text:
Ligaleleke eBhayi ekuqaleni kweveki iqela lesizwe loMzantsi Afrika leqakamba elijongene nomsebenzi onzima kakhulu. 
 UMzantsi Afrika uza kuswantsulisana neNgilane emdlalweni wesithathu wovavanyo obalulekileyo eSt George’s Park kusasa namhlanje.  
Ukubethwa yiNgilane emdlalweni wovavanyo wesibini kubeke uxinizelelo emagxeni wabadlali beProteas esazama ukubuyisa isidima emva kokugqwidiza kwitumente yehlabathi nakutyelelo obeluse-India kunyaka ophelileyo.  
UFaf du Plessis, ophantsi koxinizelelo ngenxa yendlela engancumisiyo adlala ngayo, unethemba lokuphumelela itosi namhlanje eya kumnika ilungelo lokuqhokra kuqala emdlalweni. 
 UDu Plessis unethemba lokuba indlela adlala ngayo uPieter Malan iya kuthi ilifunqule iqela lakhe.  
Amakhwenkwe kaDu Plessis avuthululwe yiNgilane ngemitsi elikhulu elinamashumi asibhozo nethoba, namhlanje kunyanzelekile ayiphucule indlela adlala ngayo.  
Ukuba akubanga njalo, iNgilane iza kugoduka nodumo. 
“Ngamanye amaxesha uyakwazi ukuphulukana nemidlalo ube umdlalo weqela uphucuka. 
 Kwicala lokuqhokra, iqela lethu lingakhuthazeka yindlela abaqhuba ngayo abantu abafana noPieter Malan.  
Kubekho iimpawu ezithembisayo kwicala labaqhokri emdlalweni obuseNewslands Stadium,” utshilo uDu Plessis ethetha neentatheli.  
AmaNgesi afumene amandla emdlalweni awuphumeleleyo eKapa kwiveki ephelileyo.  
Emdlalweni wanamhlanje afuna ukuphumelela kuphela.  
Ingenzeka lo nto ngoba athembele ngabadlali abayingozi abaquka uDom Bees noJames Anderson. 
 Kodwa kuyo yonke into, ibala ekudlalelwa kulo liba nefuthe emdlalweni kakhulu.  
UMzantsi Afrika awubanga nayo intlahla emidlalweni oyidlale neNgilane kwibala laseBhayi.  
AmaNgesi asabethwe kanye eBhayi emidlalweni yangaphambili elithoba ayidlale noMzantsi Afrika.  
“Siza kulihlola ibala ngoba anento yokuguquguquka ngokuhamba kwexesha,” utshilo uPaul Cilingwood olisekela kwiNgilane.
title: Ithemba loMzantsi libekwe kuMalan

text:
Owayedlalela iKaizer Chiefs kwiminyaka egqithileyo, uJosta Dlala, uthi usalindele izinto ezinkulu kuNkosingiphile Ngcobo eminyakeni ezayo. UDladla ukuthetha oku ngexesha elibi uNgcobo esalwela indawo yakhe kwiChiefs eqeqeshwa nguArthur Zwane. Phantsi kwesandla sikaGavin Hunt, abadlali abafana noNgcobo babeqhathula futhi benendima ebonakalayo abayenzayo abadlali abasakhasayo. Yaguquka lo nto kwakufika uStuart Baxter owathi akayazi indawo anokumdlalisa kuyo uNgcobo kwiChiefs. Iintetha ezinjalo zange zihlale kakuhle kubalandeli abalaziyo unyawo likaNgcobo. 
Akumka uBaxter, khange kube lula nalapha phantsi kukaZwane – kodwa phambi kokuvalwa kwemidlalo yeDStv Premiership kwinyanga ephelileyo, uNgcobo wenze adume ngazo iChiefs idlala ne-Orlando Pirates. Ubukho bomdlali onamava ofana noKeagan Dolly kunomthelela ekungadlalini kwakhe uNgcobo oyimveliso yeChiefs Academy. UDladla uthi kungekudala, uNgcobo uza kube engomnye wabadlali ababalulekileyo kwiChiefs phantsi kukaZwane. “UNgcobo, 23, ngumdlali webhola ekhatywayo osemgangathweni ophezulu. Kwisizini egqithileyo, ngoyena mdlali obeyinceda iChiefs xa isokola emidlalweni,” utshilo uDladla owachitha iminyaka emithandathu njengomdlali weChiefs. 
“Asiyazi into ebangela ukuba angadlali. Ngumqeqeshi yedwa owaziyo – kodwa kum, ngoyena mdlali onokuyinceda iChiefs xa kufuneka idale amathuba emidlalweni futhi uyakwazi nokufaka amagowuli. Emdlalweni obuphakathi kweChiefs nePirates kwinyanga ephelileyo, wangena wandlala kakuhle kakhulu noxa wayebonakala ukuba ubuthuntu ngenxa yokungadlaliswa rhoqo. Kufuneka alinikwe ithuba lokulwela indawo yakhe ukuze kunyuke ukuzithemba kuye,” utshilo uDladla kwi-IOL Sport. Amakhosi aza kubuyela enkomeni ekupheleni kwale xa edibana neGolden Arrows emdlalweni weDStv Premiership oza kube useMoses Mabhida Stadium. Emva kwesiqalo sesizini esidikidi, uZwane uza kulwela ukuvala umsantsa omkhulu ophakathi kweChiefs neSundowns ehleli kwindawo ephezulu kwiDStv Premiership.
title: UJosta Dladla uthi ulindele lukhulu kuNkosingiphile Ngcobo xa kuvulwa isizini

text:
Ndise ndanethemba kuRamaphosa yazi, andazi noba ndizithembisa njee, siyaphela thina yindlala kwiinkampani zabucala, osogqiba siphathwe kakubi kube ngcono kwa izinja kunathi siziSecurity ngoba noko zona ziyayenzelwa kwa indlu yayo. 
Ngathi ulambe ngengqondo kanti sisisu. Ndikhupha nje intlungu akhonto.  
– Unogada
title: – Thumela eyakho ileta eya kuMhleli ngeSMS okanye ngoWhatsapp ku: 063 743 9538

text:
KUBHUBHE abantu abathathu bosapho olunye ngenxa yomlilo ngentseni yanamhlanje kwilali yaseZeleni eQonce.  
 
Ngokwengxelo ephuma kwisithethi samapolisa ephondweni uKapteni Siphokazi Mawisa, ithi kulo mlilo kubhubhe owasetyhini oneminyaka engamashumi amathandathu anesixhenxe ubudala (67), abazukulwana bexhoba ababini abangamantombazana, oneminyaka emithathu (3)  kwakunye noneminyaka emithandathu (6)  bezelwe.  
 
Lo mlilo awaziwa ukuba uqale njani. 
 
UMawisa udiza ukuba akukho nyawo lwamfene lukrokrelwayo okwangoku. Uthi amapolisa asaqhubekeka nophando malunga nonobangela wokubhubha kolu sapho.  Amapolisa alivulile ityala.
title: Kuphandwa ngokutsha kubhubhe usapho eQonce!

text:
Isizini inye yile izayo, kwi-English Premier League, kuzakudlala iintsimbi abantu bebukele.  
Amaqela esixeko esidumileyo kwihlabathi iManchester, omabini anabaqeqeshi abatsha, lo nto ithethe ukuthi ukhuphiswano phakathi kwawo luzakuthi chatha kuneminye iminyaka.  
Ayingobaqeqeshi nje ke aba; ngoompondo zihlanjiwe, ophopho neenkcuba buchopho zebhola ekhatywayo. Abo nguPep Guardiola noJose Mourinho.  
Umqeqeshi omtsha weManchester City, uPep Guardiola, uthi ukulawulwa kakuhle kweli qela zezinye zezinto ezimtsalileyo. Ukutsho oku kwintetho yakhe ayenze esidlangalaleni ngethuba esaziswa kwinginginya yabalandeli beqela lakhe elitsha.  
Lo mfo kaGuardiola usuka kwilizwe laseJamani, apho ebeqeqesha iqela elingoorha satsha iBayern Munich. Phambi kokuya kwakhe kwelamaJamani, wayeqeqesha iBarcelona FC yaseSpain, awazibalula kuyo ngebhola eyaziwa ngokuba yiTikateka.  
“Ndikhulele kwelinye lamaziko abalulekileyo ehlabathini elivelisa abadlali abatsha eBarcelona, kuloo ndawo abadlali abancinci babalulekile. Esinye sezizathu esibangele ukuba ndize apha kungoba ndiyakwazi ukubaluleka kokuveliswa kwabadlali bangomso,” utshilo uGuardiola.  
Akukho apho aqeqeshe khona uGuardiola angayifumani impumelelo. Nalapha kwiManchester City kulindelwe lukhulu ngabalandeli abafuna ukubona iqela labo ligqugqisa kwakhona kwi-EPL nakwiChampions League yaseYurophu.  
Lo mqeqeshi kuwo onke amaqela awaqeqeshileyo ukwazile ukufumana impumelelo, ngoko ke nalapha kwiManchester City kulindeleke ukuba afumane impumelelo efanayo nakuloo maqela asuka kuwo.  
Ubukho bakhe kwi-EPL buzakuthi bufunqule ukhuphiswano phakathi kwamaqela amakhulu.
title: Ugalelekile uGuardiola eManchester

text:
IPHUPHA likaMlindi Ntloko lokubona iMpuma Koloni ihlonitshwa kwaye ifumana ingqwalasela kumculo weJazz lizalisekile. 
Kaloku ukuqala ngomso umhla wama20 de ibe yiCawa umhla wama22 kweyoMsintsi 2019, iyaqala iEastern Cape Jazz Festival yokuqala. 
Lo mnyhadala, ngokutsho komsunguli wawo uNtloko, iza kuba liqonga lweemvumi zomngqungqo weli phondo zidibene nezinye ezithandwayo eMzantsi Afrika. 
“Injongo yalo mnyhadala kukumanya iimvumi zeJazz kwaye zifumane neqonga eliza kuzenza zizingce nanjengoko lingekho iqonga lomculo weJazz ephondweni,” kutsho uNtloko encokolela I’solezwe lesiXhosa. 
UNtloko uthi le ngcamango yamfikela kwiminyaka emithathu, kulapho wagqiba kwelokuthabatha inxaxheba kweminye iminyhadala yeJazz ukuze abone uhlobo ekuqhutywa ngalo. 
“Kweminye ufika kuxutywe iindidi ngeendidi zomculo noxa nje kuthiwa ngeyeJazz. Ndabona ithuba lokwenza iqonga lokuhlonipha iimvumi zeJazz zodwa,” kutsho uNtloko. 
Uthi ufuna umnyhadala ongengowedolophu yaseMonti nje kuphela, kodwa owephondo lonke. 
UNtloko udize ukutsala nzima kwicala lenkxaso kodwa esithi oko akukhange kumtyhafise. 
“Ukuba bendiyenzela udumo lwam ngendiye ndatyhafa ngenxa yokuswela inkxaso, kodwa konke ndikwenza egameni leqonga lomngqungqo,” utshilo, ekwabulela isebe lobuGcisa neNkcubeko nezeMidlalo ngokuzama ukumxhasa. 
Lo mnyhadala ontsukuntathu, uza kuqala eGuild Theatre ngoLwesihlanu, nalapho uza kuvulwa ngodlwabevu lwentetho kaNjingalwazi Mongane Wally Serote ongumbhali nembongi. IBuffalo City Metro Orchestra ekhokelwa nguRichard Lento nayo iza kukhwela eqongeni. 
Ukanti ngoMgqibelo, eAbbortsford Christian Centre ukuqala ngentsimbi yesibini emalanga, iimvumi ezifana noSibongile Khumalo, Selaelo Selota, Lulama Gaulana, Lindiwe Maxolo, Lwanda Gogwana, Dumza Maswana, Titi Luzipo, Mlungisi Gegana, Retsi Pule nabanye baza kube begilana eqongeni. 
SIPHISA NGAMATIKITI AMANE, KUBANTU ABANE!! 
Sinamatikiti mane (4) esiphisa ngawo, ukuze uzifumanele elakho phendula le mibuzo mithathu ilandelayo. 
Igama lemvumi enye oyithandayo eza kube ikulo mnyhadala? 
Ngubani omseki walo mnyhadala? 
Uza kube uphi, nini? 
Thumela impendulo ikhatshwa ngamagama akho nenombolo yomnxeba kwi-Inbox kaFacebook wethu: Ilisolezwe okanye kuTwitter wethu @ilisolezwe 
Abaphumeleleyo bakutsalelwa ngoLwesihlanu!
title: Umnyhadala wokuqala weJazz eMpuma Koloni

text:
Abadlali beqela lombhoxo kwenye yeelali zaseNcerha bafumene impahla entsha kraca emva kokuphumelela itumente yepasika kutshanje.  
Abantu beelali babuthelene kumabala emidlalo eNcerha – apho amaqela alishumi elinesixhenxe akhuphisene khona kwitumente yombhoxo.  
Nangona ingqele ibiqhaqhazelisa amazinyo – kodwa abantu bebephume ngobuninzi babo.  
Le tumente ibinkulu kwaye bekukhuphisana amaqela aziwayo ekuhlaleni afana neYoung Leopards, S.A. Barbarians, Black Hawkers, Young Stars, Rhinos, Storm Breakers, Winter Rose, Sky Blues, Village 3, Hungry Lions, Gxethu Hungry Lions, Wonderful 15, Strandloopers, Brother, 15 Attackers, Tigers, Bombers neGreen Aloes.  
Le tumente ibizinyaswe nguNkosi uMthuthuzeli Makinana, uNkz. Mntuse Ntsokoma noMandla Moshani weBuffalo City.  
Iqela eliphumeleleyo lifumene izikipha zombhoxo ezilingene abadlali beqela elipheleleyo. “Indima edlalwa yimidlalo ekubumbeni iinkokeli ibalulekile,” utshilo uNkosi Makinana.
title: Incede abadlala umbhoxo iContralesa

text:
USIHLALO weANC eMpuma Koloni uOscar Mabuyane uthi “ukumosha” kwamalungu eANC angasihloniphiyo isikhokelo sephondo, asokuze kunyamezelwe sisigqeba sakhe. 
UMabuyane ukuthethe oku ngethuba iANC yephondo ibibambe indibano yokucwangcisa inkqubo yolonyulo lwephondo kwihotele iOsner eMonti kwimpelaveki esiyishiya ngasemva. 
“NjengePEC (ikomiti embaxa yeANC ephondweni) sisolulile isandla sethu ngeenjongo zokwenza uxolo kwabo bebeneminqweno eyahlukileyo kwisikhokelo ngethuba le nkomfa. 
“Kodwa maqabane mayicace le nto, umanyano aluthethi ukuba kufuneka sinyamezele nokuba siyabona kusenziwa izinto ezigwenxa okanye sikubethe ngoyaba ukumosha,” utshilo uMabuyane. 
La mazwi kaMabuyane ajolise kwiqela lamalungu eANC awayexhasa iNkulumbuso uPhumulo Masualle kwiphulo lakhe lokuzigqatsa isihlandlo sesithathu sokuba nguSihlalo weANC. 
UMasualle waphulukana nolu gqatso, ebethwa nguMabuyane kwinkomfa eyayibanjelwe eICC, apho kwaliwa khona ze amanye amalungu ashiyeka elujaja ligazi. 
Amalinge okuchitha isikhokelo sikaMabuyane aphanzile, emva kokuba iANC kazwelonke igqibe ngelithi iyasigunyazisa esi sikhokelo. 
Ebalisela I’solezwe lesiXhosa, unobhala weANC ephondweni uLulama Ngcukayitobi uthe: Unobangela wokudibana kwethu kukuba sifuna ukuqinisa zonke izintlu zeANC, ukuze zilungele unyulo lonyaka ozayo.” 
“Sisenzile isicwangciso sonyulo lonyaka ozayo njengephondo, ngoku into eseleyo kukuba siye kumanqanaba angezantsi ukuze wonke umntu abekwiphulo lethu lokuzuza iivoti ezithathwe eMpuma Koloni,” utshilo uNgcukayitobi. 
UNgcukayitobi ukwathe kungekudala baza kuphengulula igalelo elenziwe ngamalungu abo athunywe kwiPalamente yephondo nekazwelonke. 
“Enye into ebesidibene ngayo kukuphengulula umsebenzi wegalelo lamalungu ethu asePalamente, kuba ngenyanga yeKhala sizakube siqala inkqubo yokulungisa uluhlu lwabo bafanele ukuthunyelwa kwiPalamente yephondo nakuzwelonke kunyaka ozayo. 
“Phambi konyaka ka2014, kukho izinto esazithembisa abantu bakuthi. Ngoko ke kubalulekile ukujonga ukuba kumaxa siphi na, ukuze sazi ukuba zintoni esisilele kuzo,” kutsho uNgcukayitobi. 
UNgcukayitobi uthi bayaqhuba nokuthetha noMasualle ngemiba echaphazela urhulumento lwephondo. 
“Siyathetha neNkulumbuso, ngemiba yokutshintshwa kwekhabhinethi yephondo, siyathetha ngemiba ebekufanele ukuba sigxila kuyo ingakumbi xa sithetha ngokusiwa kweenkonzo eluntwini.”
title: ‘Umanyano aluthethi ukunyamezela ukumosha’

text:
OOsomashishini abasakhulayo abakhangela umsebenzi kumasipala waseBCM ngokufaka izicelo zabo, batyhola ukuba bangamaxhoba okuthukwa ligosa elithile kulo masipala.  
Ingxelo ithi eli gosa lisebenzisa izithuko xa libaxelela oko kumele ukuba bakwenze okanye ekumele ukuba beze nako. Bathukwa ngoonina abantu ligosa likamasipala waseBCM ngethuba betyelele ii-ofisi zikamasipala eChiselhurst eMonti.  
UThandolwethu Sawuli lixhoba lokugqibela lale ndoda edume ngokuthuka abantu abafuna iinkonzo kula masipala.  
“Ebengaqali kundithuka lo mfo emva kokuba ndiye ndabuza okuthile kuye, sithe sakungavani wandithuka ngomama esithi uzakundibulala ndinye ukuba andibhadlanga, ndithe ndakuxelela amanye amagosa, andixelela ukuba ngumthetho wakhe uyabathuka abantu,” uthethe watsho uSawuli. 
 Eli xhoba liphila ngokufumana imisebenzi kwamasipala nanjengoko linenkampani eyenza imisebenzi eyahlukeneyo.  
Ngenxa yesi sigrogriso sokundibulala, ndibaleke ndaya kuvula ityala kumapolisa aseCambridge ndinqwenela ukuba kuthathwe amanyathelo ngakulo mfo.  
UBongile Manki naye uthi uyazana nokuxhatshazwa ngokuthukwa sesi sicaka sabantu.  
“Usithuka ngoomama lo mfo, uthuka nabantu abangoomama abadala abaya phaya befuna ukuncedwa, bathi kuba bayamoyika, basuke bahleke kuba bafuna ukufumana umsebenzi,” uthethe watsho uManki. 
Le ndoda isebenza kwisetyana elijongene nokukhutshwa kwemisebenzi ngokuqesha iinkampani zabucala. Igama lomtyholwa liyaziwa leli phephandaba.  
Umqulu obonisa indlela abamele ukusebenza ngayo abasebenzi bakarhulumente kweli, uthi makuhlonitshwe, kuqalwe ngabantu kuqala kuyo yonke into eqhubeka kwarhulumente.  
“Ngale mini ebendithuka ngayo ibingumhla wesihlanu apha kule nyanga, undixelele ukuba ebendibonile egaraji eQonce, wacinga ukuhlasela andenzakalise phaya,” uthethe watsho uSawuli.  
Elinye ixhoba elingavumanga negama lalo, lithi yinto endala eqhelekileyo kubo bengoosomashishini abancinci ukuthukwa leli gosa laseBCM.  
“Xa sifaka ezi zicelo zethu zokufumana umsebenzi phaya, siye sisebenzise iifowuni zaphaya kwamasipala, uye afike lo mfo siphaya, abuze ingxaki yakho uzame ukucacisa, xa aphendulayo akakwazi kuthetha nawe engakuthukanga, ekuxelela ukuba uyincuva, le nto uyifunayo ayifanelekanga ukuba ifunwe apha emnxebeni, uyathuka yena,” litshilo ixhoba. 
Kwiinzame zethu zokufumana isetyana elijongene nonxibelelwano kumasipala waseBuffalo City Municipality, asikhange siyifumane impendulo. Bangaphezu kwesihlanu oosomashishini abasakhulayo esithethe nabo ngalo mcimbi, bengavumi kuthetha kodwa bengqina ukuba iyabathuka le ndoda.  
“Ukhohlakele lo mfana, kungcono ukuba ubengumhlobo wakhe ukuze ufumane iinkonzo kula ndawo, awuvumelekanga ukuba ubone izinto ngokwahlukileyo kuye, undincede ngegama lam, nam ndiyoyika,” litshilo ixhoba.
title: Libathuka ngoonina igosa laseBCM

text:
UMnombo Foundation, onjongo yawo ikukuxhobisa, kwanokuphuhlisa ulutsha kwizakhono zoshishino – uphehlelele ngokusesikweni iiofisi zawo ezintsha zakwaLongrich eMonti ngempelaveki, oza kuthi ujongane neemfuno zolu lutsha. 
 Umsunguli weUmnombo Foundation uHlathikazi Beni, uthi uye wagqiba ekubeni athathe eli thuba lokuba asebenzise le nkampani yakwaLongrich esele isaziwa ngokuxhobisa ulutsha olutsala nzima.  
UBeni uthi ziliqela izinto eza kuthi inkquleqhu yabo izenze ukuncedisana nabantu abaninzi ekuquka kuzo abanikazi bamashishini ekudala befuna ukukhulisa amashishini abo, imibutho engenanto yakwenza norhulumente efuna inkxaso, abanikazi beeteksi nabo bathengisa ezitalatweni. 
UMnombo Foundation usebenzisana nesikolo iNkwenkwezi Private College. Uthi bakwafundisa ulutsha nangohlobo lokubhala iileta zezicelo zomsebenzi kuquka neeCV.  
Uthi abantu abatsha into abaye bayenze kukuba bangazilandeleli izicelo zabo xa bethe bazithumela kwaye bangakwazi nokuba bazithengise kwiiCV ezo zabo ngokusebenzisa ulwazi abalufumene kule nkampani.  
Uthi kumba wemali yesibonelelo sabafundi uNSFAS, bancedisa abafundi kuba uninzi lwabo luye luyisebenzise gwenxa loo mali.  
“Into esiyenzayo siye sibathengisele iimveliso zethu, ezingundoqo, abaye bazisebenzise ezifana nezinto zokuthambisa. Esisenabo abafundi ngabaseWalter Sisulu University kwakunye neFort Hare.”  
Izicwangciso zabo kukujikeleza iphondo lonke kwaye nabanomdla abafundi nabani na wamkelekile ukungena kolu qeqesho lwezoshishino luqhutywa yiUMnombo Foundation, Longrich kwakunye ne-Inkwenkwezi Private College.
title: Kuphehlelelwe uMnombo Foundation eMonti

text:
Ukuba zingalandelwa izigqibo zenkomfa entsuku ntathu ibibanjelwe eFort Hare ngenene lingaguquka ilizwe loMzantsi Afrika. Inkomfa entsuku ntathu ibibanjelwe kweli ziko ibijoliswe ukupheka amacebo okuguqula intlalo yelizwe ngokusebenzisa amaziko emfundo ephakamileyo.  
Iinjingalwazi, oogqirha neengcali zemfundo zithathe iintsuku ezintathu zixoxa ukuba la maziko angalinceda njani ilizwe ukuba liguqule indlela abafundiswa ngayo, into abayifundiswa ukwakhiwa kweenkokheli, indima yeenkokheli ekuhlaleni nezinye ezijoliswe ukuphucula intlalo. Ezi ngcali beziphuma kumaziko emfundo aphakamileyo kuMzantsi Afrika, kumazwe aseAfrika nakumazwe angaphandle. Okona kubaluleke kakhulu ngale nkomfa ibe- kukuvuma kwakhe wonke umntu obelapha ukuba kukho imfuneko yokutshintshwa kwentlalo, nokuvumelana ukuba ukutshintshwa kwemeko yentlalo kungenzeka lula ngenxa yezifundo ezifundiswa ngala maziko. 
Uhlobo leenkokheli ezikhoyo ekuhlaleni ezinye kuzo ziphuma kula maziko ezinye azikhange zingene nokungena kumaziko emfundo ephakamileyo. Ezi njingalwazi zithi makwenziwe amacebo okuba abo bangena kula maziko baphume babenefuthe elihle kwintlalo yabantu. Ukuguqulwa kwezifundo ezifundiswa ngala maziko kubalulekile ukuze zenziwe zihambelane neemfuno zelizwe ingakumbi ezijoliswe ukuphucula intlalo.  
Ubusela nobuqhophololo zibhuqa urhulumente weli, kwanamanye amazwe aseAfrika kungumzekelo wokuba la maziko anoxanduva lokuvelisa iinkokheli ezizo ngokutshintsha izifundo ezifundiswa kula maziko. Iinkokheli zabafundi eziphuma kumaziko ahlukileyo emfundo ephakamileyo zithi abantwana abangena kula maziko mabafundiswe imbali ezakubanceda ukuba babengabantu abahlukileyo. 
Ngenene ikhona imfuneko yokuguqulwa kwendlela abantu beli nehlabathi ngokubanzi ababona nabenza ngayo izinto. Izinga lobundlobongela ezitalatweni, ezindlini nakwiindawo zokudibana nabanye abantu ziyangqina ukuba ikho imfuneko yokwenziwa kweenguqu. Ukutshiswa kwezakhiwo zikarhulumente xa kufunwa kuthetha ukuba iinkokheli zezi nkqubo zidinga unikwa ulwazi neemfundiso.
title: Inguqu ngokusebenza kweeYunivesithi

text:
Abalandeli bakaLionel Messi baqumbile emva kokuba engacholanga naphantsi kumdlalo we-Argentina wokuqala kwi-2018 FIFA World Cup namhlanje. Izolo, indoda akhuphisana nayo, uCristiano Ronaldo, ibhakuzelise umnatha yatsho yafumana amagowuli amathathu anceda iPortugal ebambene ngo’3-3 neSpain kumdlalo obutak’ iintlantsi. Namhlanje uMessi uvinjwe ithuba lokubeka ilizwe lakhe endaweni entle ngethuba unozinti, uHalldorsson, ebamba ipenela yakhe kumdlalo ophele i-Argentina ne-Iceland zibambene ngo’1-1 eMoscow Stadium. Omabini amagowuli angene kwisigaba sokuqala somdlalo. Abadlali be-Iceland elilizwe elincinane babonisile ukuba abayanga eRussia ukuyokongeza amanani. 
 
Isiqingatha sokuqala siphele amazwe ebambene ngegowuli macala. Ilizwe lase-Iceland lothuse abantu abaninzi ngokumelana ngamandla neziqwayi zabadlali be-Argentina abaquka uLionel Messi, uDI Maria noSergio Agüero. Iphelile imizuzu engamashumi amabini kwisigaba sokuqala somdlali abadlali be-Argentina bengakwazi ukufumana igowuli – kodwa kuthe sekungaseni uSergio Agüero wenza adume ngazo. Ufake ibhola entle ayibeke ekoneni ibhola emva kokuvunyelwa ngabadlali be-Iceland abadlala emva. Kodwa khange kuphele mizuzu mingaphi – uFinnbogason ufake igowuli lokulinganisa. 
 
 
Abadlali be-Iceland babuye betyhile emfeneni kwisigaba sesibini somdlalo kaGroup D. Bayixheshe ngamandla i-Argentina ebingenazo iimpendulo. UMessi ucikwe ipenela nguHolldorsson ebinikwe i-Argentina emva kokuwiswa komdlali wayo. Abekhona amathuba afunyenwe ngabadlali be-Argentina – kodwa ayikwazanga ukugqobhoza kwade kwase kugqibeleni. Umdlalo uphele ebambene ngegowuli elinye macala. Ilizwe lase-Iceland lenze umsebenzi omhle kakhulu nakubeni kwisiga sesibini lingakwazanga kangako ukuya phambili. 
Argentina: Caballero, Salvio, Otamendi, Rojo, Tagliafico, Biglia, Mascherano, Meza, Messi, DI Maria, Aguero. 
Iceland: Halldorsson, Saevarsson, Arnason, R. Sigurdsson, Magnusson, Gudmundsson, Gunnarsson, Hallfredsson, Bjarson, G. Sigurdsson, Finnbogason.
title: Abalandeli bakaMessi baqumbile emva kokukhonkxwa yi-Iceland

text:
Ukungabikho kwamathuba emisebenzi kulutsha lwaseNdevana ngaseQonce kunefuthe kwizinga eliphezulu lokusetyenziswa gwenxa kweziyobisi kwanolwaphulomthetho. Okunye ubuninzi beendawo zentselo kule Ndevana nako kunegalelo kuba ulutsha luchitha ixesha kwezi ndawo ngenxa  yokungabinanto yokwenza. 
Oku kubangele ukuba imibutho engenanto yakwenza norhulumente iMasimanyane Women’s Rights International kwakunye neBumb’ iNGOMSO  zingenelele ngokuthi zihlabe ikhwelo kulutsha ekubeni luze ngaphambili ngeenzame zokulwa oku. 
Eli phulo lokuxhobisa uluntu ngezenzo zeGBV, belibanjelwe kwirenki yezithuthi eNdevana ngoLwesibini kule veki. 
UBongiwe Menqe ongomnye wetshantliziyo nokwangumsebenzi kwiSebe loPhuhliso loLuntu uthi uyayazi ukuba amathuba emisebenzi anqabile kodwa ukhuthaza abantu abangoosisi ekubeni bavuke bazenzele, bangaxhomekeki emadodeni. 
“Uloyiko lwam kukuba xa umntu ongusisi engaphangeli exhomekeke kumntu ongubhuti ahlalisana naye, maninzi amathuba okuba axhaphazeke lo sisi kuba kaloku uxhomekeke kule ndoda, kwaye nendoda ibe negunya lokumxhaphaza kuba imazi akanamva namphambili,” utshilo uMenqe. 
ULerato Nocanda weMasimanyane Women’s Rights International uthi uthetha ngento ayaziyo kuba sele ekhe wahlala eNdevana, yeyona ndawo ihamba phambili ngolwaphulomthetho ngenxa yokuba ulutsha alunanto yokwenza. Uthi ukukhulelwa  kwabantwana abangamantombazana, iziyobisi, iHIV, ukubulawa kwamakhosikazi kwenzeka eNdevana. Uthi ziilali ezi, awakwazi ukuthetha xa exhatshazwa amanina kuba esoyika ukujajwa luluntu. 
“Silapha kuba sizokubonisa uluntu ukuba ikhona indawo yokukhalela xa lujongene nezi ngxaki. Luninzi ulutsha apha eNdevana kwaye aluphangeli, abantu baphila ngabantu apha. Abangamantombazana  baxhomekeka emadodeni nto leyo ibenza ukuba bonqene ukufuna imisebenzi kwanokuvolontiya, kungoko liphezulu izinga lolwaphulomthetho. Siza kuzama abantu abatsha namhlanje ekubeni baphakame bazenzele kwaye beze nangaphambili abafuna uncedo. 
Umama uNobefu Mthetho waseGugulethu eNdevana, 66, nobephulaphule ngethuba kuqhuba le nkqubo, encokola neli phephandaba uthe: “Ndiyavakalelwa, akumnandanga kwaphela kuba sinabantwana abahamba ngobusuku! Ukufa ngoku kusebantwaneni! Usizi lwento, bebulawa ngabantu abathandana nabo abangafuni ukulahlwa, abanye babulawe nje bezihambela. Sicenga uThixo ekubeni angenelele kwindalo yakhe. Yanga abenzi bobubi bangatyiwa sisazela xa benokumamela le nto ithethwa apha yiMasimanyane.”
title: Iingxaki ezombethe ulutsha lwaseNdevana!

text:
Ngethuba ibekwa ngokusesikweni kulo nyaka uphelileyo iKumkani yamaMampondo aseNyandeni nequka iidolophu ezintathu iSajonisi, iLibode kunye neNgqeleni, yathi iza kugxininisa kakhulu ekuziseni uphuhliso kulo mmandla waseNyandeni. 
Umnatha iIOL yamcaphula esithi, “Indawo yaseNyandeni ineedolophu ezihleli phez’ konxweme ezidinga ukuphuhliswa, iSajonisi inesakhono sokutsala abatyeleli abaliqela kodwa intswelangqesho iyagquba kula ndawo, masisebenzisaneni ekuphuceleni le ndawo yethu,” watsho uKumkani. 
NgoLwesibini kule veki sikuyo uKumkani Ndlovuyezwe Ndamase ehambisana nenkampani iReclaiming & Restoring Africa (RRA) uthe wabiza inkomfa yoonondaba kwihotele yaseMayfair eMthatha nalapho ebesithi ufuna ukwazisa ilizwe into yokuba ayiyontsomi into yokwakhiwa kwedolophu entsha eNyandeni. 
“Ndibize oonondaba ngoba ndifuna niyazi ukuba iyinyani into yokwakhiwa kweNyandeni City, ayiyontsomi nto nje yinto eseyiqhubeka kungoku,” utshilo uKumkani Ndamase. 
Wongezile esithi bona beyindlu yaseNyandeni bazimisele ngophuhliso kwaye abakhethi bani. 
“Nabanina othi uzisa uphuhliso eNyandeni ndiyamamkela, ukuba qha uqinisekile ukuba uza yimela lo nto thina asinanxa naye. Nabani na uvumelekile azothetha nathi sibubukhosi,” utshilo uKumkani. 
Othembisa ngokuphuhlisa le ndawo yaseNyandeni uLealeboga Gift Mogapi weRRA uthe isiqingatha sokuqala xa kusakhiwa le dolophu entsha iNyandeni City kuzoxabisa imali eyi7.5 trillion yeerandi. 
“Ndinabo abatyalimali endithetha nabo futhi bayivumile into yokokuba into ethi sikhona isakhono kula ndawo yaseSajonisi kwaye isiqingatha esingu35% wale mali edingekayo eyi7.5 trillion sendisifumene,” utshilo uMogapi. 
Uqhubeke esithi uzamile ukusondeza abahlali kunye norhulumente kolu phuhliso. 
“Sithethile nabahlali sibazisa ngolu phuhliso, abantu baseGomolo naseNdluzula ndathetha nabo bayayazi ukuba iyakhiwa idolophu le. Abantu abayi66 sele besebenza phaya, ningaya niyokujonga phaya. 
“Ndithethile noSodolophu waseSajonisi emva kokuba sidityaniswe nguKumkani ndimxelela ngolu phuhliso kodwa khange andithathele ngqalelo ngoba kungoku akayiphenduli imiyalezo endimshiyela yona kwaye akalicholi  
                                   Umfanekiso: Yolande Feni 
ucingo lwakhe xa ndimkhangela,” utshilo uMogapi. 
“Xa kusakhiwa idolophu le iNyandeni City asiyidingi imali karhulumente ngoba noba bona bengurhulumente bakhethe ukuzibhekelisa, okusalayo izoqhubeka,” utsho uMogapi. 
Uthi into abayidingayo yimvume yokusebenza umhlaba qha kurhulumente. Uphinde wathi bona abananjongo yokuba kukhuphiswano norhulumente. 
“Ndifuna nina niziintatheli niye kuRhulumente niyombuza ukuba kutheni engandihoyi nje. Niyandiva ndityhola abantu apha kengoku hambani nibabuze ukuba kutheni bengandithatheli ngqalelo kodwa ndiza nento enkulu kangaka?” utshilo ebonakalisa ukufunza. 
Uthi abantu abaninzi bazokuthi liphupha eli kodwa ayililo. 
“Ingxaki yile yokuba ndingumntu omnyama kwaye ndingazisondezanga kwezopolitiko,” utsho uMogapi. 
Xa ufuna ukwazi ukuba iza kubanjani iNyandeni City yiba nomfanekiso wedolophu iDubai ngoba izakhiwo ezizokwakhiwa zikhuthazwa zezi phaya.
title: Iyeza iNyandeni City eza kufana neDubai eMampondweni!

text:
UBrian Baloyi, umqeqeshi wonozinti kwiKaizer Chiefs, kuyanyanzeleka ukuba azimele ngenqayi elangeni ngoku futhi abonise wonke ubani ukuba ngenene lo msebenzi angawenza ngaphandle kokusingathwa. Igqala eliyingcaphephe kwicala lokuqeqesha oonozinti, uRainer Dinkelacker, unike uBaloyi iintambo ngokusesikweni ukuba ibenguye owenza umsebenzi wokuqeqesha nokulola izakhono zoonozinti kweli qela laseNaturena.  
Njengokuba wabuyiswa buphuthuphuthu kwixesha lakhe lokuphumla kunyaka ophelileyo emva kokuba uDennis Rudel, owayengene endaweni kaRainer, wagqiba kwelokuba ayishiye iChiefs, ngoku kuye kwafikelela ixesha lokuba abuyele ekhayeni lakhe eGermany. 
UDinkelacker, onamashumi amathandathu anesixhenxe, uncede iChiefs yavelisa oonozinti abaphume izandla esingabalula kubo uBrian Baloyi, uRowen Fernandez, * -Arthur Bartman, * -Itumeleng Khune noBrilliant Khune ukusukela ngo-1999, unyaka awafika ngawo kweli lizwe loMzantsi Afrika.  
Yena uBaloyi ubuyele kwiChiefs phambi kokuqala kwale sizini iqhubayo. Kwezi nyanga zintlanu zidlulileyo ebephantsi koqeqesho lukaDinklelacker.  
Umsebenzi wakhe ophambili ngoku uBaloyi kukuqinisekisa ukuba uKhune, uKhuzwayo noReyaad Pieterse bakwisimo esilungele umdlalo ngamaxesha onke. “URainer uthathe umhlalaphantsi ngokusesikweni,” utshilo uVina Maphosa, isithethi seChiefs izolo.
title: URainer umkile, intoishiyeke noBaloyi

text:
Umqeqeshi waMabhoko-bhoko, u-Allister Coetzee, uyavuma ukuba iqela lakhe kufuneka lilungise izinto eziliqela phambi komdlalo olandelayo ne-Argentina – kodwa uyakubethelela ukubaluleka kokuphumelela noba kusekho iimpazamo ezilungiswayo.    Oku ukuthethwe nguCoetzee emva komdlalo izolo eMbombela Stadium – apho AmaBhoko-bhoko afumene impumelelo ngokubetha i-Argentina ngo’30-23 kwimizuzu yokugqibela emdlalweni.   Lo mdlalo ibingomnye wemidlalo emine yovavanyo ezakudlalwa nguMzantsi Afrika nelizwe lase-Argentina.   Umdlali weeBoks olithemba kule mihla, uDamian de Allende, wenze ezibukwayo kwakhona lo nto ikhokelele kwimpumelelo ebidingwa kakhulu nguMzantsi Afrika oqhwaywa ngokuphumelela imidlalo ngongciphu emva kovavanyo lwe-Ireland, eBhayi, kutshanje.   UCoetzee, njengomqeqeshi, uzivumile iziphene ezenziwe liqela lakhe – kodwa watsho encoma umsebenzi owenziwe ngabadlali bakhe ekugqibeleni.    “Kufuneka kubekho into esiyenzayo, asikwazi ukuhlala sibhungca emidlalweni ngolu hlobo. Ndiyithandile indlela esiwuqale ngayo umdlalo – noxa amandla wethu aye ehla phambi kokuphela kwesiqingatha sokuqala nasekuqaleni kwesiqingatha sesibini,” utshilo uCoetzee.  “Sizamile ukudala amathuba ngoBryan Habana ekunxele. Into nje embi kukuba asiwasebenzisanga loo mathuba futhi kuye kwakho iimpazamo ezincinci eziliqela emdlalweni wethu. Indlela esidlale ngayo amashumi amabini emizuzu okuqala emdlalweni iyancomeka. Ndifuna umdlalo onjeya oko. Into endiyithethayo kukuthi izigqibo ezithathwe ngabadlali kwiindawo ezibalulekileyo bezingafanelekanga kwaye nokukhaba kwethu kuyakhalisa. Kufuneka sibenaso isibindi kwixesha elizayo futhi siwasebenzise amathuba. Udonga lwethu emva luyandixhalabisa njengokuba sisiya kula mdlalo useSalta ngoMgqibelo ozayo. Iguqukile i-Argentina ukusukela ngo’2015 kwaye isothusile indlela edlale ngayo. Ikwazile ukusigubengela amatyeli aliqela, kufuneka sifunde kwezo zinto,” utshilo uCoetzee.   Umqeqeshi weePumas [Argentinna], uDaniel Hourcade, uthe ibacaphukisile abadlali bakhe indlela abadlale ngayo yokugqibela yomdlalo.  Lo mqeqeshi woleke ngelithi kumdlalo oseSalta iqela lakhe linethuba lokulungisa iimpazamo.    
Umqeqeshi waMabhoko-bhoko, u-Allister Coetzee, uyavuma ukuba iqela lakhe kufuneka lilungise izinto eziliqela phambi komdlalo olandelayo ne-Argentina – kodwa uyakubethelela ukubaluleka kokuphumelela noba kusekho iimpazamo ezilungiswayo.

“Kufuneka kubekho into esiyenzayo, asikwazi ukuhlala sibhungca emidlalweni ngolu hlobo. Ndiyithandile indlela esiwuqale ngayo umdlalo – noxa amandla wethu aye ehla phambi kokuphela kwesiqingatha sokuqala nasekuqaleni kwesiqingatha sesibini,” utshilo uCoetzee. 
 “Sizamile ukudala amathuba ngoBryan Habana ekunxele. Into nje embi kukuba asiwasebenzisanga loo mathuba futhi kuye kwakho iimpazamo ezincinci eziliqela emdlalweni wethu. Indlela esidlale ngayo amashumi amabini emizuzu okuqala emdlalweni iyancomeka. Ndifuna umdlalo onjeya oko. Into endiyithethayo kukuthi izigqibo ezithathwe ngabadlali kwiindawo ezibalulekileyo bezingafanelekanga kwaye nokukhaba kwethu kuyakhalisa. Kufuneka sibenaso isibindi kwixesha elizayo futhi siwasebenzise amathuba. Udonga lwethu emva luyandixhalabisa njengokuba sisiya kula mdlalo useSalta ngoMgqibelo ozayo. Iguqukile i-Argentina ukusukela ngo’2015 kwaye isothusile indlela edlale ngayo. Ikwazile ukusigubengela amatyeli aliqela, kufuneka sifunde kwezo zinto,” utshilo uCoetzee.   Umqeqeshi weePumas [Argentinna], uDaniel Hourcade, uthe ibacaphukisile abadlali bakhe indlela abadlale ngayo yokugqibela yomdlalo.  Lo mqeqeshi woleke ngelithi kumdlalo oseSalta iqela lakhe linethuba lokulungisa iimpazamo.

Indlela esidlale ngayo amashumi amabini emizuzu okuqala emdlalweni iyancomeka. Ndifuna umdlalo onjeya oko. Into endiyithethayo kukuthi izigqibo ezithathwe ngabadlali kwiindawo ezibalulekileyo bezingafanelekanga kwaye nokukhaba kwethu kuyakhalisa. Kufuneka sibenaso isibindi kwixesha elizayo futhi siwasebenzise amathuba. Udonga lwethu emva luyandixhalabisa njengokuba sisiya kula mdlalo useSalta ngoMgqibelo ozayo.  Umqeqeshi weePumas [Argentinna], uDaniel Hourcade, uthe ibacaphukisile abadlali bakhe indlela abadlale ngayo yokugqibela yomdlalo.  Lo mqeqeshi woleke ngelithi kumdlalo oseSalta iqela lakhe linethuba lokulungisa iimpazamo.

title: Coetzee: Kungcono ukulungisa iimpazamo siphumelela imidlalo

text:
Amakhosi agoduka namanqaku amathathu emva kokuba ebethe iCape Town City ngamagowuli amabini kwelinye (2-1) emdlalweni we-Absa Premiership obutshisa eNewlands Stadium ebusuku namhlanje. Ukuphumelela kweKaizer Chiefs kuthetha ukuthi ayikabethwa nakanye emidlalweni emine eyidlalileyo kule sizini. Amanqaku amathathu afunyenwe liqela lika-Ernst Middendorp alibeke phezulu kwiPSL ngamanqaku alishumi emva kokuphumelela imidlalo emithathu nokudlala ntanganye komnye. Umdlalo uqale ngesantya esiphezulu kakhulu, uKermit Erasmus ubhakuzelise umnatha emzuzwini wesithathu umdlalo uqalile – yatsho yaphala phambili iCape Town City ebikhangela impumelelo yayo yokuqala emidlalweni emihlanu eyidlale neChiefs. 
UMiddendorp uqale umdlalo ngoDaniel Akpeyi ezipalini – kanti ekhona noKhama Billiat phambili. Lizibonakalisile iqela laseKapa ukuba lidlalela ekhaya ngokudlala kakuhle futhi lihlasela phantse sonke isigaba sokuqala. Amakhosi aphose ithuba lokufaka igowuli lokulinganisa emva kwebhola engqutyelwe ecaleni nguLazarous Kambole emva kokudlalelwa kakuhle nguReeve Frosler. Kuyiwe kwixesha lokuphumla iCity ihamba phambili – kodwa izinto ziye zajika emva kwexesha lokuphumla. UDaniel Cardoso ufake igowuli lokuqala leChiefs emva kwebhola ebikhatywe nguGeorge Maluleka. UBaccus ufake igowuli ephumelele ngalo iChiefs ekuzeni kuphela komdlalo. Iinguqu ezenziwe nguMcCarthy azikwazanga ukwenza umahluko, kanti uSamir Nuekovic noLebogang Manyama ngabanye babadlali abayilweleyo iChiefs emdlalweni wanamhlanje. Komnye umdlalo, iHighlands Park ibethe AmaZulu ngo’2-1. 
   
Cape   Town City: Leeuwenburgh, Mkhize, Cupido, Edmilson, Seedat, Mobara, Mokeke, Makola, Erasmus, Norodien, Mthembu.  
Amalalela: Stephens, David, Links, Kewuti, Morris, Ralani, Martin. 
Kaizer Chiefs: Akpeyi, Ntiya-Ntiya, Mathoho, Cardoso, Frosler, Maluleka, Manyama, Parker, Nurkovic, Kambole, Billiat. 
Amalalela: Khune, Katsande, Moleko, Castro, Zuma, Baccus, Sasman.
title: Amakhosi ayibethele ekhaya iCape Town City, kanti yona iHighlands Park iquthise AmaZulu

text:
Ukufunda kwakunye nokuhlohla kootitshala kume ngxi eVuwani kwiphondo laseLimpupo ngenxa yoqhankqalazo olwenziwa ngabahlali kula mmandla.  
Oku kulandela emva kokuba abahlali bala mmandla bengoneliseki sisigqibo esithathiweyo sokuba ezinye iindawo zaseVuwani kwakunye neMalamulele zizakwenza umasipala omnye omtsha. 
Abahlali batshise nezikolo ezingama-23 zala mimandla besonakalisa kwazixhobo zilulutho kubo.  
Usihlalo wale bhodi, uJane Thupana izolo kumabonakude uthe, ibhodi ibagqibele abahlali ngaphambili. “sicinga ukuba ibizakwenza izinto zibembi mpela ukuba sasizamile ukuthetha nabo kuqala. 
 Ngoku sele kukubi akusekho kubuyela kubo.”utshilo uThupana
title: Zimile izifundo eVuwani

text:
KunyanzelekE azibambe ziqine zisuka umqeqeshi omtsha weChippa United, kungenjalo – naye angazibona etsiba umgubasi.  
UVladislav Heric, 50, uqale ngoMvulo wale veki ukusebenza njengomqeqeshi weChippa emva kokuba igxothe uTeboho Moloi obengumqeqeshi oyintloko ukusukela kunyaka ophelileyo.  
UMoloi uchithwe ngabaphathi beChippa United emva kokuba ibethwe yiCape Town City ngo’2-0 kumdlalo wePSL obuse-Athlone Stadium kwiveki ephelileyo nasemva kothotho lwemidlalo ingaphumeleli.  
Ekuqaleni kwesizini, usihlalo weChippa United, uSiviwe Mpengesi, wathi ufuna iqela lakhe lifumane indawo kwiTop 8 xa kuphela isizini.  
Kubekho ukungaqiniseki ngalo mbono emva kokuba eMoloi engakwazanga ukuphumelela imidlalo engaphaya kwesithandathu.  
Lonke olo xanduva lithiwe ntimfa kuHeric ngoku, kanti kukho neNedbank Cup efuna ukuqhuba kakuhle kuyo iChippa. 
Isivumelwano sikaHeric siphelelwa xa kuphela isizini – kodwa uMpengesi ucinga ukuba yeyona ndoda isifaneleyo isikhundla sokuqeqesha iChippa United.  
“Besifuna umntu olaziyo iqela nezinto elizifunayo. Usifanele esi sikhundla uHeric ngoba nguye owasinyuselayo kwiPSL ngo2014. Khange ndithandabuze konke konke futhi siyamamkela. Sinomnqweno wokudlala ixesha elide kwiNedbank Cup – kanti siyakufuna nokungena kwiTop 8 xa kuphela isizini. Okwethu kukumnika yonke inkxaso ayidingayo,” utshilo uMpengesi ethetha ngoHeric. 
Umsebenzi onzima kaHeric uqala ngoMgqibelo xa iChippa idlala neFree State Stars kumdlalo weNedbank ngecala emva kwentsimbi yesithathu emalanga eGoble Park Stadium.  
Lowo ngumdlalo ongayinzimela kakhulu iChippa ngoba iFree State idlala kakuhle kakhulu futhi iyingozi ebaleni layo. 
Into ekufuneka ayenze uHeric kukukhuthaza abadlali bakhe emva kwemidlalo eliqela bengaphumeleli. Yona iStars iya kumdlalo wempelaveki inamandla kakhulu emva kokubetha iPlatinum Stars ngo’2-1 kwiveki ephelileyo.  
Kwisizini egqithileyo, iChippa United yaqhuba kakuhle kakhulu kwiNedbank Cup – nakule isizini inomnqweno wokudlala ngcono.  
“Sidlala neqela elomeleleyo kumdlalo onzima – kodwa singalibetha futhi siye kumjikelo olandelayo. Thina sizimiele kakhulu ukwenza konke ukuze siphumelele. Ndisasombulula imiba ethile nabadlali bama ngoku phambi kwalo mdlalo,” utshilo uHeric. 
Imidlalo yeNedbank

title: Unikwe imiqathango engqongqo uVladislav!

text:
Imbethi-manqindi yaseZiphunzane, uNtlantla “24” Ngamntwini , ongumceli-mngeni kwintshatsheli yodidi lwempukane uThembelani Nxoshe waseMdantsane, uthi uqinisekile ukuba kuzakusa eyintshatsheli ngomhla wethoba kwinyanga yoMnga. 
 “Ndiqinisekile ndizakuwuphumelela lo mlo ngoba kudala ndiwulungiselela. Ndiyamazi kudala ndimbukela uNxoshe, akazokwazi ukumelana nam tu ngala mini.” 
La matyendyana azakunyathelana ngeenzwana kumlo ozakohlula kubini ezona ndawo zinkqenkqeza phambili ngokuvelisa elona nani liphezulu leentshatsheli kwimbali yamanqindi eMzantsi Afrika – iZiphunzane noMdantsane kwiholo i-Orient Theatre ngomhla wesibhozo kwinyanga yoMnga. 
UNgamntwini, 24, nezathi zawa iinzame zakhe zokuba yintshatsheli ngo-2014 xeshikweni elaliswa ngophotho kumjikelo wesine nguSimphiwe Konconco, nowayeyintshatsheli yoMzantsi Afrika kudidi lweengcongolo (straw weight), ubabongozile abalandeli bakhe ukuba baphume ngobuninzi babo bayomxhasa. 
“Kubalandeli bam bonke, phumani ngobuninzi benu.Yimini yethu leya, ndizakubhinqa ngala mhla. Siyamazi ukuba uzakusikhaba, asingqube, kodwa nantoni ayenzayo siyilungiselele.” 
UNgamntwini uya kulo mlo enemilo elishumi elinesine; uphumelele yalishumi elinesithathu, waze wabethwa komnye kuphela.  
Intshatsheli ekhuselayo uThembelani Nxoshe yona inemilo engamashumi amabini anesine, iphumelele yalishumi elinesithandathu, yabethwa kwesixhenxe, yadlala ntanganye komnye.  
Eminye imilo ephambili kule tumente iquka umlo wentshatsheli ye-IBF Intercontinental kudidi lweJunior feather: uLudumo Lamati waseMdantsane nozobe esilwa no-Alexis Boureima Karobe waseBurkina Faso; uMzuvukile Magwaca uzakubeka intshinga yakhe ye-IBF Intercontinental kudidi lweNtambanani esichengeni nalapho azakujongana nendoda yaseNamibia egama lingu-Immanuel Naidjala. USphamandla Baleni waseMthatha, noyintshatsheli yodidi lweNgcongolo, uzakukhusela intshinga yakhe yoMzantsi Afrika kuXolisa Magusha waseSada. Uyanda “Big Bear” Nogogo waseMdantsane, uzakuzama ukuqwenga uMzoxolo Ndwayana waseRhini kumlo omijikelo isibhozo.  
Le tumente yenziwa yiXaba Boxing Promotions nekhokelwa ngu-Ayanda Matiti.
title: Ntlantla Ngamntwini: Akanokwazi ukumelana nam

text:
UKUZE ikhondo lootitshala lihlale lihlonitshiwe, kufuneka ootitshala baziphathe ngendlela ekhuthaza umzekelo nentembeko ebantwaneni – futhi bajongeke njengekamva – ngokokutsho kukaMongameli weNaptosa uNkosiphendule Ntantala.  
UNtantala ebethetha kwinkomfa yephondo kwihotele iOsner eMonti ngempelaveki, apho lo mbutho ubudibene, kuxoxwa ngemiba echaphazela ikhondo lobutitshala. Abathunywa beNaptosa (National Professional Teachers Organisation of South Africa) bathe bayizimasa le nkomfa.  
UNtantala uthi uninzi lootitshala abaphantsi kweNaptosa, bakhokelisa umntwana phambili kuyo yonke into abayenzayo.  
“Ngoku bendithetha eqongeni undivile ukuba khange ndiyalele ukuba ootitshala mabanxibe kanjani, kodwa okubalulekileyo yinkangeleko ekhatshwa sisidima nentembeko xa utitshala ephambi komntwana. Utitshala makohluke xa esiya emsebenzini, angafani naxa esiya elwandle eyokuzonwabisa,” kutsho uNtantala. 
 UNtantala uxelele intloko yesebe lezemfundo eMpuma Koloni uThemba Kojana, obezimase le nkomfa yeNaptosa, ukuba xa isebe linganootitshala abathe xhaxhe abaphantsi kweNaptosa, iingxaki ezambethe eli sebe zingayinto yezolo. 
 “Utitshala olilungu leNaptosa uyayazi ukuba phambi kokuba aye esitalatweni, xa kungavisiswana nomqashi, asiyonto ekuqalwa kuyo leyo – ifanele ukuba ibeyinto yokugqibela.  
“Ngaphezu koko ke, injongo yethu ephambili likamva lomntwana. Kwizikolo apho kukho amalungu eNaptosa aliqela, ufika kukho uzinzo ngenxa yendlela la malungu ethu aziphatha ngayo emsebenzini nangaphandle,” kutsho uNtantala. 
 Uthi kwiNaptosa, umbandela wokuba ukowuphi umbutho wezopolitiko asiyonto ephambili, into ephambili yimicimbi enxulumene nokuba usebenza njani utitshala esikolweni.  
“Lo nto ayithethi ukuba asinawo amakhaya ethu ezopolitiko, kodwa xa sidibene siyiNaptosa sithetha ngekamva lomntwana kwaneemeko abasebenza phantsi kwazo ootitshala. Kwankqu nesebe lezemfundo, kwilizwe loMzantsi Afrika jikelele, liyayazi ukuba asikhokelisi ipolitiki thina kwaNaptosa,” utshilo uNtantala. 
 UKojana uthi emva kokuba engene kwesi sikhundla sakhe ukhe wabamba indibano neNaptosa apho kwavunyelwana kwelokuba makubekho uzinzo kwizikolo zephondo.
title: Naptosa: Titshala jongeka njengekamva

text:
Emva kwemuzuzu engamashumi alithoba, iMamelodi Sundowns ithwaliswe isithsaba njengeentshatsheli zeTelkom Kockout zika-2019 emva kokubethwa iMaritzburg United ngamagowuli amabini kwelinye (2-1) emdlalweni obumhle eMoses Mabhida Stadium ngokuhlwa kwanamhlanje. Kokwesibini iSundowns iphakamisa iTelkom Cup kwisixeko saseThekwini. Ngonyaka ka-2015, iSundowns yavuthulula iKaizer Chiefs ngamagowuli amathathu kwelinye. Namhlanje iphinde yenza ezibukwayo. Iqhawe leSundowns ibe yifolosi eyingozi kakhulu efake amagowuli amabini emdlalweni wanamhlanje – uMauricio Offonso. Kuyiwe kwixesha lokuphumla iMaritzburg United ihamba phambili ngegowuli elinye elifakwe nguJudas Moseamedi – ongene phakathi kukaDenis Onyango noLebusa ngetshova walivalela emnatheni. 
Umdlalo weSundowns uye watshintsha emva kokufakwa kwegowuli kuyo – kodwa khange ikwazi ukufaka igowuli lokulinganisa ngenxa yabadlali beTeam of Choice ababevale mba emva kwisigaba sokuqala. Emva kwekhefu, iSundowns iye yazicacisa ukuba ingoompondozihlanjiwe ebholeni yaseMzantsi Afrika ngokuthi igubungele iMaritzburg United ebizilahlele nofele emdlalweni ebisilwela ukuphumelela iTelkom Cup okokuqala kwimbali yebhola yeli lizwe. Amagowuli amabini afakwe nguMauricio Offonso anike iSundowns impumelelo ebalulekileyo namhlanje eThekwini. UGaston Sirino, uHlompho Kekane no-Andile Jali ngabanye babadlali abathe banceda iDowns emdlalweni wanamhlanje. 
   
Maritzburg: Ofori, Morgan, Kunene, Mngonyama, De Reuck, Allie, Buchanan, Claasen, Shandu, Timm, Moseamedi. 
Amalalela: Mpandle, Sanoka, Jappie, Mekoa, Lea’alafa, Kutumela, Augusto. 
Sundowns:  Onyango, Langerman, Morena, Madisha, Jali, Kekana, Lebusa, Zwane, Mkhulise,  Sirino, Affonso. 
Amalalela: Mweene, Arendse, Lakay, Ngcongca, Makgalwa, Mabunda, Vilakazi.
title: IMamelodi Sundowns ziintshatsheli zeTelkom Knockout zika-2019!!

text:
Njengokuba amaqela amaninzi adlala kwi-Absa Premier Soccer League esathathe ikhefu emva kokusongwa kwesizini – yena uPitso Mosimane nabadlali beMamelodi Sundowns abaphumlanga ngenxa yemidlalo yeCaf Champions League.  
AmaSandawana amkela iqela laseTunisia eliyingozi, i-Esperance, kumdlalo weChampions League ngo’20:00 eLucas Moripe Stadium ngoLwesihlanu. 
 Ezi ntshatsheli zezwekazi le-Afrika ziya kulo mdlalo zinamandla emva kokuvuthulula i-AS Vita Club ngo’3-1 kwiveki ephelileyo enkundleni yayo eDemocratic Republic of Congo. 
IiBrazilians zithe ngcu kwindawo yokuqala kuGroup C – kodwa zinamanqaku amane ngokulinganayo ne-Esperance. Lo nto ithethe ukuthi la maqela omabini azakube efuna amanqaku amathathu. Emva kokudlula kwiVita kwiveki ephelileyo, iqela lakhe liqhwalela ngenxa yabadlali abathile abangakwazanga ukudlala, uPitso uya kulo mdlalo ukuzithemba kuphezulu.  
“Abanye abadlali kunokwenzeka ukuba bazidlalela igalufa bekwathatha nemifanekiso – kodwa thina siyazi apho siya khona. Sikhulile ngoku emva kokufumana amava kwimidlalo edlulileyo. Kunyanzelekile sifumane amanqaku amathathu ekhaya ngoba sincwase amanqaku amane kubo,” utshilo uJingles. 
Nakubeni iSundowns engafumenanga nto kwisizini yePSL edlulileyo – kodwa umqeqeshi uyiqhwabele izandla ngokusebenza kakuhle kwimidlalo yeCaf. 
Kwelinye icala, iSuperSport United idibana neTP Mazembe kumdlalo weCaf Confederation Cup kaGroup D ngo’14:30 eLubumbashi ngeCawe.  
UKaitano Tembo nguye ozakutsala imikhala njengokuba uStuart Baxter ejonge imiba yeBafana Bafana.  
KuGroup B, iPlatinum Stars izakuzama ukubuyisa isidima sayo ngale mpelaveki xa idibana neSfaxien kumdlalo ozakube useTunisia ngeCawe emva kokubethwa yiMbabane Swallows ngo’4-2 kwiveki ephelileyo. 
pedro.mapelo@inl.co.za
title: UPitso ufuna impumelelo kwiChamps League

text:
Nangona izinto zingayihambeli kakuhle iChippa United kule sizini – kodwa abalandeli bayo bayixhasa ngokupheleleyo. I’solezwe lesiXhosa lincokole nomnye onethemba lokuba iChippa izakusinda ezembeni futhi iqhube kakuhle kwiNedbank Cup. 
Pedro Mapelo: Bhota Mhlekazi, unjani? 
Umlandeli: Molo Bhuti, kuhle unjani wena? 
PM: Kuhle nakum. UBhuti lo ngubani kanye kanye? 
Umlandeli: Igama lam ndinguLubabalo Oliphant. Ngokokuhlala ndilapha kwaNobuhle, eTinarha. Ndingumlandeli weChippa United. 
PM: Kuhle ke Bhuti. Umtshato wakho neChippa United waqala nini? 
Lubabalo Oliphant: HeyLe nto yaqala ngo’2013, ngoko ndandingumlandeli weKaizer Chiefs. Ndandimane ndisiya ebaleni ndiyokubukela iChippa, ngo’2014 ndadibana noKhayalethu Tu – uyinkokheli yabalandeli kule ndawo yethu. Wandibhalisa njengomlandeli weChippa. Ndalibala ngeChiefs, ngoku ndiyiChippa qha. 
PM: Yintoni ongasoze uyilibale ngeMamelodi Sundowns? 
LO: EyiiiEmva kokuba iChippa United yabuyela kwiPSL ngo’2010, ukufumana indawo yesithandathu kwisizini ephelileyo yeyona nto endingasoze ndiyilibale. Nokubethwa yiMamelodi Sundowns kumdlalo weMTN 8 yenye yezinto eyandikhathazayo. Ndandisebaleni nomhlobo wam sivuma ingoma ethi: “Khawuvume moya wam. Kodwa sabethwa ekugqibeleni. 
PM: IChippa United iqhuba kakuhle kwiNedbank kubi kodwa kwiPSL, uthini ngalo nto? 
LO: Yeyi.Siqhuba kakuhle kwiNedbank Cup, siyazidla ngalo nto. Besingaqhubi kakuhle ngaphambili – kodwa ukufika kukaDan Malesela kuzitshintshile izinto. Siyaya eThekwini. Kuhle ngoba sidlalela ekhaya kumdlalo ozayo, kunyanzelekile siyibethe iSuperSport United kulo mdlalo. UThixo uzakusinceda kwiPremier League, ndinalo ithemba; izinto ziza kuguquka kule midlalo izayo. 
PM: Ngubani umdlali omthandayo? 
LO: NguBongani Kama. Waqala ukudlala ibhola apha phambi kwam eTinarha. Ukhule edlala kwiindawo zaseTinarha, ndimazi kakhulu.
title: Oliphant: UThixo uzakusinceda kwiLeague

text:
Emva kobumnyama, kuyakhanya, oku kucace kakuhle kwiziganeko zakutshanje kulowo wayesakuba ngumphathiswa wesebe lezimali uNhlanhla Nene nothe wanikwa isidanga sobugqirha kwiMangosuthu University of Technology izolo.  
Ukunikwa kwakhe esi sidanga uNene kuza emva kokuba esandula kufumana isikhundla kwibhodi elawulayo kwinkampani iAllan Gray.  
UNene uphuma kwixesha ebelimnyama kubomi bakhe emva kokugxothwa njengomphathiswa wesebe lezimali ngumongameli uJacob Zuma. Emva kokushiya kwakhe njengelungu lepalamente lombutho we-ANC kwabakho iingxelo zokuba uzakuthatha isikhundla kwiBrics Bank. 
La yunivesithi ithi, ibineenjongo zokunika lo kaNene isidanga sobugqirha kwangaphambi kokuba akhutshwe esikhundleni sakhe nje- ngomphathiswa wesebe lezimali. 
Le ngxelo ithi, esi sidanga sobugqirha kukunika imbeko kwiinzame zikaNene zokuqinisa imeko yezimali zeli ngamaxesha anzima, lo gama ebekwakhusela iinkampani zikarhulumente eziphantsi koxinzelelo ngenxa yobuqhophololo.  
Ukanti othethe egameni lenkampani yakwa-Allan Gray uIan Liddle uthi, amava kaNene kulawulo lezimali nakulawulo lemicimbi yoluntu atsale umdla wabo. 
 “Siyavuya kakhulu ukuba nomntu ofana noNene kwibhodi yethu, kwaye siyavuya ukufumana ukuba ukwamnkele ukutyunjwa kwakhe,” utshilo uLiddle. 
Ojongene nezimali kumbutho weDA, uDavid Maynier unqwenelele uNene impumelelo kumsebenzi wakhe kula nkampani.  
“Iyothusa kakhulu indlela athe waphathwa ngayo lo kaNene nguJacob Zuma kunye nombutho we-ANC,” utshilo uMaynier.  
Ukugxothwa kukaNene kubangele ingxoxo eninzi kakhulu kwabezopolitiko nakweminye imikhakha yentlalo kweli loMzantsi. 
Konke oku kubangele ukuba kutyunjwe uDes Van Rooyen njengomphathiswa wezimali iintsuku ezimbalwa kakhulu, kwaza kamva kwabuyiselwa uPravin Gordhan emva koxinzelelo olathi labekwa kuZuma ngabezopolitiko.
title: Unikwe isidanga sobugqirha uNene

text:
Ithe tshwa phakathi kwikona ezolileyo yempuma yeFreystata, kufutshane nomda waseLesotho.  
Rhoqo ngonyaka, ngamawaka abantu abajolisa imibombo kwindawana yaseMooderpoort ngaphandle kweLadybrand, eFreystata, ukuyokunika imbeko, kwaye beyokucela uncedo kumprofetikazi wabeSotho – uMantsopa.  
Bakhanyisa amakhandlela engcwabeni lakhe, kumqolomba apho wayeqhubela khona iiseshoni zempiliso, bethabatha amanzi – nto leyo kuthiwa inempiliso – kumthombo uMantsopa wayesikha khona amanzi.  
UMantsopa wayengumnqa kuba waphila iinkulungwane ezintathu zeminyaka – kuba wazalwa ngonyaka ka1795 waze wabhubha ngonyaka ka1906 kwindawo yaseMoordepoort.  
Waye waziwa njengomntu owanikwa isiphiwo sokuprofeta, nto leyo kuthiwa yayicaphukisa ikumkani yabeSotho uMoshoeshoe, nowamthintela ebuKumkanini bakhe, mhlawumbi esoyikisela ungenelelo lwakhe.  
Emva kokubaleka umsindo kaMoshoeshoe, uMantsopa waya kuhlala kwindawo eyayenziwe yiNkonzo yamaTshetshi ngo1865 njengendawo yokwenza umsebenzi wobizo lwakhe kwiphondo laseFreystata nasebumelwaneni baseLesotho.  
AmaTshetshi eSt Augustine’s Missions bambhabhatiza ngegama lakhe lobuKristu uAnna ngo1871 kodwa, okunikisa umdla, wadibanisa inkolo yakhe yobuKrestu nonxulumano lwakhe nezinyanya.  
Uninzi yayingabantu ababezokufuna ukuphiliswa nguye. Kude kube namhla oku, iindwendwe zixhela iibhokhwe kwaye zikhanyise amakhandlela kule ndawo, ixesha elininzi befuna uncedo ngakwiintsapho zabo okanye iingxaki ezithile zemisebenzi.  
Kwiqonga elikule ntaba, nalapho wayesenza khona imisebenzi yakhe yempiliso, kukho iileta ezishiywa zindwendwe zakhe zale mihla. Imihla ngemihla, abo bajongene nale ndawo, basusa ezi leta kwaye bazitshabalalise, kungenjalo ziye zipakishane.  
Kwezi ndawo uMantsopa wayehlala kuzo ngase-St Augustines, zaziwa njengeModderpoort Sacred Sites, kwaye kukho ithemba lokuba iyakuze ibhengezwe njengeWorld Heritage.  
Kwezi ndawo kukho ingcwaba lakhe, neliphakathi kwamangcwaba woonyawontle nabazalwane, ndawonye namalungu engingqi yamaTshetshi.  
Imisebenzi yale ndawo isaqhuba, kodwa kule mihla, ezinye zeendawo ezilapha ziqeshise kwinkampani yabucala njengekhaya leendwendwe.
title: Indawo yomprofetikazi itsala iindwendwe eFreystata!

text:
Unephupha lokuba yintshatsheli yehlabethi uLuyanda Ntwanambi.  
Eli gatyana lothuse umzi emva kokutywatyusha uFikile Mlonyeni emlweni ubutakisa iintlantsi eOrient Theatre kwimpelaveki ephelileyo kwitumente ebiququzelelwe yiRumble Africa Promotions.  
Impumelelo kaNtwanambi, 20, iqinisekise ukuba ugoduka nentshinga yeWBO Afrika yodidi lwempukane. UNtwanambi uthi unephupha lokuba yintshatsheli ngeny’imini. 
 “Sonke siziimbethimanqindi sinephupha lokuba ziintshatsheli zehlabathi. Nam ngenye imini ndinephupha lokuba yintshatsheli yehlabathi,” utshilo uNtwanambi. 
Ephefumla ngemphumelelo yakhe emva komlo obuphathi kwakhe noMlonyeni.  
UNtwanambi uthe: “Ngowona mlo obunzima endakhe ndawulwa lo. Ndibulela iqela lam labaqeqeshi ngokuqinisekisa ukuba ndize kuwo ndiwulungiselele. Ndibulela nabalandeli abame nam ukusuka ekuqaleni komlo ukuyotsho ekugqibeleni.” 
 OkaNtwanambi uthi kuninzi ekufuneka ekulungisile emdlalweni wakhe nangona ephumelele. “Ewe, ndiwuphumelele umlo, kodwa kuninzi ekufuneka ndikulungisile. Phakathi emlweni ndiye ndaziyeka izinto ebezindisebenzela. Iye yandichana lo nto kumjikelo wesithandathu.” 
Ezinye iziphumo zetumente: UShavkat Rakhimov utshabalalise amathuba ka-Azinga Fuzile okulwela intshinga yehlabathi, emva kokumlalisa ngophotho kumjikelo wesibhozo.  
Impumelelo kaRakhimov waseTajikistani, kodwa ozinze eRussia uza kungquzulana nentshatsheli yeIBF yehlabathi, kudidi lweJunior Lighweight, uTevin Farmer, ungaphelanga lo nyaka.  
Ibikokuqala ephulukana nomlo uFuzile, ngelixa ephume esaligcinile irekhodi lokungabethwa uRakhimov. Omabini la matyendyana anemilo elishumi elinesihlanu. 
URonald Malindi uyikhusele ngempumelelo intshinga yakhe yoMzantsi Africa yodidi lweNtambanani emva kokubetha uMichael Daries ngamanqaku. Yena uAyabonga Sonjica ugoduke exwaye intshinga yoMzantsi Afrika yodidi lweJunior Featherweight emva kokubetha uInnocent Mantengu ngamanqaku.  
USiphosethu Mvula umke eyintshatsheli yeIBF Afrika yodidi lweLightweight emva kokutya uMichael Mokoena ngamanqaku.  
UKhanyile Bulana naye umke neyakhe intshinga yeIBF Afrika emva kokubetha uPhila Mpontshane ngamanqaku.
title: ULuyanda ufuna intshinga yehlabathi

text:
Kulindeleke kume yonke into eBhayi ngale njikalanga yanamhlanje njengokuba kukho umdlalo omkhulu webhola ekhatywayo.  IiChilli Boys zamkela Amakhosi kumdlalo we-Absa Premier Soccer League ngo’18:00 eNelson Mandela Bay Stadium.    Lo mdlalo ubaluleke kakhulu kuwo omabini la maqela – kwaye iChippa United izimisele ukusebenzisa wona ukuze ibuyise isingqi sayo ebiqale ngaso le sizini ka’2016/17.    Kwimidlalo esibhozo, iChippa United, ayiphumelelanga nomye umdlalo – lo nto ayimonwabisanga umqeqeshi wayo uDan Malesela.  UMalesela ukhala ngamathuba angasetyenziswa kakhuhle ngabadlali bakhe emidlalweni – kodwa kulo umdlalo uthi uqinisekile ngokuguquka kwezinto.    “Ngoku ingqondo zethu sizibethelele kulo mdlalo wethu neKaizer Chiefs,” utsho uMalesela kumajelo endaba.     Idabi phakathi kwala maqela lizakubanzima ngoba nayo iChiefs iphantsi koxinizelelo olumandla ngenxa yokunqaba kweziphumo ezincomekayo kwimidlalo emihlanu yonke edlulileyo. USteve Komphela uze eBhayi efuna amanqaku apheleleyo ukuze acuthe umsantsa ovulekayo phakathi kweqela lakhe nalawo aphala phambili kwiPSL.   IiChilli Boys ziya kulo mdlalo zijingxela emva kokonzakalelwa ngabadlali abaphambili.  “Kunyanzelekile senze utshintsho ngenxa yabadlali bethu abonzakeleyo. Kukho izinto ezibalulekileyo esizifundileyo kumdlalo wethu ogqithileyo. Kodwa nalo umdlalo awahlukanga kulowa besiwudlala neMaritzburg United phakathi evekini,” utsho Umalesela.    Lo mqeqeshi, ozibalule kwiPSL ngokudlalisa iqela lakhe ibhola enomahluko nebukelekayo kunamanye amaqela, uyakuqonda ukubaluleka kokufumana amanqaku apheleleyo kulo mdlalo. Uthi namhlanje ibali lokuphoswa kwamathuba ngabadlali bakhe liyaphela.    “Besithetha into enye ngoLwesibini odlulileyo – kodwa kulo umdlalo kuyanyanzeleka izinto ziguquke. Amanye amaqela anesimbo sokuhlala emva xa edlala nathi, ndinethemba iChiefs ayizukuyenza lo nto. Liqela elithanda ukuwuthathela kulo umdlalo noko amaxesha amaninzi. Nayo iza apha kuba ifuna ukuphumelela,” utshilo uDan Dance.
