Njengokuba iFrance neBelgium kulindeleke zilwele indawo kumdlalo wokugqibela kwindebe yehlabathi namhlanje ebusuku – iFrace inexhala lomqeqeshi weBelgium, uRoberto Martinez, ozibonakalisileyo ngokubetha amazw amakhulu noHenry – olazi ukusuka nokuhlala ilizwe lakhe. UHenry wadlalela iFrance amatyeli alikhulu namashumi amabini anesithathu awafaka kuyo amashumi amahlanu ananye amagowuli. 
“Ayiqheleki into yokuba uThiery Henry abe kwiqela elidlala nathi ngoba iligqala lebhola ekhatywayo eFrance. Kukhulu kakhulu awakwenzela iFrance ngethuba engumdlali kwaye siyamhlonipha ngenxa yalo nto. Kodwa ndingatsho nakuTiti ukuba usenkampini engafanelekanga,” itshilo ifolosi yeFrance, u-Olivier Giroud. 
UHenry wachitha phantse uxesha lakhe lonke eNgilane – apho wayedlalela khona i-Arsenal FC. Ukungaselwa so kwakhe ngabalawuli bebhola eFrance kungumnqa – kodwa umongameli weFFF, uNoel Le Graet, uthe baphoswa nguye ngenxa yokungabikho nxulumano naye. “Ubomi bubanjalo ngamanye amaxesha. Uhleli eNgilane ixesha elide kakhulu kwaye asingabantu abasondeleleneyo. Iifolosi zeBelgium ziyammamela futhi ziya mhlonipha,” utshilo uLe Graet. 
Emva kokuthatha umhlalaphantsi akukho nto ingako ayenzileyo kwicalal lokuqeqesha. ULe Graet ucinga ukuba uHenry uthathe isigqibo esifanelekileyo ngokuba lisekela mqeqeshi ngenxa yeso sizathu. Kungcono ukuqala njengomcedisi kwiqela lesizwe. Akukho mathandabuzo, unalo ikamva kwezoqeqesho,” uvale ngalo mazwi uLe Graet. 
Kwindebe yehlabathi, iBelgium lelinye lamazwe ambalwa anamagowuli aliqela. Iifolosi zayo, uRomelu Lukaku noMichy Batshuayi – zifaka amagowuli ngokumangalisayo. Ayothusi kekambe lo nto ngoba banoHenry owayengurhasatsha ngeentsuku zakhe zokudlala ibhola kwi-Arsenal nakwiFrance. UHenry waqshwa ngo-2016 emva kokuqeshwa kukaRoberto Martinez. UGiroud ucinga ukuba ubukhali beefolosi zeBegium bunefuthe likaHenry kwaye ukungabikho kwakhe kwiFrance kuyamothusa.
title: Olivier Giroud: UThierry Henry usenkampini engamfanelanga!

text:
Kufuneka basebenze ngokuphindeneyo abadlali beMamelodi Sundowns ngempelaveki xa bedlala neBidvest Wits emva kokuba iphose ithuba elihle lokuya kwindawo yokuqala phakathi evekini. 
 Amasandawana abambene ngegowuli elinye macala (1-1) nePolokwane City emdlalweni weAbsa Premier Soccer League obumhle eLoftus Versfeld Stadium.  
Ngokwenza njalo, iSundowns iphose ithuba lokususa iWits kwindawo yokuqala.  
Nangona iziphumo zomdlalo waphakathi evekini zingamncumisanga uPitso Mosimane, kodwa uzamkele ngoba iqela lakhe liyiyekile iPolokwane yafaka igowuli lokulinganisa. 
“Ayisonwabisanga into yokungawafumani onke amanqaku nangona abadlali bedlale kakuhle. Bazamile abadlali kodwa uGeorge Chigova [unozinti] noogxa bakhe bebezimisele emdlalweni. Kufuneka silamkele inqaku elinye noxa siphulukene namabini. Inqaku elinye liza kusinceda ngoba ukhuphiswano lwendebe yePSL lusaya phambili,” utshilo uPitso emva komdlalo.  
Bekukho ithemba lokuba iSundowns iya kukwazi ukongeza kwigowuli elifakwe nguThemba Zwane kwisiqingatha sokuqala  kodwa ngelishwa, uDenis Onyango, ubhutyuze ibhola sele isesandleni yangena phakathi. 
Impazamo eyenziwe ngunozinti yamkelwe kakuhle nguPitso Mosimane othe okwenzekileyo kuqhelekile ebholeni.  
“Unozinti ophambili eAfrika wenze impazamo enkulu. Yenzeka impazamo sidlala neHighlands Park. Kulungile, ezi zinto ziyenzeka. Siyamthanda uDenis ngoba usihlangule sidlala neMimosas,” utshilo uPitso. 
 Ngentsimbi yesithandathu emalanga ngoMgqibelo, iSundowns neWits ziza kulwela indawo yokuqala eBidvest Stadium. 
 Ishiywa ngamanqaku amabini iDowns esenemidlalo yiWits ehleli phezulu.  
Umdlalo uza kubanzima ngoba nayo iWits izimesele ukuhlala enkcochoyini yePSL futhi ayizukuvuma ukubethelwa ebaleni layo.
title: IDowns neWits zilwela indawo yokuqala kwiPSL

text:
NJENGOKUBA naye wachitha ixesha elide ekhathalela ngezempilo uluntu, umam’ uNontsikelelo “Ntsiki” Biko ulinikele kubasebenzi bezempilo abaphambili kwidabi leCovid-19, iwonga lesidanga sembeko alinikwe yiRhodes University ngoLwesithathu weveki ephelileyo. 
Umam’ uBiko, inzalelwane yaseLibode kwanomhlolokazi kaSteve Biko, uwongwe ngesidanga sembeko iLLD (Doctor of Laws) leli zikomfundo. Ingqonyela yaseRhodes, uGqr. Sizwe Mabizela, uthi eli tshantliziyo liwongelwa imisebenzi yalo yokwakha uluntu kuquka nokusebenzela abahlelelekileyo kwanabangakhathalelekanga. 
“Ngokumilisela iinzipho kwingqiqi yokuzidla ngokuba ngumntu ontsundu, [umam’ uBiko] udlale indima ebalulekileyo ekunikeni ithemba kwaneendlela zokuphila kuluntu ebelusebenzela. Kwiintshukumo zakhe eluntwini, uchukumise ubomi babaninzi ze wanceda abancinane nabadala ukuba baphuthume kwakhona isidima sabo, ukuzihlonipha kwanokuba nobuntu,” utshilo uMabizela. 
Umam’ uBiko uphumelele iJunior Certificate yakhe eBuntingville Secondary School ze imatriki wayiphumelela eShawbury Senior Secondary School. Unoqeqesho kubumongikazi nezokubelekisa kwaneDiploma kwinzululwazi yobumongikazi ayiphumelele eUnisa, kuquka neziqinisekiso kubumongikazi kwizibhedlele iGrey (Geriatric Care and HIV/Aids Counselling) kwaneDora Nginza Hospital eGqeberha (primary health care). 
Ngo1966, ngethuba ekuqeqesho, umam’ uBiko wadibana nenkokheli yeBlack Consciousness Movement, uSteve Biko, owayesenza izifundo zobugqirha kwiYunivesithi yaseNatal. Ngo1970 bazimanya ngeqhina lomtshato ze balizwa ngabantwana uNkosinathi, Samora. Umam’ uBiko ukwanayo nentombi uBulelwa Lindelwa ezelwe ngo1988. 
Umam’ uBiko usebenze kwiindawo eziquka iSt.Matthews kuQoboqobo, kwizibhedlele iAll Saints eNgcobo, iGrey eQonce. Wayelilungu leGinsberg Civic Association kwanosoxanduva kwiGinsberg Education Trust. 
“Kuluzuko kum ukuwongwa ngewonga eliqaphela imisebenzi yam yiRhodes University. Njengokuba ndichithe ubomi bam kwiinkonzo zokhathalelo lwempilo kawonkewonke, eli wonga ndilinikela kumawaka wabasebenzi bezempilo abaphambili edabini abakhusele ilizwe lethu kubhubhane weCovid-19,” utshilo umam’ uBiko.
title: Umam’ uBiko uwongwe yiRhodes

text:
Umqeqeshi we-Orlando Pirates, uMilutin “Micho” Sredojevic, yindoda ezithembayo – kodwa akakhululekanga phambi komdlalo weCaf Champions League ongempelaveki. ESam Nujoma Stadium ekwidolophi yaseWindhoek, eNamibia – kulapho i-Orlando Pirates iza kudibana neAfrican Stars emdlalweni wesibini obalulekileyo.  
Emdlalweni wokuqala obubanjelwe e-Orlando Stadium kwiveki ephelileyo, akubangakho qela elifuna ukoyiswa phakathi kwePirates neStars eqalayo kulo nyaka ukudlala kwiChampions League.  
Ukuya kwePirates kwilizwe lasebumelwaneni kungekho siqinisekiso yeyona nto emenza anxube uMicho. Nangona iAfrican Stars iliqela elincinane kunePirates – kodwa indlela edlale ngayo eGoli yothuse abantu abaninzi futhi kuye kwabonakala ukuba iya kusokolisa nakumdlalo wesibini. 
Ukungakwazi kwePirates ukufaka amagowuli idlalela ekhaya ibe yeyona nto ephazamise ingqondo kaSredojevic.  
Oku kwenzeke emva kokuba Ezimnyama zingakwazanga ukuphumelela ekhaya – eyona nto ebalulekileyo xa iqela lidlala kwiChampions League.  
“Omnye umsebenzi, ukungafakwa kwegowuli kuthi kwenzekile – kodwa asikwazanga ukufaka igowuli. Lo nto ibizakulenza libe lula utyelelo lethu eWindhoek. Indlela esidlale ngayo ibingakwazi ukusinceda kwiindawo ezibalulekileyo ebaleni. Andazi ingxaki ibiphi. Xa sidlalela kowayo iStars izinto ziza kutshintsha ngoba sakube sidlalela endaweni eyiqhelileyo. Ndinalo kodwa ithemba, singawuphumelela umdlalo eNambia,” utshilo iMicho emva komdlalo wokuqala. 
Ukuze iPirates ikwazi ukudlulela kumjikelo olandelayo weChamps League, kufuneka iphumelele okanye idlale ntanganye – kodwa kubekho igowuli elifumanayo emdlalweni.  
Ngeke ibe lula lo nto ngoba umdlalo uza kudlalelwa kuzenzele webala abangakwaziyo ukudlala kuwo abadlali baseMzantsi Afrika.  
Umqeqeshi weStars, uBobby Samaria, uxelele amajelo eendaba okokuba indlela iqela lakhe elizakudlala ngayo kufuneka yahluke eWindhoek kunaleya abadlale ngayo eMzantsi Afrika.
title: Micho: Singawuphumelela umdlalo eNamibia

text:
Iqela laseMpuma Koloni liyophisa kwakhona emva kokubethwa emidlalweni emibini ilandelelana. IChippa United ibethwe yiTS Galaxy ngamanqaku amathathu kwelinye emdlalweni weDStv Premiership obubanjelwe eMbombela Stadium ngoLwesibini wale veki. Kanti kwiveki ephelileyo, iChippa ibethelwe ekhaya ngamanqaku amabini kwelinye yiGolden Arrows. Nangona iChippa iqale yabhakuzelisa umnatha eMbombela Stadium ngenqaku elifakwe nguRiaan Hanamub emzuzwini wesihlanu kwisigaba sokuqala somdlalo, iTS Galaxy ibuye ngamandla yayongamela ngamanqaku afakwe nguMthobisi Mngomezulu, uMenzi Ndwandwe noWayde Lekay yatsho yayokuhlala kwindawo yeshumi elinambini. Yona ngoku iChippa ijingelwa lizembe kwindawo yeshumi elinesine. Ukubethwa kweChippa kubuyisela emva umsebenzi omhle owenziwe nguKurt Lentjies ongene endaweni kaGavin Hunt owanqunyanyiswayo emva kokungaphumeleli kweqela ixesha elide. 
Kodwa nangona iqela lakhe libethiwe, uLentjies uthe liza kuvuka livuthulule liye phambili. Uyincomile kakhulu indlela abadlale ngayo abadlali bakhe emdlalweni wayizolo elinye nangona bebethiwe. Into ayikhalele kakhulu yindlela usompempe awuphethe ngayo umdlalo. “Yah, silahlekelwe ngamanqaku amathathu emva kokulawula umdlalo ixesha elide. Ewe, iTS Galaxy ikhe yabuya ngamandla kwisigaba sesibini – kodwa ke sithi abayiyekileyo sinawo amandla okuyoyisa. Zange ndayibona ipenela engacacanga njengale usompempe ayinike iTS Galaxy namhlanje. Andifuni ukukhalazela umsebenzi owenziwa ngoosompempe kodwa ndimbonile engathathi sigqibo kusiwiswa uRiaan emhlabeni weTS Galaxy. Andimkhalazeli usompempe, qha ndiyabavela abadlali bethu ngoba badlale kakuhle kakhulu emdlalweni. Siza kuvuthulula siye emdlalweni olandelayo,” utshilo uLentjies. Emdlalweni olandelayo, iChippa United iza kundwendwela AmaZulu angaqhubi kakuhle nawo.
title: ULentjies ushiyeke ephoxekile emva kokubethwa kweChippa

text:
Akungoku bengayithandi imfundo yasesikolweni abantu abantsundu, ususela kwakwiminyaka yokufika kwamamishinari kweli lizwe.  
AmaXhosa akungquzulana nabamhlophe, nokuba kungantoni na, ayenganyali ukusuka atshise izikolo kwakunye nento yonke ebhaliweyo, atshabalalise nemizi yokushicilela. Unangoku ke basenjalo abantsundu. 
Kunyaka ophelileyo, ukuba kusenjalo nakulo unyaka, abafundi kumaziko-mfundo enomsila bangquzulene neziphatha-mandla malunga nokunyuswa kwemali yokufunda.  
Eyona nto imandla kuloo misadulo yabo yaba kukutshiswa nokonakaliswa kwempahla yamaziko-mfundo enomsila, nto leyo eyawashiya ekwimeko embi nangaphezu kwaleyo ibibangele ukuba afune ukunyusa imali yokufunda. Andazi kukuthini ukufuna imfundo yamahala ngotshabalalisa izinto zokufunda ezikhoyo! 
Kwiinyanga ezintathu nezine ezidlulileyo, abantu baseVuwani bangquzulene neziphatha-mandla malunga nohlengahlengiso kucando-mida yoomasipala.  
Into oluyenzileyo uluntu lwaseVuwani ukubonakalisa ingqumbo yalo ibe kukutshisa izikolo nokukhupha abantwana ezikolweni iinyanga zintathu zonke, belinganisa into eyake yenziwa luluntu lwaseMntla Kolini kunyaka ongaphaya neyaka yenziwa ngaMaMpondomise akowethu eminyakeni emininzi eyadlulayo. 
Amaziko-mfundo enomsila kutshanje aqalise uthethwano norhulumente, namanye amaqela achaphazelekayo, malunga nonyuso-mali yokufunda.  
Usashukuxwa unjalo loo mcimbi, abafundi sele bengxange ngamatayala avuthayo bathi baza kuwavala nya amaziko-mfundo enomsila. Kambe ke abanye sele beqalisile ngemisadulo yabo kwamanye amaziko-mfundo.  
Oku kubenza babonakale okwabantu abangathi bathi “anide nigqibe ukuthetha, thina singxamele ukonakalisa”. 
Zininzi ke iziganeko endingazibalulayo ngemikhuba yokuchunuka imfundo kwabantu abantsundu. Okona kucace okomva webhokhwe kukuba kusekho abantsundu abangalaziyo ixabiso lemfundo.  
Nangona kukho abafuna imfundo yamahala kodwa kukho abangaliseso ixabiso lale nto bathi bayifuna mahala, izimbo zabo zikhombisa njalo. Xa bengayifuni abantu into, lowo ubanunusa ngayo ufumaneka ebulaleka. 
Umbandela wokufikeleleka kwemfundo kumntu wonke ngumcimbi obaluleke kakhulu. Akukho mntwana weli lizwe nokweli lizwe umele kungafundi kuba kusithiwa udinga imali.  
Oku kudinga ukumiselwa ngenkqubo eya kujoliswa ekuchongeni ngempumelelo abantu abanjalo kuba asinguye wonke umntu omele kufumana imfundo yamahala.  
Abanako ukuyihlawulela kumele kuqinisekiswa ukuba bayahlawula kuba ke izinto zayo ziyahlawulelwa, enokuba zihlawulwa ngurhulumente na. Inkqubo enjalo ayinofumaneka ke kukho abahlelele ukukhwezelela imfundo izikhuni zesihogo. 
Sazitshisa izikolo ngemihla yokuqhankqalazela inkululeko kuba sasingafuni kwahlobo olo lwemfundo esasinunuswa ngayo.  
Ngoku imfundo yeyethu kwaye iyileyo sasiyilwela, enokuba asikabiyiyo na kodwa naleyo ikhoyo imiliselwe sithi. Ukujika siyibukule ke kukumzala ujike umdle. 
Akuyonyani ukuthi ukubhenela ezitalatweni sesona sixhobo soloyiso ekuqinelweni ziindlebe kukarhulumente namaqumrhu achaphazelekayo. 
 Okona kuthethwa kukubhenela ezitalatweni kukuba woyisakale kwisithebe seengxoxo ukumthimba ingqondo lowo uxoxa naye ukuba umoyisele ekukugwebeleni.  
Ngeliphandle woyisiwe kwisithebe sengqiqo nobungqondi ngoku ubhenela kwesobuhiba sona sikuzondela nokusiphipha. Bubuhiba ukutshabalalisa izixhobo zemfundo esinazo. 
Abafundi ke bathembise ngokuyivala gingci imfundo enomsila, beyivala kwakubo ke phofu apho baqokole khona.  
Mna ndithi ngebehlangatyezwa avalwe kwangoku la maziko-mfundo bengekawatshisi, abiyelwe agadwe ubusuku nemini. Kuya kuthi mhla basibona isidingo sokuvulwa kwawo afumaneke esenjengoko ayevaliwe. 
Iingxoxo malunga nemfundo yasimahla kwabafanelekileyo maziqhube. Kambe ke, asinguye wonke umntu ekufanele abe nemfundo enomsila.  
Bambi bafanelwe luqeqesho lumbi ukuzinzisa uqoqosho. Ingangathi ndiyaphoxisa xa ndisithi uninzi lweenkokeli zale misadulo indawo yazo isepalemente, hayi kumagumbi emfundo enomsila. 
Ziingqondi kuphela ezayamkelayo ingqobhoko; usenjalo nanamhla oku umcimbi wemfundo nabantsundu. Goba msenge iibhokhwe zikudle! 
Owenu kwisiXhosa, Nxuba.
title: Imfundo nabantsundu

text:
Omnye wabadlali beqakamba abasakhulayo, uThando Ntini, uzichithile iintente kwiphondo laseGauteng walibangisa kwelaKwaZulu-Natal – apho kulindeleke adlalele iDolphins kwisizini entsha. UNtini, 20, obedlalela iTitans, uphakathi kwabadlali abancwase ukufumana amathuba kwamanye amaqela phambi kwesizini entsha. “Ndifuna ukuba sendaweni apho ndiza kufumana amathuba okudlala ngaphezulu kunesizini egqithileyo,” utshilo uNtini, ethetha nabeendaba. “Kum, ukubuyela eThekwini kuhle ngoba yindawo eqhelekileyo. Ndingumntu owakhulela ngaselwandle. Andikuthandi ncam ukuhlala kude nonxweme – kodwa kuninzi endikufundileyo apho ndisuka khona kwaye ndinethemba lokuba kuza kundinceda,” utshilo uNtini, owaqala ukudlala iqakamba kwinqanaba eliphezulu kwiWestern Province idlala kwitumente ekuthiwa yi-Africa T20 Cup ngo-2018. 
Phambi koko wazenzela igama kwiqela lesizwe labadlali abasakhulayo nakwiqela lephondo laseNtshona Koloni. Esinye sezizathu ezibangele unyana kaMnu. Makhaya Ntini aye kwiqela laKwaZulu-Natal kukusebenze nabantu abathile acinga ukuba bangayiphucula indlela adlala ngayo. “Ukuza kwam apha akukho ngokudlala kuphela. Zininzi izinto endifuna ukuziqabelisa kwiminyaka embalwa ezayo kwikhondo lam lokudlala iqakamba. Bendifuna ukusebenza nabantu abafana noDuzi Mbatha, u-Imraan Khan noQuiton. Ukufumana ithuba lokuchongwa yeyona nto ephambili kum kwaye ndinethemba lokufunda oogxa bam abatsha ingekaqali isizini,” utshilo uNtini, odlala njengomjuli webhola yeqakamba ophuma eMpuma Koloni. 
Kwiqakamba yaseMzantsi Afrika, iDolphins iyaziwa ngokuvelisa abajuli bebhola yeqakamba abanesantya esiphezulu. “Kubalulekile ukunikwa kwabadlali abadlala njengam amathuba kwiqela lesizwe. Ndinethemba lokuba ngeke ndisokole ukuqhelana nedolophi yaseThekwini ngoba ndiyidlalile iqakamba nabadlali abaninzi abasadlala emgangathweni osezantsi. Ayondawo entsha kakhulu kum le, ndiyabazi abantu endidlala nabo apha. Kuyandichulumancisa ukusebenza noQuinton Friend (umqeqeshi wabajulayo) noxa ikokokuqala ndidibana naye,” uvale ngaloo mazwi uNtini, umdlali oyakukhula ephantsi koxinizelelo ngenxa kayise owazenzela igama elihle kwiqakamba yehlabathi ngeentsuku zakhe.
title: UThando Ntini uye kwiDolphins kuba efuna ukudlala rhoqo

text:
UBUQHOPHOLOLO kwaneenkokeli ezenza unothanda zingajonganga iimfuno zoluntu yenye yezinto ezithi qatha kuluntu laseMpuma Koloni xa lucinga ngoomasipala beli phondo. 
Oku kuvele kwinkomfa yantsuku-mbini ebikhwetywe ngukhala woomasipala boMzantsi Afrika (South African Local Government Association [Salga]), nebibanjelwe e-ICC eMonti. 
Obesakuba nguSodolophu waseChris Hani uMxolisi Koyo, nowonyulwe njengosihlalo omtsha weSalga eMpuma Koloni uthe: “Asikwazi ukuyiphepha eyokuba xa abantu becinga ngoomasipala, umba wobuqhophololo kwakunye neenkokeli ezenza unothanda yinto ethi qatha kuqala.” 
“Ndiyathemba ngoku ukuba oomasipala abasayiphiki into yokuba abantu bacinga ngobuqhophololo kwaneenkokeli ezizenzela unothanda xa befikelwa yingcingane malunga noomasipala.“Kufuneka sisebenze nzima ukuphelisa le ngcingane. Isixhobo sokulwa oku, lunxibelelwano oluluqilima phakathi kwabantu noomasipala. Kuhle ukuphawula ukuba oomasipala abaliqela ephondweni banesikhokelo esihle sokuphucula indlela abachitha ngayo imali,” utshilo uKoyo. 
UVuyo Mlokoti – osandul’ ukuqeshwa njengomanejala kamasipala waseNelson Mandela Bay – uthi xa iinkokeli zopolitiko nezolawulo koomasipala ziyazi ukuba kufuneka ziphendule eluntwini ngemisebenzi yazo lungalula kakhulu urhulumento loomasipala. 
“Yonke imihla iinkokeli zomasipala kufuneka zenze umsebenzi wazo ziyazi ukuba xa zithe zenza gwenxa into kufuneka ziyilungise kwalo mini. Ingxaki iqala ibekho xa iinkokeli zingakulungisi oko kugwenxa zikwenzileyo,” utshilo uMlokoti. 
Ethetha malunga nokutyunjwa kwakhe, uKoyo uthe: “Ndiziva ndimncinci yintembeko endiyinikwe ziinkokeli zoomasipala baseMpuma Koloni. Siza kusebenzisana sisonke noomasipala ukuphucula inkqubo yokusiwa kweenkonzo eluntwini.” 
Kusenjalo uNomakhosazana Meth, usodolophu wase-OR Tambo obefudula engusihlalo weSalga ephondweni, wonyulwe njengelungu lekomiti yeSalga kuzwelonke elimele iMpuma Koloni. Usodolophu womasipala iDr Beyers Naude uDeon De Vos naye wonyulwe njengelungu lekomiti yeSalga kuzwelonke.
title: Ubuqhophololo noomasipala

text:
Iqela lebhola ekhatywayo laseMpuma Koloni, iChippa United, liphantsi koxinizelelo kwakhona emva kokubethwa ngo’1-0 yiSuperSport United emdlalweni obuseSisa Dukashe Stadium kwiveki ephelileyo.  
Emva kokuba iphulukene nomdlalo wokuqala phantsi kwesandla sikaClinton Larsen, iChippa ayikaphumi engxakini ngokuba umsantsa ophakathi kwayo neMaritzburg United esemsileni ngamanqaku amathathu qha.  
Nakubeni kunjalo kodwa kubekho ukuphucuka eqeleni phantsi kwakhe uLarsen ngokuba walifumana lisekugqibeleni kwiPSL.  
Emva kokuthatha iintambo, iChippa iphumelele imidlalo emibini, yadlala ntanganye kwemibini yabethwa komnye.  
Xa izinto zingahambi kakuhle, usihlalo weChippa, uSiviwe Mpengesi, waziwa ngokugxotha abaqeqeshi, kodwa yena uLarsen uthi akanalo nelincinci ixhala ngokuba iqela lisaqokelela amanqaku ngokwendlela ekwakucwangciswe ngayo. 
Njengokuba iChippa ingakwazanga ukuphumelela, uLarsen uthe akothukanga, futhi yinto ebisoloko ilindelekile ngokuba iqela belingeke lingabethwa kweminye imidlalo.  
ULarsen uthe ukuvuka kweChippa emva kokubethwa yeyona nto ekumele iyenze ukuze ibonise ukuba liqela elinamandla.  
“Kwiiveki ezintlanu ezidlulileyo, ndayithetha into ethi ikhona imidlalo esakubethwa kuyo, kodwa eyona nto ibalulekileyo kum kukuvuka emva kokubethwa. Andixhalabanga ngokuba sisesekhondweni elihle. Libala ngendawo esasikuyo kwiiveki ezintlanu ezigqithileyo ngokuba sasinalo ixhala ngoko. Sisaqhuba kakuhle, sikwazile ukuqokelela amanqaku asibhozo emidlalweni emihlanu. Sizimisele ukuqokelela amanqaku emdlalweni ozayo kuba ngomnye wemidlalo esasithe kufuneka sifumane amanqaku kuwo,” utshilo uLarsen ethetha neentatheli eMonti. 
NgeCawe ngo’15:30, iChippa United kunyanzelekile ibuye nempumelelo eThohoyandou Stadium – apho iza kudibana neBlack Leopards esokolisayo xa idlalela ekhaya ukuze ikwazi ukulibaleka izembe.  
Nayo iLeopards ifuna amanqaku ngokuba umahluko phakathi kwayo neMaritzburg ngamanqaku amahlanu kuphela.  
ULarsen uvumile okukuba kunzima ukudlala eThohoyandou ngenxa yabalandeli – kodwa uthe abangeke bayoyike iLeopards.  
“Kunzima ukudlala phaya ngenxa yabalandeli abagcwalisa ibala. Uxinizelelo luzakube likwiLeopards kwaye ingasinceda lo nto. Siza kuyihlonipha iLeopards kodwa ngeke siyoyike. Sibonisile kwiiveki ezidlulileyo ukuba singabetha nokuba leliphi iqela xa sidlala kakuhle,” utshilo uLarsen. 
Imidlalo yePSL: 
NgoMgqibelo: Highlands Park vs Baroka FC @Makhulong Stadium, 15:30; Polokwane City vs Golden Arrows @Peter Mokaba Stadium, 15:30; Kaizer Chiefs vs Maritzburg United @FNB Stadium, 18:00; AmaZulu FC vs Bidvest Wits @King Zwelithini Stadium, 20:15 
NgeCawe: SuperSport United vs Free State Stars @Lucas Moripe Stadium, 15:30
title: Larsen: Andixhalabanga kuba sisekhondweni elihle

text:
Kwiintsukwana ezimbalwa ezigqithileyo, abantu abaliqela bangene kumakhasi onxibelelwano ngelikhupha imbilini yabo ngokungamkeleki kokuqeshwa kweembuso ezinye kwiinkqubo ezohlukeneyo kumabonakude.  
Le ncoko idandalazise elubala intlungu yabantu abafundela izakhono ezikumila kunje, abangaqatshelwayo xa bekhangela amathuba engqesho.  
UBonang Matheba, Boity Thulo no-Pearl Thusi, ngamanye amagama ekwenziwe ngawo umzekelo. Xa sele kuthethwa inyani, kulithuba noko la magqiyazana siwabona.  
Amanye amagama athe abalulwa ukongeza, aquka elikaThando Thabethe, Lerato Kganyago, Nomuzi Mabena, Luthando Shosha, Minnie Dlamini mhlawumbi nelo likaPearl Modiadie.  
Oku kwenzeka nakubafana, mhlawumbi hayi ngamaxesha amaninzi. Kunoo-Mo Flava, okanye uSizwe Dhlomo, kodwa kwakufuneka ubakhangele uze ubafumane.  
Ngelixa aba bengabasasazi kumabonakude, unomathotholo kwakunye neendima ezithile kwiziganeko ezithile, kungalula ukubasusa kukhangelwe igazi eliselitsha, kodwa inyani yeyokuba bakwenza ngokufanelekileyo oko bakwenzayo.  
Kungekudala, ugxa wam uncome uNomuzi Mabena ngendlela entle asingathe ngayo oonondaba kupapasho lwabachongelwe kwiiSouth African Music Awards. Beneqonga elikhulu, kusuku olubi, nolubandayo, ababukeli bebekwimeko engentle, kodwa wenze konke okusemandleni akhe ukubatsala. 
 Oko kukodwa nje sisakhono. Wakhe wambona uMatheba noThusi besenza usasazo ngqo, kodwa wagqibela nini ukubabona beyishwantshwatha imigca yabo? Mhlawumbi zange, nasekubeni isenzeka kubo, into nayo bayayiqhusheka ukuze ingabonwa.  
Ukwenza kakuhle kwabo kuthetha ukuba bayabiza ngokwexabiso, kodwa noxa kunjalo, iinkampani zibonakala zingayinanzanga leyo, ekupheleni kosuku, eyona nto ibalulekileyo kukugqwesa.  
Eyona ndawo edinga utshintsho ngumabonakude. Nasekubeni amajelo afana noo-e.tv noMzansi Magic bevelisa imisebenzi edidiyelwe apha ekhaya nje, kodwa kusekuninzi ukuphindwa-phindwa kwabadlali abanye.  
Oku ukubona kakuhle xa ubukele iinkqubo ngokulandelelana kwazo. Siyabathanda abadlali bethu ngetalente abanayo kwaye siyabaxhasa, kodwa kufanele kubekho okwenziwayo ngendlela yokubachonga.  
Umzekelo ofika engqondweni ngumdlalo iGazi, umdlalo oyidrama omtsha kwiMzansi Magic. Ngumdlalo otsala umdla okhangele icala elimnyama lobugqwirha.  
Noxa kunjalo, abanye babadlali abakula mdlalo uZikhona Sodlaka, Thami Mngqolo, Zenande Mfenyane no Anga Makubalo, bonke babuya kwiGenerations. Bathabatha inyathelo elihle lokuphakamela imivuzo yabo ababeyibona iphantsi, kwaye kumnandi ukubabona bebuyele kumabonakude, kodwa ukudlala bonke endaweni enye kwenza umoya ongathandekiyo noko. 
 Sisabona uMngqolo enguSenzo weGenerations noMfenyane enguNoluntu. Babekhe badibana njengezithandani ngoko kwiGenerations, oku kuyaphinda kuyenzeka kwiGazi.  
Kuyafana nokubona uBrooke noRidge besenza esibazi ngako kwiBaywatch okanye kwiNotting Hill. Bangabadlali abaziwayo nabagqwesileyo, kodwa mhlawumbi kumoya wokukhuthaza utshintsho, iqonga eli lidinga ukuvula iinyoba.  
Kodwa le nyewe ayiqali iphinde iphelele kubadlali. Kufanele sifunde banzi ngee-arhente ezikhetha abadlali, iinkampani ezivelisa imidlalo kwakunye nokuhlela.  
Bonke kufanele bakhangele italente entsha. Umdlalo iSaints & Sinners ikwenzile oko kakuhle, kwaye nabanye kufanele balandele ekhondweni.  
Asilibuzi icala letalente, esikuthethayo kunye kokokuba ingqondo nemehlo ziyakhumbula apho simgqibele khona umdlali, ngenxa yemveliso, nangenxa yomdlali, kufanele kubekho okutsha kumabonakude.
title: Lixesha leembuso ezintsha kwi-TV!

text:
Itumente yebhola ekhatywayo, iAfrica Cup of Nations (CAF), ithiwe wambu lilifu elimnyama xa kanye iqala ukungena kuvuthondaba. NgoMvulo kubhubhe abantu abasibhoso bonke kwaze kwalimala abantu abaqikelelwa kumashumi amathathu anesibhozo ngethuba kuqhubeka umdlalo obuphakathi kweCameroon neComoros obuse-Olembe Stadium ebusuku. Iingxelo zithi abantu baye banyathelana ngethuba benyanzelisa ukungena ebaleni ebelingagcwaliswanga ngenxa yemithetho yeKhorona. Kuthiwa abantu abebefuna ukungena ebaleni bebeqikelelwa kumawaka angamashumi amahlanu. Lona ibala liginya abantu abangamashumi amathandathu. 
Umdlalo uphele kuphumelele iCameroon ngo’2-1 emdlalweni iComoros elwe kakhulu kuwo idlala ngabadlali abalishumi emva kokukhutshwa komdlali wayo kwisigaba sesithathu. Emva kwesithwakumbe sokubhubha kwabantu befuna ukubukela umdlalo we-Afcon, kugqitywe kwelokuba umdlalo obuza kudlalelwa e-Olembe Stadium ngeCawe usiwe e-Ahmadou Ahidjo Stadium. NgoLwesibini, uMongameli weCAF, uGqirha Patrice Motsepe, uvakalise ukhukhathazeka kwakhe watsho evuma ukuba kubekho ukuhexa kwindlela abaququzeleli abalungiselele ngayo kwicala lezokhuselo. 
“Ndazi kakuhle okokuba ngokomthetho, ikomiti eququzelelayo yiyo enoxanduva lezokhuselo. Kodwa nathi siyiCAF sinoxanduva lokuqinisekisa ukuba umntu ngamnye ukhuselekile,” utshilo uGqirha Motsepe ethetha namajelo eendaba. “Ukuba iheke ibivuli, ngesingalahlekelwanga yimiphefumlo yabantu. Bekuvaliwe ngenxa yezizathu ezingenakucaciswa. Kucace gca ukuba kubekho ukungenziwa kwezinto kakuhle. Ezinye izinto bekufanele ukuba zibonwe zingekehli ukuze sikwazi ukuqinisa ukhuselo. Kwakuhlonitshwa abaswelekileyo ngokuthi cwaka imizuzwana kwabadlali phambi kokuqala komdlalo emidlalweni elandelayo. Emva kwentlanganiso, iCAF iza kukhupha ingxelo egcweleyo,” utshilo uMotsepe.
title: Igutyungelwe lilifu elimnyama iAfcon eseCameroon emva kokubhubha kwabantu

text:
Imvumi ezenzele igama eMpuma Koloni kumculo wokholo, uKhanyisa Nkantsu uzakube esungula ngokusesikweni icwecwe lakhe elitsha kraca, nelileleshumi ukuza kuthi ga ngoku. 
Eli cwecwe, elineengoma ezilishumi elinesine eziquka ingoma ethi ‘Ewe Lowo’, liza kusungulwa kwicawa yase-Imonti Assemblies of God ngeCawa, umhla wesithandathu kule nyanga. 
“Ndigqibe kwelokuba xa ndikhupha icwecwe leshumi, ndikubhiyozele oku kwicawa yam, nalapho ndenziwe khona, ndaze ndakhuliswa khona ngokomoya. Izakube iyimini enkulu kum nalapho ndiza kube ndibulela kuThixo ngenxa yokulunga kwakhe. Akakufaki entweni uThixo akushiye, into ayiqalileyo uyayifeza,” utshilo uKhanyisa. 
Eli cwecwe leshumi lilandela abanye oobhazabhaza bamacwecwe ale mvumi naquka * -We Are Ready nathe wamshicilela kunyaka ka’2015 ekhatshwa ngunyana wakhe * -Inamandla.  
Ukanti amanye amacwecwe akhe aquka, * -Ezintweni Zonke, Ungcwele Somandla, Xa Simi Ngakuwe, Udumo, Amandl’ovuko kunye nezinye. 
Ngonyaka ka-2015 uKhanyisa wathi wenza imbali ngokusungula icwecwe lakhe lesithoba kunye nonyana wakhe owayeminyaka ilithoba, * -Inamandla Sabuka. Kwinqaku elaphuma kweli phephandaba ngonyaka ka-2015 uKhanyisa wayengawuvali umlomo ngesakhono esathi sakhethwa ngunyana wakhe ebuncinaneni bakhe. 
Kweli cwecwe lakhe litsha uKhanyisa usebenze noMxolisi Mhlongo, uShadrack Ndlovu kunye noMacozoma. 
Ukanti iimvumi azakwabelana nazo ngeqonga uKhanyisa ziquka uVeliswa, uBethusile Mcinga, uDumi Mkokstad, uJumbo, uMawethu, uLuleka Mhlanga, uV-Sholo, uThumeka, uBonginkosi, no-Inamandla Sabuka. 
UKhanyisa wongeze ngelithi bazakuba ne-Live Band ngalo mhla, nalapho ekubeke kwacaca ukuba abanavalo, makulindelwe okuhle kodwa.  
Ukwathe uluntu oluzakuthi luzibandakanye nabo ngolu suku luzakuvuseleleka, kwaye lusikelele yingoma ezakube isitsho ngalo mhla mkhulu. 
Amaxabiso okungena emnyango likhulu leerandi (R100) umntu omdala, ize ibe ngamashumi amahlanu eerandi (R50) umntwana. Bazakuqala ukutsholoza ngentsimbi yokuqala de kube ngokuhlwa.  
Ungaphoswa!
title: UKhanyisa ukhupha icwecwe leshumi

text:
UBUKHOSI baseMaxesibeni phantsi kukaNonyaniso Fikeni bumemelele ubambiswano phakathi kwabo neetyalike ezahlukeneyo kunye namapolisa kumthandazo wokulwa ulwaphulo mthetho ozakuqhuba rhoqo ngenyanga kwilali yaseLugelweni. 
Olu manyano luphantsi komxholo othi ‘Yizani sakhe’ kuba luneenjongo zokwakha ingingqi enolutsha noluntu oluluqilima ngesiseko esisiso soMdali. 
Ethetha kuphehlelelo lolu manyano ngoLwesine weveki ephelileyo, uNkosi Fikeni, uthe oko kwangenyanga yoMnga nyakenye le lali igutyungelwe lilifu elimnyama lobundlobongela nobugebenga, kungoku nje iKomkhulu lithi kwanele.  
“Kuphuma izidumbu eziliqela ngenyanga kule lali oko kwangenyanga yoMnga, kanti neengxwelerha ziliqela. Noko kwanele, asikwazi ukulala ngesijwili sivuswe sesinye. Lilixa lokuba sibhekise kuMdali kuba sizizamile iinzame zokuwukhuza lo mkhuba, nzame ezo ziwele ezindlebeni ezivalwe ngomdongo. Sicele umanyano namapolisa neenkonzo kuba sikholelwa ukuba sakuwubona umehluko xa sithandaza ngazwi nye.” 
Ophethe isikhululo samapolisa kule ngingqi uColonel Mlambo Ndabankulu, uthe besisipolisa baya lulangazelela olu manyano kuba ngenene luyanda ulwaphulo mthetho kwaye bangaphezu kweshumi abantu ababhubhe ngokuhlatywa kususela ngoDisemba kule lali. Uthe oyena nobangela wobundlobongela ziziyobisi, utywala nokuhamba ngobusuku kolutsha. Uthe olu manyano luza kuwenza lula umsebenzi wamapolisa kwaye nabo bayawazi amandla omthandazo. 
Obethethela amabandla azinikeleyo kolu manyano nguMdidiyeli Mathenjwa weMethodist Church of South Africa, nothe: “Siyazinikela ukuba yinxalenye yolu manyano, kwaye siza kuhlala phantsi sicwangcise iindlela esingarhweba ngazo ulutsha lungene enkonzweni, luthi xha kwiziyolo zeli lizwe. Sibulela ukuhlakanipha kwekomkhulu lethu, likwazi ukuthi kwakubakho isithwakumbe libhenele kuSomandla. 
Umntu omtsha wale lali uLuthando Magaweni, uthe unethemba lokuba olu manyano luza kuba yimpumelelo lululwe neengcambu ulwaphulo-mthetho eLugelweni.
title: Ubukhosi, iityalike namapolisa zidityaniswe lulwaphulo – mthetho

text:
OWAYE sakuba nguMongameli waseMzantsi Afrika uThabo Mvuyelwa Mbeki, uzakubekwa ngokusesikweni njengentloko (chancellor) yeYunivesithi yoMzantsi Afrika (Unisa) ngoMvulo. 
Ukuchongwa kukaMbeki kwesi sikhundla, kuza kuqinisa nangakumbi uxanduva lwakhe eUnisa nanjengoko ekwanentsebenziswano neli ziko kwicandelo loqeqesho lweenkokeli zaseAfrika phantsi kweThabo Mbeki African Leadership Institute (TMALI). 
I-TMALI liziko elisebenza ngokubambisene neThabo Mbeki Foundation kwakunye neUnisa. 
Kwingxelo emfutshane, iUnisa ithi ichulumance kakhulu ukwamkela umntu okwibakala likaMbeki njengentloko yayo. 
UMbeki uzalelwe eDutywa ngonyaka ka-1942, ezalwa ngamatshantliziyo omzabalazo umam’ uNomaka notat’ uGovan Mbeki. Wazibandakanya ne-ANC Youth League ngo-1956 eneminyaka elishumi elinesithathu, ze wawufulathela uMzantsi Afrika esiya elubhacweni ngo-1962. 
UMbeki unesidanga seeMasters kwezoqoqosho awasifumana kwiYunivesithi iSussex eNgilane. Lo kaMbeki ubenguMongameli amatyeli amabini ngo-1999 nango-2004. 
Ngonyaka ka-2008, iANC yamkhweba kwisikhundla sakhe njengomongameli welizwe. 
Noxa kunjalo, uMbeki uthe gqolo ukuqhuba nomsebenzi wakhe wokumanya izizwe eAfrika nanjengoko sele ethabathe inxaxheba kwiingxoxo zoxolo eLesotho, Zimbabwe, Burundi, Comoros, Cote d’Ivoire naseDemocratic Republic of Congo. 
sithandiwe.velaphi@inl.co.za
title: UMbeki uchongwe njengentloko ye-Unisa

text:
UZizipho Siyongwana (21) waseQonce, ozicelela inkxaso eluntwini ngokuthi lumvotele atsho akwazi ukungenela ukhuphiswano lukaMiss King William’s Town, uthi oku akakwenzeli yena siqu, wenzela abasakhulayo ekubeni abengumzekelo omhle kubo. 
USiyongwana uthi abantwana sele bekhula bengenalo ithemba ingakumbi abo bakhulela emaphandleni ngenxa yeziganeko ngeziganeko ezibuhlungu ezenzeka ekukhuleni kwabo kule mihla. USiyongwana ungenele uMiss KWT, bengamagqiyazana angamashumi amabini anesihlanu (25) kodwa lona ukhuphiswano lufuna ishumi elinesibini (12) kuphela. 
USiyongwana ukuze abe uyangena kweli nani lifunwayo uxhomekeke kuluntu ekubeni lumvotele. Abakwaziyo ukuvota ngabo bakunxibelelwano lomnatha kuphela kuba kufuneka ungene kuFacebook ukhangele igama lakhe ukhangele indawo ethi vota wakugqiba ucofe kuyo. Ukhuphiswano olu lokuvota luyavala ngoMgqibelo umhla wesithathu kuTshazimpuzi. 
Olona khuphiswano laba nobuhle luza kuba ngenyanga yoMnga 2021. 
USiyongwana uthi izicwangciso zakhe ujonge ukukhulisa kwanokuxhobisa abantwana abangamantombazana, hayi kuphela, nakubantwana abangamakhwenkwe. Uthi amathuba anje anqabile kubantwana abangamakhwenkwe, kusoloko kujoliswe kumantombazana kungoko nawo eza kuwabandakanya. 
“Ndifuna abantwana abasakhulayo xa bejonga kum babone umzekelo. Ndikwafuna nokubabonisa ezinye iindlela ngobomi, bangajongi icala elihle kuphela, bajonge nemingeni ukuze bakwazi ukumelana nobom,” utshilo uSiyongwana. 
Lo nobuhle uqhube wathi ufuna ukugcina abantwana bexakeke zizinto eziza kuthi ziphuhlise iingcinga zabo hayi ukuyabula bengenanto yakwenza. 
USiyongwana wenza unyaka wakhe wesithathu kwizifundo zobuchwepheshe (IT) eWalter Sisulu University. Uqale ukungenela ukhuphiswano loonobuhle eneminyaka emithandathu (6) kuphela.
title: UZizipho ucela inkxaso yokungena kuMiss KWT

text: Akubanjwanga nje abadidiyeli, notywala buthathiwe. Ngokomfanekiso, obu tywala bubonakala njengosingamqombothi kwanenye ingxubevange eyenzelwa ekhaya.Umasipala uthi oku akukho semthethweni.Ukudidiyelwa kotywala kuvaliwe phantsi kukaLevel 4 wokuvalwa kweentshukumo elizweni, utshilo uMasipala.“Isixeko singathanda ukukhupha isilumkiso kwabo badidiyela utywala, ukuba thina siwuthathele ingqalelo umthetho nemiqathango yokuvalwa kweentshukumo elizweni.“Abo bangathobeli mthetho siza kubabamba,” utshilo othethela iBuffalo City, uSamkelo Ngwenya.
title: Kubanjwe abadidiyeli, kwathathwa nalo singamqombothi

text:
OKUQALE njengesilumkiso sokuba amantombazana afunda eClarendon High School for Girls eMonti mawachule ukunyathela xa ehlomla kumaqonga ezonxibelelwano ingakumbi kwimiba yezobuhlanga, kujike kwayincindi yekhala, amakhosikazi awayefunda eClarendon egixa, ebika “ubuhlanga” kwesi sikolo. 
Oku kuza emva kokuba kwiveki ephelileyo esi sikolo sifake ileta kuFacebook waso, apho isivakalisi sokuqala sivulwe kanje: “IClarendon High School sisikolo esisekelwe kwimigaqo nesizinikeleyo ekulweni nezehlo zobuhlanga.” 
Esi sivakalisi besihlakulela ukubalula isehlo saseMelika emva kokubulawa komdaka wela lizwe uGeorge Floyd ezandleni zamapolisa amhlophe. 
 Esi sikolo sikwakhankanye nezehlo zobungqwabalala bamapolisa oMzantsi Afrika kwanobuhlanga obugquba eMzantsi Afrika nakwihlabathi. 
Ngokwale mbalelwano ikuFacebook, iClarendon imemelele kubazali nakwabo bajongene namantombazana afunda eClarendon ukuba baqiniseke ukuba abantwana babo bathabatha uxanduva futhi amazwi abo kumaqonga onxibelelwano angqamana nemigaqo yesi sikolo yokubona “uMzantsi Afrika ongenabuhlanga”. 
Isuke apho kanye, abo babesaya kufunda kwesi sikolo benomsindo ngale mbalelwano besithi “ayinakuba” yiClarendon le ibhala lo nto. 
Omnye ohlomle kule mbalelwano uphawule kanje: “Ndiphumelele imatriki ngo2009 kodwa ndisabona into enye kwezo zinto sasigaxeleka kuzo kwiminyaka elishumi elinanye edlulileyo. Ayiyo le. IClarendon mayenze ngcono. Bancedile wethu ngokubhala le leta, kufike ixesha lokuba eli ziko libhenceke. Sithule ixesha elide.” 
Omnye uthe: “Sasilungiselela ukuqala umdlalo womnyazi kwaye omnye wabaqeqeshi wandicela ukuba ndigcine ixesha (lokudlala). Abaqeqeshi babenencokwana bethetha isiXhosa phambi komdlalo. [Utitshalakazi waseClarendon] wayezihambela wabeva ukuba bathetha isiXhosa. [Utitshalakazi waseClarendon] waya kumqeqeshi waseClarendon wamchukumisa ngesinyanzelo ze wathi ‘asiluthethi olo lwimi kwesi sikolo’.” 
Omnye ubhale ngolu hlobo: “Kwakungavunywa ukuba sicule amagwijo xa kukho iitumente zezemidlalo kusithiwa ziingoma zetoyitoyi.” Omnye uthe: “Ndikhumbula ngethuba thina mantombazana amnyama sasinyanzelwa ukuba simazi ‘uDank God’ ngentliziyo kodwa amantombazana amhlophe ayenganyanzeliswa ukuba amazi ‘uBawo Wethu’.” 
Ngethuba sibhala kule veki, imihlomlo ibingaphaya kwamakhulu asibhozo, nto leyo ethe yanyanzelisa ukuba ibhodi elawula isikolo (SGB) iphendule ngembalelwano. 
“Siyiqaphele ngokukhulu ukuxhalaba ingxoxo kuFacebook waseClarendon ephakamise izehlo zobuhlanga nokubukulwa kwesi sikolo. Siyakwamkela oku ngelithi le nyaniso ikrakrayo mayivakaliswe. 
“Njengesikolo sichasene nobuhlanga nokubukulwa. Ibhodi yesikolo (SGB) igqibe kwelokuba kusekwe ikomiti yokuphengulula nokubhalwa ngokokutsha kwemigaqonkqubo ze kubekho iqonga lokuqubisana nezehlo zobuhlanga nokubukulana. 
“Siza kuthetha noluntu lwaseClarendon ze sicele bonke abazali, amantombazana [esikolo], amantombazana amadala [esi sikolo], kwanoluntu ngokubanzi ukuba lusebenzisane nathi ukwakha isikolo esinokuzingca ngaso sisonke. Sizimisele ukusombulula iinkxalabo eziphakanyisiweyo,” itshilo le bhodi kwimbalelwano.
title: Bayagixa ngengqumbo ‘yobuhlanga’ eClarendon

text:
Kapa:  
Abantu abakhulu ngomzimba amaxesha amaninzi bajamelana nezigxeko ezonyelisayo ezibangela ukuba babeneentloni ngemizimba yabo.  
Oku kubangela ukuba bangazithembi ebomini, bambi bazidele kunabanye abantu de bazame iindlela ezohlukeneyo zokwehlisa imizimba.  
Kungokunje oko kufikelele esiphelweni ukuba bangazithembi ngemizimba yabo nanjengoko uAnelisa Magazi, 27, esungule inkampani yakhe eyiThick Thigh Swimwear. Uthi injongo yokusungula le nkampani kukufuna ukumilisela ukuzithemba nokuzithanda kwabantu abakhulu ngomzimba. 
“Ndifuna bangabinantloni ngemizimba yabo yaye bazithembe ngemizimba yabo naxa bephakathi kwabantu ingakumbi xa betyelele kumanxweme  awohlukeneyo,” utshilo uMagazi. 
Uthi abantu abakhulu ngemizimba bayathanda ukwenyeliswa xa benxibe iimpahla zokuqubha, ngelithi bona akufanelekanga ukuba bayinxiba ngenxa yemizimba yabo emikhulu. 
UAnelisa uthi kungokunje kule nkampani yakhe ukwiphulo lokudibanisa ezi mpahla zokuqubha ze azinike mthungi uthile athunge isuti zokuqubha elungiselela abacondobi bakhe abakhulu ngokwemizimba. 
Kungokunje unamanenekazi amathandathu nathi acondobe enxibe ezi suti beveze loo mizimba yabo yondleke ngokwenene. 
“Ndiyavuya ukuba lapha, yayi liphupha lam ukuba ndibe ngumcondobi nto nje ndafumana izigxeko ngomzimba wam omkhulu, abantu bayasinyhasha besicalucalula ngemizimba yethu,” utshilo uNokuzola Fika, 32, waseKhayelitsha.  
Uthi bafuna ukuphuma baphele kwinto yokuba babe behlazwa ngemizimba yabo emikhulu.  
Uthi kungokunje bayazingca ngemizimba yabo. Esitsho kananjalo ukuba ubuhle bomntu abuxhomekekanga kubungakanani bomzimba. 
Ezi nzwakazi zondlekileyo zithi ngoku kufikelele ixesha lokuba nazo zikhuphe ngaphandle imikhaba zingabiyintlekisa, zibe zikhonjwa xa zenze oko.  
Ukanti le nkampani inabacondobi abathandathu abakhulu sele ineenyanga ezisibhozo yasungulwayo.
title: Izidudla zifumana ithuba lokucondoba

text:
Ozakhela igama lakhe kwezoshishino eMonti uSipho Suntelo, 31, ongumnikazi wesinongo iEbuhlanti BBQ Sauce, uthi apho ajonge khona kukuba sifumaneke nakumanye amazwe angaphandle kwiAfrika. Eli tyendyana likhulele kwilizwe laseLesotho ebazalini bakhe. Lifundele ukupheka ePE College. 
Uthi umbono wokuziqalela eyakhe iEbuhlanti BBQ Sauce uqale ngo2015 ngethuba eyintloko yabapheki kwenye yeehotele zaseMonti. 
Uthi wacela uManejala wakhe athenge izithako ezithile kuba efuna ukukhe azame esi sinongo (sauce) esizokuba sesabo kule hotele, hayi esithengwa sele silungele ukutyiwa. 
Emva kokubona ukuba siyathandwa ziindwendwe ezityelela kwihotele yabo, wagqiba ekubeni asikhulise nangakumbi nto leyo yamenza ukuba aphume emsebenzini. Uthi okubangele ukuba asithiye ngeli gama iEbuhlanti izizathu zoko zininzi, okunye ikukukhumbuza abantwana bomgquba emva ekhaya abaphesheya kolwandle umtsalane kwanokubonakalisa ubunye. Ngaphandle kwiphepha elithe nca kule bhotile yeEbuhlanti BBQ Sauce ibhaliwe injongo yeli gama. 
Uthi injongo kukuba isosi yakhe inabe ingafumaneki eMpuma Koloni naseMzantsi kuphela. 
“Sinoosisi noobhuti abaphesheya kolwandle endifuna babenento ebakhumbuza emva ekhaya kwenzele athi xa ebona igama iEbuhlanti azibone esemaxhantini kowabo. Zikhona izinto othi wakuyiva, wakuyibona naxa uyingcamla ivele ikukhumbuze imvelaphi kwanokukhula kwakho, nale sauce igama layo injongo yalo koko,” utshilo uSuntelo. 
KwiEbuhlanti BBQ Sauce kusafumaneka ibhabhatyu kuphela. Lo mpheki uthi ezimnandi iindaba zezokuba uza kukhupha nencwadi yokupheka, kwaye ukwakulo nephulo lokuyikhulisa ifumaneke nangeperiperi nangezinye izinongo le Ebuhlanti. Kwaye le Ebuhlanti awuyifaki kwinyama eyojiweyo kuphela, uyifaka nakwipizza, intlanzi neetshipsi. 
IEbuhlanti BBQ Sauce isafumaneka ikakhulu kwiiTshisanyama zaseMonti eGonubie, Beacon bay naseVincent. USuntelo sele ekwiingxoxo neenkampani ezivelisa ukutya eziza kuthi zithengise esi sinongo sakhe. 
“Noosomashishini esele ndibeke kubo le sauce yam bonwabile kwaye bayandikhuthaza.” 
Uthi wonwabile kwindawo akuyo ngoku ngokwale Ebuhlanti BBQ Sauce nangona nje ngeli xesha lokumiswa kweentshukumo zelizwe bekukhe kwanzima engasayi ngaphandle ayokuthengisa isauce yakhe. 
USuntelo uthi uyayibulela inkxaso ayifumana kuluntu, nawayifumana kwiSEDA. 
Uthi umngeni asajongene nawo kukudelelwa ngabantu kuba becinga inokuba uqeshiwe ayoyakhe le sauce,  abanye baye bavuye batsho bathenge xa bebona igama kwaye besiva nokuba ungumvelisi wayo. UkuFacebook nakwiLink FM ngooLwesine apho afundisa ngokupheka.
title: Uzenzele iBBQ Sauce emuncis’ iintupha!

text:
Kapa: 
Zivaliwe izikhululo zoololiwe ukuqala kwisikhululo sikaloliwe iChris Hani ukuya kuma ngePhilippi, kweli leKapa. 
 Ukuvalwa kwezi zikhululo zikaloliwe kumzila osembindini kulandela emva kokuba abasemagunyeni kwaMetrorail bevakalise ukuba abasayi kuhamba okwethutyana oololiwe kulandela ukunyuka komthamo wamanzi nabangela ukuba ibonakale luzizi imizila yoololiwe phakathi kwezi zikhululo. 
Kungokunje abakhweli baxoze mphini wumbi ukuzama iindlela zokuba bafikelele kwindawo zokuxelengela inyama. 
“Siphila kabuhlungu thina bantu basebenzisa oololiwe kuba uMetrorail akakhawulelani nathi yaye akavelani nathi, sifika emva kwethuba emisebenzini kuba inani labakhweli bakaloliwe lingaphaya kokuqonda nto leyo ibangela singoneli ezibhasini, oku kusityabula kakhulu kuba oololiwe basuke basiqubulise bangahambi,” utshilo uLindiwe Mahanjana nongumkhweli kaloliwe. 
“Sidane kakhulu sisigqibo esithathwe nguMetrorail sokuvala okwethutyana umzila kaloliwe osembindini,” utshilo uDalton Ndongeni ongusomlomo kwimanyano elwela amalungelo wabakhweli iPublic Transport Voice. 
Oku kulandela emva kokuba le manyano ithe yafumana lo myalezo ngomhla weshumi elinesine kule nyanga.  
OkaNdongeni uthi lo myalezo sisonyeliso ngakubakhweli bakaloliwe kwiindawo ezichaphazelekayo. Uthi oku kubonakalisa ulawulo oluhexayo kwiziphathamandla kwinkampani yohambo ngololiwe iMetrorail, nadiza ukuba ngeyikwazile ukuthintela oku kwangethuba. 
Ivakalise ukuphoxeka nodano iKhayelitsha Development Forum (KDF) malunga nokuqhawulwa okwethutyana kweenkonzo zohambo ngololiwe phakathi kwezi zikhululo zikumzila osembindini.  
“Kuyaxhalabisa ukuva iingxelo ezikumila kunje kumaxesha angoku wokuba kungamiliselwa imilinganiselo ukuthintela imeko ezikumila kunje,” utshilo uNdithini Tyhido ongusihlalo weKDF.  OkaTyhido uthi oku kuyakhwankqisa kuba kuchaphazela kanye abo bangathathi ntweni ngenxa yokungacetywa kwezinto kwangethuba ukuze zingachaphazeli abakhweli. 
“Isimo sezulu esibi esikhatshwa zizandyondyo zemvula sibangele ukuba kumiswe okwethutyana ukuhamba kweenkonzo zikaloliwe kumzila osembindini,” utshilo uRiana Scott wakaMetrorail. 
 Uthi ukuvalwa okwethutyana kwalo mzila kulandela ukuphakama komthambo wamanzi ngakwisikhululo sikaloliwe iNolungile.  
OkaScott uthi imeko iyakubuyela esiqhelweni emva kokuhla komthamo wamanzi.
title: Ukungahambi koololiwe kubetha abahlali eKapa

text:
UMnu. Siviwe Mpengesi ubeke ithemba kuVladislav Heric njengomnye wabantu abanokuhlangula iqela lakhe elitsala nzima kwiDStv Premiership. Namhlanje kuqeshwe uVladislav Heric njengomcebisi oyintloko weqela. Sisikhundla esingaphezulu kwesomqeqeshi weqela, uSiyabonga Gwambi – osabambeleyo. 
Ukufika kukaHeric kuza emva kokugxothwa kukaLuc Eymael – ekhululweyo kwiiveki ezidlulileyo yiChippa United ngenxa yezityholo zobuhlanga ekuthiwa wazenza engumqeqeshi eTanzania. Yena wayeqeshwe njengomcebisi oyintloko emva kokugxothwa kukaDan Malesela. Kulindeleke ukuba uGwambi noHeric basebenzisane njengokuba iChippa United isazama indlela yokunyukela phezulu kwiDStv Premiership esele inemidlalo elithoba yonke ingasaphumeleli. 
“UHeric, oyinzalelwane yelizwe laseSerbia, uyayazi indlela esebenza ngayo iChippa United ngoba wakhe wancedisa ngonyaka eyanyuselwa ngayo isuka kwiGladAfrica Championship. Siyamamkela kwiqela lethu esicinga ukuba liza kuzuza kumava anawo emidlalweni esibhozo eshiyekileyo. Into efunekayo ngoku kukuba iqela livale isizini lisendaweni ebhetele,” utshilo uMnu. Mpengesi. 
Emva kokuba iChippa ibethe ngo’1-0 yiBaroka FC emdlalweni wayizolo, ngeCawe iza kuzama ukulwela amanqaku apheleleyo xa idibana neGolden Arrows. UHeric, okhe wasebenza kwiqela laseKapa elikwiGladAfrica Championship, ufika kakubi iChippa United ihleli kwindawo yeshumi elinesihlanu futhi idinga uncedo ngakumbi emidlalweni yeDStv Premiership nangona iqhuba kakuhle kwiNedbank Cup.
title: UVladislav Heric ungene endaweni kaLuc Eymael kwiChippa United

text:
Uzakuvela enkundleni kwakhona ngoLwesine wale veki umrhanelwa ojongene namatyala aquka ukudlwengula abulale inkondekazi kwilali iBolotwa eNgqeleni.  
Umrhanelwa, uAseza Makinana (29) ebevele enkundleni yamatyala eNgqeleni okokuqala ngoLwesithathu weveki ephelileyo. Ityala lakhe liye lamiswa emva kokuba umbuso ucele ithutyana elingangeentsuku ezisixhenxe zokuphanda umrhanelwa kwezinye iziganeko zolwaphulo mthetho.  
Ngethuba evela enkundleni abahlali beelali zaseNgqeleni baphakamise amakhephe khephe ngaphandle kwenkundla yamatyala besithi makagcinwe ngaphakathi ngenxa yobungozi anabo. 
 UMakinana ubanjwe emva kokubulawa kwenkondekazi eneminyaka engama-75 kwilali yaseBholotwa eNgqeleni. Ixhoba uGaga Nomuntshu wabhubha emva kokudlwengulwa emva koko wakrwitshwa kwezi veki zimbini zidlulileyo. 
Ngethuba evele enkundleni uMakinana bathathu abantu ababike ukuba nabo bangamaxhoba okudlwengulwa nguye. Omnye wabahlali ukhale iinymbezi, ebalisa ngendlela awadlwengulwa ngayo nguMakinana, waza emva koko wamxabela amanxeba amathandathu entloko.  
Uthe, “Ndiyavuya ede wabanjwa wavalelwa, ibuhlungu into awandenza yona kwiveki ezimbini ezidlulileyo. Ndasindiswa kukuzilwela kodwa wandohlula ngamandla wandixabela ngezembe.Siyamoyika makangabuyi entolongweni.  
UMaphelo Vava obethethela abemi beelali eziquka iBolotwa, iMhosi nezinye phantsi kweeWadi ezine eNyandeni uthe umrhanelwa kudala edlwengula amaxhegwaza kodwa engabanjwa kuba abantu bengaqinisekanga ukuba ngenene nguwe owenze lo mkhuba. 
Uthe” Umntu osincedisileyo ngumama uNomathamsanqa owathi wamlayita wambona nguye kwalula ukumbamba. Abanye bayoyika ukuxela ukuba bayadlwengulwa.” UVava uqhube wathi, “Sonwabe kakhulu singabahlali sophumla ekuhlaleni. Le nkwenkwe idlwengule udado boyise de yamxabela ngezembe.” 
Ilungu losapho lwexhoba uNolithemba Ntangana uthi kuyaluvuyisa olusapho ukubanjwa komrhanelwa emva kokwenza eli sikizi.  
Amapolisa athi, kuthathwe incindi kumrhanelwa nezakuhlolwa ngeliqokelela ubungqina obumoyamanisa nesi senzo.
title: Bafuna abolele ejele ojongene nezityholo zokudlwengula nokubulala

text:
“Ukuzokuthi ga ngoku alishumi elinesithathu amatyala avuliweyo, kwabanjwa abantu abalishumi ngokolusa kodwa beyazi kwanqunyanyiswa. Kwaze kwachithwa amabhuma angamashumi amabini anesine. Sikwabulela nabahlali abathe basebenzisana namapolisa bechaza emapoliseni ezi ndawo zinamabhuma angekho semthethweni,” utshilo uNqatha. 
Usihlalo weNdlu yeeNkosi ephondweni uNkos’ Mwelo Nonkonyana ubongoze iiNkosi ekubeni ziqaphele ngamaxesha onke kwaye ziyilwe into yolwaluko kwiindawo zazo ekuhlaleni. 
“Sihlaba ikhwelo kubazali babantwana kwakunye neentsapho bayithobele imiqathango yelockdown, bangathumeli abantwana babo entabeni ngeli xesha. Nabazali bangoyiki bavule ityala bavulele abo bolusa iintsana zabo ngaphandle kwemvume yabazali,” utshilo uNkosi Nonkonyana.
title: Ayi24 amabhuma achithiweyo,  kwabanjwa ishumi!

text:
YIMINYAKA ingamashumi amabini anesibini uThemba Qasani waseTyutyu eBhisho ebhuqwa yimpundulu eyamkhupha emsebenzini, yamwisela ubudoda bakhe emva koko yalala nomfazi wakhe. 
Le mpundulu, evela ngelizwi, iyathetha ezindlebeni zikaQasani, ithi makanyamezele iza kumnika “ihlabathi” nemali engangezigidi ezingamashumi amabini (R20 million). 
“Lathi [eli lizwi] kwanele ngabantwana bam ababini, landiwisela ubudoda emva koko lavela kunkosikazi ekungathi ndabelana ngesondo naye, kanti lilo eli lilala nonkosikazi wam. 
“Emva kokuba [eli lizwi] lilele nonkosikazi wam, ndaye ndalibuza ukuba kutheni lidlwengula unkosikazi wam, ukuphendula lathi mandingayithethi emntwini lo nto kuba liza kundinika ihlabathi,” utshilo uQasani. 
UQasani uthi ukruqukile yile mpundulu, kuba kudala esehla esenyuka efuna amancedo ngaphandle kwempumelelo. 
“Lithi mandinyamezele kuba liza kundenza uThixo buqu. Lithi uYesu wafa ngoko ke ndim ofanele ukuthabatha indawo yakhe. Landikhupha nakumsebenzi wam eBhisho, lisithi andifanelanga ukuba ndisengqeshweni kuba liza kundinika ihlabathi,” utshilo uQasani. 
Uthi mhla wagqiba kwelokuya kumthandazo owawumkhulu eQonce, kwasa eqaqanjelwa ziinyawo. “Ndavuka iinyawo ziqaqamba, kunzima ukuphakama. Emva koko lathetha lisithi alifuni ndiye kula mthandazo kuba ndiza kuthetha izinto zikaThixo,” utshilo uQasani. 
UQasani uthi emva kokusokola ngenxa yokuphuma emsebenzini, wagqiba kwelokuba akhe amane ukudlala iLotto. 
“Bendimana ndidlala iLotto, ndiman’ ukuphumelela imali. Ndayeka ukudlala iLotto xa lindixelela ukuba liyazazi iinombolo endizidlalayo, ngoko ke mandilibale ngokuphumelela iLotto. Lalivele lizibize iinombolo, esele ndizibhale phantsi,” utshilo uQasani. 
Uthi mhla waveza ubudoda bakhe phambi kukagqirha omhlophe esibhedlele, le mpundulu yathetha ngoko nangoko “yathi ayiyithandi into yokuba ndivezele abantu abamhlophe ubudoda bam”. 
UQasani uthi emva kokuba efowunele I’solezwe lesiXhosa, le mpundulu ithethile kuye isithi: “Ndiyabona ufowunela I’solezwe lesiXhosa, ndifuna ukwazisa ukuba bendize kuwe ukungcatsha uThixo kuba akade asinike izinto ezintle abesithembise zona.” 
UQasani uthi uyile emagqirheni kodwa akazange afumane uncedo. “Elinye igqirha lathi ndinamafufunyana adityaniswe nemimoya yasemangcwabeni. Ndanikwa amayeza kodwa andizange ndincedakale,” utshilo uQasani, othi ukruqukile yimeko aphila phantsi kwayo. 
Ixhwele laseNgqushwa uThembele Hanise uthi uQasani uphethwe lilumbo. “Ilumbo sisilwanyana esifakwa emntwini ngemimoya emdaka. Sithi sakufakwa sifike sithethe senze nje unothanda, kumntu lowo ongenwe yimimoya emdaka,” kutsho uHanise. 
UHanise ucebise uQasani ukuba aphande banzi ngendawo ekuthiwa kuseMzumbo KwaZulu Natal, indawo athi ineengcungela zokukhupha ilumbo emntwini. 
Umfundisi ocele ukuba angachazwa ngegama, uthi uQasani ungenwe ngamadimoni. 
“Ukuba uyayifunda ibhayibhile kwiziTyhilelo, uyakuqaphela ukuba kukho indawo ethetha ngokudideka kwabantu. Akekho umntu onokunikwa ihlabathi, kuba ihlabathi lelikaYehova. Lo tata ungenwe yimimoya emdaka egquba kwiindawo zethu zokuphila,” kutsho lo mfundisi. 
Ngethuba I’solezwe lesiXhosa lityelele kwaQasani, unkosikazi kaThemba ebengekho ephangele. Ummelwane obuzwe leli phephandaba uthe unalo ulwazi ngengxaki yalo tata.
title: Impundulu yamwisela ubudoda bakhe!

text:
Usigcinile isithembiso awasenzayo uKaizer Motaung sokutshintsha izinto eqeleni lakhe emva kwesizini ka2018/19 engahambanga kakuhle.  
Amakhosi amkele iziqwayi zabadlali ababini kule veki kwaye anethemba lokuba baya kuncedisa kwiphulo lokuwabuyisela kwindawo yawo ebholeni yaseMzantsi Afrika.  
Sekuphele iminyaka emine iKaizer Chiefs ingacholi naphantsi kwicala leendebe.  
Ayiqhelekanga lo nto kwiChiefs eyazibalula ngokuthatha iindebe kwasekusekweni kwayo ngeminyaka yoo’70. 
 Enye yezinto ekhathaze abalandeli nenyanzele uMotaung ukuze abhinqele phezulu ibe kukuphoswa kweChiefs yiTop 8. 
 IChiefs yazise ifolosi yayo entsha egama elinguSamir Nurkovic noKearyn Baccus obedlalela iMelbourne City yaseAustralia. 
UNurkovic waseSerbia, obedlalela iKFC Komarbo kwilizwe laseSlovakia, utyikitye isivumelwano seminyaka emithathu, kanti iinkcukacha ngesivumelwano sikaBaccus, 27, kulindeleke ukuba zibhengezwe ekuhambeni kweentsuku.  
UBaccus, owazalelwa eThekwini ngo’91, ngumdlali wasesiswini ekulindeleke akhuphisane nabadlali abafana noWillard Katsande, uGeorge Maluleka noSiphelele Ntshangase.  
Bane bebonke abadlali abatsha kwiChiefs. Kwiiveki ezigqithileyo ityikitye uLazarous Kambole obedlalela iZesco United noJames Kotei waseGhana.  
Bonke abadlali beChiefs abatsha ngamadoda anconywayo. “Silinde ukufika kukaKearyn Baccus osuka kwiMelbourne City. Uza kwaziswa ngokusesikweni kwakule veki,” itshilo iChiefs. 
Ingxaki yeChiefs kwiisizini ezidlulileyo ibe kukungakwazi ukufaka amagowuli emnatheni.  
Ukufika kukaNurkovic kwakunika abalandeli ithemba emva kokufaka amashumi amabini anesithathu amagowuli emidlalweni angamashumi amabini anesibhozo kwisizini edlulileyo.  
Njengokuba kulungiselelwa isizini entsha, iChiefs iza kuthi tsi gxada eBotswana apho kulindeleke idlale umdlalo wokucweya neentshatsheli, iTownship Rollers, phambi kokuqubisana neOrlando Pirates emdlalweni weCarling Black Label Cup ekuthambekeni kwale nyanga yeKhala.
title: Amakhosi amkele iziqwayi zabadlali

text:
Kule nyanga ithamsanqelekileyo yokubhiyozela iintombi zeAfrika, amanina eAfrika nomzi wasetyhini ngokubanzi, kukho nto isuke yazinga kum engqondweni, yintetho yamaXhosa echanekileyo ethi, “ilizwe lihle liyintombazana.” 
 Le ntetho igxininisa kwixabiso lomntu wasetyhini esizweni, igxilise ukubukweni kwakhe, ukuthandwa kwakhe, kwanokuthenjwa kwakhe njengentsika ekuxhomekeke kuyo ukuwa nokuma komzi, ukuphuhla nokubhanga kwesizwe, lingalityalwanga negalelo labo ekwandiseni nasekuqhamiseni ikamva lesizwe.  
Kaloku inzala yesizwe, ukuzinza kwesizukulwana sohlanga, kwanokuphila ngoyolo nobuncwane kwesizwe, zonke ezi zinto zixhomekeke kumanina. Ngoomama neentombi zohlanga eziqinisekisa ukwanda nokuqhama kwesizwe!  
Ngaphandle kwamanina, ikhaya liyabhanga, uhlanga luyatshabalala, isizwe siyanyamalala! Kungoko kumele oomama neentombi zesizwe baphathwe okweentyatyambo ezingenakubuna, kuba bakungonwabi, baxheleke emiphefumlweni okanye badakumbe, nelizwe ngenkqu liyambatsha! 
Nanjengamntu oyithandayo indalo kaMdali, nohlala enomdla wenkangeleko yayo, lithe lakukhala ixilongo livakalisa ngokubhiyozelwa kweentombi noomama kule nyanga yeThupha, ndazixelela ukuba nanjengoko ndihlala ndisenza minyaka le, mandinike oomama neentombi ezikhoyo ebomini bam ingqwalasela, intlonipho nenkathalo ethe kratya kunokuba bendisenza.  
Eyona nto ithe qatha engqondweni yam, kukuzama ukudla imbadu nomzi wasetyhini, ukuze ndirhabule banzi ngezona zinto bazithandayo, ezibonwabisayo kwanezo zibaphatha emanyeni, ukuze ndabelane ngazo nomzi wakowethu. 
 Iinjongo zokukwabelana nani mzi ontsundu kukuba sizigoca-goce, sithi apho senza kakuhle khona ngokuphathalele kwimpatho yethu kumanina, siqinise kunjalo nje senze nangakumbi. 
 Siya kuthi ke apho siqondayo ukuba siwa nganeno, mhlawumbi sisenziwa kukungakhathali nokuthatha izinto njengezo zilula okanye zingenamsebenzi, sikhawuleze silungise ukuhlala.  
Ukuba asilungisi msinya, amanina aya kuhlala edandathekile okanye edakumbile, nto leyo ke iya kukhokelela ekubeni ilizwe eli lethu limbatshe kwaye lingabi namva namphambili! 
Ingaba ukho umntu ongayaziyo indlela iintombi noomama abakuthanda ngayo ukuthandwa?  
Ingaba ukho umntu ongayiqondiyo into yokuba amanina akuxabise kanobom ukuxatyiswa? Ingaba ukho ozenza ngathi akaboni, phofu ebona ukuba iintombi noomama akukho nto bayikhathalela ukogqitha ukukhathalelwa?  
Ngubani na ongayaziyo into yokuba amanina akholelwa kwelokuba inyaniso iyakhulula, kanti ubuxoki nobuqhinga buzala umdintsi nokubhanga kokumthemba umntu?  
Xa amanina esiphethe kakuhle thina bantwana, thina bafana, thina madoda kwanathi bootata, kutheni singabaxeleli ezinkonkqeni ngokuthakazelela kwethu indima yabo ebomini bethu? 
 Into entle iyabulelwa, iyaxatyiswa, iyathakazelelwa, iphathwa okwentyatyambo, ifunjathwa ngobunono oku kweqanda ukuze ikhuseleke kwaye ihlale ihombile, kuba yakudakumba iyambatsha, kutsho kumbatshe nelizwe lide libe ngumqwebedu! 
Konke oku kukhankanywe ngentla apha, kwiincoko zam namanina, ncoko ezo bezisekelezelwe ekuzameni ukuqonda ngezinto ezibaphilisayo nezibadakumbisayo, zizo ezivele kwiintombi nakoomama abaninzi.  
Nanjengomfundisi-ntsapho esikolweni, ndithethile noogxa bam abangamanina apho emsebenzini, bonke bekhala ngokunganikwa ntlonipho ncam ngabantwana besikolo, batsho besithi abafundisi-ntsapho abangamadoda, ngabona bahlonitshwa kakhulu ngabafundi, nangona iwonga labo lomsebenzi lifana kwaye lilingana.  
Umbuzo ke nanku, ingaba emakhaya umama uhlonitshwa ngokulinganayo notata ngabantwana babo?  
Ukuba akunjalo, kutheni? Ukuba kunjalo, loo ntlonipho mayigqithiselwe ezikolweni nakwiindawo esihlala kuzo. 
Ndithethile neentombi zohlanga, amaqobokazana, wona angalali ndleleni, kuba kwakuba njalo kwakuba kunyembelekile! Kwingxoxo yam neentombi zeAfrika, akukho nto indichukumise ukogqitha leyo yokuba zonke zisithi umhla nezolo, ngokungafaniyo nathi bantu basebuhlanti, bona abantu ababhinqileyo bathi behamba ezitalatweni, ezivenkileni, kwiirenki nakwizitishi zezithuthi, babe bebethelwa luvalo.  
Behleli nje ixesha elininzi baxhalabile, baxhalabile kuba sibakhwaza ngemilozi nangamakhwelo oku kwezinja, side sibabize nangezinjakazi.  
Baxhalabile kuba asoyiki kubatsala-tsala ngoku singabazi, noonyana bethu baphele bephatha iintombi ezizintanga zabo ngolu hlobo nathi senza ngalo.  
Baxhalabile kuba akukhethe bani, ngutata ozala intombi, ngutata otshate unina wentombi, ngumalume, ngutatomncinci, ngutata nobhuti wesithili, bambi kuthi madoda aboyiki kuqhawula iinkciyo ngenkani nangesinyalumane kwiintombi noomama, nkqu kwanaba sibatshate senza izifungo nezibhambathiso zokubathanda ebubini nasebumnandini, senze okubulala isizwe, sitshabalilse ubuntu bomntu obhinqileyo, kutsho kubhange nesizwe siphela! 
Asinjalo sonke ke nto zakuthi, nto zoobawo, ngempatho apha kumanina. Akho amadoda noonyana abangumzekelo omhle wokuphathwa kakuhle komntu obhinqileyo.  
Kule nyanga yamanina, masiphume iphulo, siphakamise kwaye sizinzise ukubaluleka kokuphathwa kakuhle kweentombi noomama, ukuze bangabi nakuxheleka, bangabi nakudakumba, kuba bakudakumba, nelizwe lethu liya kumbatsha kwaye libhange kuphele! 
Masiwakhumbule amazwi obulumko athi: “Ilizwe lihle, liyintombazana!  
Wathinta amanina, wathinta imbokotho!”
title: Kungadakumb’ amanina, ilizwe liyambatsha!

text:
Umdlali siswini omtsha weChippa United, uMenzi Masuku, uthi uyakuvuyela ukuba yinxalenye yeli qela.  
Emva kokuba yinxalenye yeSA Under-23 ebithatha inxaxheba kwi-Olimpiki eRio de Janeiro, eBrazil, lo mdlali wamkelwe ngokusesikweni ngusihlalo weChippa United – uSiviwe “Chippa”Mpengesi. Bekuke kwabonakala ngathi uMasuku akakufuni ukuza kwiChippa – kodwa kuyabonakala ukuba iye yalungiswa yi-Orlando Pirates.  
Ngoku ngumdlali weli qela lizinze eMpuma Koloni ngokupheleleyo kwaye kulindeleke adlale indima ebalulekileyo kule sizini yePremier Soccer League ka’2016/17. Kanye phambi komdlalo wokuqala weChippa United neFree State Stars eNelson Mandela Bay Stadium ngorhatya ngoLwesibini – uMasuku wamkelwe ngokusesikweni ngusihlalo weeChilli-boys.  
“Kuluvuyo kakhulu kum ukuba lapha. Ndamkelwe ngezandla ezishushu ngusihlalo nangabantu bonke. Ndiziva ndisekhaya,” utshilo uMasuku. 
Le ndedeba, yaziwa ngegama elithi “Slyzer Tsosti”, khange ifumane kakuhle ithuba lokudlala kwiPirates ngenxa yokhuphiswano – kodwa ngoku inethuba lokuthatha ibhola yayo iyibeke kwelinye inqanaba. “Ndizimisele ukwenza konke okusemandleni. Kubemnandi kum xa ndingena eNelson Mandela Bay Stadium. Ndizimisele ukusebenzela iChippa United ngokuzimisela okukhulu. Andizifundi kakhulu izinto ezibhaliweyo ngam. Kuyacaca ke ukuba kuninzi okuthethiweyo ngam. Mandiyibeke icace ngoku le nto: Zininzi iindawo ebendinokuya kuzo – kodwa iChippa ibiyeyona iphambili. Bendifuna ukuza kwiChippa ngenxa yesitayile somdlalo wayo,” utshilo uMasuku kwikhasi lomnatha. 
Lo mdlali uvumile ukuba bekukhona ukuxinga kwezinto – kodwa uthi ixesha lokuthetha ngezozinto belingekafiki. “Ewe, bezikhona izinto ezifuna ukusonjululwa. Ndiyavuya ngoku ngoba konke oko kudlule,” uvale ngalo mazwi uMasuku. 
Iqela ebelidlale, i-Orlando Pirates, layibeka yacaca gca ukuba uMenzi Masuku ngumdlali weChippa emva kokuba [lona] lathatha uNkosinathi Mthiyane kwiiChilli-boys. 
UMasuku unethuba lokudlala elibhetele kwiChippa ngenxa yendlela adlala ngalo ihambelana ncakasa nale uDan Malesela ayisebenzisayo kwiChippa. Njengokuba kukho imbambano phakathi kukaJoseph Molangoane neChippa – uSlyzer Tsotsi angasetyenziswa endaweni yakhe kakhulu kule sizini intsha.
title: Ndiziva ndisekhaya kwiChippa – Masuku

text:
Inkampani yemigodi, iHarmony Gold, izibophelele ekunikeni imbeko abasebenzi mgodini abasebenze kule nkampani besuka kwidolophu yaseLady Frere ngokuthi ivuselele isikolo samabanga aphakamileyo iNtsonkotha.  
Ingxelo ithi le nkampani ivumile ukuba izakwakha amagumbi okufundela amatsha alishumi elinesithathu,iziko lenzululwazi,ithala leencwadi nokuhlaziywa kondonga.  
Unozala walo mbono, uSabelo Mgotywa, owayesakuba ngunobhala wombutho wabebenzi mgodini NUM, ucele uncedo egameni lamadoda amaninzi alahlekelwe ziimpilo zawo emigodini.  
“Ndithe ndakubona imeko yesi sikolo ndavakalelwa noko ndacela inkampani le yakwa Harmony, khange balibazise ukuza kubona ukuba banganceda ngantoni,” utshilo uMgotywa.  
Uthi oku kungenxa yokuba baninzi oonyana bengingqi yaseLady Frere ababhubhele emigodini; abanye babuye begula ngenxa yeengxaki ezahlukeneyo emigodini.  
“IChris Hani sesinye sezithili esinamadoda amaninzi athe asebenza emigodini yaseHarmony Gold – kungoko sibone kufanelekile ukuba sizise olu ncedo kwesi sikolo,”utshilo uMgotywa. 
IMpuma Koloni lelinye lamaphondo athi akhuphe amadoda amaninzi ukuya kusebenza emigodini eyahlukeneyo eMzantsi Afrika ukusukela kwiminyaka yo-1950, utsho uMgotywa.  
“O.R. Tambo, Amathole, Alfred Nzo neChris Hani zezona ngingqi zisinika abasebenzi kungoko siye sigxininise uncedo kwezo ndawo ngokuthi sivumelane nabantu ngalo nto sinokuba nceda ngayo,” utshilo uMgotywa.  
Isikolo saseNtsonkotha sesinye ezilithemba lesithili saseChris Hani ngokufumana amanani aphezulu kubafundi abathi baphumelele ibanga leMatriki. 
Isithethi  seenkampani yakwaHarmony, uMahadi Letsoi, uthi bajonge ukugqithela kwezinye iindawo zeMpuma Koloni.  
“Sizakusebenzisa imali engangamakhulu amahlanu amawaka (R500 000) kulo msebenzi waseNtsonkotha, ngoku sijonge ukuya e-O.R. Tambo sincede ezinye izikolo,” utshilo uLetsoi.  
Inkampani yakwa-Anglo Gold kunyaka ophelileyo ivulele abahlali baseLambasi, eLusikisiki, ithuba lokuba bathengise umbona wabo kwinkampani yakwaKellogs.  
Ingingqi yaseLady Frere ihambe emva ngokwamanani wabo bathe baphumelela kwibanga leshumi (Matriki) kunyaka ka-2016, oluncedo kulindeleke ukuba luphucule umgangatho wemfundo kwesi sikolo nesithili ngokubanzi, itsho ingxelo. 
Isebe lemfundo eMpuma Koloni lizakukhokela iphulo lokuvuselelwa kwesi sikolo.
title: Inkampani yomgodi iHarmony izakuvuselela isikolo saseNtsonkotha

text:
Iqela laseNtshona Koloni, i-Ajax Cape Town, lityikitye ifolosi yaseZambia egama lingu-Aubrey Funga. Isibhengezo senziwe leli qela namhlanje – kwaye isivumelwano sengqesho esityikitywe ngulo mdlali ne-Ajax sakuphelelwa ngo’2021. UFunga uchithe ixeshana kweli qela ephantsi kovavanyo lwabaqeqeshi be-Ajax Cape Town.  Lo mdlali ufikayo kulindeleke anikwe uxanduva lokukhokela i-Ajax kwisigaba sesibini sesizini emva kwesokuqala esokoleyo kuso. UFunga uzakukhuphisana nezihlabane ezaziwayo kwibhola yoMzantsi Afrika eziquka uNathan Paulse noPrince Nxumalo. Le ndedeba izithembile kwaye iqhayisa ngamava ewaqokelele kumaqela edlale kuwo ngaphambili aquka iNkana FC, iNchanga Rangers neZanaco FC. Akayodyongo uFunga ngoba udlalile kwiCaf Champions League nakwiConfederation Cup. “Ndizimisele ukudlala ngendlela yam eqhelekileyo, kanye leya bendidlala ngayo kwiZanaco. Owona msebenzi ndiwaziyo kukufaka amagowuli nokudala amathuba amagowuli; lo nto indincedile kuwo onke amaqela endiwadlaleleyo. Ndiyakholwa, lo nto izakundinceda nalapha. Iqela, abalawuli balo nabalandeli bafuna umntu onje ngam. Ndicinga ukuba ndizakuwenza umahluko,” utshilo uFunga. “Ukudlalela eli qela yinto elungileyo kum kakhulu, futhi yeyona izakuthi yondlalele izinto ezinkulu ezizayo. Ukuba lapha kundinika amandla wokuthatha ikhono lam lebhola ekhatywayo ndilise kwelinye inqanaba.” …uvale ngalo mazwi uFunga. Ingqonyela ye-Ajax, u-Ari Efstathiou, ziyayigcobisa ezi ndaba zokufika kwale ndedeba. “Lo mdlali ufunyenwe ngaxeshanye noRodrick kwaye bobabini bafake amagowuli angamashumi amabini anesine ukuze iZanaco iphumelele indebe kunyaka ophelileyo. Bobabini bayakwazi ukufaka amagowuli, beza nalo mbali ke apha – le nto kanye siyifunayo,” utshilo u-Efstathiou. Eli qela likwatyikitye uRodrick Kabwe osuka kwiZanaco.      
Iqela laseNtshona Koloni, i-Ajax Cape Town, lityikitye ifolosi yaseZambia egama lingu-Aubrey Funga. Isibhengezo senziwe leli qela namhlanje – kwaye isivumelwano sengqesho esityikitywe ngulo mdlali ne-Ajax sakuphelelwa ngo’2021. UFunga uchithe ixeshana kweli qela ephantsi kovavanyo lwabaqeqeshi be-Ajax Cape Town.  
Lo mdlali ufikayo kulindeleke anikwe uxanduva lokukhokela i-Ajax kwisigaba sesibini sesizini emva kwesokuqala esokoleyo kuso. UFunga uzakukhuphisana nezihlabane ezaziwayo kwibhola yoMzantsi Afrika eziquka uNathan Paulse noPrince Nxumalo. Le ndedeba izithembile kwaye iqhayisa ngamava ewaqokelele kumaqela edlale kuwo ngaphambili aquka iNkana FC, iNchanga Rangers neZanaco FC. Akayodyongo uFunga ngoba udlalile kwiCaf Champions League nakwiConfederation Cup. 
“Ndizimisele ukudlala ngendlela yam eqhelekileyo, kanye leya bendidlala ngayo kwiZanaco. Owona msebenzi ndiwaziyo kukufaka amagowuli nokudala amathuba amagowuli; lo nto indincedile kuwo onke amaqela endiwadlaleleyo. Ndiyakholwa, lo nto izakundinceda nalapha. Iqela, abalawuli balo nabalandeli bafuna umntu onje ngam. Ndicinga ukuba ndizakuwenza umahluko,” utshilo uFunga. 
“Ukudlalela eli qela yinto elungileyo kum kakhulu, futhi yeyona izakuthi yondlalele izinto ezinkulu ezizayo. Ukuba lapha kundinika amandla wokuthatha ikhono lam lebhola ekhatywayo ndilise kwelinye inqanaba.” …uvale ngalo mazwi uFunga. 
Ingqonyela ye-Ajax, u-Ari Efstathiou, ziyayigcobisa ezi ndaba zokufika kwale ndedeba. “Lo mdlali ufunyenwe ngaxeshanye noRodrick kwaye bobabini bafake amagowuli angamashumi amabini anesine ukuze iZanaco iphumelele indebe kunyaka ophelileyo. Bobabini bayakwazi ukufaka amagowuli, beza nalo mbali ke apha – le nto kanye siyifunayo,” utshilo u-Efstathiou. 
Eli qela likwatyikitye uRodrick Kabwe osuka kwiZanaco.
title: Ibhengeze igama lefolosi entsha i-Ajax Cape Town

text:
Intshatsheli entsha yeWBO Africa, kudidi lweNgcongolo, uSiphamandla Baleni, uthi ufuna ukulwela intshinga yehlabathi. 
UBaleni ukuvakalise oku emva kokubetha uAyanda Ndulani ngamanqaku kumlo ubutakisa iintlantsi eIndoor Sports, eMdantsane, kwimpelaveki ephelileyo. 
Umlo wala matyendyana ubamise ngeenyawo abalandeli ukusuka kumjikelo wokuqala uyokuthi xhaxhe kowokugqibela. 
 “Okokuqala mandibulele kwiqela labaphathi bam ngokubanam kumalungiselelo alo mlo. Ubungekho lula tu lo mlo, kodwa indlela ebesiwulungiselele ngayo ibonakele. Ndiyivuyela kakhulu le mpumelelo. 
UNdulani ayombethimanqindi ilifokofoko,” utshilo uBaleni emva komlo. 
Le ndedeba ithi inephupha lokulwela intshinga yehlabathi ungaphelanga unyaka ka2019. 
“Le mpumelelo ithetha lukhulu kum. Andinamdla kakhulu kwintshinga yoMzantsi Afrika, ndibawela ukulwela intshinga yehlabathi,” utshilo uBaleni.  
UNdulani uyavuma ukuba ubethiwe nguBaleni. “Andifuni kuxoka, ndibethiwe kulo mlo. 
Yaye ndizibethise ngokwam ngokuyeka ukudlala ngendlela ebesihlele ngayo nabaqeqeshi,” utshilo uNdulani. 
OkaNdulani uthi ukubethwa nguBaleni akumbulalanga maphupha. 
“Ndisenethemba lokuba yintshatsheli yoMzantsi Afrika. Ndiza kuphinda ndihlale phantsi nabaqeqeshi sibonisane ukuba masenze njani ukubheka phambili,” wongeze watsho uNdulani. Ezinye iziphumo zale tumente: USabelo Ngebiyane ulalise ngophotho uNkosikhona Speelman kumjikelo wesixhenxe. 
UEnathi Stelle umngqengqise kumjikelo wesibini uAbongile Tipa noMzwabantu Mbexeshi umthe qwaka-qwaka kumjikelo wesibini uMfundo Gwayana, uSiyabulela Trower naye uwuphumelele kumjikelo wesibini umlo wakhe noSiyabulela Rubela. 
USiko Moshani ubethe uMogale Molefe ngamanqaku, uZukisa Mafu noJacklin Soldaat badlale ngokulingana.
title: Ulambele intshinga yehlabathi uBaleni!

text:
Imbaleki yeli loMzantsi Afrika kwi-800m, uCaster Semenya, uphume indawo yokuqala kumjikelo wokuqala kwiheat2 yemidlalo ye-Olimpiki eqhuba eRio de Janeiro. 
 Lo kaSemenya unomdla wokwaphula irekhodi le’800m elenziwa nguJarmila Kratochvilova ngonyaka ka-1983. USemenya ukwiphulo lokufumana imbasa yakhe yesibini yegolide kwimidlalo ye-Olimpiki. Khange atsale nzima ukuphuma phambili kwabo ebukhuphisana nabo kumjikelo wesibini, waqabela umgca ngexesha elingu’1:59:32.  
NgoLwesihlanu uzakube ekhuphisana kumjikelo ophambi kwamagqibela kankqoyi.
title: UCaster angophula irekhodi le-800m

text:
Umbutho ongekho phantsi korhulumente obizwa iNelson Mandela Institute for Education and Rural Development (NMIERD) nojongene nokuphuhlisa imfundo kweli lo Mzantsi Afrika ubambisene neziko le mfundo ephakamileyo iFort Hare uzakusindleka umsitho obizwa Indibano noyinxalenye yemibhiyozo yeliziko eligqiba iminyaka elikhulu yasekwa. 
Lo msitho untsuku-ne uzakube ushukuxa imiba ejamelene nabafundi kweli lo Mzantsi Afrika uphela ngelinge lokuzama ukwakha kwakhona ikamva le mfundo enoxanduva kubantwana abalikamva leli lo Mzantsi Afrika.  
Le ndibano izakube izinyaswe ziinkokheli zabafundi ezisuka kumaziko emfundo ephakamileyo, kumaphondo ohlukeneyo kweli, ootitshala bamabanga asezantsi, ababhali kunye nabantu basekuhlaleni bavumelekile ukuzothatha inxaxheba kulo msitho. 
UBomikazi Njoloza nojongene nemiba yolwimi nesakhono sokufunda nokubhala eNMIERD uthe; “Le ndibano ifike kanye ngexesha apho amaziko emfundo ephakamileyo evala ngelinge lokuhlisa imali yokufunda ngoko ke izakuzisa iimbono ezizakuzisa utshintsho kweli lo Mzantsi Afrika” 
uAzola Dayile nongomnye wabakhokele abafundi kwiziko lemfundo ephakamileyo iNelson Mandela Metro uthe; “ Ndinemincili kakhulu ngale ndibano kwaye ndiyavuya isenzeka kuba iyadingeka emva koluqhankqalazo lo nyaka ophelileyo lwe #Fees Must Fall, kwaye ndingxamele ukudibana nabanye abafundi abasuka kwamanye amaziko ukuze sizokwabelana ngoluvo ukuze sikwazi ukusa uMzantsi Afrika phambili”. 
Le ndibano izakuqala ngomhla 29 kuAgasti ukuya kumhla wesibini kuSeptemba, izakube ibanjelwe kwi yunivesithi yaseFort Hare eMonti.
title: Indibano eFort Hare

text:
Umdlalo ude wafikelela esiphelweni lingekho iqela elifuna ukoyiswa phakathi kwePetro de Luanda neKaizer Chiefs emdlalweni weCaf Champions League obudikidiki namhlanje eLuanda kwilizwe lasebumelwaneni, e-Angola. Amakhosi aye enethemba emdlalweni wanamhlanje ngoba aye akwazi ukuyibetha ngo’2-0 othuleyo iPetro de Luanda emdlalweni obukwiveki ephelileyo eMzantsi Afrika. 
Iziphumo zanamhlanje aziyincedanga iChiefs ngoba isahleli kwindawo yesithathu emva kokuqokelela amanqaku amane emidlalweni iyidlalile kwiChampions League. Umdlalo khange ube nawo umtsalane wade wayokuphela. Aphantse afuma igowuli Amakhosi ngethuba uLebogang Manyama ezama ukukhabela unozinti emzuzwini weshimi elinanye – kodwa umzamo wakhe uphazanyiswe ngabadlali beqela ebilidlalela ekhaya. 
Ngoko nangoko, abadlali bePetro de Luanda badibanise iibhola besiya phambili – ngelishwa labo, bafike ethe qwa uDaniel Akpeyi ezipalini. Kuyiwe kwixesha lokuphumla iqela laseMzantsi Afrika ilelona lithembisayo. Ibe libali elifanayo nakwisigaba sesibini somdlalo. Lide laphela ixesha lomdlalo kungekho qela elikwazileyo ukubhalisa ebhodini. Amakhosi ayalingana ngamanqaku neHoroya – kodwa yona ikwindawo yesibini.
title: Amakhosi abambene ngeqanda nePetro de Luanda kwiChampions League

text:
Umqeqeshi weMamelodi Sundowns, uPitso Mosimane, yindoda eqheleneyo neenzingo zebhola ekhatywayo eMzantsi Afrika nangaphaya kwemida yawo. Nangona kunjalo – kodwa uPitso akonqeni ukuyixela into ebalulekileyo kuye. Iqela lakhe liphoswe ziindebe ezintathu eMzantsi Afrika – kodwa lo nto ayikhathazi nakancinci ngoba uthi ufuna iindebe ezinkulu: eyePSL neCAF Champions League. Ukungxabalaza kweDowns kuzo zombini yinto enzima kakhulu – kodwa isaqhuba kakuhle, mhlawumbi – kungenxa yamava namalungiselelo enziwe phambi kokuqala kwesizini. Noxa iSundowns inganikwanga ixesha lokuzilungiselela ngokufanayo ne-Orlando Pirates edlala iChampions League – uPitso namakhwenkwe wakhe basathe chu kakuhle. 
Ngoku iDowns ihleli phezulu kwiPSL emva kokubetha iMaritzburg United ngo’2-1 emdlalweni obuseHarry Gwala Stadium ngoLwesibini kule veki. Ibethwa ngumoya phezulu ngamanqaku angamashumi amane anesithathu. NakwiChampions League, iDowns ihleli phezulu kuGroup A emva kokuvuthulula iLobi Stars ngo’3-0 kwiveki ephelileyo. Amasandawana antingele eMorocco – apho aza kuqubisana neWydad Casablanca ngentsimbi yesixhenxe eStade Moulay Abdellah ngorhatya ngoMgqibelo. Akusekho nto iyidlalelayo iDowns ngoba seyinalo itikiti. UPitso unomnqweno wokubona namanye amaqela aseMzantsi edlala kwimidlalo yeCAF. Kutshanje, uthundeze amaqela eli lizwe ukuba akuthathele ingqalelo ukudlala kwiChampions League. 
“Amaqela afana nePirates neChiefs ayafuneka kwiChampions League. Sinabo abadlali nePSL ekwinqanaba eliphezuli; makungabikho zizathu zokungalimeli ilizwe kwiChamps League. Amanye amazwe anamaqela amabini. Nathi sinako ukuyenza lo nto – indawoni ingxaki? Ngeke sikhale ngeendleko, iSimba yaseTanzania iyithatha phi imali yona? Ukudlala kwamaqela kwiCAF kunceda abadlali baqhelane nendlela ekuhanjwa ngayo kwizwekazi le-Afrika,” utshilo uPitso.
title: PSL,Champions League: iDowns ibethwa ngumoya phezulu

text:
UMohammed Salah uthokombise intloko kubonakala ukuba uxhelekile entliziyweni yakhe emva kokufakwa kwegowuli kwimizuzu yokugqibela emdlalweni. Inyaniso mayithethwe – AmaYiphutha ebexhathisile futhi abadlali bayo i-Uruguay bebexakiwe kwade kwakwimizuzu yokugqibela kwisigaba sesibini – ngethuba uJose Maria Gimenez efaka igowuli elihle ngentloko kumdlalo obunzima kakhulu wesibini weFIFA World Cup kwibala ekuthiwa yi-Ekaterinburg Stadium. Lelo gowuli linye elenze idemeshe kumsebenzi omhle owenziwe yi-Egypt phantse umdlalo wonke – kwaye ikwa lilo elishiye iintliziyo zenkitha zamaYiphutha zichontsiza igazi. 
 
Kuyiwe kwixesha lokuphumla amazwe omabini ebambene noxa i-Uruguay ibiyeyona inamandla. Iifolosi ezimbini zase-Uruguay ezoyikwayo uSuarez noCavani uphele umdlalo bengacholanga naphantsi – kodwa akukho bani onokubatyola ngokungazami. Zikhona iibhola iibhola ezimbi abazidlalileyo – ntekunayo bebefika unozinti u-Elshenewy uvale kwanto eza kuye. Isigaba sesibini besithatnde ukubanochatha ngoba iqela ngalinye belifuna igowuli lempumelelo. Uruguay yiyo ekwazileyo ukudala amathuba acacileyo kune-Egypt. Lo nto ithethe ukuthi ukungabikho kukaMohammed Salah, odume ngkufaka amagowuli, bekuvakala ngoba ebengekho umntu wokugqibezela iibhola ezitywe emacaleni. 
 
Emva kwempumelelo yayo i-Uruguay namhlanje, lo nto ithetha ukuthi ibambene neRussia ngamanqaku amathathu noxa abasingathi bendebe yehlabathi benamagowuli amaninzi emva kokuvuthulula iSaudi Arabia ngemvula yamagowuli amahlanu izolo kumdlalo wokuqala kaGroup A. Kwakunyanzeleka ukuba nayo iYuphutha izingombele iSaud Arabia ukuze ibenokufumana ithuba lokuya kumjikelo olandelayo. 
 
Uruguay: Muslera, Varela, Giménez, Godin, Cáceres, Bentancur, Vecino, Nandez, De Arrascaeta, Cavani, Suárez. 
Egypt: Elshenewy; Fathi, Gabr, Hegazi, Abdel Shafi; Hamed, Elneny; Trezeguet, Said, Warda; Mohsen
title: UGimenez uzishiye zityumkile iintliziyo zamaYiphutha

text:
Imvumi yomculo weAfro Soul uDisebo oyinzalelwane yakwaMashu KwaZulu Natal, ukwiphondo leMpuma Koloni apho athengisa khona icwecwe lakhe elitsha kraca elithi “Colours of Love”. 
 Eli cwecwe, neyilelokuqala kule mvumi, sele lifumaneka kwiivenkile ezithengisa umculo kumaphondo onke eli kwaye sele zidlalwa nakoonomathotholo beli iingoma zakhe .  
UDisebo (31) uthi sele iyiminyaka eliqela ecula njengoko iluthando kwaye iyinto ayiphilayo umculo.  
Kwindlela yakhe esele eyihambile kumculo kwiminyaka edlulileyo uthathe inxaxheba kukhuphiswano lomculo ii-Idols, Yamaha Talent Search, Castle Milk Stout Talent Search walilo nelungu leqela legospile elibizwa ngokuba yiRare. 
Encokola kumagumbi ephephandaba I’solezwe uthe, kwingoma zonke ezingaphakathi kwicwecwe lakhe zithetha ngothando kwaye xa uzimamele ziphilisa umxhelo.  
Uthi ayithandayo kwiingoma zakhe yethi ‘Nkqonkqoza’ okanye ethi ‘Joy’ kodwa esithi zonke iingoma zakhe nganye inembali.  
“Iingoma ezi zingamava wam kuba ndikhule phantsi kothando kwaye ndiboniswa ngokubaluleka kothando. Kungoko zonke iingoma zam zingothando kwaye esele kubalulekile kule sikuyo imihla, luthando. Ngokuzithengela uzimamelele eli cwecwe kuzakutshintsha nto kuwe.”  
Uthi khange kubenzima kwaye kungelula ukuba ashicilele icwecwe lakhe, uthi enye yemiceli mngeni ibikungade afumane mntu azakuthi asebenze naye kwicwecwe eli kungoko kwathabatha ixesha ukuze abe ukhupha icwecwe. 
 Uthi ubulela kumvelisi womculo uFundile Mdingi kwakunye neqela lakhe ngokuba bembeke kule ndawo akuyo namhlanje.
title: UDisebo uhambisa ivangeli ngeengoma zothando

text:
Amandla nobukrelekrele zezinye zezinto eziza kuvavanywa kwiOrlando Pirates xa idlala umdlalo obalulekileyo ngempelaveki.  
NgoMgqibelo, iPirates iza kulwela ukuya kumjikelo olandelayo weCAF Champions League xa idibana neHoroya emdlalweni ekunyanzelekileyo iwuphumelele eConakry, eGuinea.  
Ikamva leBucs limfiliba emva kokuba ibambene ngo’2-2 neFC Platinum yaseZimbabwe emdlalweni obunzima kwiveki ephelileyo. 
Noxa kuphantse konakala emdlalweni ogqithileyo kodwa amagowuli amabini afakwe nguThembinkosi Lorch noAugustine Mulenga akwazile ukuyihlangula iPirates.  
Ihleli kwindawo yesithathu iBucs ngamanqaku amathandathu kuGroup B.  
Phambi kwayo yiHoroya enamanqaku asixhenxe emva kwe-Esperance ebethwa ngumoya phezulu.  
Ukuba iPirates ibikwazile ukubetha iPlatinum, ngoku ngekuthethuba iqinisekile ngendawo yayo kumjikelo olandelayo weChampions League.  
AmaBhakaniya abuyele kwimidlalo yeCAF kunyaka ophelileyo emva kokuvuselwa nguMilutin  
“Micho” Sredojevic owafika kunzima kuwo. 
UMicho uyazi ukuba iqela lakhe kufuneka lidlalele ukufa nokuphila eGuinea kwaye unethemba lokuba amasoja wakhe aza kulwela ukuhlala kolona khuphiswano lubalulekileyo ebholeni yaseAfrika.  
“Besifuna amanqaku amathathu kwiPlatinum ebeza kwenza sidlalele inqaku elinye emdlalweni esiya kuwo. Ngoku kufuneka sidlale ngathi sisemdlalweni wokugqibela ngokuba yimpumelelo yodwa eyakusinceda ukuze siye phambili.  
Ndibaqhwabela izandla abadlali bethu abalwileyo emdlalweni ogqithileyo.  
Sizimisele ukulwa eGuinea ukuze sifumane indawo kumjikelo olandelayo. 
 Into nje eyingxaki kukuba iyakelema kokwayo iHoroya,” utshilo uMicho ethetha namajelo eendaba. 
Nakubeni iPirates yenze umqela obonakalayo kwiChampions League nakwiPSL – kodwa uMicho uphantsi koxinizelelo emva kokuba iphoswe ziindebe ezintathu zonke kule isizini.
