Oyena mdlali othe wanefuthe kulo mdlalo nguWilliam Twala ekungeneni kwakhe kwisigaba sesibini somdlalo. Lishumi elinambini lemidlalo iChiefs ingabethwa kwimidlalo yePSL. 
La maqela mabini aye kwixesha lokuphumla kungekho elifake igowuli. Umdlalo uqale kakuhle – kodwa iyiChippa United elawula umdlalo. Amakhwenkwe kaDan Malesela abeyibeka phantsi ibhola kamnandi esebenzisa amaphiko – kodwa side saphela isigaba sokuqala kungekho nto ebhodini. Zehlelwe lilishwa iiChilli Boys ngethuba uBuyani Sali ekhutshelwa ngaphandle ngenxa yokwenzakala. Ngenxa yobumanzi umdlali uye wathanda ukuba rhabaxa macala. Amakhosi awuthathele kuwo umdlalo ekhambeni kwexesha. 
UGeorge Maluleka noWillard Katsande bebetyala iibhola kuGustavo Paez noJoseph Molongoane – kodwa abadlali beChippa United bebehleli bethe qwa emva. UPaez uphantse wayonzakalisa iChippa ngebhola ephume ecaleni ebigotywe ekunene sisiququ u-Edmore Chirambadare. Khange kuphelele apho ngoba noMaluleka uke watsala intambula ekude – kodwa ibhola yakhe iphume kancinci ezipalini. Amakhosi bekufanelukuba aye kwixesha lokuphumla ehamba phambili ngegowuli elinye okanye amabini ukuba ebengadlalanga ngawo amathuba. 
USteve Komphela ukhuphe uChirambadare kwisigaba sesibini waze wafaka uGoerge Lebese. Injongo yakhe uSteve ibikukufaka umntu ozakuthi awenze lula umsebenzi kaPaez oqale umdlalo namhlanje ngenxa yokungabikho kukaBernard Parker. Ifolosi yeChippa, u-Andile Mbenyane, ukhabe ibhola entle engaphaya komhlaba kanozinti – kodwa yahambela phezulu ezipalini. UPaez ukhabe ibhola ebuhlungu, ifike ethe qwa uDaniel Akpeyi. 
UTsepo Masilela ukhutshiwe kwaze endaweni yakhe kwafakwa uHendick Ekstein. Kwimizuzu embalwa phambi kokukhutshwa kwakhe uMasilele ebeke wafumana ukonzakala okanye ebethunakele njengomdlali okhathazwa kukonzakala. ULebese ungcangcazelise umnatha ngomzuzu wamashumi asibhozo anesihlanu emva kwebhola ehle noWilliam Twala – ongene endaweni kaMolangoane kwisigaba sesibini. UMalesela ufake uVusumzi Ncube endaweni kaLerato Manzini kwimizuzu yokugqibela.
title: ULebese ukhulule Amakhosi efuthanyiselwe!

text:
OLINGISA kumdlalo weMzansi Magic, iThe Queen, uchekrwe ngabalandeli bakhe abaye bavele bafune ukufota naye bengambulisanga. 
USthembiso “SK” Khoza odlala indawo kaShaka kulo mdlalo, uveze ukuba kusuke kuthi makazilahle phantsi xa abantu beman’ ukumbiza ngoShaka xa bedibana naye. 
Ukuveze oku ngethuba enodliwanondlebe olukhethekileyo neSolezwe eZimbali Resort kwaDukuza ngoLwesithathu, apho lo mdlalo ubusenza esinye seziqendu zawo. 
Uthe uyaqonda ukuba abalandeli kusube bevuyela ukumbona, wathi ucela ukuba bamhloniphe naye njengomntu. 
Udize ukuba akafoti nabantu abavele beze kuye bamhlohle ngemfonomfono ze bamfote bengambulisanga. 
“Andinangxaki nabalandeli abandivuyelayo, kodwa ndithanda ukuba umntu andihloniphe. Ukuba ufuna sifote makeze kum andibulise, acele umfanekiso. 
“Ukubulisa kubaluleke kakhulu. Umntu ongabulisiyo ndivele ndibone ukuba akanaxesha lam, unexesha lalo mntu aye ambone kumabonakude acinga ukuba uyamazi,” kutsho uSthembiso. 
Ngethuba bekwisikhululo seenqwelomoya besiya eThekwini ekuqaleni kweveki ehamba nogxa wakhe uZandile Msutwana, odlala indawo kaVuyiswa Jola, uthe ucaphukiswe ngomnye wabasebenzi kwesi sikhululo obethe gqolo ukumbiza ngoShaka. 
“Ndimxelele ukuba ndinguSthembiso. Uqhubekile wandibiza ngoShaka ndavele ndadlula. UZandile uye wambuza ukuba angaziva njani yena xa enokubizwa njengonogada, noba esemxelele igama lakhe. 
“Ndibonile ukuba uyadana. Andinguye uShaka, andizange ndithiywe elo gama ekhaya,” kutsho uSthembiso. 
Uthe kuyamhlupha okokuba angabi nguSthembiso Khoza ebantwini abe nguShaka ongenantliziyo, into emenza aphathwe luvalo lokuba ingaphela imfaka engozini. Uthe uyakuvuyela ukuba yinxalenye yalo mdlalo ongaphelelanga nje ekonwabiseni kodwa odlulisa nomyalezo obalulekileyo kuluntu olubukeleyo. 
“Indaba kaShaka nokungathembeki emtshatweni ichukumisa abantu abaninzi ababhekene naloo ngxaki emitshatweni yabo. 
“Ndiye ndihlangane nabantu besithi yazi SK le nto oyidlalayo incede mna nowakwam emtshatweni,” kutsho uSK.
title: Udikwe kukubizwa ngoShaka owe-The Queen!

text:
Kukho into ekunzima ukuyikholelwa ncam ngeentsuku zocalucalulo kweli loMzantsi Afrika. Lo nto yinto yokuba uninzi labelungu bathi babengazi ukuba kwakukubi kangakanani kubantu abantsundu bakweli lizwe ngoko. Njani?  
Kaloku urhulumente wengcinezelo yayinguye owayephethe iziko losasazo elaziwa njengeSABC kwaye besenza ngandlela zonke ukuba bangavezi izinto ezazisenziwa kubantu abantsundu. Kwakufuneka uzisenge kumaphephandaba namajelo osasazo abucala iindaba zokuba kuqhubeka ntoni kanye kanye eMzantsi Afrika. 
Iziko lakwaSABC lelona likhulu kuwo onke apha eMzantsi Afrika, kumabonakude nakunomathotholo akho ndawo bangafikeleli kuyo. Le SABC yekawonke wonke, kwaye ubunokufunga uthi ingathi bayazama ukuba ubukhe wayithi tshe ingqonyela yapha enguMnu. Hlaudi Motsoeneng ezindabeni. UMotsoeneng kwezi veki siphuma kuzo ukhe wenza izibhengezo ezikhulu.  
Umzekelo kumba wokudlala umculo waseMzantsi Afrika (90% womculo wabo) yayiyinto eyavuyelwa kakhulu ziimvumi zakweli. Nathi siliphepha sazivuyela ezi ndaba. Emva kweveki kungenwe kule nkqubo yomculo waseMzantsi Afrika kwavakala ukuba abasasazi bamajelo athile abonwabanga ngoba zange baxelelwe kwangethuba ukuba kuzakuza olu tshintsho emculweni. Yaba luphawu lokuqala lokuba abasebenzi baseSABC ingathi baphantsi kwengcinezelo ngoba abaxelelwa nto, kusuke kugqitywe pha phezulu kuthiwe mabenze qha. 
Uphawu lesibini lathi gqi xa uMotsoeneng ebhengeza ukuba oonondaba baseSABC abazokuveza imifanekiso yabantu abaqhankqalazayo. Eli nyathelo lokungavezi abantu besilwela amalungelo abo kubuyise iinkumbulo zeentsuku zengcinezelo. Ingaba sibuyiselwa emva?  
Singathanda ukuva izimvo zabafundi bephepha ngalo mba waseSABC. Liziko lethu bantu bavotayo eliya, kwaye kufuneka umxholo walo usekwe ngabemi beli nasepalamente. Sibhaleleni ku: isibhalo@inl.co.za
title: Yeyethu sonke iSABC, sithini ngayo?

text:
Abakwa 1st Class Manor BnB eMonti bebebambe indibano yokungcamla umdiliya omfaxangiweyo eMonti ngoMgqibelo umhla wesihlanu kweyeNkanga.  
Ngenxa yemvula kuye kwanyanzeleka ukuba abantu abapha kwikhulu ngenani baxinane kwigumbi ebelilungiselwe ukutya. Kodwa oko khange kutyhafise oosomashishini nolutsha oluphangelayo ekuthatheni eli thuba bangcamle, bancokole, bazane. 
“Emva kokubona ukuba awekho maninzi amathuba okudibana nabanye oosomashishini ndagqiba ukuba kufuneka ndikhangele amaqonga okudibana nabanye abantu abatsha apha eMpuma Koloni.  
“Lo mcimbi we Summer Wine Tasting esiwuqalileyo apha sisiphumo sezoonzame,” kutsho uPelisa Kunju (27) ongumphathi wale BnB. 
“Ukungcamla umdiliya omfaxangiweyo ayingomcimbi wokunxila yindlela yokufunda ukuba umdiliya othile uselwa njani, nantoni ngeliphi ixesha njalo-njalo. Kukuzifundisa!” uqhube watsho uKunju. 
“Baninzi kanti abantu abathanda umdiliya omfaxangiweyo apha eMonti!” kutsho uLorna Hudson waseBlenz Wine Boutique esebenzisane nokaKunju ekuqiniskiseni ukuba umdiliya ubukhona ngalo mhla. 
Umdiliya obungcamlwa: 
– Robertson Sparkling Pinot Noir 
– Klein Zalze Brut MCC Rose 
– Warwick First Lady ebomvu 
– Warwick First Lady Rose 
– Warwick Three Cape Ladies engumxube obumvu 
– Kwagqityezelwa ngeKrone Night Nectar ehlwihlwizayo. 
“Kwelam icala ndifuna abantu bafunde ngeendidi ngeendidi zesiselo somdiliya. Uninzi lwabantu ebebelapha bebelindele ukuba bazakungcamla umdiliya oswiti kanti ayihambi njalo! Ibayincasa eyomileyo ekufuneka uyiqhele! Ndiyavuya ukubona umcimbi obumila kunje apha. Ngethemba lokuba bazakuqhubeka besenza neminye” uvale ngelo uHudson. 
isibhalo@inl.co.za
title: Umanyano ngomdiliya omfaxangiweyo

text:
Nangani ilizwe lethu lithe gabhu ezingxakini ngenxa yokudodobala koqoqosho – kodwa ikhona into ebancumisayo.  
Isiganeko sika1994,  unyaka abantu abamnyama abazuza ngawo inkululeko okokuqala emva kokubanjwa ngesixhanti iminyaka emininzi nguRhulumente wengcinezelo soze siphume ezingqondweni zabo ngoba senza umahluko.  
Ukumiliselwa kwenkqubo entsha yolawulo kwavula amathuba amahle kwezoshishino kwatsho kwantshula neenkampani ezifana noMTN, uVodacom kwezonxibelelwano.  
Ukufika kwazo kwafikisana neminxeba ephathwayo iNokia, iMotorola, iAlcatel nezinye. Ubukho baloo maqumrhu abuguqula ubomi babantu noqoqosho loMzantsi Afrika ngophanyazo.  
Zange kubekho nguqu kwicala leebhanki, ezona ntsika zoqoqosho loMzantsi Afrika kwade kwangunyaka ophelileyo (2018).  
Eli lizwe lineminyaka emininzi lixhathise ngeebhanki ezifana noStandard Bank, uFNB, uNedbank noAbsa – owaginya zonke iibhanki ezincinci ezifana nooMeeg Bank.  
Emva konyaka ka2000, kwathi gqi isidubedube ekuthiwa nguCapitec – ibhanka yokuqala ekwazileyo ukungena nzulu ebantwini abamnyama ezilalini nasezilokishini. Abantu abaninzi baqala kuCapitec ukusebenzisa ibhanka ngoba yonke into yakhe yayilula futhi ixabisa kancinci.  
Iindaba ezimnandi kulo nyaka kukufika kweebhanki ezintsha kraca. Kutheni ndisithi ukufika kwazo ziindaba ezimnandi  kodwa nazo zifuna le mali yethu?  
Into ebangela nditsho kukuba siza kufumana ithuba elihle lokukhetha ibhanka ehlangabezana neemfuno zethu, engabizi kakhulu kodwa ekhuselekileyo.  
Ukhuphiswano lweebhanki ezinkulu aluwathobanga amaxabiso okugcina imali xa ubani ethelekisa nento eyenzekayo ngoku eMzantsi Afrika. 
Kunyaka ophelileyo kufike iTymeBank esezandleni zosomashishini omnyama uPatrice Motsepe. Kulo unyaka (2019), kuza iDiscovery Bank, iBank Zero nePost Bank, iUbank – kanti yena uAfrican Bank sele egalelekile nendlela entsha nelula yokubhanka imali.  
Zonke iibhanki ezintsha zisebenzisa ubuchwepeshe bale mihla, kodwa abantu bayakwazi ukukhupha iimali zabo ngeendlela eziqhelekileyo. Imali bubomi bethu.  
Ukufika kweebhanki ezintsha kusinika ithuba lokufunda iindlela ezintsha zokonga imali. 
 Iingxelo zithi abantu beli lizwe abayongi imali (savings) futhi abayityali imali (investment). Ukonga imali kukugcina imali ebhankini okanye kuloo ndawo uyithembileyo ungancwasanga nzala kuba unenjongo yokwenza into ethile.  
Kanti lona utyalomali kukufaka imali kwiinkampani ezinobuchule bokuphatha imiba yemali unenjongo yokufumana inzala emva kwexesha elithile. Zombini ezi zinto zibalulekile kodwa azenziwa kakuhle ngabantu abamnyama. Isizathu isoloko ikukungasebenzi, imivuzo ephantsi nokonganyelwa kwabasebenzi ziingxaki zamakhaya abo. 
Zizinto abaphephela ngazo abantu ezo. Ukulondoloza notyalomali akudingi imali eninzi. Andibasoli abantu ngoba iibhanki zethu azibafundisi ncam abantu iindlela zokwenza imali, into eziyibeka phambili kukubantywilisela ezikweletini.  
Ubangaya ngapha, zonke iibhanki ziyakweletisa ngemali ngoba yenye yeendlela ezenza ngayo ingeniso. Ukufika kweebhanki ezintsha ziindaba ezimnandi ngoba iindleko zokugcina imali ezibhankini kwehlile ngoku.  
Njengokuba uCapitec ebeyeyona bhanki ebiza kancinci kodwa ukufika kukaTymeBank kutshintshe yonke into. Wenze ukubhanka kwalula futhi kwaxabisa kancinci – ewe, ngoba uyibhanki yobuchwepheshe.  
Ukufika kukaTymeBank kunyanzele zonke iibhanki ziguqule indlela ebezisebenza ngayo. Nazo zilandela ekhondweni lakhe.  
UDiscovery Bank noBank Zero kulindeleke basebenze ngokufanayo noTymeBank. Okuhle ngezo iibhanki kukuba abantu abamnyama baza kufumana ithuba lokuthenga izabelo kuzo.  
Ngokugcina imali, iibhanki ezinkulu bezikade zibonzakalisa abantu ngamaxabiso aphezulu. Ukufika kweebhanki ezintsha kuguqule yonke into ngoba zize neendlela ezintsha, ezikhawulezayo futhi ezikhuselekileyo. 
Make sithelekise amaxabiso weebhanki ezindala neTymeBank. Akukho mali ebhatalwayo ngenyanga kwaTymeBank. Kwezinye: FNB – R5.75, Absa – R5.30, Standard – R5.60, Capitec – R5.00, Nedbank – R5.50. Umzekelo: xa utsalelwa imali yendlu, imoto okanye lo nto uyibhatalayo, kwaTymeBank ubhatala iponti (R2.00) qha.  
Xa ufaka imali eTymeBank usebenzisa uBoxer okanye uPick *  Pay; ubhatala iiponti ezimbini (R4). Ubhatala imali efana nezinye iibhanki xa ukhupha imali enkulu kuphela. 
 Ukukhupha imali ngekhadi likaTymeBank kwaPick *  Pay nakwaBoxer kusimahla kwaye uphiwa amanqaku xa unekhadi lakwaPick nPay kodwa ubhatala iR8 xa ukhupha imali kwezinye iibhanki.  
UTymeBank unyanzele uNedbank weza neAkhawunti entsha esimahla kodwa obhatala xa uyisebenzisile kuphela. Yena uStandard Bank uvelise iAkhawunti ekuthiwa yiMyMo. Yona ixabisa iR4.95 ngenyanga kodwa inawo amaqithiqithi amahle.  
Nayo iAfrican Bank iyekile ukuba yibhanki yezikweleti kuphela. Ngoku uyakwazi ukonga, ukutyala imali, uthenge umbane, iethayim ubhatale nezinto zakho kwiAkhawunti entsha ekuthiwa nguMyWorld. Nayo ixabisa imali engaphantsi kweR5 ngenyanga. Njengokuba sisamkela iibhanki ezifana noTymeBank.  
Kufikile ixesha lokuba abantu baziqhelise ukonga imali ngokuthi bazikhethele ibhanki exabisa kancinci. Kudala iibhanki zibatyabula abantu kodwa iphelile lo nto ngoku.  
Ziziyatha kuphela ngoku eziza kukhala ngokutyelwa imali ziibhanki okanye amaxabiso aphezulu.
title: Ukufika kweTymeBank kuguqule izinto eMzantsi Afrika!

text: UMKOMISHINALA wephondo uNjengele Lt Liziwe Ntshinga usamkele isigwebo sezihlandlo ezithathu zobom ezithwe nka kwindoda yaseNtabankulu ebithe gqolo ukuphindaphinda idlwengula abazala bayo ababini kwakunye nodade wayo omnye.
title: Ubomi eziseleni kobedlwengula azalwa nabo!

text:
Umbutho olawula umboxo kweli lizwe, iSouth African Rugby, uchonge uJacques Nienaber njengomqeqeshi omtsha weqela lesizwe lombhoxo. Indedeba yakwaNienaber ingene ezihlangwini ezishiywe nguRassie Erasmus obuyele emsebenzini wakhe njengomlawuli oyintloko kwiSaru. Nangona engumqeqeshi omtsha kwiBoks, uJacques Nienaber – kodwa ligama nje elo ngoba iinyawo zakhe zinodaka. Ebengomnye wamadoda ancedise uErasmus ngethuba iqela lesizwe lidlala indebe yehlabathi. Emva kokuba AmaBhokobhoko ephumelele indebe yehlabathi, uRassie Erasmus, waye wathi akakwazi ukuqhubela phambili njengomqeqeshi wawo ngoba unomsebenzi wakhe kakade. Ukunyuselwa kukaNienaber akubothusanga kwaphela abalandeli bombhoxo ngoba ebebonwa njengomnye wamadoda athe anegalelo elibonakalayo kwimpumelelo yoMzantsi Afrika kwitumente yombhoxo ebibanjelwe eJapan kunyaka ophelileyo. 
UNienaber, 47, noRassie baqala ukusebenzisana ngethuba besebenzela iFree State Rugby kwiminyaka yoo-90. Baphinde basebenza kunye kwiWestern Province nakwiStormers phambi kokuqeshwa yiSouth African Rugby kwiminyaka emibini egqithileyo. UDeon Davids ulisekela likaNienaber ukusukela namhlanje. Yena ukhe waqeqesha iqela lombhoxo laseMpuma Koloni elidlala kwiPRO 14, iSouthern Kings, iSWD Eagles nakwiBoland. UDaan Human ngomnye wabancedisi baMabhokobhoko oza kungena endaweni kaMatt Proudfoot oqeshwe yiNgilane kwiveki ephelileyo. UMzwandile Stick, obengumncedisi kusekho uRassie, uza kuhlala esikhundleni sakhe.  Umongameli weSaru, uMark Alexander, uthe isigqeba sigqibe kwelokuba sithathe umntu ongaphakathi kwiBoks ukuze athathe apho ayeke khona uRassie ngoba umntu omtsha ebeza kuqala phantsi yonke into.
title: AmaBhokobhoko afumene umqeqeshi omtsha – kodwa iinyawo zakhe zinodaka

text: AmaBhokobhoko ngoompondozihlanjiwe behlabathi embhoxweni kwakhona emva kokuba ecambalalise AmaNgesi emdlalweni wokugqibela weNdebe yeHalabathi namhlanje eYokohama kwilizwe laseJapan. UMakazole Mapimpi noCheslin Kolbe balele emgceni ukuze uMzantsi Afrika ukwazi ukubetha iNgilane ngo’32-12 emdlalweni obunzima kakhulu ekuqaleni kwawo. Phambi komsebenzi omhle owenziwe nguKolbe noMapimpi – indoda encede uMzantsi Afrika ngenqina nguHandre Pollard oyiphosileyo ipenela yokuqala ngenxa yoloyiko. Kuyiwe kwixesha lokuphumla AmaBhokobhoko ephala phambili. Nangona umsantsa ubungemkhulwanga – kodwa amakhwenkwe kangqondongqondo, uRassie Erasmus, ebegunye ngamandla futhi engawavumeli AmaNgesi adibanise iibhola eziyingozi. UMzantsi Afrika uzicacise kakuhle emva kwentsukumo eyenziwe nguMakazole noLukhanyo Am emzuzwini wamashumi asixhenxe anesihlanu.
title: AmaBhokobhoko ziintshatsheli zehlabathi emva kokucambalalisa AmaNgesi!!!

text:
Iphephandaba I’solezwe likrwece oosaziwayo abaphuma eMpuma Koloni, ngelifuna uluvo lokuba lo nyaka ka-2016 ingaba ububaphethe njani?  
Ukanti bakwanqwenelele nabalandeli babo iKrismesi emyoli kwakunye nonyaka omtsha oyokozela amathamsanqa. 
Imvumi yeAfro-Pop uBulelwa “Zahara” Mkutukane uthi ubumhle kuye lo nyaka xa kuthelekiswa nale idlulileyo. Uthi eyona nto yenze kwakuhle kukuba uye wacheba iinwele (afro) zakhe, emva kokuthatha isigqibo ngenye intseni sokususa i-afro kuba efuna ukuqala ubom obutsha. 
“Ndaye ndane nkolelo yokuba ukususa kwam iinwele kukhona okuhle okuzayo empilweni yam. Ngokwenene kuye kwanjalo. Bendikwafuna nokukhe ndiqalele kanti nditshintshe nendlela ebendikade ndiyiyo ngaphambili kuba ngoku ndiqalise nokujongana nomzimba wam,” utsho uZahara. 
Unqwenelele uluntu lonke kwakunye nabalandeli bakhe iKrismesi emyoli nonyaka omtsha oyokozela amathamsanqa. Uthi eli lixesha apho wonke ubani kubalulekile ukuba alichithe nosapho lakhe. Nangona nje yena esithi uzakuxakeka de kubengumhla weshumi elinesihlanu kwinyanga ezayo. Ukhuthaze imvano phakathi kweentsapho esithi akukho nanye into eyogqitha ikhaya kuba kubunzima odibana nabo abona bantu baye bakuthuthuzele ikwalusapho lakho. 
UZahara ukwavakalise imincili yakhe ngokuzimanya kwakhe ngeqhina lomtshato nomsasazi woMhlobo Wenene uAmaza Ntshanga kunyaka ozayo. Uthi ngoku sele ingamalungiselelo katsiki wakhe nozakuba kwinyanga yoMdumba. 
Isithethi samapolisa aseGcuwa uKapteni Jackson Manatha uthi ubumhle kakhulu kuye unyaka ka2016. UManatha uthi zininzi izinto athe wazenza phakathi kwekhaya lakhe abengakhange akwazi kwiminyaka edlulieyo. 
Uthi eyona nto asebenze nzima kuyo kukufundisa abantwana bakhe. “Kunzima ukufundisa abantwana kodwa ndiphunculuke kunjalo ndawagqiba amatyala,” utshilo uManatha. 
Umyalezo wakhe kubantu beli phondo leMpuma Koloni kwanabo baseNtshona Koloni kukuba baqaphele ezindleleni. Uthi umgangatho wolwaphulo-mthetho unyuka kakhulu xa kusongwa unyaka. 
UZintle “Babe Zee” Mbusi woMhlobo Wenene uthi, nakuye ubumhle unyaka ka-2016, kodwa waphinda wambi kuba uye walahlekelwa nangabantu ebebathanda. Uthi ubuhlobo ubakhile nabantu abaninzi nangona obunye buqhawukile kodwa uthi ngenxa yoMdali uye waphumelela kwaye wakhula. 
Kumyalezo wakhe wokuphela konyaka ukhumbuza abalandeli bakhe ukuba inyanga yoMqungu isemnyango uluntu malonwabe kodwa babenomlinganiselo kwaye ulonwabo lomntu lungachaphazeli elomnye umntu. 
“De sidibane kunyaka ozayo niziphathe kakuhle balandeli bam. Bazali nikhathalele abantwana benu,” utsho uBabe Zee. Uthi enye yezinto emonwabisileyo kukuphumelela imbasa kumawonga iMthatha Community Awards. 
Imvumi yegospile uButho Vuthela uthi nakuye ubumhle kakhuku lo unyaka ingakumbi kwicala lomculo njengoko bathe baphumelela neembasa eziliqela. Nangona nje baye bawuvala ngenyembezi emva kokuba bethe bashiywa ngugxa wabo kumculo wokholo uS’fiso Ncwane. 
Kumyalezo awushiyela uluntu ngeli xesha likaxakeka uButho uthe: “Ndiyazithoba ndidomboza kubantu bethu ndisithi mabayithobele imithetho yezendlela kwaye nabantu mabathobelane. Xa udiniwe phumla ukuze uzokwazi ukufika ukhuselekile.” 
UButho ukwathe abantwana mabahlonele abazali ukuze izokwanda imihla yabo. Uthi uluntu zeluwelele kunyaka omtsha ngomthandazo.
title: Oosaziwayo kumyalezo weKrismesi

text:
IBILUCHULUMANCO kwisikolo iWongalethu High eseNU 2 eMdantsane emva kotyelelo lo mbutho wabucala i-Impact ngeliyokukhuthaza abafundi abangamantombazana. Malunga namakhulu abane wabafundi abangamantombazana kwesi sikholo axhamle kwizipho zeetawuli zokuzikhusela xa umntu esexesheni.  
Ukanti umsunguli we-Impact uNolubabalo Nkanjeni ebephelekwe yimvumi eyaziwayo yomculo wokholo uSibusisiwe Mbuku basebenzise eli thuba banika amazwi enkuthazo kwaba bafundi. UMbuku owaziwa kakhulu ungelikaSibu wayekwi sihlanu sokugqibela kukhuphiswano lomculo wokholo u”I want to sing Gospel” ngo-2014. Esi sibini sabelene ngeqonga sikhuthaza abafundi ukuba bangavumeli imeko yabo yangoku ibe ngumqobo kwingomso labo.  
UNkanjeni uthe, “Umnqweno wam kukukhuthaza amantombazana ukuba azazi ukuba ungubani, nokwazi ngendima eldlwa nguYesu Krestu ezimpilweni zethu.” Ukwathe injongo yakhe kukuphila ilizwi likaKrestu ngokubonakalayo ngokuthi enze umehluko.  
USibu ukhuthaze aba bafundi ngokubaluleka kokusebenzisa isiphiwo onaso, uzakhele ikamva. Ubalule umculo njengento anesiphiwo kuyo esithi nabani na angayilo nto afuna ukuba yiyo, xa esebenzisa isiphiwo anaso ngokufanelekileyo.  
USibu ukwathe, “Abantu abatsha bayasidinga kakhulu, ukubakhuthaza nokubaxhasa, sakhane, sibonisane neendlela zokuzixabisa.” Ukwathe, “Awudingi mali ukuze ukwazi ukukhuthaza abantu, okubalulekileyo kukuba ube ngumntu onombono.” 
Utitshalakazi wesi sikolo uLungiswa Nkosinkulu-Maweni uthe, “Kube yinkuthazo enkulu ukufika kukaNolubabalo, ephelekwa nguSibusisiwe, itawuli zabasetyhini zizakuba luncedo kakhulu, kwaye siyawabulela namazwi abo enkuthazo.” UNkosinkulu-Maweni ungutitshalakazi odlala indima enkulu kubomi babafundi abangamantombazana, njegoko ejongene nezimidlalo, ekwafundisa iNatural Science, iMaths, kwaneMaths Literacy. 
Ukwathe izikolo ezifana neWongalethu zine ngxaki yabafundi abakhulelweyo, nabangabazali. “Ngelinye ixesha ucela umntwana aze nomzali wakhe, ufumanise ukuba ukanamzali, indima yomzali ikwasesandleni sakhe.”  
UNkanjeni uwusungule lo mbutho kwinyanga yeThupha, kwaye kwezi nyanga zintathu uzibalasele ngokunika iingcebiso kubafundi bebanga le shumi, ngokunika amazwi enkuthazo azikolweni. 
Ube nesandla kumnyhadala wokwamekela intasa-hlobo iPeelton Spring Festival, kwaye inkxaso ngeetawuli zokuzikhusela zabasetyhini zaxa usexesheni uyifumene kumalungu osapho, abahlobo, namalungu athile kwibandla ayinxalenye yalo.
title: Baxhotyiswe ngexabiso lobuntombi abafundi besikolo iWongalethu

text:
Abahlali bommandla waseMnquma, eGcuwa bacele ungenelelo loMongameli we-EFF, uJulius Malema kwizinto abakholelwa ukuba azihambi kakuhle kurhulumente kunye nakuMasipala wabo. 
Oku bakuthethe xeshikweni uMalema ebekwibala lelokishi yaseColoured eGcuwa ngoMgqibelo, apho ebeyomamela yonke imicelimngeni ejongene nabo. 
Phakathi kwezinto ezithethwe ngabahlali, ukuxuthwa kweemali zenkam-nkam zabantu abadala ngamagosa karhulumente, umntu avele angarholi ngaphandle kwesizathu. 
Ukunikwa kwabantu izindlu kwindawo yaseNew Rest kwilokishi entsha yaseGcuwa bengekho selungelweni lokuxhamla. 
Indawo yaseZizamele ineminyaka engamashumi amabini anesihlanu, kodwa ayikabinazo izindlu zangasese kunanamhlanje, umntu kufuneka azombele umgxunya enze indlu yangasese yethutyana, nangona urhulumente wayethembisile ngokuzakha. 
“Ndize kuwe Malema ukuba usincede singabantu abadala, imali yethu yenkam-nkam iyabiwa, sivele singarholi ngaphandle kwesizathu,” utshilo uNomthandazo Mkhupha ongumhlali. 
USimilo Tatase ucele inkokheli yabo uMalema ukuba aqwalasele imeko yokunikwa kwabantu abathile izindlu eNew Rest ndaweni yokuba zinikwe abanikazi bazo. 
Abahlali bakwathi, iinkokheli zombutho kufuneka zixhobise amalungu ombutho ukuba i-EFF ayondawo yokulwa ngezihlalo, kwaye bazinike uxanduva lokuba zithengise umbutho ebantwini ingakumbi eGcuwa. 
Ephawula emva kwezikhalazo zabahlali uMalema, uthe bazakuzilandelela zonke izikhalazo zabahlali, kwaye bazakuqinisekisa ukuba ziyafezekiswa. 
“Kwizinto enizithethileyo sakuzilandelela, kwaye zeningothuki xa sithetha ngamagama enu epalamente, kuba zonke izikhalazo zenu sakuziphakamisa khona,” utshilo.
title: Baphalaze imbilini yabo kuMalema

title: Uyimbongi?

text:
IYAPHOKOKA imiyalezo yovelwano kusapho legqala lomzabalazo wenkululeko yeli uDumisani Mafu.  
UMafu obesaziwa kakhulu njengoMazola usweleke ngempelaveki esiphuma kuyo. IANC eMpuma Koloni imchaze njengosihlalo walo mbutho wokuqala kweli phondo emva kokuba iANC ibuyele kweli.  
Ngexesha lomzabalazo uMazola udlale indima enkulu kwinkululeko yeli, eli khonkco lomkhosi woMkhonto Wesizwe owawusemfihlakalweni kweli, neenkokeli zeANC ezazizinze eLusaka eZambia.  
Ugxa wakhe emzabalazweni uMzoxolo Stokwe ubalule indima edlalwe nguMazola kwidabi lenkululeko yeli.  
Uthe, “Ndaqala ukudibana naye e-Angola eyinkumanda yenkampu yoMkhonto Wesizwe, saphinda sadibana eTranskei ngexesha likaOperation Vula nalapho inguye inkumanda.”  
UStokwe uphinde wamchaza njengendoda eyayithanda ukubonwabisa ngamabali oyolo ngethuba bekunye kwidabi lenkululeko besebenza emfihlakalweni.  
Uqhube wathi, “Ngethamsanqa siphinde sasebenza kunye kukhuseleko lombutho weANC emva kokuba sibuyele ngaphakathi kweli. Sakhe salahlekwa ngubawo uMandela elalini, samkhangela, ukulahleka kwenkokeli iphantsi kokhuseleko lwenu yayiyinto embi kakhulu.” 
 Inkokeli yeUDM uBantu Holomisa umchaze njengenkokeli eyayihlakaniphile, ezinikele emzabalazweni wenkululeko yeli. Kumyalezo awubhekise kolu sapho uHolomisa uthe, “Akukho mntu unokulithatha kuni ihlaba enilivayo, ngaphandle koMdali obesinike uMazola waphinda wamthatha.”  
OkaHolomisa uthe isikhewu esishiywe nguMazola kwipolitiki yeli sikhulu kwaye ngumceli mngeni ukusivala.
title: Igqala lomzabalazo likhunjulwa ngoogxa balo

text:
Amakhosi akafumenanga mpumelelo kwimidlalo emine edlulileyo. Lo nto iyawakhathaza amawakawaka abalandeli bawo – kodwa umqeqeshi uSteve Komphela uthi iqela lakhe lizakuqhubela phambili nomsebenzi nokuba liyaxinga na.    IKaizer Chiefs ayikwazanga ukuqokelela amanqaku amathathu izolo kumdlalo we-Absa Premier Soccer League obuphakathi [kwayo] neCape Town City ophele ngo’1-1 eFNB Stadium izolo ebusuku.  Amakhwenkwe kaKomphela afake igowuli kuqala, ingxaki ewaveleleyo kukukhutshwa kukaSibusiso Khumalo ngekhadi elibomvu ngomzuzu wamashumi amabini anesibhozo.    Emva koko iCape Town City ibuye ngamandla – kodwa iChiefs izamile ukuxhathisa kwade kwayiywa kwixesha lokuphumla. Kwisiqingatha sesibini iCity ifumene igowuli lokulinganisa – aphela nyaa amathuba okufumana amanqaku apheleleyo kwiChiefs kuba ibidlala ngabadlali abalishumi.    Iziphumo zalo mdlalo abazamkelanga abalandeli beChiefs; bebefuna kumqeqeshi esiqwini – kodwa uKomphela uthi yintlal’isenzeka leyo. Kudliwano ndlebe alenze kumabonakude [TV], le ndedeba eyayifudula iqeqesha iBafana Bafana, ithe imigushuzo eyenziwe ngabalandeli ilindelekile kwaye yenzeka kubo abantu.    “Zizinto ezenzekayo ezi kule misebenzi yethu. Okwethu thina kukuqhubela phambili nomsebenzi noba kunjani na. kufuneka uyirhuqe inkqwelo nokuba ayinamavili xa kukubi,” utshilo uKomphela.
