Owayesakuba nguMphathiswa wamaPolisa uFikile Mbalula wachazela inginginya yabahlali baseNyanga, eZolani Centre, kweyeDwarha kulo nyaka uphelileyo ukuba siza kwakhiwa isikhululo saseSamora Machel kwaye sele siboniwe nesiza. 
Ukususela ngoko, oko abahlali bale ngingqi yambethwe bubundlobongela balindela esi sikhululo. 
Evula esi sikhululo ngokusesikweni, uCele utyikitye isifungo asifundele oonondaba esithi: “Luvuyo kum ukuvula esi sikhululo sitsha esiza kunceda abahlali bale ndawo abangama40 000 ukususela namhlanje. Esi sikhululo siza kuba namalungu angama116 nezithuthi ezingama54 eziza kusetyenziswa ukukhusela ubomi babahlali,” waze watyikitya. 
UCele uxelele abahlali ukuba, ukuba bebenendlela yabo beziza kuba nezikhululo zonke izitalato zaseNyanga. “Sifuna iphele into yokuba iNyanga ibelikomkhulu lobundlobongela,” utshilo. 
Usihlalo weCPF yaseNyanga uBuyisile Makhasi, uthe siza kwenza umahluko esi sikhululo kubahlali balapho ekunyanzeleka ukuba baqeshe izithuthi besiya eNyanga, besiyela izinto ezifana nokugunyazisa izazisi. 
“Iza kucuthela amapolisa aseNyanga umsebenzi. Iza kuphela intsokolo yokuqesha izithuthi ngemali abangenayo abahlali balapha.” 
Umhlali waseSamora, uAngelina Mtalane, 63, uthe: “Kudala sasokola apha, sikhwela sisiya eNyanga. Into ebuhlungu yeyokuba sifike zingekho izithuthi zamapolisa apho. Kudala sasidinga isikhululo samapolisa kule ngingqi. Siza kutsho sikwazi ukunqanda ubundlobongela busenzeka. Kaloku thina ubukwazi ukuyibona into isenzeka kunyanzeleke ufowunele eNyanga. Xa efika amapolisa ibe ngathi zange kwenzeka kwanto.” 
Omnye umhlali, uLuvo Stofile, uthe uyakwamkela ukufika kwesikhululo, esithi kuza kwehla nezinga lokuqhekeza eSamora.  
“Kaloku bayayazi ukuba zikude iiveni zamapolisa. Ziza kutsho zizulazule nalapha ezitalatweni ngoku. Lo nto iza kwenza bacinge kabini abo bathanda ukuqhekeza izindlu zabantu,” utshilo. 
Ngokweenkcukacha zobundlobongela zalo nyakamali, kubulewe abantu abangama308 eNyanga ukususela kwekaTshazimpuzi ukuza kuma kweyoKwindla kulo nyaka. 
Elo nani lelona liphezulu kwizikhululo zonke zaseMzantsi. Kufunyaniswe ukuba kubulawa abantu abangama57 ngosuku.
title: Iza kuyeka ukuba likomkhulu lobundlobongela iNyanga

text:
Kutshiswa amavili amadala eemoto kwizitalato zedolophu kwirenki endala yaseMthatha ngoonotekisi, naku- N2 osuka kwicala laseThekwini ongena kwidolophu yaseMthatha. 
Kuvakala ukuba oku kulandela emva kokuba bathe aba notekisi babamba intlanganiso yokuza nesisombululo  emva kokuba bathe basuswa kwiirenki abasebenzela kuzo ngumphathiswa wamapolisa kazwelonke uBheki Cele ngezidubedube zabo. 
Iivenkile ezikufutshane kwezi renki kuye kwanyanzeleka ukuba zivalwe kwasekuseni.  
Isithethi samapolisa ephondo uKapteni Khaya Thonjeni uthi kuyabonakala ukuba bapheka imbiza engavuthwayo. “Bonke abayinxalenye yokuzisa ucwangco besebenzisana namapolisa bayijonge ngelihlo elibanzi yonke into eyakuthi ibe ngumqobo ukuza nocwangco kule dolophu.”  
Uqhube esithi lothi litshona eli lanamhlanje uLwesihlanu ibe ingabo abatshotshentla, besebenzisana namapolisa aseKSD Law Enforcement.  
“Kungakhona ulibaziseko kubantu abadlula kule dolophu, sicela ukuba basebenzise ndlela zimbi,” utshilo.  
“Sifuna uxolo, uzinzo nocwangco naphi na kule dolophu. Asinasiqinisekiso sokuba ngoobani abaphembeleli bolu dushe, ukuba ngoonotekisi okanye asingabo kwisinina,” utshilo.
title: Yingxaki izixholoxholo zoonoteksi eMthatha!

text:
Amasandawana abuyele phezuli kwi-Absa Premier Soccer League emva kokubetha iMaritzburg United ngo’2-1 emdlalweni obumhle kakhulu eHarry Gwala Stadium ebusuku namhlanje. Itsazise igazi kuqala iMamelodi Sundowns ngegowuli elihle elifakwe nguLebohang Maboe – ofumene ibhola ephucukileyo kuGaston Sirino emva kokudlalelwa nguNascimento. Yona iTeam of Choice igodule ngegowuli lokubika ekhaya elifake kushike embalwa kuphele umdlalo. Lizamile kekambe iqela lika-Eric Tinkler – kodwa imizamo yalo ibingonelanga. Ukuphumelela kweDowns namhlanje kuthetha ukuthi isusa i-Orlando Pirates ebihleli phezulu. 
Amaqela axhwithene zizuka emdlalweni – kodwa ngabafana bakaPitso Mosimane ebekufanele bafake amagowuli aliqela emva kokufumana amathuba aliqela abangawasebenzisanga kakuhle emdlalweni. Kwimizuzu emihlanu yokuqala, uMaboe uyibeke endaweni entle iSundowns ebisebenzela ukuya emdlalweni weCAF Champions League ongempelaveki isendaweni entle kwiPSL. Igowuli lize emva kwemizamo nomsebenzi omhle obusenziwa nguThemba Zwane, uEmiliano Tade noMaboe phambili. Nakubeni kungene kuyo igowuli kwangoko emdlalweni, okuncomekayo kukuba iMaritzburg khange iyekelele. Ikwazile ukungena kwiindawo eziyingozi – kodwa uDenis Onyango ukwazile ukuyithintela. UTade ufake igowuli lesibini kwatsho kwayiwa kwixesha lokuphumla iDowns ihamba phambili ngo’2-0. 
Baqhubele phambili abadlali beTeam of Choice abalwela ukusinda ezembeni. Kubekho ithemba xa uFurtune Makaringe efaka igowuli kushiyeke imizuzu esibhozo emdlalweni – kodwa ngelishwa layo iMaritzburg, ayikwazanga ukuyoyisa iDowns ebidlala ngabadlali abalishumi ebaleni emva kokukhutshwa kukaGaston Sirino ngekhadi elibomvu nguVictor Gomes emdlalweni. Imeko yeMaritzburg United ayikaphuucuki emva kokubethwa emidlalweni emibini elandelelanayo. 
   
Maritzburg United: Ofori, Kunene, Xulu, Allie, Sanoka, Makaringe, Matsi, Kutumela, Kateregga, De Reuck (Zakri), Shandu  
Amalalela: Mpandle, Figuareido, Zakri, Mokate, Farmer, Moseamedi, Mekoa. 
Mamelodi Sundowns: Onyango, Coetzee, Nascimento, Morena, Langerman, Kekana, Mabunda, Zwane, Sirino, Maboe, Tade. 
Amalalela: Pieterse, Manyisa, Mahlambi, Mkhulise, Lebusa, Lakay, Arendse.
title: Ibuyele endaweni yayo iDowns emva kokubetha iMaritzburg United ebusuku namhlanje

text:
Umbutho we EFF ufikelele kwisigqibo sokuxhasa umbutho we Democratic Alliance eNelson Mandela Bay, Rhawutini, ekuRhuleni nase Tshwane. Oku kudizwe ngumongameli walombutho uJuluis Malema ngethuba ebethetha namajelo endaba eAlexander. ”EKZN sixhase I IFP eRusternberg sixhase umbutho wabahlali olwela ukugqithiswa kwenkonzo, oku kusemva kokuba sithathe isigqibo sokuba asifuni zikhundla kuyo yonke lento sizakuyivotela lemibutho,”uthethe oko uMalema. 
 Oku kwenze ukuba kusombuluke kuphele ukuqaqaditsha kubantu beli malunga neyona nto izakwenzeka kulawulo lomasipala abaphambili eMzantsi Afrika. “Sijongene nenkuntsela ezimbini apha kodwa kufuneke ukuba sikhethe eyona kuntsela ingcono kunenye ukuze kusetyenzwe,kuba asinakukwazi ukuba sibe ngokhwele ecingweni kuyo yonke lento,”utsho uMalema.Umongameli we Cope uMousia Lekota uthi lentsebenziswano izakuvula amathuba okumiselwa korhulumente ongqongqo kweli. 
 Ukanti inkokheli yombutho we DA uMusi Maimane kwelinye icala  usungule urhulumente wentsebenziswano kunye nemibutho emincinci equka iFreedom Front Plus,Congress of the People,United Democratic Movement kunye ne African Christian Democratic Party. ”Akukho sivumelwano sifikelele kuso nombutho we EFF kuphela baqinisekise ukuba baza kusivotela basixhase ngevoti yabo kuphela,”utsho uMaimane. Inkokheli yombutho we Freedom Front-Plus uPeter Mulder kwelakhe icala uthi akuyompazamo ukuzimanya kobu budlelane. ”Sikulungele ukungena kwesisivumelwano nge njongo zokuba kuzuze abantu belilizwe ngobuninzi babo,”uthethe watsho uMulder.I ACDP yona inethemba lokuba ubuqhopholo buzakusitshulwa nengcambu ngenxa yalentsebenziswano.
title: Imibutho emincinci kweli izimanye ne DA

text:
ILIZWI linye, liqhutywa ngemva lumanyano oluthi makehle esikhundleni uMongameli Jacob Zuma. 
Imibutho yezopolitiko ephikisayo kwaneendibanisela ezichasene noZuma, bezingungelene ePitoli ngoLwesithathu kumngcelele omemelela uZuma ukuba ehle esikhundleni. 
UMongameli weUDM uBantu Holomisa, uthi bafuna ukubonisa uZuma neANC ukuba lifikile ixesha lokuba ehle esikhundleni uZuma. 
“Silapha ukuthumela ilizwi, ukuba konakele. Kunjenje kweli lizwe kungenxa kaZuma. Ngoku, siza kuceba indlela yokuya kumkhupha ePalamente eKapa. Siyaya naKwaZulu Natal, siyokubaxelela ukuba akukho ndawo singaxhaywa kuyo,” kutsho uHolomisa. 
UPhumzile Van Damme weDA uthi lo mngcelele awuqhutywa bubuhlanga, koko kukukruquka kwabantu sisikhokelo sikaZuma. 
Inkokeli ye-EFF uJulius Malema uthi baqonde ukuba mabangadlali ngexesha labo, base uxwebhu lwezikhalazo “kumntu ongenabudlelwane neencwadi”. 
“Sifuna ukukhusela ikamva labantwana bethu. Ukuba kuthiwa sinobuhlanga ngenxa yokuba sifuna uZuma ahambe, siyazingca ngobobuhlanga,” utshilo uMalema. 
Ethetha kumbhiyozo wosuku lokuzalwa lweminyaka engamashumi asixhenxe anesihlanu kaZuma, eKliptown eSoweto, ilungu lekomiti embaxa yeANC uNomvula Mokonyane uthi lilungelo labo abantu ukubamba umngcelele.  
“Lilungelo elalwelwa nguMongameli Zuma. Kuxhomekeke kubo ukucinga ukuba bangajikela inkqubo yedemokhrasi kuba uZuma wonyulwe phantsi kwalo nkqubo,” utshilo uMokonyane ngethuba ethetha noonondaba.
title: ‘HAMBA ZUMA’

text:
Xa kudibana iKaizer Chiefs neChippa United emdlalweni ojongwe ngamehlo abomvu kunyanzelekile kubekho eliphumelelayo. Abaqeqeshi bamaqela omabini, uStuart Baxter noGavin Hunt, baphantsi koxinizelelo ngenxa yeziphumo ezingancumisiyo emidlalweni yokuqala yesizini. Amakhosi angene nzima kwiTop 8 kwisizini egqithileyo ngenxa yokungakwazi ukuphumelela imidlalo phantsi kukaHunt. Phambi kokuqala kwesizini, iChiefs ifumene abadlali abatsha ebekucingwa ukuba baza kuyifunqula ukuze idlale ngendlela eyahlukileyo kunesizini egqithileyo. Kusenzima kakhulu kwaye lo imfake engxakini uBaxter ngoba abalandeli abasayiboni eyona nto ayenzayo. 
Nangani iChiefs isatsala nzima – kodwa yena umqeqeshi usenalo ithemba. “Ndiyathemba abalandeli baza kusixhasa bayiqonde nendlela esiyihambayo. Xa benokulixhasa iqela, lingakwazi ukunyusa umxakatho,” utshilo uBaxter ethetha kutshanje. Amakhosi aphumelele umdlalo omnye, adlala ntanganye kwemithathu aze abethwa kwemibini. Noxa ingekaswabuluki nje nayo iChippa United, okuhle ngoHunt kukuba unikwe inkxaso epheleleyo nguMnu. Chippa Mpengesi odume ngokugxotha abaqeqeshi rho emidlalweni yokuqala yesizini. Kulo nyaka wogqithwe yiTS Galaxy, iMarumo Gallants noSwallows FC esezenze iinguqu kubaqeqeshi kule sizini. 
“Ndiyavuma iqela aliqhubi ngendlela eyamkelekileyo – kodwa sinethemba leziphumo ezihle emva kokubona umsebenzi owenziwe ngabaqeqeshi ukusukela oko kuqale isizini. Ndisazibophelele ekumxhaseni umqeqeshi njengokuba ndanditshilo phambi kokuqala kwesizini. Sinqwenela ukubona iqela liphumelela emizameni yalo. Sicela wonke umntu abenomende ngoba thina baphathi siwubonile umsebenzi owenziwa ngabaqeqeshi nabadlali ukusukela ekuqaleni kwesizini,” utshilo uMpengesi kule veki. Kunyanzelekile iChippa iphumelele ukuze ikwazi ukusuka kwindawo embi ekuyo ngoku. Amakhosi aza kuzama ukuphepha ukubethwa nguHunt obewaqeqesha kwisizini egqithileyo. 
Imidlalo yeDStv Premiership: 
Lwesihlanu: Sekhukhune vs Cape Town City @Ellis Park Stadium, 15:30; SuperSport United vs Baroka @Lucas Moripe Stadium, 17:00; Kaizer Chiefs vs Chippa United @FNB Stadium, 17:30 
Cawe: Swallows vs Stellenbosch @Dobsonville Stadium, 15:30
title: UBaxter ungantywiliselwa nguHunt emdlalweni weDStv Premiership ngempelaveki?

text:
Isebe lezeMfundo eMpuma Koloni lithi ukuncipha kwenkxasomali yokuthuthwa kwabafundi iza kuphazamisa inkqubo yokudityaniswa kwezikolo njengoko eli Sebe lizimisele ukuhlengahlengisa inkqubo yezemfundo. 
Oku 
kuvele kwindibano nooNondaba kwiziko iMandla Makupula Institution eMonti ngoLwesibini, nalapho uMphathiswa wezeMfundo uFundile Gade ebechaza ngokulungela kweMpuma Koloni ukuvula izikolo zika2022. UGade uthi la masebe mabini aza kuqinisa iindlela zentsebenziswano ukuze kungabikho nkcithomali. 
Eli sebe belikhuphe umpoposho othi kwiminyaka emithathu ezayo liza kuvala izikolo ezibalelwa kwi2000, ngokuthi lidibanise izikolo ezingenawo kakuhle amanani wabafundi. 
Impumelelo yeli phulo ibigxile kakhulu kwimo yezothutho, ijonge ukuthutha abafundi ekuza kunyanzeleka ukuba baye kwisikolo esikude. 
Kodwa ngokutsho koMphathiswa weli sebe, kulo unyaka le nkqubo iza kuphazamisa kuba isebe alinamali ngokwaneleyo yokuthutha abafundi. 
Kunyaka ophelileyo, iSebe lezoThutho nelisebenzisana nelo lezeMfundo linciphise inani labantwana abathuthwayo ngomyinge ka14 weepesenti ukusuka ku120 000 laya kuthi xhaxhe ku103 000. 
“Sidibene neSebe lezoThutho sabonisana ngendlela esiza kusebenzisana ngayo kulo nyaka ukuqinisekisa ukuba abafundi abayidingayo inkonzo yezothutho bayaxhamla. Sizama kangangoko ukuvala izikroba ezingunobangela wokuba kubekho ilahleko,” utshilo uGade. 
Ukanti umphathiswa wezoThutho kwakweli phondo uWeziwe Tikana-Gxotiwe uthi uza kusungula uphando emva kokuba uphando lwenkampani uEnerst and Young kwakunye noMphicothi Zincwadi befumanise ukuba kukho abanikinkonzo abahlawulwa ngaphaya komsebenzi abawenzayo, ngelixa abanye befumana imali encinci kuleyo ibafaneleyo. 
UTikana-Gxothiwe uthi olunye uphando liyakunceda ekuphuhliseni inkonzo yokuthuthwa kwabafundi ngokuthi livele nesisombululo kwimingeni evezwe luphando oseluqoshelisiwe. 
Bangaphaya kwe800 abafundi abangekabhaliswa, nekulindeleke ukuba babhaliswe emva kokuvulwa kwezikolo. UGade ukwathe isebe lezeMfundo linezithuba ezibalelwa ku54 000 kwizikolo zeli phondo.
title: Isebe lezeMfundo lizimisele ukuhlengahlengisa inkqubo yezemfundo

text:
UKUBA xa ufunda eli nqaku ufumana ubunzima nokonqena, yazi ukuba uphethwe bubuvila, ngokokutsho komfundi ophumelele emagqabini kulwimi lwesiXhosa uSesethu Zweni waseSenyukele Senior Secondary eMaXesibeni (Mount Ayliff). 
UZweni uwongwe ngembasa yokubalasela kwisiXhosa kumsitho wokubhiyozela iziphumo zebakala leshumi elinesibini (Grade 12) obubanjelwe kwihotele i-ICC eMonti kwiveki ephelileyo, emva kokuphumelela ngomyinge ka-94% kwisifundo sesiXhosa. 
Ngunyaka wamashumi amabini anesibini lo, umbhali kwanomakhwekhwetha kwisiXhosa uNelson Njengabantu Yapi, ngokubambisana neSebe lezeMfundo ephondweni, enikeza iwonga kumfundi kaGrade 12 othe wagqwesa kulwimi lwesiXhosa kwiphondo laseMpuma Koloni liphela. 
Ebalisela I’solezwe lesiXhosa, uZweni uthe: “Ndiziva ndonwabe kakhulu leli wonga. Ewe bendiyazi ukuba ndiza kuzuza iziphumo ezincumisayo kwisiXhosa, ngenxa yokuzimisela kwam ekusifundeni nasekusihlalutyeni, kodwa andikhange ndiyicinge eyokuba ndigade ndibengumfundi ogqwesileyo kunabanye.” 
“Ngethuba ndifumana umnxeba ondibizela kumsitho wamawonga wabafundi abaphumelele emagqabini, bendiyazi ukuba sinye isifundo endisiphumelele kunazo zonke – sisiXhosa,” kutsho uZweni. 
UZweni uthi utitshala wakhe wesiXhosa ebemkhuthaza ukuba afunde nangakumbi. 
“Ebeyazi ukuba ndinolwazi oluphangaleleyo kwesi sifundo, ethe gqolo ukundikhuthaza ukuba ndenze nangakumbi.” 
“Into endiyithandayo ngesifundo sesiXhosa kukuba sifundiswa ngolwimi lwethu lwenkobe, nto leyo eyenza lula apha kum ukuba ndazi into ekuthethwa ngayo. 
Nangoku ndiye ndingabakholelwa abantu abantetho isisiXhosa, abathi kunzima ukubhala isiXhosa. Kunzima njani? Kuba lulwimi lwakho olu! Othi isiXhosa sinzima wenziwa nje bubuvila,” kutsho uZweni. 
“Abafundi banako ukusidelela isiXhosa kuba ilulwimi lwabo, kwaye basoloko bekhalaza ngephepha lesibini (imibongo, iinoveli) kwiimviwo zesifundo sesiXhosa besithi linzima. Andiboni nto enzima phaya, kuba kubuzwa le nto uyifundileyo kufunwe ukuba hlalutya.” 
Ngonyaka ka2017, uYapi wathi: “Ixesha lihambile, ndiyaguga ngoku. Iinjongo zokuba ndikhuphe eli wonga, kukuba ndifuna ihlumelo kulwimi lwesiXhosa. Ndiyacela kurhulumente wephondo laseMpuma Koloni, kwanoluntu ngokubanzi ukuba luzinike uxanduva lokukhulisa futhi nokugcina ulwimi lwesiXhosa.” 
“Ndixhalabile kakhulu, kuba ulwimi lakowethu luyakhukuliseka. Masizinike uxanduxa, senze iinzame zokuba luhlale luhleli ulwimi lwethu. Enye into ephinda indixhalabise kukuba abafundi abafumana eli wonga, abalandeli makhondo anesiXhosa xa beseYunivesithi,” watsho uYapi. 
UZweni uthi uzimisele ukwenza ezeNzululwazi kwezeeLwandle iMarine Science, kodwa usalinde iziphumo zesicelo sakhe eyunivesithi.
title: ‘Livila othi isiXhosa sinzima’

text:
INKULUMBUSO yaseMpuma Koloni uPhumulo Masualle ukholelwa ukuba xa into ingonakelanga, ayifanelanga kutshintshwa endaweni yoko kufuneka kuqinisekiswe ukuba kuqhutywa ngalo mqela nempumelelo. 
Le ntetho kaMasualle ikekelela kanye kwiziphumo zebakala leshumi elinesibini (Grade 12) apho iphondo leMpuma Koloni lithe lafumana umyinge ka-70.6% kwiimviwo zika2018. Ezi ziphumo zenze imbali nanjengoko eli phondo lingazange layizuza impumelelo efana nale. 
Kunyaka ophelileyo, uMasualle ebesoloko enethemba lokuba “uzinzo” olukhoyo kwisebe lezemfundo lakuza neziphumo ezihle.  
UMasualle ebekwasoloko ekholelwa ukuba iinguqu zakuza xa kumiliselwe imigaqo hayi xa kujongenwe okanye kutshintshwa iziqu. 
“Uyitshintshelani xa ingonakelanga into. Ungayitshintsha into kuphela xa kukho undonakele. Ndinethemba lokuba izinto ziza kuqhuba ngokwezicwangciso. Umbuso wona uza kutshintsha kweyeSilimela kulo nyaka, kodwa into ebalulekileyo kukuqhuba ngokwezicwangciso zeenkqubo ezimiselwe ukuphucula imfundo,” utshilo uMasualle. 
Izolo amagosa eNdlu yoWiso-Mthetho eBhisho ebethe bhazalala ephondweni ehlola ukulungela kwezikolo umhla wokuqala wokufunda kulo nyaka. 
UMasualle uthi kukho izikolo apho izixhobo zingekafikeleli. “Zizikolwana ezimbalwa kakhulu apho izinto zazo sele zifikelele kuzo. Ngokuqinisekiswa lisebe lezemfundo, zonke izixhobo ebekufanele ukuba zisesikolweni ngomhla wokuvulwa kwezikolo, umhla wamashumi amabini kule nyanga awunakufika ungenzekanga lo msebenzi,” utsho uMasualle. 
“Ndithethile namagosa ezemfundo kuba into esemdleni kum kukuba kwenziwe isicwangciso sokuqinisekisa ukuba umsebenzi omhle osele wenziwe uyaqhuba.” 
Ethetha ngempumelelo ezuzwe liphondo kuGrade 12 ka2018, uMasualle ukhumbule ongasekhoyo uMphathiswa wezeMfundo uMandla Makupula. 
“Le mpumelelo siyiqhwabela izandla kongasekhoyo uMphathiswa wezeMfundo uMandla Makupula. Ndiyamazi ukuba asingomntu othanda ukunconywa kodwa ndiyayazi ukuba ngechulumancile yile mpumelelo. 
“Ngo2016 sahlala phantsi, senza isicwangciso esithi ngo2018 izinto kufuneka zitshintshile kwisebe lezemfundo. Le mpumelelo ifana nesithembiso kubantu baseMpuma Koloni, asikwazi tu ukohlukana nayo. Abantu beli phondo balindele lukhulu,” utshilo uMasualle. 
“Ixesha lokuphuma kweziphumo zikaGrade 12  ibisoloko iyincindi yekhala kubantu abathanda iMpuma Koloni, kodwa ngenxa yomsebenzi wamagosa ezemfundo kwanabafundi bakaGrade 12 ka2018 ngoku sikwixesha lethemba. Ngoku sikwimeko yokulungisa ubume nesidima.” 
Uthi uzinzo esebeni luncedisile kakhulu kwezi ziphumo, “kodwa into esingenoyitshintsha kukuba ixesha lalo mbuso (ka2014-2019) lifikelela esiphelweni ngoku”. 
“Into elindelekileyo kukuba urhulumente okhokelwa yiANC aqhube nalo mqela sele wenziwe. Ngaphandle koko, kwisebe lezemfundo kukho amagosa aqeshwe ngokusigxina nendingenamathandabuzo kwelokuba enza umsebenzi ekudala ewazi.” 
sithandiwe.velaphi@inl.co.za
title: Masualle: Uyitshintshelani xa ingonakelanga!

text:
UCHUKU nentiyo yamakhosikazi aseWhittlesea kunyanzeleke ukuba ixelwe kumapolisa ale ndawo emva kokukruquka kwenkosikazi yelali yale dolophu eyucwa ngamanye amakhosikazi ngenxa yokuba iphila nentsholongwane yesifo sikagawulayo.  
Igama lale lali asinakulixela ukukhusela isidima sale nkosikazi nanjengoko ingezonjongo zayo ukuthiwa pa-ha kwemeko yempilo yayo.  
Inkosikazi eneminyaka engamashumi amane (40) ikhale esimantshiyane ngethuba ibalisela I’solezwe lesiXhosa ngendlela ethe yaphatheka ngayo, ithukwa ngamakhosikazi amabini ale lali ngenxa yokuba iphila nentsholongwane yesifo sikagawulayo.  
Le nkosikazi, etshate nendoda ebhujelwe ngumfazi, ithi iqale ukuba lixhoba lezithuko kwilali yayo ngenyanga kaCanzibe kulo nyaka.  
“Mna nditshate nomyeni sele ebhujelwe ngumfazi, ngoku lo mama ungummelwane uyandibuza ukuba ndiyayazi na ukuba lo mfazi ubhubhileyo womyeni wam wayephila nentsholongwane yesifo sikagawulayo.  
“Into endavele ndambuza yona ke mna kukuba babemvavanyile na igazi ukuze bazi ukuba uphila nentsholongwane yesifo sikagawulayo. Zange andiphendule wavela wahleka lo mama. Kulapho ndaqala khona ukungcikiveka, ndihlekwa ngamakhosikazi amabini alapha elalini, maxa wambi endithuka,” itshilo le nkosikazi, yatsho isithula phezulu isikhalo.  
Le nkosikazi ixelele I’solezwe ukuba iphila nayo intsholongwane yesifo sikagawulayo, noxa nje oku engakuxeleli umyeni wayo. 
 “Ewe ndayokuzivavanya ndafumanisa ukuba ndiphila nentsholongwane kagawulayo, kodwa umyeni wam akayazi lo nto.”  
Uthi wathi emva kokukruquka zizithuko zala makhosikazi, wayokumangala emapoliseni. “Amapolisa azenzile iinzame zokuthibaza la makhosikazi andithukayo kodwa akayeka, aqhuba nokundithuka,” itsho le nkosikazi.  
Le nkosikazi ngenxa yokuziphendulela kwezi zithuko, ibanga ngelithi yabethwa yenye yala makhosikazi. Ikwabanga ngelithi enye kula makhosikazi idlisela ngelithi inyobe ngamawaka amahlanu eerandi (R5 000) enkundleni, ngoko ke ityala alizukuhambela ndawo. 
 La makhosikazi ebevelile enkundleni, kodwa imihla yokuvela kwawo yahlukene. Ngomhla wamashumi amabini anesibini kule nyanga kuza kuvela le nkosikazi ingummelwane wexhoba, ze ngomhla wesine kuvele le nkosikazi ibibethe ixhoba. Ixhoba libanga ngelithi la makhosikazi atshintshe ingxelo enkundleni, esithi athukwe yile nkosikazi imangeleyo. 
 “Bathetha into engekhoyo emva kokundithuka, emva koko  abonqena ukundixelela ukuba banyobe inkundla. Into endiyifunayo mna bubulungisa kuba akekho umntu onelungelo lokundithuka ngempilo yam,” itshilo le nkosikazi. 
 Iinzame zokufumanaa uluvo kwisithethi samapolisa aseWhittlesea uNamhla Mdleleni ziphanzile ngethuba sibhala eli nqaku.  
sithandiwe.velaphi@inl.co.za
title: Usisigculelo sezithuko ophila nogawulayo

text:
UThulani Mbenge uyakhula emanqindini. Kwiveki ephelileyo, le ndodana yaseMdantsane yenze imbali ngokubetha imbethi manqindi yaseMexico engazange yabethwa egama linguDiego Cruz kumlo obukwiholo lembali iEmperor Palace.  
UMbenge uye kumlo nendedeba yaseMexico enethemba lokufumana le ntshinga yeWBC kwididi leWelterweight emva kokuba uDiego Cruz engabufumenanga ubunzima obamkelekileyo esikalini.  
Le mpumelelo izuzwe nguMbenge imfake kuluhlu lweembethi manqindi zeli lizwe loMzantsi Afrika ezifana noo-Azinga Fuzile nezinye ezineentshinga ezimbini ukuya phezulu (Intshinga yoMzantsi Afrika nentshinga yeWBC International). 
UMbenge, 25, ophumelele lo mlo ngamanqaku emva kwemijikelo elishumi elinesibini, ubulele kakhulu umthelekisi wakhe uMnumzana uRodney Berman emva komlo. 
 “Ndiyabulela kuMnu. Rodney Berman ngokundinika eli thuba. Nakumqeqeshi wam uPeter Smith.”  UMbenge uyincomile indlela alwe ngayo uCruz.  “Andifuni ukuxoka, yimbethi manqindi elushica uCruz. Ndifunde lukhulu kulo mdlalo. Ndithi enkosi nakubalandeli bam ngokundixhasa,” uvale ngalo mazwi. 
UMbenge ebesilwa umlo weshumi elinesithathu njengembethi manqindi ehlawulwayo yaye uyiphumelele yonke loo milo.  
Kanti uphulukene nomlo wakhe wesithandathu uDiego Cruz, nobedlala umlo wakhe wamashumi amabini anesithandathu aphumelele elishumi elinezibhozo waze wadlala ntanganye kwemibini. 
Ezinye iziphumo zale tumente: 
UDeeJay Kriel uyikhusele ngempumelelo intshinga yakhe yeWBC International kudidi lweNgcongolo emva kokubetha intshatsheli yoMzantsi Afrika, uXolisa Magusha, ngamanqaku.  
Ibilityeli lesibini enyathelana ngentupha la matyendyana nowokuqala umlo waphunyelelwa kwangulo kaKriel.  
UKevin Lerena ubethe uDimytro Kucher wase-Ukraine ngamanqaku eqinisekisa ukuba uyikhusela ngempumelelo intshinga yakhe ye-IBO kudidi leCruserweight.  
URowan Campbell ubethe uMasixole Botile wazinqandela kumjikelo wesibini kumlo wodidi lweMiddleweight. 
isibhalo@inl.co.za
title: UMbenge yintshatsheli entsha yeWBC evunyiweyo

text:
UGqr. Nokuzola Mndende 
Ndiziva ndingenakuthi cwaka xa ndifumanisa ukuba uNgconde, uTogu, uMzukisi Faleni ongumsasazi kwicandelo lenkolo kuMhlobo Wenene ugqiba kuphumelela izifundo zakhe zobugqirha kula dyunivesithi yaseNtshona-Kapa apha kule yoKwindla. Ndithi kuwe Mkwayi ‘Huntshuuu’ kwedini ungapheleli apho ke uxelele nabanye ukuba yintoni kanye le ubuyiphanda, waze wayihla amahlongwane xa bekutheni kuqala. Uxelele uluntu ukuba yintoni emabayijongisise bayihlalutye kuba kaloku ezinye izinto sithi xa sithetha kweli lethu icala lesintu kuthiwe azibhalwanga. Omnye umntu uyakubuza ukuba yintoni le ebangele ukuba ndingakwazi ukuthi cwaka ngale thisisi yakho ndibe elo xesha ndisithi ndiluKholo Lwemveli qwaba, inyani engasoze ijikwe mntu ke leyo, izizathu zam ke zininzi. 
Njengoko ke sisazi ukuba xa umntu ethweswa ubugqirha (PhD) xa ethe waphumelela kuphando oluthile luze lube nabavavanyi bangaphandle kwedyunivesithi leyo ubufunda kuyo (external examiners) babe besuka apha kweli lizwe lethu (national), kuye, kuphinde kubekhona nabangaphandle koMzantsi, kuze kubekhona nabaphesheya kwezilwandle, bayixikixe nkalo zonke lento uyithethayo baphume ngazwinye. Mna kaloku isupervisor yam yayinguNjingalwazi David Chidester, ezangaphandle yanguNjingalwazi Isabel Phiri waseMalawi noNjingalwazi Jacob Olupona waseNigeria kodwa ozinze eMelika, waze omnye yanguNjingalwazi Rosalind Hackett wakwiDyunivesithi yaseTennesse eKnoxville eMelika. 
UTogu lo uthe noxa bekungelula kuye ukuthetha phandle kubantu baseNtshona abacinga ukuba isintu sethu sasingento phambi kokuba bafike, waphelisa yonke loo nto, banqwala bathi ‘hayi sikuvile Ngconde’. Kaloku kusoloko kusithiwa isiNtu siyacinezela koomama ngaphezu kwezinye iinkolo neenkcubeko ezafikayo apha, bade abanye bathi oomama abantsundu bancedwa kukufika kwesilungu batsho bakhululeka, amampunge odwa. 
Uphando lwakhe ke uTogu luye lwagxininisa kwindlela uYakobi (Jacob) waseBhayibhileni nabanye ootata abayivelela ngayo imontlalo yoomama okanye abantu ababhinqileyo, waze wayiqhathanisa nendlela ukumkani uPhalo wamaXhosa awayeyivelela ngayo imontlalo yoomama ngokwesintu (Comparative analysis between the Biblical Jacob of the Old Testament and Old Testament of King Phalo of AmaXhosa). Uyivelele yacaca gca into yokuba eyethu imontlalo kwantlandlolo noxa utata eyintloko yekhaya ngokwemontlalo yesintu (patriarchy), ibiyinto engacalucaluliyo, umntu ebenendawo yakhe ngokwendlela azelwe ngayo (birthright) nokuba sesiphina isini. Uyayibonakalisa lo kaTogu into yokuba ukumkani uPhalo ebengazange wenza izigqibo yedwa nabantakwabo ebakhuphele ngaphandle oodadewabo noodade boyise. Ude ayicacise into yokuba izinto ebekumelwe zenziwa ngodadobawo ebengazichaphazeli azenze ngokwakhe kuba ebeyazi inkolo yesintu ukuba ithini kwanokuba iziphumo zakuthini xa ephuma ecaleni. 
Uyayibonakalisa lo kaNgconde nento yokuba ngexesha likakumkani uPhalo intlonipho ebantwini abadala kuquka oomama yayiyintsika yesizwe esakhekileyo hayi le yanamhlanje apho ufumanisa ukuba abantu abadala nabangomama bazizigculelo zokunukunezwa, beholongwa esidlangalaleni ngabantu abathi ngamadoda, loo nto beyenza egameni lenkolo eyafikayo yaze yanyhasha ubuntu bomAfrika. Namhlanje sinezidlwengu, ababulali bemiphefumlo yabantu abangakwazi nokuzikhusela phofu besithi baziinkokheli zangomso ezimise ngobudoda bazo. 
Undicubhula xa esithi izinyanya zomzi ontsundu azithi ze zisebenze zibe ziyavuswa kwabafileyo, zisebenza gqathu kula ndawo zikuyo. Yiyo ke le nto ndiyifunde ngomdla omkhulu let hesis yakhe uMkwayi lo kuba uveza iinyani zokuba oomama bacinezelwa yinkcubeko yobukoloniyale (colonial African culture) eyenza uninzi lwamadoda antsundu namhlanje akope zonke ezi mfundiso zoYakobi abe ngathi ayalwa kukho umoya mhla engena ebudodeni. Amadoda anamhlanje athukela ngaphezu koomama. 
Camagu Togu oneendlebe uyakuva abuyele emthonyameni abuze intsusa nonobangela, angxengxeze kuzokulunga isizwe. Ithesis efana nale kaTogu ndiyikhuthaza ukuba ifundwe ukuze ulutsha luzokuvuleka amehlo lubheke phambili luqiqe kakuhle kuzokuphuhla obona bungcambu bobuzwe bethu obusekelwe kwingcambu zethu. Loo nto iyakwenza kucace ukuba lomkhuba wokucinezelwa komama esiXhoseni ngumgqakhwe otata bakudala babenesidima imizi iqinile iluqilima. 
Camagwini. 
Njingalwazi Nokuzola Mndende (PhD in Religious Studies – UCT) ubhala njengomphathi weCamagu Heritage Institute and a scholar of African Theology)
title: HUUUNTSHU! TOGU, GQIRHA MZUKISI FALENI

text:
Phambi kokuba ndityatyadule ngalo mba ndicela ukuqala ndivakalise indlela endicingela ukuba imfundo ingayo okanye ebekufanele ukuba ingayo esizweni. 
Xa isizwe sithumela abantwana baso kumaziko emfundo ndicinga ukuba sikuba iinjongo zazo kukuba sibe nabantu abaza kukwazi ukusombulula iingxaki esihlangabezana nazo nesiza kuhlangabezana nazo. Uya kuzibuza ke nawe mntakwethu ukuba zeziphi ezi ngxaki sijongene nazo njengabantu abamnyama, ingaba uhlobo lwemfundo esilufunxe kumaziko wemfundo lunalo na ulwamvila lokusombulala iingxaki zethu nokusiphuhlisa njengomzi ontsundu? 
Ngala mazwi andizami kujongela phantsi igalelo lemfundo kumzi ontsundu kuba ndiyazi into yokuba ngale mfundo sinezi thwalandwe, kwaye siyakwazi ukuqhakamshelana nezinye izizwe kodwa ngokwam akuphelelanga apho . 
Thina bantu bantsundu sikhulela phantsi kweemfundiso ezimbini. 
Imfundiso yokuqala siyifumana ekhaya, kumalungu osapho, ezihlobeni kunye nasekuhlaleni. 
Le imfundiso yasekhaya inezinto eziyihlobisayo ukuze ibeyiyo, ezinye ngamasiko, izithethe, iinkolo, iinkolelo kunye nenkcubeko. Kodwa ke indlela esizenza ngayo namaxesha ayohluka kwisizwe ngasinye nangokufuthelwa zindawo esihlala kuzo. 
Imfundiso yesibini yile siyifumana kumaziko wemfundo egunyazisiweyo ngurhulumente, olu ke uhlobo lwemfundiso kuthiwa alunakhaya lolomntu wonke, nangona nje mna ndingakholelwa ncam hayi kuba ibuhlabana nale yasekhaya, kodwa kuba ndisazi ukuba mfundiso nganye enikezelwa esizweni isuka kumnombo waso onamagangxa, amachule kunye nendlela yemo mpilo yaso esekelezelwe kwindlela esasijonga ngayo okanye esijonga ngayo impilo. 
Umzekelo, xa sithatha umntu ontsundu ofundiswe ingqiqi buThixo ngokwa sesikolweni esigunyazisiweyo ngurhulumente, ubuya indlela abona ngayo imiba yenkolo ibutshintsha kunangaphambili, umoya wakhe wenkolo wobe sewubufuthelwa zimbono zababhali kunye nezabaxhonxi bakhe, lo nto imenza abebujongeka ngelinye iliso ngabo bangakhange bafumane elo thamsanqa lokuya kufuthelwa zimbono nengcamango zezinye izizwe, naye ngokunjalo ababone abo nesizwe sakhe benkolo imi ndawonye ingakhuliyo, ingahambi namaxesha. 
Umbuzo wam kwakubanjalo uthi ngubani na onoxanduva lokukhulisa inkcubeko, amasiko, izithethe, inkolo yakhe njalo-njalo xa ingengobemi nabahlali besosizwe? 
Le meko iyasiphinda naxa kufanele sixoxe ngophuhliso lwempilo-ntlalo yomntu ontsundu, naxa kufuneka size nezisombululo kwiingxaki esihlangabezana nazo ezinje ngentswela ngqesho, ukungabina lwazi kunye nezifo, singazi nokuba kufanele sisebenzise obuphi ubugcisa, kukho abemveli kunye nesibufumana kumaziko wemfundo . 
Lo nto nje iyodwa inegalelo kwindlela olurhuqa ngayo unyawo uphuhliso kwisizwe sakowethu kuba ixesha elininzi silichithela ekuphicotheni ingxaki de singabi saba nawo amandla wokuza nesisombululo kuba aphelele ekucingeni ingxaki ukuba iyintoni, yenziwe ngantoni, kanjani, khona ingabe ifuna ukungenwa njani kukho ezimfundiso sinazo zimbini? 
Yiyo le nto sisemva kwezinye izizwe ngobuchwepheshe nasekuveliseni iinkcuba-buchopho kuba sime esiphambukeni asazani ukuba singobani, sivela phi, kwaye sisingise phi, singumntu wonke ekuthiwa singuye. 
Xa ndizithoba ii-emere ndithi isizwe esingayihoyanga imbali yaso iye iziphinda-phinde. 
– Bavuyise Raphael Diko
title: IZIMVO:  Ukufa kwesazela somntu ontsundu kwaqala mhla wabeka umcondo esikolweni

text:
Emva kokugqushalaza ixesha elide ngenxa yokunqatyelwa lithuba lokudlala, uJeremy Brockie noGeorge Lebese bade bakhululeka emva kokuvuma kweMamelodi Sundowns ukuba bahambe ngomhla wokugqibela wokubhaliswa nokuthengwa kwabadlali ngamaqela adlala kwiPSL.  
Sekulithuba elide uLebese ezama ukuhamba kwiSundowns kunzima. Ngoku uza kufumana ithuba lokuvuselela ikhono lakhe lebhola ekhatywayo kwenye indawo.  
ULebese washiya iKaizer Chiefs isaqeqeshwa nguSteve Komphela ngelithi ufuna ukuya kwiqela eliza kumnika ithuba lokudlala.  
Izinto azimhambelanga kakuhle kwiSundowns eye yabolekisa ngaye kwiSuperSport United kwisizini egqithileyo, kodwa ngelishwa lakhe, nalapho izinto azimhambelanga kakuhle. Akukacaci ukuba leliphi iqela aza kulidlalela kodwa kulindeleke alifumane ingaphelanga inyanga. 
Naye uBrockie owathengwa kwiSuperSport ngezigidi zeerandi kudala ekufuna ukuhamba ngenxa yokunqatyelwa yimidlalo.  
Ngoku uza kudlalela iMaritzburg United emva kokubolekiswa ngaye yiSundowns. Kucacile oko kwenzeke ngenxa yokunqaba kwamaqela ebenokumelana nemali ebethengiswa ngayo.  
UBrockie uzenzele igama njengomnye wabadlali abaphambili eMzantsi Afrika kwicala lokufaka amagowuli esekwiSuperSport.  
Ukufika kwakhe kwiTeam of Choice kwakuba luncedo kakhulu kuyo emva kokusinda ezembeni kwisizini egqithileyo.  
“Liye lavela ithuba lokufumana uBrockie ngemboleko. Emva kokubonisana nomqeqeshi wethu, siye savana ukuba uBrockie ngumdlali ofunekayo kwiqela lethu,” utshilo uQuintin Jetto, umanejala weMaritzburg United kwincoko yakhe neKickOff. 
“Bekungekho nzima kwaphela ukumfumana uBrockie ngoba omabini amaqela ebezimisele ukuthengiselana. UJeremy ufuna ukudlala, iSundowns ifuna adlale nathi siyamdinga umdlali onokufaka amagowuli. Naye umdlali uthe uyakufuna ukuza kuthi,” utshilo uJetto.  
Abadlali abaliqela abafana noAubrey Ngoma, uLucky Mohomi, uJose noAli Meza ababhaliswanga yiSundowns. Kunokwenzeka bakhululwe ukuba akubangakho qela elifuna ukubathenga.
title: Ekugqibeleni, uBrockie noLebese bade bakhululeka

text:
Abadlali abaziwayo abakhululwe yiKaizer Chiefs kwinyanga ephelileyo abafana no-Itumeleng Khune, uMandlala Masango kunye noTefu Mashamaite akukacaci nangoku ukuba bayophelela phi na njengoko bekhululekile ukuba bazibandakanye nalo naliphi na iqela abalifunayo. Ingxelo ithi yena uMasango uza kubuyela kwiChiefs. kodwa kuthe cwaka ngekamva likaKhune obesoyanyaniswa neDowns. Kanti yena uMashamaite usame nematha emva kweendaba ebezimoyamanisa neqela laseMelika kwiveki ephelileyo. Ukanti ifolosi  yeBafana Bafana uKatlego Mphela uyekile ukuziqeqesha neqela leYunivesithi yasePitoli. Ingxelo ejikeleza kumajelo eendaba idiza ukuba akubonakali ngathi  uMphela nobekhe wabonakala emabaleni eTuks ebutsheni bale veki angatyikitywa  leli qela. 
Kuvakala ukuba uMphela khange abonakale emabaleni kwezi ntsuku zimbini  zidlulileyo. Ukanti iMaritzburg United ngomso iza kubhengeza umntu oza kungena endaweni  kaSteve Komphela njengomqeqeshi. UMandla Ncikazi nobencedisa uKomphela njengomqeqeshi nguye ekukholeleka ukuba angavala esi sithuba, aze ancediswe nguFadlu  Davids. 
IMaritzburg United ishiyeke ingena mqeqeshi emva kokushiya kukaKomphela ngoku ngxamisekileyo kweli qela.  IMaritzburg United ibilindele ukubhatalwa nguKomphela, kwaye ijonge ukuthabatha  ingalo yomthetho. “Andinakutsho ukuba ngubani oza kuba ngumqeqeshi omtsha, kodwa  siza kubhengeza yonke into namhlanje xa sikhupha ingxelo yoonondaba,” utshilo  uKadodia.  Ukanti * -Ernst  Midderndorp nobesandula kugxothwa yiChippa United phantsi kwezityholo zokunga  hloniphi abadlali nabalawuli kweli qela kukho amarhe ebekhe amdibanisa nento  yokuba angaphinda abuyele kweli qela. UBennett Chenene usiwe kwiqela labancinci  leSupersport United. 
Ukanti uChenene kunye noThabiso Nkoana kuthiwa baziqeqesha  phantsi kweqela labakhulayo, nelijongwe nguRicardo Katza. UChenene ebekhe  wadityaniswa nokuya kwiqela lePolokwane  City njengenxalenye  yotshintsho lwabadlali. Nalapho aMatsatsantsa ebejonge ukufumana uPuleng  Tlolane. Ukanti inzalelwane yase Zimbabwe  edlala kwiqela leKaizer Chiefs uOvidi Karur, unikwe ithuba lokuba atsale umdla  womqeqeshi omtsha uSteve Komphela. UKaruru besele kuvakele ukuba ngomnye  wabadlali iChiefs eza kubolekisa ngabo kwamanye amaqela e-PSL.  
Le dyongwana  nebisuka kudlala eBelgium ifike ekuqaleni kwesizini ephelileyo kwiChiefs,  inikwe ithuba lokuba isebenzise eli khefu ukutsala uSteve acinge kabini ngokumsa  kwenye indawo. Enyanisweni uKaruru khange afumane thuba lokudlala kakhulu  kule sizini iphelileyo. Uqale kwimidlalo emibini wangena phakathi kowesithathu  isizini yonke. Lo mdlali uneminyaka engamashumi amabini anesithandathu, odlala  esuswini uza kube nethemba lokufumana ithuba ebaleni kule sizini.
title: Gqaba-gqaba kwiPSL

text:
EMVA kwethutyana abathandi bakaOros Mampofu bengasomboni koomabonakude babo, baza kuchulumanca kukumbona ngale ntlwa yanamhlanje kwiRhythm City. 
  
UMampofu osandul’ ukubangutata kusana oluyintombazana, uza kube ebukelwe ngabathandi beRhythm City ngoLwesine, umhla we16 kuCanzibe. 
Uza kudlala indawo yegatyana laseMpuma Koloni elinguBanele, osapho lwakhe luxhomekeke kwimali yesibonelelo sikarhulumente ukuze luphile. 
  
UBanele unomdla kwimbali yamandulo, ingakumbi eyaseAfrika kwaye ke ibali lakhe liqala kanye emva kokufumana ibhasari yokufunda kwiYunivesithi yaseRhawutini. 
UBanele ngowokuqala kusapho lwakhe ukuya eYunivesithi, oku kulithamsanqa kuye kodwa kukwabeka uxinizelelo olungaphaya nanjengoko usapho lwakhe lonke lujonge kuye. 
Ukubeka isonka etafileni uwedwa ayiyondlwan’ iyanetha, ngoku uBanele uzibona esebenza njengomqokeleli wezinto ezisebenzileyo ukuze ziphinde zisetyenziswe (recycle) ukuze athumele imali ekhaya. 
  
“Ndiyavuya kakhulu ukuzibandakanya neRhythm City ndidlale indawo kaBanele. UBanele usibonisa izinto esihlangabezana nazo, ingakumbi singabafundi. Ndiziva ndithobekile kukunikwa le ndima,” kutsho uMampofu. 
  
Ingaba ke ngoku uBanele uza kumelana njani nolu xinizelelo lungaka? 
Ungaphoswa yiRhythm City ngentsimbi yesixhenxe kwi-etv.
title: Baza konwabela uOros kwiRhythm City namhlanje

text:
INKUNDLA yamatyala engingqi yaseGcuwa igwebe indoda enamashumi amane anesibini ubudala emva kokuba le ndoda ifunyenwe  inetyala lokudlwengula umntwana wodade wayo oneshumi elinesihlanu leminyaka ubudala. 
Le ndoda iza kuchitha iminyaka esibhozo entolongweni. 
Isithethi samapolisa aseGcuwa neziphaluka uKapteni Jackson Manatha sithi umakhulu wexhoba, okwangumama kogwetyiweyo  uthe emva kokufumana ezi ndaba zokuba umzukulwana wakhe ulixhoba lokudlwengulwa wazisa emapoliseni. 
Oku kwenzeka kwinyanga yoKwindla ngo2017 kwilali yakuKhabakazi, eThafalofefe kuCentane. 
Ityala lavulwa kuCentane ze lathunyelwa kwicandelo elijongene nokukhusela abantwana abaphethwe gadalala kwakunye namanina eGcuwa. 
Ogwetyiweyo akachazwanga ngegama ngenjongo yokukhusela ixhoba.  
—
title: Ugwetyelwe ukudlwengula umtshana wakhe!

text:
UWelcome Madoda Yose, 60, ojongene netyala lokubulala owayencuma naye kudala uLindelwa Peni, ngethuba evele phambi kwenkundla izolo eMonti, uxelele igqwetha lakhe ukuba akayifuni ibheyile.  
UYose bekulindeleke ukuba afake isicelo sebheyile izolo. INkundla iye yalimisa ityala ilimisela umhla weshumi elinesithandathu kwinyanga kaOkthobha.  
Le ndoda, nebisebenza njengomqhubi wezithuthi zikawonkewonke eMonti, ijongene netyala lokubulala uPeni ngesizathu esingekaziwa yinkundla nalusapho.  
UPeni wabhaqwa emva kweentsuku ezintathu wabe egqityelwe ukubonwa ekhwela kwikhwantam yale ndoda.  
Ingxelo eyaphuma kwilungu losapho ithi sele beneminyaka emihlanu bengasancumelani ixhoba nale ndoda, kwaye obanjiweyo ebehlala nenkazana yakhe.  
Usapho luthi nalo lusothukile sesi sihelegu. UPeni wabhaqwa kwihlathi laseChicken Farm ngaseMdantsane enenxebakazi emva kwendlebe kwaye nemilenze sele ityiwe zigrogro zehlathi.  
Wathathwa ngamapolisa emva kokuba le ndoda ichazile ukuba iwuse phi umzimba wexhoba.  
Amanina kwakunye namadoda emibutho eyohlukeneyo ebengungelene nayizolo njengeveki ephelileyo phambi kwale nkundla yaseMonti bezokuxhasa usapho lakwaPeni.  
Bebekwalwela nokuba inkundla imnike isigwebo esiqatha obuleleyo. UPeni uyangcwatywa ngoMgqibelo kwikhaya lakhe kwaWelithinta eTsholomnqa.  
Ngasemva ushiya iintwazana zakhe ezimbini, oosisi bakhe kwakunye nomama wakhe ohlutshwa sisifo seswekile.  
Kusenjalo, kwilali yakwaMdeni eGcuwa kubulewe owasetyhini onamashumi amathathu anesibhozo naye ebulawa yindoda ekuvakala ukuba wayencuma nayo kwiminyaka edlulileyo.  
Ixhoba libulewe ngoMgqibelo. Ingxelo ephuma kuCol Tembinkosi Kinana ithi ixhoba libhaqwe yindoda encuma nexhoba emva kokuba engabambi fowuni yakhe.  
Le ndoda ithe lakungayibambi ifowuni ixhoba yayokukroba kowalo yafika yabona loo mbono sele sibhubhile isithandwa sayo kwaye sibotshelelwe izandla sinamanxeba okuhlatywa. 
 Umrhanelwa ubanjiwe ulinde usuku lwakhe lokuvela ezinkundleni. UMkomishinala wephondo uNjengele Liziwe Ntshinga uzikhalimele ezi zehlo zithe gqolo zisenzeka zokubulawa kwamanina.  
Ukwaqhwabele izandla amapolisa aseGcuwa ngokuthi akhawuleza abamba orhanelekayo.
title: Akayifunanga ibheyile obuleleyo eMonti

text:
Umdlali-siswini omtsha, uBhongolethu Jayiya, uthi ukudlalela iqela lebhola ekhatywayo elifana neKaizer Chiefs yayiliphupha lakhe esemncinane. Njengokuba etyikitye isivumelwano sengqesho namhlanje – kuye kufana nokuzalisekiswa kwephupha lakhe. Amakhosi abhengeze lo kaJayiya njengomdlali wawo kwikhasi lonxibelelwano uTwitter namhlanje. Oku kulandele iingxelo ezithe ndii ezithi lo mdlali ufunwa ngamaqela amakhulu afana neKaizer Chiefs, iMamelodi Sundowns ne-Orlando Pirates. 
UJayiya udlalele iCape Town City kwisizini ephelileyo – kodwa iye yamkhulula emva kokungavumelani naye kwiingxoxo ezithe zakhokelela ekukhululweni kwakhe. Mithathu iminyaka uJayiya azakuyihlala kwiChiefs. “Ndaqala ukuva ngomdla wayo iChiefs ekupheleni kwesizini yePSL ka-2016/17. Iphupha lam lobuntwana lizalisekisiwe namhlanje kwaye ndonwabile kakhulu. Ndingxamele ukudlala ebaleni kwaye ndizimisele ukulincedisa eli qela ukuze libuyele kwiintsuku zalo zolonwabo,” utshilo uJayiya. 
Nangona lo mdlali engayidlalanga yonke imidlalo yeCitizens – kodwa wazenzela imbali ngokufaka amagowuli amathandathu kwimidlalo ayidlalileyo. Eminye yemidlalo awagqwesa kuyo ngulowo wafaka amagowuli amathathu kuwo eyedwa xeshikweni iCity idlala neChippa United kulo nyaka. “Besisoloko sixoxa noBhongo kwezi veki zimbini zidlulileyo. Sithethe neCape Town City kuqala ethe yasinika ingxelo epheleleyo ngalo mdlali. Siye saqwalasela izinto ezithile apha kuye phambi kokumthatha,” utshilo uBobby Motaung kwingxelo ebhaliweyo ekhutshwe yiChiefs. 
 
Camaldine Abraw of Kaizer Chiefs challenged by Traore Moussa of Asec Mimosas during the 2016 CAF Champions League football match between Kaizer Chiefs and Asec Mimosas at the FNB Stadium in Johannesburg, South Africa on March 12, 2016 ©Samuel Shivambu/BackpagePix 
Ukufika kukaJayiya kulandela ukutyikitywa kwabadlali ababini uTeenage Hadebe obedlalela iChicken Inn noPhilani Zulu obedlalela iMaritzburg United. Kwangaxeshanye, Amakhosi akhulule uCamaldine Abraw obeyifolosi yeli qela kwiisizini ezimbini ezidlulileyo. Nangona iChiefs seyibhengeze abadlali abathathu ukuzothi ga ngoku – kodwa kulindeleke yongeze abanye abadlali phambi kokuvulwa kwesizini entsha.
title: Bhongolethu Jayiya: Ibiliphupha lam ukudlalela iKaizer Chiefs!

text:
AKUSENTSUKU zingaphi imvumi yeAfroPop, uNtando Bangani, ikhuphe ukracaza wecwecwe lesibhozo elikwabalisa ngothando. 
UBangani udize ezi ndaba kutshanje ngethuba etyelele izakhiwo zephephandaba I’solezwe eMonti, nalapho asibalisele ngengoma ethi ‘Mbali’ ekweli cwecwe aliphekayo. 
Uthi kule ngoma ubalisa ngobomi bokukhula kwakhe esoyika ukuzibika emantombazaneni, namanye amabali angothando wabanye abantu. 
“Ndenza ingoma yesibhozo ngoku. Ndifuna ukwenza iingoma ezilishumi elinesibini, ndicaphula kwezo zakudala ndizithandayo. 
“Ndibalisa amabali angam nalawo ndiwava kwabanye abantu ndiwadibanise, ndiphume nengoma,” kutsho uBangani. Simbuza ngomculo awumamelayo, uthe iingoma nesingqi sikaSjava asithandabuzeki. “Nokuba ungavala amehlo, uSjava soze ungamazi kuba unesingqi sakhe esohlukileyo, nongasoze usiphazamise nayo nayiphina imvumi. Yiyo loo nto kwicwecwe lam elizayo ndizixelele ukuba mandikhe nditshintshe kulo Ntando waziwayo noye ngelinye ixesha angohluki kwabanye.” 
UBangani uthi uRobbie Malinga ngunobangela wokuba acule umculo wothando. 
“Xa bedibana nam ndandingekho kumculo wothando nokucula ngesiXhosa. Yonke le nto ndiyiqale ngo2002 ukudibana kwam nabo, ndaze ndakhupha icwecwe lokuqala ngo2003.” 
UBangani uthi nangona kulungile nje ukucula ngezothando, kodwa kukho izinto ezibalulekileyo ebomini ezingezinye. Ubalise ngecwecwe lakhe elithi ‘Mayibuye’ alikhuphe kunyaka ophelileyo, elibalisa ngedabi elithe mbende eli loMzantsi Afrika. 
“Eli cwecwe lichukumisa umcimbi obalulekileyo eluntwini, umcimbi womhlaba. Asokuze kuthethwe ngomhlaba nje, loo nto ithetha ukuba umhlaba ukukuphila kuthi,” utshilo. 
“Abantu badinga ukubanomhlaba ukuze bakwazi ukuphila, de baphilele nezizukulwana zabo ezizayo,” ubuye watsho. 
Le nzalelwane yaseBhofolo eyaziwa ngeAfroPop, ivakalise ukuba umculo awumanga ndawonye, kwaye uthi naye njengemvumi kufanele ahambe namaxesha. 
“Ndiyayithanda iAfroPop kodwa ndicinga ukuba ifanele noko itshintshe ngoku, makubekho umfutho ongomnye ngoku,” kubalisa uNtando. 
Uthi kwicwecwe lakhe elilandelayo angathanda ukusebenza nezinye iimvumi. Ubalule uThandiswa Mazwai, uRingo Madlingozi noZonke Dikana njengabasengqondweni yakhe. 
Uyakuva kwangathi xa icwecwe liphumile! 
simphiwe.freddie@inl.co.za
title: Lisendleleni icwecwe lesibhozo likaNtando

text:
Abafana Bes’thende bayantwizisa emva kokuba bekhutshiwe kwiNedbank Cup. Iqela likaSteve Komphela likhutshwe ziidyongo, iVaal University of Technology, ephumelele ngo’6-5 kumapela emva kokuba umdlalo uphele ebambene amaqela ngamagowuli amabini macala (2-2) eDobsonville Stadium namhlanje. INedbank iyaziwa njengelona khuphiswano olushiya abantu bebambe ongezantsi. Amaqela amakhulu asoloko ebangamaxhoba wamaqela amancinci adlala kumanqanaba asenzantsi. Namhlanje iGolden Arrows ibe liqela lokuqala elidlala kwi-Absa Premiership elikhutshwe liqela elidlala kwiSAB League. UKomphela unike abadlali abaninzi abangaqhelanga ukudlala ithuba lokuqaala umdlalo namhlanje – kodwa kuye kwacaca okokuba ubanike ngosuku olubi. 
Phambi komdlalo, kubekho ukutsarhana ngamazwi phakathi kukaStanley Nkoana weVUT noKomphela. UNkoane uthe uza kubetha uKomphela nesosilungu sakhe esikhulu. Abadlali beVaal bathezele emnxebeni kwangoko emdlalweni; ngomzuzu wesine bebehamba phambili ngegowuli elifakwe nguLeuba Tema. Bazamile ukunyusa umxakatho Abafana Bes’thende – kodwa yabe imile ithe gomololo iVaal University. Ufake igowuli lokulinganisa uSibusiso Mokondo emva kokufumana ibhola kuSibusiso Sibeko. Kuthe sekungaseni, uMichael Gumede  ubeke phambili iArrows ngegowuli alifake sekushiyeke imizuzu emine kuphele umdlalo. UReitumetse Hlongwane ufake elokulinganisa kushiyeke imizuzu emibini qha kuphele umdlalo atsho amaqela abambana ngo’2-2. Iphumelele kumapenela iVUT ngo’6-5. Kweminye imidlalo, AmaZulu avuthululwe ngo’4-1 yiBloemfontein Celtic. Wona Amavarara abethe iSuper Eagles ngo’1-0.
title: USteve Komphela woyiswe ziidyongo ezidlala kwaSAB League

text: Le yimifanekiso ethathwe kule mpelaveki, I’solezwe lesiXhosa
title: NgoLwesihlanu wale veki iphelileyo kuvulwe le nyanga yoMsintsi, ekwayeyezokhenketho, ngumasipala ombaxa waseBuffalo City

text:
Amabutho akhe phantsi isitya sigcwele nangona ibingawo adlale umdlalo oncomekayo. Ekugqibeleni, iWarriors FC yeyona ekwazileyo ukuphumelela umdlalo ngamagowuli amabini kwelinye (2-1) emdlalweni weDStv Compact Cup obushushu ngendlela emangalisayo eMoses Mabhida Stadium ngorhatya lwanamhlanje. Ukuphumelela kwayo iWarriors FC kuthetha ukuthi iza kudibana neCoastal United ebethe iDinaledi FC ngamagowuli amathathu eqandeni emdlalweni wokuqala weDStv Compact Cup. Nangona Amabutho ewe phantsi kwiinzame zawo zokuya kumjikelo wokugqibela weDStv Compact Cup – kodwa ngawona adlale umdlalo ongcono. 
Oyena mdlali obe ngumqobo endleleni yaMabutho ibe ngu-Itumeleng Khune – ofumene ithuba elihle lokuvuselela isakhono sakhe sakubamba ezipalini. Isigaba sokuqala siphele iWarriors ihamba phambili ngegowuli elifakwe nguSiyethemba Sithebe – obinze ngomkhonto ekhaya ngempazamo. Amazamile Amabutho ukuhlasela esebenzisa uRitchie, uPeprah noMmondi – kodwa uHappy Jele, uNjabulo Ngcobo noThabo Matlaba bebevale mba. Amaqela abuyele ebaleni kwisigaba sesibini umfutho uthande ukuba phezulwana. Ilelo nelo iqela belifuna ukuphumelela. Abadlali baMabutho, bekhokelwa nguPule Mmodi, bebeyinto ibila kwiWarriors FC ehlangulwe nguKhune amatyeli amaninzi. 
Emva kwethuba abadlali bezama, uNkosinathi Sibisi ufake igowuli lokulinganisa. Afumene amandla Amabutho ngakumbi okuhlasela – kodwa umdlalo ude waya ekugqibeleni engakwazanga ukufumana igowuli lempumelelo. Ukungena kukaFortune Makaringe noRuzaighh Gamildein kuwufunqule umdlalo weWarriors FC eye yafumana igowuli elifakwe nguMonnapule Saleng umdlalo usiya ekupheleni. Ngoku iWarriors FC iza kulungiselela ukulwela isigidi sonke serandi xa idibana neCoastal United emdlalweni wokugqibela kwiveki ezayo. 
Warriors: Khune, Njabulo Ngcobo, Mako, Jele, Matlaba, Lorch, Nkosingiphile Ngcobo, Blom, Hotto, Dolly, Peprah 
Amabutho: Mothwa, Xoki, Sibisi, Ritchie, Dube, Memela, Qalinge, Potsane, Claasen, Letoalo, Mulenga.
title: Amabutho awe phantsi elwile kwiWarrios FC isindiswe nguKhune

text:
UXolisani “Nomeva” Ndongeni akanawo umnqweno wokulwa no-Azinga Fuzile onyukela kudidi lweLightweight.  
La matyendyana akhulele phantsi kwesandla sikamanejala ka-Azinga Fuzile, uMzamo Njekanye, eDuncan Village Boxing Association (DVBA). 
 Ngonyaka ka-2015, uNdongeni wemka eDVBA, emva kokulwa imilo elishumi elinesixhenxe. Wazimanya neHotbox Gym, eRhawutini, phantsi kwesandla sikaCollin Nathan. 
OkaNdongeni uthi kunganzima ukuvuma ukulwa no-Azinga Fuzile.  
“Akukho mbethi manqindi ndiyoyikayo – kodwa andinawo umnqweno wokulwa no-Azinga Fuzile. Ndimthatha njengomninawe wam uFuzile ngoba sisuka kude sobabini. Ukhulele phambi kwam. Ukuba kunyanzekile ukuba silwe, kungafuneka ibenkulu inzuzo kulo mlo,” utshilo uNdongeni. 
Le ndedeba ikholelwa ukuba ukuxhimfana kwezona mbethi manqindi ezinesosakhono zaseMzantsi Afrika kunciphisa amathuba okuba neentshatsheli zehlabathi.  
“Ndiyavuma kugcwele ompondozihlanjiwe kudidi lweLightweight, kodwa ukuxangxathana kwethu sodwa kunciphisa amathuba okuvelisa iintshatsheli zehlabathi,” utshilo uNdongeni. 
Nangona echasene nokuthelekiswa kweembethi manqindi zaseMzantsi Afrika ezikwizinga eliphezulu, uNdongeni uthi akayoki nenye.  
“Ewe, ukuxhimfana kwethu sodwa akulincedi ilizwe, kodwa andoyiki nanye imbethi manqindi,” itshilo le nzalelwane yakwaBhaca. 
UNdongeni, 28, unqwenelele impilo entle uSimphiwe Vetyeka osesibhedlele emva kokutshayiswa yimoto kwekaTshazimpunzi.  
“Ibihlungu into eyehlele ubhuti Simphiwe [Vetyeka], makakhawuleze aphile,” utshilo uNdongeni. 
Le ntandane yabalandeli bamanqindi ezinze eMonti ithi iphupa layo kukuqabela eqongeni nentshatsheli yeWBO kwihlabathi uRay Beltran.  
“Iphupha lam kulo nyaka kukulwa nentshatsheli yeWBO, uRay Beltran”. 
UNdongeni akakoyiswa kwimilo engamashumi amabini anesine asele eyilwile njengembethi manqindi ehlawulwayo.
title: Unomeva uthi akafuni ukulwa noFuzile

text:
Uchacha kuhle kwisibhedlele saseMthatha iBedford uNkosi Nonkonyana, emva kokungeniswa kuso kulandela ukubandakanyeka kwakhe kwingozi yemoto, ngenjikalanga yangoCawe. 
Ngokwengxelo lo kaNonkonyana ugaxeleke kule ngozi ekunye nomqhubi wakhe, esendleleni ebuya eMthatha, esingise kwikhaya lakhe eliseFlagstaff. 
Isakhwankqisekile indlu yeenkosi zemveli eMpuma Koloni zindaba zokulimala kwale nkosi ekwalibambela nobhala kule ndlu. 
Usihlalo wendlu yeenkosi zemveli eMpuma Koloni uNkosi Ngangomhlaba Matanzima uthe, bothuke kakhulu beziinkosi emva kokufumana ezindaba kodwa zehla izibilini bakufumanisa ukuba noko akalimalanga ngamandla.  
“Noko uyathembisa kuba uyazithethela kwaye utsho ukuba akukubanga kakhulu,” uthethe watsho uNkosi Ngangomhlaba.  
Uqhube wathi, “Besikunye kwiintlanganiso kwaye ziseninzi izinto ezidinga ubukho bakhe kanti nomsebenzi wakhe mnintsi kakhulu. Simnqwenelela ukuba aphile ngokukhawuleza khon’ ukuze abuyele enkomeni.” 
Ubongoze uluntu ukuba luqaphele ezindleleni maxa onke, esithi malithobele  imithetho yezendlela ngamaxesha onke. 
Isithethi sesebe lezeMpilo kweli phondo uSiyanda Manana ungqinile ukuba uNkosi Nonkonyana uchacha kuhle kwisibhedlele saseBedford.
title: Ugaxeleke engozini uNkosi Mwelo Nonkonyana

text:
EMVA kokuphakamisa igama lakhe ngengoma ethi Africa Unite kumculo weKwaito, uNavada uphinde wabuya nengoma entsha kwakhona. 
Ingoma yakhe ethi ‘Umincil’ uBaby’ sele ifumaneka kumaqonga omnatha athengisa iingoma. 
Le ngoma ibalisa ibali leqabane elinovalo kuba libona uqhogwano phakathi kwesithandwa salo nalowo esisebenza naye. 
“Sukoyika kuba ubona ndisebenza nomnye umntu kuba ungazi okuqhubeka phakathi kwethu,” kucacisa uNavada ngale ngoma, esithi abathandanayo badinga ukuthembana naphantsi kweyiphi na imeko. 
UNavada, ogama lakhe lokwenene linguSiyabulela Joni, ongumyeni notata, waqala ukucula kwiminyaka engaphaya kweshumi eyadlulayo. 
Wangena kwezomculo ngokuqala ngokuqeqesha abantwana abaselula ngomdaniso. 
Ubalisa athi kwaphambi koko ifuthe besele livakala. “Ndandiye ndikhalise umculo ndiphinde ndiwujayivele,” esitsho ngoncumo. 
Uthi amathuba waqala ukuwafumana phantsi kwesandla esiluqilima segqala lezolonwabo eMpuma Koloni uKoko “K.K” Godlo. 
Icwecwe lakhe elithi ‘Africa Unite’ elaliphethe umyalezo ohlanganisa ama-Afrika ngexesha lezixholoxholo zeXenophobia ka2008, lamphathela imbasa yeBest Dance Song kwiKumkani FM Music Awards neyalandelwa yiBest Kwaito Song kwiiECMA ngo2015. 
Ezinye iingoma eyaziwa ngazo le mvumi yakuQoboqobo ziquka Incindi, Esontweni, Ebumnandini, Lobola, Bulisa, Wintersummer, nezinye. 
Usebenze neemvumi ezifana noSuper, Mavie M, Cee *  Gee, DJ Mnce noCrazy Tulz ukubalula kwabambalwa. 
Kule ngoma ethi ‘Umincil’ uBaby’ usebenze nemvumikazi uZoe Daka. 
UNavada ucela inkxaso ukuze abenako ukushicilela ividiyo yale ngoma. 
Ungancokola naye kwikhasi likaFacebook elithi: Iphupha Productions. 
simphiwe.freddie@inl.co.za
title: Ingoma kaNavada imemelela ukuthembana kwizithandani

text:
UGqirha uMhlobo Jadezweni oligqala lokufundisa isiXhosa esikolweni naseYunivesithi ukusukela ngo1975, usiqhwabela izandla isigqibo sorhulumente weMpuma Koloni sokuba kuqaliswe ukubuza imibuzo ngesiXhosa abafundi bebanga leshumi kulo nyaka. 
UGqr Jadezweni sele esidla umhlalaphantsi emva kokujikeleza kumaziko emfundo esezantsi ukuya kwaphakamileyo efundisa, ekhusela, ekwathethelela ulwimi lwesiXhosa. 
“Uninzi lootitshala beMpuma Koloni ngamathetha siXhosa, ingakumbi kwizikolo eziza kuchaphazeleka, ngoko ayintshanga into yokuba abantwana beza kubuzwa ngesiXhosa, abasazi isiNgesi kakade aba bantwana nicinga ukuba bazi isiNgesi,” uthethe oko uJadezweni. 
Uthi okona kuza kunceda abafundi nootitshala kukwamkela nokuthanda ulwimi lwabo lwenkobe, isiXhosa. 
“Kufuneka bayazi le nto ifundwayo, beyilandela ngolwimi lwesiXhosa, abaguquli beencwadi kufuneka bavelise iincwadi ezifanelekileyo ukuncedisa eli phulo lihle kangaka,” utsho uJadezweni. 
Lo kaJadezweni ebephakathi kwezifundiswa ebezijijisana nolwimi lwesiBhulu kwiyunivesithi yaseStellebosch eKapa, enyanzelisa ukuba kufundiswe, kubhalwe, kuthethwe isiXhosa kwela ziko lesiBhulu. 
“Ndivuya kakhulu ngenxa yoku kuba silwe kakhulu eStellenbosch kwango1990, sisilwela ulwimi lwesiXhosa, ukusukela ngo1996 ukuya ku1997 saqala ukukhupha izidanga zeMasters ngesiXhosa ngenxa yelo dabi eStellenbosch,” uqhayise watsho uJadezweni. 
Oligosa eliphezulu kwiSebe leMfundo eMpuma Koloni, uMahlubandile Qwase, kwiveki ephelileyo uxelele inginginya yezifundiswa, abafundi nootitshala ukuba isiXhosa siza kusetyenziswa ukubuza abafundi imibuzo kwibanga leshumi kulo nyaka. UJadezweni uthi nangona ikho imicelimngeni eliza kudibana nayo eli phulo, kodwa liza kuphumelela. 
“Owokuqala umcelimngeni ngowokuba abazali, ootitshala nabafundi baza kulujongela phantsi ulwimi lwabo, kanti urhulumente uncedisana nabo. Okwesibini abakwazi ukubhala isiXhosa aba bantwana, babhala izivakalisi namagama angaphelelanga, ezo zizinto ezifuna ukuqwalaselwa kusaqalwa,” utsho. 
Ibhodi ejongene neelwimi zeli iPan South African Languages Board iliqhwabele izandla eli nyathelo lorhulumente weMpuma Koloni. Usihlalo obambeleyo kule Bhodi, uPreetha Dabadeen, uthethe wathi: 
“SiyiPan South African Languages Board siyasamkela esi sibhengezo senziwe ngurhulumente wephondo leMpuma Koloni, akwaba namanye amaphondo ebenokuzeka mzekweni. Oku kumele ukuba kuqale kumabanga asezantsi esikolweni,” utshilo uDabadeen. 
Kukho uluvo lokuba ukubhalwa kwezi mviwo ngesiXhosa kuyakunceda iphondo leMpuma Koloni ukuba liphucule iziphumo zebanga leshumi. IMpuma Koloni ihleli kwindawo yesiBhozo ngokoluhlu lokuphumelela kwabafundi bebanga leshumi kuzwelonke. 
“Ndifundise isiXhosa eJamani, abantu bezinye iintlanga bayasamkela isiXhosa. Aba bantwana kufuneka basamkele isiXhosa, kamva kufuneka benziwe uvavanyo lomsebenzi kwangolwimi lwesiXhosa,” utsho uJadezweni.
title: ‘Abasazi kakade isiNgesi aba bantwana’

text:
WAYEYOKUKHUPHA izinyo kwisibhedlele saseCecilia Makiwane eMdantsane ngo2002, kodwa endaweni yokuba aphumzeke kwiingqaqambo zezinyo, uPriscilla Tobeka Jantjies (45) uthi wavela akavaleka mlomo, ulwimi lwakhe lwashwabana latshona emqaleni. 
UJanjties uthi ulapho iingxaki zakhe zaqala khona, kuba ngoku ugogeke ngokomzimba futhi akakwazi kuhamba. 
Le nkosikazi, eyayihlala eMdantsane futhi izisebenzela ngelo xesha, ithi yagqibela ibizwa ngugqirha ukuba iyokukhupha izinyo. 
“Le nto yaqala ngomhla weshumi elinesihlanu kweyeDwarha 2002 ndiyokukhupha izinyo eCecilia Makiwane. Ndahlatywa inaliti, ndalinda emva koko ndaya kugqirha. Kodwa ndazigqibela ngelo xesha wayendikhupha ngalo izinyo, ndavele ndavuleka umlomo awavaleka, ulwimi latshona emqaleni. 
“Emveni koko ndalaliswa esibhedlele, kanti lonke eli xesha kukho umthambo othe waphazamiseka. Zange ndiphinde ndikwazi ukuba ndim ukusukela ngoko,” utshilo uJantjies, osele wabuyela kowabo eJeffreys Bay, ngethuba ebalisela I’solezwe lesiXhosa. 
Le nkosikazi, enabantwana ababini uNocawe (25) noAnele (22), ithi imeko imbi kakhulu kuyo ingakumbi emva kokuba iswelekelwe ngumyeni ngo2017. 
“Kuthiwa akazange atyikitye phantsi iimpepha zokuba ndincedakale ekufumaneni imbuyekezo yemali kwingxaki yam eyenziwa ngamagosa esebe lezempilo eMpuma Koloni. Amagosa ezempilo andehlisa endenyusa, akandincedi. 
“Ndisentlungwini, akukho mntu wokundinceda, andiyazi ukuba mandithini. Ngoku bendinqwenela athi uThixo endithatha kube kukho uncedo olukhoyo kubantwana. Andikwazi kuhamba, ndilele ngomqolo. Yiminyaka ilishumi elinesithoba ndingakwazi ukuzenzela kwanto, ndifakwa amanaphukeni. Ibuhlungu imeko yam. 
“Utata walapha endlini waphuma engena esibhedlele ezama ukulungisa imeko yam. Ugqirha owayendikhupha eli zinyo wazimela kanti ngeli xesha akhangelwayo uzitshintshe igama lakhe,” kutsho uJantjies. 
Kwiveki ephelileyo, uJantjies ukhe wazama ukuzibulala, ngokuzityakatya umzimba ngesikhali, ngenxa yomvandedwa ekuthiwa udalwa yimeko aphila phantsi kwayo. 
UJantjies uthi imbuyekezo yemali, emva kokudontsisana enkundleni, waye wayifumana kusithiwa yiR500 000. Kodwa ukuza kuthi ga ngoku kunzima ukuyifumana le mali, bandehlisa bendenyusa. 
Urhulumente wephondo uthi le R500 000 yayisisipho sasimahla kuba iinkundla azizange zifumane kunxulumana kwemeko yale nkosikazi kwakunye nenkqubo yokukhutshwa kwezinyo. 
“Into abayithethayo kukuba utata walapha endlini wabhubha engatyikityanga kule mali, ngoko ke ngoku bathi ibango laphinda lajika. Akukho mbalelwano ndingayibhalanga. Utata walapha endlini wayenceda mna, ibango lelam hayi yena,” utshilo uJantjies. 
Isithethi sesebe lezempilo ephondweni uSizwe Kupelo uthi emva kwezikhalazo zale nkosikazi, isebe laye lenza uphando lwalo lwangaphakathi “apho kwaye akwafunyaniswa nto edibanisa ukukhutshwa kwezinyo kwakunye nemeko yakhe (le nkosikazi)”. 
“Usapho aluzange luzamkele ezi ziphumo zophando ze kwachongwa ingcaphephe ezimeleyo, nayo engazange ifumanise nto edibanisa ukukhutshwa kwezinyo kwakunye nemeko yale nkosikazi. 
“Usapho lwaye lwaqalisa umbandela wokwenza ibango kwisebe kwaye akuzange kubekho nto edibanisa ukukhutshwa kwezinyo kwakunye nemeko yakhe. Elinye lamagqwetha osapho laye laqhubezela isebe ukuba livuze le nkosikazi ngokwesisa. 
“Olu sapho lakhe lanikwa imali esisipho sasimahla (gratuitous offer) se-R500 000 eyayiphunyezwe ngowayeyintloko yesebe (ngelo xesha) uGqr. Siva Pillay, kwaye esi sipho kwakuyalelwe ukuba masamkelwe zingaphelanga iintsuku ezingamashumi amathathu (30) okanye siza kurhoxiswa xa singamkelwanga lusapho,” utshilo uKupelo, esithi ukubhubha komyeni wale nkosikazi ngo2017, phambi kokutyikitywa kwebango, kwathetha ukuba akusekho bango. 
UKupelo uthi obesakuba nguMphathiswa kwiSebe lezeMpilo, uNomsa Jajula, wangenelela ngokwesisa kwimeko yolu sapho apho kwagqitywa ukuba malakhelwe indlu eJeffreys Bay. Indlu entsha yakhiwa ze yafakelwa nefenitshala, utshilo uKupelo. 
“IVodacom Foundation yanikela ngeSpaza ukuze usapho luqale ushishino. IVodacom Foundation yaphinda yazinikela ekundiseni uNocawe de abekanti ufikelele kwimfundo enomsila.”
title: ‘Kwatshona ulwimi emqaleni ndikhutshwa izinyo!’

text:
Ngokobalo manani lwabantu abathetha iilwimi ezithile kweli loMzantsi Afrika, kuqikelelwa ukuba ulwimi lwesi-Afrikansi lolunye leelwimi ezinabantu abambalwa abaluthethayo. 
Bamalunga nomyinge weepesenti ezintlanu ezinesiqingatha (5,6%) kuphela abemi boMzantsi Afrika abantetho isisi-Afrikansi.  
Phakathi kwabantu abathetha olu lwimi, ndingakhankanya abo bazibiza ngokuba bangamaAfrikaner nabakwabizwa ngokuba ngamaBhulu ngabanye; abantu abantsundu ababizwa ngokuba ngabeBala ingakumbi kwiphondo leNtshona Kapa; eleMpuma Kapa neloMntla Kapa. 
Uphando lukwaveza nokuba baliqela abantu abathetha isi-Afrikansi nakwilizwe laseNamibia kuquka nelo laseMozambique.  
Kulo mhlomlo, ndizama ukuveza ukuba xa abantu abathetha ulwimi oluthile bezinikele ngalo kwaye bezingca ngalo, olo lwimi aluyi ndawo, olo lwimi alunakuze lubhange okanye lunyamalale, koko luya kuhlala lulukhulu umhla nezolo, lude longamele nezinye ezithethwa ngamavila nangoo-asikhathali! 
Phakathi kwezinto ezizinzisa zize zimilisele iingcambu zokomelela kolwimi lwesi-Afrikansi, ndingakhankanya ukungadlali kwama-Afrikaner ngolwimi lwawo kangangokuba ade aqinisekise ukuba nezinto akholelwa kuzo nazixabisileyo, zithiywa ngolwimi lwawo. 
Mandikhankanye le mizekelo ilandelayo: 
Okokuqala makhe ndinikhumbuze ngoko ndandikhe ndakuphawula ngaphambili, ukuthiywa kohlanga olu lwama-Afrikaner kwanolwimi aluthethayo.  
Ama-Afrikaner nangona esebenzisa ulwimi oluthathwe kwisiDatshi nesiJamani, ulwimi lwawo aluthiya ngegama elayamene nezwekazi eli ahlala kulo, oko kuthethe ukuthi nokuba ubani uyathandabuza, kweli gama lolu lwimi kuqinisekiswa ukuba olu lwimi lolwezwekazi iAfrika ngqo.  
Kwigama elithi Afrikaner nelo lolwimi luthi Afrikaans; igama lezwekazi iAfrika liyakhokela, lize lilandelwe ngoonobumba abancinci abathathu.  
Oku ndikuchaza ndikushwankathele ngelithi ama-Afrikaner nesiAfrikaans zezalapha eAfrika kwaye ngendlela le isizwe nolwimi zithiywe ngalo, ingathi kum kubhentsiswa kuze kugxininiswe ukuzingca ngezwekazi leAfrika. 
Esi sizwe asiphelelanga nje ekuthiyeni ubuntu baso ngezwekazi leAfrika, koko nemibutho elwela amalungelo aso kunye nezakhiwo zenkolo yaso zithiywa kwangesigama solu lwimi nesivakalisa udumo lwama-Afrikaner.  
Kwezenkolo kumaphondo onke kukho ityalike ethiywe ngokuba yiDatshi enemveli yesi sizwe, ize icawe yokuqala kwidolophu abahlala kuyo abo bangama-Afrikaner bayibize ngeMoeder Kerk, kuze kutsha nje kuye kukhula naleyo inegama labo ibizwa ngokuba yiAfrikaans Protestante Kerk.  
Ingaba njengokuba uninzi lwethu maXhosa lulandela inkolo engeecawe neenkonzo, zikho iicawe ezithiywe ngobuXhosa, igama lazo liqale ngoXhosa? Ukuba zikho zimbalwa kwaye azinakufika nakwiminwe emihlanu. 
 Kwesi sihlandlo ndingathanda ukubalula icawe ebizwa ngokuba yi-Afrika nayo ethiywe ngezwekazi, iRhabe eyathiywa ngokumkani uRharhabe kunye naleyo yebandla laseBuhleni kaShembe. 
 Ingaba bethu kutheni uninzi lweecawe zithiywe ngolwimi lwasemzini nangona kuzo kukhonzela amaXhosa okanye ama-Afrika odwa? 
Kwimibutho yamalungelo oluntu mingaphi ejolise kubuntu bama-Afrika, kumaXhosa nakwezinye izizwe ezintsundu?  
Nditsho kuba sazi sonke ngombutho owawudume ngamalungu angama-Afrikaner owawunganqandeki sele unqandwa, nowawubizwa ngokuba yiAfrikaner Weerstandbeweging, gama elo lithetha ukuthi umbutho ojolise ekuxhathiseni ngobu-Afrikaner.  
Ungaze ube kho bethu umbutho onjengalo kumaXhosa? Andiqinisekanga kuba thina siluhlanga oludume ngokubandakanya wonke ubani, nokuba olo bandakanyo lungasimisa ndawonye singabi nakuphuhla.  
Kukwakho nombutho obizwa nge-Afriforum, mbutho lowo ujolise ekukhuthazeni ukukhuselwa kolwimi nesiko lama-Afrikaner. Andikhumbuli ukho umbutho okumila kunje kumaXhosa, nowawuzanywa ukumiselwa owawubizwa ngeSolokhozi lesiXhosa, awuzange uhambele ndawo kuba wawungafumani nkxaso kuthi bantu bazibiza ngobuXhosa. 
IsiAfrikansi sikhula ukogqitha ulwimi lwethu ngeli lixa sona sithethwa ngabantu abazizigidi ezisixhenxe, sibe isiXhosa sithethwa zizigidi ezilishumi elinanye.  
Oku kwenzeka ngenxa yokuzimisela kwamaAfrikaner ngolwimi lwawo nangesiko lawo. Zingaphi izichazimagama ezikhoyo zesiXhosa xa kuthelekiswa nezo zesiAfrikansi? Ingaba ezo zichazimagama ziyafumaneka kwi-Intanethi? 
Ezesi-Afrikansi ziyafumaneka kwaye abantetho isisi-Afrikansi bahlala bexoxa kwi-Intanethi ngesigama esitsha nesivelayo ngeenjongo zokukhulisa ulwimi lwabo mihla le.  
Kutheni ezethu zingafakwa kule mijelo nakula maqonga ukuze lungakhuli ngokonyawo lonwabu ulwimi lwethu? 
Intetho ethi isiNgesi nesi-Afrikansi zanikwa amathuba okuphuhla ngurhulumente wengcinezelo iphelelwe lixesha nentsingiselo.  
Yiminyaka engaphezu kwamashumi amabini kusithiwa silingene ngokwamalungelo, okufunekayo kukuba siphakame siphuhlise ulwimi lwethu namasiko ethu, ukuze singashiyeki ngasemva okanye kubhange okukokwethu. 
Nathi makhe sibe nemibhiyozo yobuntu bethu nolwimi lwethu njengeAfrikaans woordfees, isiXhosa sishukume siphuhle ezikolweni kuyilwe ukhuphiswano ngolwimi lwethu njengeEnglish Olympiad neAfrikaans Olimpiade, sibe nemuziyam noovimba bolwimi lwethu njengeAfrikaans Taal Monument neAfrikaans Taal Museum.  
Ukuphuhla nokubhanga kwesiXhosa kusezandleni zethu!
title: Isi-Afrikansi asiyi ndawo!

text:
Kubanjwe umfundisi onamashumi amane anesine ubudala, ebanjwa ngamapolisa aseAvondale eMatatiele emva kwezityholo ezenziwe ngabafundi besikolo iMission High eMatatiele zokuba bacofwacofwa amabele ngulo mfundisi.  
Ngokwengxelo ephuma kwisithethi samapolisa uKapteni Raphael Motloung, lo mfundisi lityeli lesibini eli ebanjwa ebanjelwa izityholo ezikumila kunje. Wabanjwa kunyaka ophelileyo wakhululwa ngebheyile yewaka. 
 UMotloung uthi umfundisi ubanjwe ngeCawa yempelaveki emva kokuba umfundi waseMission High oneshumi elinethoba (19) ethe wamangalela lo mfundisi kuba esithi umbizele eofisini yakhe ekwangaphakathi kwesi sikolo emxelela ukuba uyamthanda.  
Ingxelo iqhuba ithi emva kokuba umfundi eye wala, umfundisi uye waphakama esondela kumfundi nalapho aye wamphathaphatha amabele ngohlobo olungamkelekanga. 
 Umfundi uye waphoncuka wabaleka esothuswe sesi senzo senziwa ngumfundisi kuye njengoko ingumntu abamhloniphayo ngaphakathi esikolweni. 
 UMotloung uthi umfundi uxelele abazali bakhe ngokwenziwe ngumfundisi kuye, ze kwavulwa ityala kwisikhululo samapolisa eAvondale, apho amapolisa afumanise ukuba lo mfundisi wakhe wabanjwa ngaphambili ebanjelwa kwaityala elifanayo lokuxhaphaza ngokwesondo umfundi, naye owayefunda eMission High, nalapho wakhululwa ngebheyile yewaka leerandi.  
Umfundisi ulindeleke avele kwinkundla yamatyala eMatatiele kungekudala kwaye ungaphakathi eziseleni.
title: Ubanjiwe umfundisi ocofacofa abafundi!

text:
UMASIPALA wesithili iAmathole ubalule iintsika ezilishumi elinanye neziqulathwe kumbono walo masipala wonyaka ka2058, usithi ezi ntsika zakubangela ubomi obungcono kuwo wonke umntu walo masipala ngaloo minyaka. 
Ezi ntsika ziquka ulawulo lwezimali, unxibelelwano ngomnatha, uqoqosho lweelwandle, iindlela ezisemgangathweni, intembeko kamasipala eluntwini, uphuhliso kumntu wonke kwanokwakhiwa kwenkangeleko kamasipala. 
Umanejala walo masipala, uThandekile Mnyimba, ebalisela I’solezwe lesiXhosa kwindibano yezamanzi nelindle (Water and Sanitation Indaba) ebibanjelwe eMonti, uthi izinto abazifumanise njengomcelimngeni kulo masipala kukusilela ekucwangciseni. 
“Yiyo le nto sithi masibuyele ezingqondweni, sibeke phantsi zonke izicwangciso zethu. Into embi ke kukuba sicwangcisa kwixesha elinzima, ixesha lembalela. Kodwa into emnandi kukuba olu cwangciso silwenzela isizukulwana sika2058. Ngabo abaza kuxhamla koku. Sifuna eso sizukulwana singazifumani kwingxaki esizifumene sikuyo,” utshilo uMnyimba. 
UMnyimba uthi baye bavumelana belibhunga ukuba makwenziwe isicwangciso esoluliweyo. 
“Saye savumelana ngo2017 silibhunga, ukuba iingxaki zikamasipala wethu zifuna isicwangciso esoluliweyo. Savumelana ukuba le nto yokucwangcisa nje iminyaka emihlanu ayincedisi. 
“Siye sabona ukuba masicwangcise ngaphaya kwezizukulwana ezibini emva kokuqaphela ukuba uninzi lwabantu bethu lulutsha. Ngabo ke abo baza kuthi baxhamle kulo msebenzi wesicwangciso esisiqale ngoku. 
“Ezinye zezinto esiphuma nazo neziqulathwe kulo mbono wethu ka2058 ziquka ukusebenzisa indalo yethu yolwandle ukukhulisa uqoqosho nokudala imisebenzi. Saphinda saqwalasela umbandela wezothutho woluntu, sabona ukuba xa sinokuqinisa, xa sinokusebenzisana noorhulumente abangaphezulu kuthi ukuphucula iindlela singenza lukhulu. 
“Masikhumbule ukuba xa iindlela zintle, noqoqosho luhamba ngendlela entle. 
Enye into kukufaka unxibelelwano lomnatha (internet). Awukwazi ukuqhuba uqoqosho ngaphandle konxibelelwano lomnatha. Sithi ke unxibelelwano lomnatha malungapheleli edolophini, maluye nasezilalini,” utshilo uMnyimba. 
Ethetha ngomba odla umzi eAmathole, lowo wokunqongophala kwamanzi, uMnyimba uthe: “Ibhunga laye lavumelana nyakenye ukuba sibambe indibano efana nale. Isizathu ke kukuba sinoxanduva, ngokoMgaqosiseko ukuba masicwangcise ze sise amanzi ebantwini. Silibhunga likamasipala siyavumelana ukuba olu xanduva asilwenzi ngendlela efanelekileyo.” 
“Siyavumelana silibhunga ukuba kukho ukuqhwalela, kulo mbandela wokunika abantu amanzi. Sigqibe kwelokuba ke sijonge ukuze sizofumanisa ukuba yintoni unobangela wokuba kube njalo. 
“Siyenzile lo nto kunyaka ophelileyo, sayifumana imicelimngeni, equka ukuthatha umasipala owawungahoywanga kumba wamanzi ngurhulumente wengcinezelo, ububanzi beendawo zethu ezisezilalini, iziseko zamanzi ezindala kwanemali engonelanga yokusa amanzi eluntwini,” utshilo uMnyimba. 
UMnyimba uthi lo masipala ufuna imali engangeR3.3 billion kule minyaka isibhozo izayo ukuqinisekisa wonke umzi walo masipala unamanzi nendlu yangasese. 
“Imali esinayo okwangoku yiR610 million. Iya kusithatha iminyaka esibhozo ukuqinisekisa ukuba wonke umntu waseAmathole unamanzi nendlu yangasese,” utshilo uMnyimba, ebalula ukuba baza kuqala umbandela wokuthatha amanzi olwandle acocwe enziwe amanzi alungele ukuselwa. 
Lo kaMnyimba ukwathe bayaqhuba nokomba amanzi phantsi komhlaba (borehole) besebenzisa iingcali ukuqinisekisa ukuba kombiwa kwindawo enomthamo othe xhaxhe wamanzi.
title: Amathole kwisicwangciso sika2058

text:
ICape Town City ziintshatsheli zeTelkom Knockout ngokusesikweni kulo nyaka! Oku kulandela impumelelo ezuzwe leli qela emva kokubetha iSuperSport United ngo’2-1 kumdlalo obumhle kakhulu ePeter Mokaba Stadium ngale njikalanga.  
Emva kweenyanga nje ezine eli qela libhaliswe ngokutsha kwiincwadi zebhola yeli lizwe, u-Eric Tinkler, ulibumbe emva koko walithatha walibeka phezulu kwibhola yoMzantsi Afrika. 
  
La maqela aqale isiqingatha sokuqala ngokusukelana – kodwa kungekho nto ixhomisa amehlo. Kuthe ngomzuzu wesithoba, uThuso Phala, wafumana ibhola isuka kwicala lasekhohlo – idibene naye engayizilungiselelanga kakuhle, wayiphosa. Luthiba ukuba ebelisebenzise kakuhle, iSuperSport United ngeyihambe phambili kwangoko. Eli qela lasePitoli lohlwayiwe ngokuphosa elothuba ngoba u-Aubrey Mngoma ubeke emnatheni umkrolo webhola ekude kumhlaba kanozinti.  
  
Nangona uReneilwe Letsholonyane noDean Furman bebezibethelele iingcambu zabo embindini webala futhi belawula yonke into eyenzekayo – kodwa badibene nesikhuthali esikhulu uRoland Putsche obesebenzisana namadoda abalekayo afana noMpho Matsi, Lebohang Manyama no-Aubrey Mngoma.  
  
Amakhwenkwe ka-Eric Tinkler khange ayiqhelisele kodwa iSuperSport United kwaye khange kucaca nokuba amanye akanawo amava kwimidlalo ekumila kunje. Abadlali beCape Town City badlale umdlalo wabo obalekayo, kodwa baqinisekisa ukuba abavuli emva. Kuyiwe kwixesha lokuphumla iCape Town City ihamba phambili ngegowuli elinye.  
  
Kwisiqingatha sesibini iqela laseKapa liqale apho beliyeke khona kwesokuqala. Lihlasele lingaphezi, kangangokuba uReyaad Pieterse unyanzeleke ukuba avale iibhola ezimbi.  
UKingston Nkatha ufake igowuli lokulinganisa ngomzuzu wamashumi asixhenxe. Kodwa kuthe kwimizuzu nje emibini emva koko, uJudas Moseamedi ufake igowuli lesibini leCTC emva kokuba uManyama esukele amadoda kwicala lasekunene. UStuart Baxter ukhuphe uJeremy Brockie noThuso Phala – kwaze ezindaweni zabo kwangena uCole Alexander noDove Wome.  
  
Amakhwenkwe kaTinkler azincede ngento enye kulo mdlalo. Xa ebambe ibhola ayikhabela phambili futhi aqinisekise ukuba iya ezipalini kodwa akupheleli apho ngoba kwangaxeshanye – ayaqinisekisa ukuba akashiyi iipali zawo zibhentsile. 
  
Umdlalo wona ubuvulelekile kuwo omabini la maqela. Amathuba wokuphumelela indebe ebekhona macala futhi eyona nto iwenze umdlalo wamhle kukuzimisela kwabadlali ebaleni. UPieterse ebexakekile kakhulu ubukhulu becala – kodwa kuthe ngoku sekusondela isiphelo somdlalo, uShu-Aib Walters, nguye oye waxakeka kakhulu ngoba iSuperSport ibihlasela ngamandla. Ukwazile kodwa ukuqubisana nezo bhola bezijulwa kuye ngabadlali beSuperSport. 
SuperSport United: Pieterse, Boxall, Daniels, Gould, Bhasera, Furman, Letsholonyane, Phala, Mnyamane, Nkhatha, Brockie 
Amalalela: Pule, Morton, Modiba, Alexander, Farmer, Booysen, Wome 
Cape Town City: Walters, Mkhize, Johannes, Gumede, Mokeke, Matsi, Putsche, Ngoma, Jayiya, Masina, Manyama 
Amalalela: Motloung, Sim, Nodada, Kobola, Moseamedi, Adjei, Mashkinya
title: Halalaaaa Cape Town City!!!!!

text:
ULunga Solani (27), uza kuchitha iminyaka engamashumi amabini anesithandathu (26) ekwezimnyama izisele emva kokufunyanwa yinkundla yengingqi yakuCentane enetyala lokudlwengula uninakhulu onama85 eminyaka ubudala. 
Ingxelo ephuma kwiGunyabantu lezoTshutshiso ithi uSolani wakwenza oku kuninakhulu wakhe ngomhla we31 kweyeKhala  ka2021 kwikhaya labo elikwilali uMandluntsha kuCentane. 
Ngokwengxelo ebekwe phambi kwenkundla,  umakhulu wayelungiselela ukulala eyokucima isibane kwigumbi lokuphekela ngethuba ehlaselwa ngumzukulwana wakhe. Umakhulu kulapho weva kukhatywa ucango kungena umzukulwana wakhe emtyhilizela kwigumbi lokulala wamdlwengula. 
Ingxelo ithi umakhulu wazama ukuzilwela kodwa woyisakala ngenxa yeminyaka yakhe emva kokuba uSolani waye wamdibanisa nedonga, embetha ngenduku. 
“USolani woyisakala bubuthongo emva kokudlwengula umakhulu kwakwigumbi elo. Umakhulu wayesele ngelo xesha ebikele usapho nabamelwane nabaye baqokelelana kwagqitywa ekubeni kubizwe amapolisa,” udize oko uLuxolo Tyali nothethela iNPA. 
USolani phambi kwenkundla uliphikile elokudlwengula ityala, walivuma elokuqhekeza nelokuba. 
UMtshutshisi uSiyabonga Manase uveze ubungqina beJ88 phambi kwenkundla, ebonisa izivubeko zokukrwitshwa nokubethwa kukamakhulu. 
I-NPA  isamkele esi sigwebo, isithi uSolani bekufanele ukhusela uninakhulu hayi ukumxhaphaza.
title: Iminyaka ejele  ngokudlwengula uninakhulu (85)

text:
Yinkosikazi egama linguThandeka Mniki enamashumi amane anesibhozo ubudala (48) esele iyiveki yesithathu le inyamalele emzini wayo. 
Le nkosikazi ichazwe ngumyeni wayo kwisikhululo samapolisa saseSwartkops eGqeberha njengelahlekileyo. 
Ingxelo ephuma emapoliseni ithi uMniki wagqityelwa ngentsimbi yesibhozo kusasa kungeCawa ezintsukwini, umhla wama31 kwinyanga yeKhala esemzini wakhe okwisitalato iMthavuma eseWell Estate. 
Umyeni wale nkosikazi ichaze emapoliseni ngoLwesihlanu kwiveki ephelileyo njengelahlekileyo. 
Ngethuba inyamalala yayinxibe isikipa esimhlophe, ijezi eluhlaza kwakunye neteki eziluhlobo lwe-all star. 
Amapolisa abongoza nabani na onokuba nolwazi malunga nokunyamalala kwale nkosikazi atsalele umcuphi uSrg Martin Assia ku 082 442 1099, 08600 10111, SMS 32211 okanye atsalele nasiphi na isikhululo esikufutshane.
title: Kuntsuku inyamelele inkosikazi yaseGqeberha

text:
INKOSIKAZI ebanjwe ngezityholo zokubulala igosa eliphezulu kurhulumente waseMpuma Koloni ivele phambi kwenkundla kamantyi waseMonti ngoMvulo. 
  
UBulelwa Ndudula (44) ubanjwe kwikhaya lesisibini eTsomo, emva kokuba amapolisa eqokelele ubungqina obumayamanisa nokubulawa komyeni wakhe uSakhekile Ndudula.   
  
USakhekile, obesebenza njengengqonyela yabasebenzi (Chief of Staff) kwisebe lophuhliso loluntu eMpuma Koloni, wadutyulwa izihlandlo ezisibhozo kumzi wesibini oseCambridge West eMonti ngomhla weshumi elinesine kwinyanga ephelileyo. Wabhubha xa kanye esithi cakatha kumasango esibhedlele iSt Dominics eMonti. 
  
I’solezwe live ukuba uBulelwa noSakhekile bebekhe banengxabano phambi kwesi sehlo. “Ingxabano ibinkulu kangangokuba bake bohlukana ixeshana baphinda babuyelana,” itsho ingxelo esuka kwimithombo ethembekileyo. 
  
Ngethuba evela enkundleni, uBulelwa ebebakabakaza ebalekisa amehlo rhoqo xa ejongiwe. Ixesha elininzi ulichithe ejonge phantsi, ebana ukugqugula negqwetha lakhe uSimphiwe Mbabane. 
  
Umantyi uNazeem Joemath uxelele inkundla ukuba akazukuqhubeka nesicelo sebheyile kuba maninzi amatyala ajongene nawo enkundleni. Umbuso sele uvakalisile ukuba uyasichasa isicelo sebheyile ngakumtyholwa. 
Isicelo sebheyile sakumanyelwa kwakhona ngoLwesithathu umhla wesihlanu kule nyanga.
title: Inkosikazi enkundleni ngokubulala umyeni oligosa eliphezulu kwarhulumente

text:
Emva kweminyaka emininzi uLionel Messi ezama ukuphumelela indebe yehlabathi, ekugqibeleni ude walifumana ithuba elicacileyo lokuyifuma. Oku kwenzeka emva kokuba uJulian Alvarez naye uLionel Messi bengcwabe iCroatia ngamagowuli amathathu eqandeni emdlalweni obutak’ iintlantsi eLusail Iconic Stadium kubusuku banamhlanje. Le yimpumelelo ebaluleke kakhulu kuMessi ongabeka phantsi kwiminyaka embalwa ezayo njengomdlali. Ukuphumelela indebe yehlabathi yinto engambeka encochoyini njengomdlali owenze izinto ezinkulu ebholeni yehlabathi. Isiqingatha sokuqala siphele iArgentina inkqenkqeza phambili ngamagowuli amabini eqandeni. 
Ekuqaleni umdlalo ulawulwe yiCroatia – eyaziwayo ngukudlala ibhola entle ehamba phantsi ikhokelwa yigqala leReal Madrid, uLuka Modric. Khange kubekho qela elifuna ukulahlekelwa kwangoko, omabini adlale umdlalo elumkile kakhulu. Igowuli lokuqala lize ngepenela efakwe nguLionel Messi othe kratya ngoku kuDiego Maradoa ngamagowuli kwindebe yehlabathi. Oku kwenzeke emva kokuba unozinti weCroatia, uDominik Livakovic, ewise uJulian Alvarez obezama ukufaka igowuli. Emva kwemizuzu embalwa, uAlvarez ufake igowuli lesibini layo iArgentina. Ufumene ibhola esizikithini sebala wabaleka nayo ephahlwe ngabadlali beCroatia. 
Nangona ebekhe waphulukana nolawulo lwebhola – kodwa uye wayifaka emnatheni emva kokuba bengakwazanga abadlali beCroatia ukuchitha. Side saphela isigaba sokuqala umdlalo ulawulwa yiCroatia engakwazanga ukugqobhola kwiArgentina. Kwisigaba sesibini, bekungasekho nto ingakho enokwenziwa yiCroatia ngoba abadlali beArgentina balwele ukukhusela amagowuli abawafumene kwisigaba sokuqala somdlalo. Isikhonkwane sokugqibela esibethelele ibhokisi ekungcwatywe ngayo iCroatia sifakwe kwa nguJulian Alvarez ogqibezele ibhola ayidlalelwe nguLionel Messi. Bekukho ithemba lokuba iCroatia iza kulwela ukuya phambili kwakhona nakule itumente yalo nyaka emva kokubethwa yiFrance kwegqithileyo eRussia.
title: UJulian noMessi bangcwabe iCroatia emdlalweni weFifa World Cup

text:
Ekuqaleni kwale veki sibukele amalungu endlu yowiso-mthetho egunyazisa utshintsho kwiCandelo 25 lomgaqo-siseko weli. Eli Candelo 25 libalula amalungelo omhlaba okanye izakhiwo.  
Lilonke, umhlaba uza kubuya. Njani? Nini? Sakuhlala silindile.
