NGAPHANDLE kwamathandabuzo unyaka ka-2016 uyakuhlala ukhumbuleka ngenxa yeziqendu zawo ezithe zatsala umdla kubafundi bamaphephandaba kwanabo babukela umabonakude okanye baphulaphula unomathotholo. 
Ukusuka kwezopolitiko, ezemidlalo, ezolonwabo ukuya kwezoqoqosho, iindaba zika-2016 zenze uluntu lahlala luthe xhungu maxa wambi lubambe ongezantsi ngelinye ixesha lonwabile. 
*  Ngubani obesazi ukuba iNelson Mandela Bay, iTshwane neGoli zingaze zimke kulawulo leANC? Ngubani obesazi ukuba kungakho indoda (Pravin Gordhan) eqin’ isibindi iphikise ukudlakatheliswa kombuso lusapho lakwaGupta? 
*   Kulo nyaka inkundla yomgaqo-siseko ithe yayalela uMongameli Jacob Zuma ukuba abuyisele kwinxili yombuso imali engange-7.8 yezigidi zeerandi echithwe ekwakheni ikhaya lakhe eliseNkandla. Oku kwenzeka nangona nje uZuma wathi waxelela isizwe amatyeli ngamatyeli esithi akukho gxeke ekwakhiweni komzi wakhe ngumbuso. 
*  Unyaka ka-2016 uphinde yangunyaka apho zithe zayingxinano izimemezelo zokuba makehle esikhundleni uMongameli Jacob Zuma, ngenxa yokungaqhubi kakuhle kweANC kunyulo loomasipala obelubanjwe kwinyanga yeThupha. 
*   Nehlakani likaZuma, uHlaudi Motsoeneng ebengundaba-mlonyeni kulo nyaka, ukusuka ekubhengezeni ukuba iSABC iyazikhwebula ekupapasheni imifanekiso ebonakalisa udushe ukuya kwisibhengezo sokuba owona mculo uzakudlalwa kulo msasazeli woluntu izakuba ngulowo weemvumi zeli isikakhulu. 
Kodwa noxa kunjalo inkundla ephakamileyo yaseNtshona Koloni imfumanise engekho kwilungelo lakuxhuzula mikhala kwizikhundla eziphezulu kwiSABC lo kaMotsoeneng. Kwakhona, abasebenzi beSABC kwanabo bebesakuba ngamalungu ebhodi kweli qumrhu bakhwele bezehlela kuMotsoeneng bexelela iPalamente ngelithi ilawula ngegqudu le ndedeba. 
*   Futhi ngubani obesazi ukuba isikolo iPretoria Girls’ High, ekucaca ukuba sithathe iminyaka sicalucalula abantwana abamnyama, singabanjelwa uqhankqalazo liqaqobana labantwana baso abamnyama befuna kutshintswe umgaqo-nkqubo weenwele? 
*   Impalalo-gazi yokubulalana koonoteksi ngenxa yomzila ophakathi kweLibode noMthatha sokuze ilityalwe. 
*   Emva kweminyaka engamashumi amabini ananye, iqela leMamelodi Sundowns lenze uMzantsi Afrika wabhiyoza emva kokuphumelela iCAF Champions League eyagqityelwa yiOrlando Pirates ngo1995. ISundowns ibeliqela lokuqala leli ukuthabatha inxaxheba kwiFIFA Club World Cup eJaphani noxa nje izinto zingayihambelanga kakuhle. 
*   Imbaleki uWayde Van Niekerk wenze uMzantsi Afrika wazidla emva kokwenza imbali kulandela ukophula irekhodi leminyaka elishumi elinesixhenxe kwiiOlimpiki ebezibanjelwe eRio de Janeiro eBrazil. 
*   Inzalelwane yaseMhlahlane kuGatyana uNjengele Derrick Daliwonga Mgwebi kulo nyaka uthe wenzelwa itheko lokumnika undlela-mhlophe emva kokutyunjwa kwakhe ngunobhala-jikelele weZizwe eziManyeneyo (United Nations [UN]) uBan Ki-Moon njengenkumanda yomkhosi weUN onjongo zawo ikukuzisa uxolo eDRC. 
*   Phesheya kweelwandle, engazange anikwe thuba enjalo, uDonald Trump uvotelwe njengoMongameli waseMelika. Ukanti iNkulumbuso yaseBritane uDavid Cameron uthe wanikezela kwisihlalo sakhe emva kokuba uninzi labantu bela lizwe bethe bavota ngokuchaseneyo nokuzibandakanya kweli lizwe nemanyano yamazwe aseYurophu. 
*  Xa sijonga kunyaka ozayo, sibona kuseza kuqhubeka ukuthaphuka kwezitsala umdla kuba lo ngunyaka wenkomfa yokonyula iinkokeli ezintsha zikazwelonke kwiANC. Ngubani ozakungena endaweni kaMsholozi? 
NaseMpuma Koloni ikwalelo dabi. INkulumbuso uPhumulo Masualle okwangusihlalo weANC ephondweni ufikelela esiphelweni sexesha lakhe elimiselweyo njengosihlalo walo mbutho. Inkomfa yolonyulo yephondo izakubanjwa ekupheleni kwenyanga yeSilimela. Ngubani ozakungena endaweni kaMasualle? 
Nokuba yintoni ezakwenzeka, amas’ abekwe elangeni. I’solezwe liza kuhlala lizizicaka zenu.
title: Shiyeka 2016, samkela u2017

text:
Usapho lakwaDyantyi kwilokishi iLulama Hlanjwa eBarkley East lunendawo yokufihla intloko ngoku, enkosi kwibali elilusizi ebelipapashwe leli phephandaba, I’solezwe lesiXhosa, kweyeSilimela. 
UFikile Dyantyi (30), ulivolontiya elenza inkqubo yomculo kamaskandi Ekhephini Community Radio. Waphumela elubala ngentlungu yosapho lwakhe. Uthi umama wakhe wayehlalisana natata othile kwindlu eseBarkley East. 
Ukusweleka kwalo tata ngo2013, usapho lwalo tata lwafika lusithi mabakhangele enye indlu. Olu sapho kwanyanzeleka ukuba lukhangele enye indawo, kodwa yabe imali ingekho, kuba umama kaDyantyi akaphangeli kwaye akakafikeleli kwiminyaka yenkamnkam yabadala. 
Olu sapho uncedo lulufumene kwiphondo laKwaZulu Natal, kwaye abawuvali umlomo lolu ncedo kuba ngoku banendawo yokufihla intloko. 
“Ndifumene uncedo emva kokupapashwa kwebali lam liphephandaba I’solezwe lesiXhosa. Ndincedwe nguMnu. Victor Xaba, oye wasithengela izixhobo zetyotyombe. “Yena uMnu. Vuyisile Somadani uye wathi uza kusakhela ityotyombe xa sele zikhona izixhobo. Thina sivuyela ukuba nendawo yokufihla intloko, siyeke ukuxhomekeka emntwini. 
“Silusapho lakwaDyantyi sivuya kakhulu sikwambulela utat’ uVictor Xaba ngento asenzele yona. Yanga uThixo angamomeleza, amnike amandla ayenze nakwabanye abantu into asenzele yona,” utshilo uDyantyi. 
UXaba usebenzela isikhululo sosasazo saseThekwini, Izwi loMzansi. Uthi wabona eli bali lingosapho lakwaDyantyi kumnatha wonxibelelwano. 
“Xa ndiqala ukubona eli bali, ndathi lo ngugxa wethu. Ndamfowunela, apho ndathi ndavakalelwa libali lakhe lentsokolo. Ndabuza ukuba singamnceda njani, wathi ufuna indawo yokufihla intloko,” kutsho uXaba. 
UXaba uthi wawuphosa kubaphulaphuli umba, kodwa naye wafaka isandla. “Ndikholelwa ukuba esi sisigaba sokuqala. Olu sapho lusalufuna uncedo. Ndikwafuna nokubona lo mfana ephumelela ebomini, ngenxa yokuba unesakhono,” utshilo uXaba. 
Kwabo banokongeza, uDyantyi ufumaneka kule nombolo 073 008 0004. 
sithandiwe.velaphi@inl.co.za
title: Sibulela I’solezwe ngoncedo lwaseKZN

text:
UFaf de Plessis nguye ozakukhokela iqela lesizwe loMzantsi Afrika leqakamba kwimidlalo yovavanyo nelizwe laseSri Lanka.  
Oku kulandela isibhengezo esenziwe ngu-AB de Villiers sokulahla njengokapteni weProteas.  
Lo kaDe Villiers ukhokele eli qela kwimidlalo emibini yovavanyo (New Zealand ne-Australia) emva kokuthatha iintambo kuHashim Amla ekuqaleni konyaka.  
Kodwa endaweni yakhe uDe Villiers kwangena uFaf du Plessis ngenxa yokukhathazwa kukonzakala.
title: UDu Plessis ngukapteni wemidlalo yovavanyo

text:
Amajita akhe phantsi isitya sigcwele kumdlalo we-Under-20 FIFA World Cup wokuqala abethwe kuwo ngo’2-1 yiJapan ngentsasa yanamhlanje eSuwon World Cup Stadium. Amakhwenkwe elizwe loMzantsi Afrika ngawo awuqale kakuhle lo mdlalo ngokuthi ankqonkqoze kunozinti weJapan ekwenza konke oko eyibeka phantsi ibhola ekwasebenzisa amandu. Ade avuzwa Amajita ngomzuzu wesixhenxe kwisigaba sokuqala somdlalo ngethuba uGrant Margeman ebeka ibhola emnatheni ebetheke kumdlali weJapan. 
  
Igowuli elifunyenwe ngaMajita kulo mdlalo liwanike amandla Amajita okumelana neziququ zeJapan ekuye kwanyanzeleka itshintshe indlela ebidlala ngayo kuba ibikhangela indlela enokuthi ifumane ngayo igowuli lokulinganisa. Amajita aphantse afumana igowuli lesibini emva kokuba uKeletso Makgalwa ongqube ngentloko ibhola ephume ecaleni [yena] ephakathi kumhlaba kanozinti. Nangona amakhwenkwe kaThabo Senong ebexhathisile kwesi sigaba sesibini – kodwa ifolosi yeJapan, uKoki Ogawa, ebengoyena mdlali okhathazayo. 
  
Izinto zijikile kwisigaba sesibini. IJapan ibuye kwixesha lokuphumla inamandla. Umqeqeshi waMajaphani ufake umdlali oyingozi, osedyongo ngokweminyaka ogama linguTakefusa Kubo (15) emva kweshumi lemizuzu kwisigaba sesibini. Zisuka nje, edibene no-Ogawa, bawushukumisile uMzantsi Afrika phaya emva. Ngelo xesha iJapan ibikhangela igowuli lesibini emva kwegowuli elifakwe ngu-Owaga oshiye unozinti waMajita, uMondli Mpoto, egqwethekile. Ngomzuzu wamashumi asixhenxe ananye, uKubo uvalele emnatheni igowuli lesibini leJapan. USenong ufake uLiam Jordan endaweni kaWiseman Meyiwa, uzamile ukudibanisa iibhola esiswini esiya phambili – kodwa ibibumbe emva iJapan futhi ingafuni nova.  
  
Emva kwalo mdlalo wokuqala, abadlali boMzantsi Afrika abanakusola nyawo lwemfene ngokubethwa kwabo ngoba ngabo abafumene amathuba nabangakwazanga ukuwasebenzisa kakuhle. Isoloko ingeyongxaki ukukhokela phambili kumaqela oMzantsi Afrika onke – kodwa yingxaki ukuwuqoshelisa umdlalo. Kwenzeke lo nto nakulo mdlalo wanamhlanje. Amathuba ebekho, qha abadlali abaqinisekisanga ukuba bayawasebenzisa kakuhle abekufanele awanike impumelelo yokuqala kumdlalo we-2017 Under-20 World Cup.
title: Akhe phantsi isitya sigcwele Amajita!

text:
Abahlali baseBhongweni eMthatha badlulise uxwebhu lwezikhalazo kwinkundla yamatyala eMthatha izolo beyicela ingenelele kwinto abayibiza ngokungakhuseleki ngenxa yomlo oqhubayo phakathi kweerenki ezimbini iKhwezi kunye neGolden Egg. 
Abahlali batyhola ngelithi babethiwe ngoLwesithathu ngabaqhubi bezithuthi zaseGolden Egg ngethuba bebambe intlanganiso kumzi welungu lebhodi kufuphi neziko lombane lakwaEskom.  
Inkokeli yabahlali uNonceba Guma uthi babini abahlali ababethwe bonzakaliswa kolu hlaselo kuba bengafuni kukhwela kwizithuthi zabo nabangeniswe esibhedlele. 
UGuma ukwathi kunyanzeleka bakhaphe abantwana yonke imihla ekuseni kuba bezohlaselwa ngoonoteksi baseGolden Egg.  
Kwelabo icala abaqhubi baseGolden Egg batyhola ngelithi zizizthuthi zabo ezithathu ezithe zabethwa ngamatye ngentseni yaphezolo eBhongweni ngethuba zizama ukukhwelisa abantu kule ndawo ekubangiswana ngayo. 
Kusenjalo, namhlanje umnini weeteksi oneminyaka engamashumi amane uzakuvela enkundleni ngezityholo zokubulala umqhubi weteksi uMabhuti Sihle Mnto obesebenza kumzila ophakathi kweLibode noMthatha.  
UMnto udutyulwe wabulawa kwiveki ephelileyo kudushe loonoteksi baseMthatha naseLibode. 
OoKhetshe (Hawks) bathi lo mnini weeteksi ubanjwe enompu wohlobo lwe9mm neembumbulu ezisibhozo. 
Esamkela uxwebhu uAndrew Gqiba oyimanejala kule nkundla yamatyala uthe uzodlulisa uxwebhu lwezikhalazo kumantyi abuyele kubahlali ngokukhawuleza. 
isibhalo@Inl.co.za
title: Bafuna kungenelelwe kudushe loonoteksi

text:
Amapolisa aseBhayi adize ukuba kudutyulwe kwabulawa oonqevu abaziwayo ababini kwiziganeko ezahlukeneyo kumantla esi sixeko.  
Othethela amapolisa ala mmandla uColonel Priscilla Naidu, uthe omnye woosaziwayo baba nqevu uXandre Jansen (24) udutyulwe amatyeli amaninzi kubusuku bangoMvulo.  
UNaidu uthi, owesibini unqevu uDonovan Berry (47) udutyulwe e-Extension 31 eBethelsdorp. Iingxelo zithi uBerry udutyulwe esazihambela esitalatweni wadutyulwa ngokumandla ebusweni. Amapolisa aphanda ngetyala lokubulala.  
Amapolisa abongoza uluntu ukuba luye ngaphambili xa lubona kusenzeka ulwaphulo mthetho kwiindawo zalo.
title: Kudutyulwe oonqevu kumantla eBhayi

text:
Umsasazi womculo kamaskandi uThembelani Sikilishi owaziwa ngo-DJ Jikijwa emoyeni, kwizikhululo ezibini zeli phondo iNgqushwa FM kwakunye neL2K eseTinarha, ucela inkxaso kuni balandeli bakhe njengoko ephindile kwakhona wachongwa njengomnye wabasasazi abagqwesileyo kwizikhululo zasekuhlaleni . 
U-DJ Jikijwa uza kube engomnye woosaziwayo kumnyhadala weECMAS (Eastern Cape Music Awards) oza kubanjelwa eGuild Theatre eMonti ngomhla wesibini kwinyanga yoMdumba.  
Lo msasazi uthi uzalelwe kwezona lali zisemagqagaleni kwaye zibomvu, apho kunzima ukufumana ulwazi kwilali yaseQwaninga kuGatyana.  
Kodwa uthi oko zange kumthintele ukuba angabinguye lo msasazi wayenephupha lokuba nguye esemncinci. 
Uthi uthando lwakhe ngalo mculo kamaskandi lwaqala esemncinci njengoko ekhulele kuwo kuba kuGatyana ngowona uthandwayo.  
Ukwadiza ukuba wakhuthazwa nangongasekhoyo uSaba Mbixane owakhula emmamela, enqwenela nokufana naye ekukhuleni kwakhe. 
“Ndikulungele ukuya nakwesiphi na isikhululo esikhulu seSABC ngoku kuba ndiyazibona ndilolekile ndiyakwazi endikwenzayo. Kwaye ndiyabona ndifikelele kule ndawo ndandinqwenela ukuqala kuyo,” utshilo uDJ Jikijwa. 
U-DJ Jikijwa ulipolisa kodwa uthi umsebenzi wakhe wobupolisa awuphazamisani nowokuba ngumsasazi. Ukusasaza ungena ngeempelaveki, ze kwisebe lesipolisa angene phakathi evekini.  
Uthi oogxa bakhe emsebenzini ngabona bamxhasayo kwaye bamkhuthaza kakhulu ngokuba enze into ayithandayo.  
U-DJ Jikijwa sele ekhe wayifumana imbasa yokubangoyena msasazi ugqwesileyo kumaskandi ewongwa ngeNelson Mandela Music Award ekupheleni kuka2018 eNangoza Jebe eNew Brighton.  
Sele ekhe wachongwa nakwiSATMA Awards ebezibanjelwe eMahikeng kunyaka ophelileyo.
title: UJikijwa ukulungele ukuntingela kwizikhululo ezikhulu

text:
“Ingxaki kukuba sisizukulwana sokuqala esenza ezi zinto ngoko ke sinamatyala amakhulu. Ngoko ke xa ushishina kufuneka ukwazi ukuthengisa ezinye izinto zakho ukuze wonge imali uqale ezinye izinto,” kutsho usomashishini, uSisa Ngebulana, ephendula umbuzo omalunga namarhe okuba uyatshona emva kokuthengisa udederhu lweevenkile iMdantsane City kwakunye nezimbini ezisePitoli; iSunnypark Mall neBloedstreet Mall.  
“Kukho ezinye izinto esiceba ukuzakha siyiRebosis Property Fund; kodwa enye yeempazamo zethu yayikukutyala imali phesheya kweliya lamaNgesi. Ndinezakhiwo ezintathu zodederhu lweevenkile pha emaNgesini. Ezoqoqosho ke aziqhubi kakuhle kwela cala. Emva kweBrexit [ukurhoxa kweUnited Kingdom kwiEuropean Union] yehlile ingeniso kwaye namaxabiso athe xhaxhe. Nathi siceba ukuthengisa izinto zethu ezipha phesheya emaNgesini,” uqhube watsho uNgebulana xeshikweni sincokola naye kwikhaya lakhe lokungcakaza nokubamba iinkomfa elitsha eMthatha, iMayfair Convention and Casino Precinct.  
Phambi kokuba sihlale nale ngqonyela yeBillion Group, sifumane ithuba lokuzulazula esi sakhiwo sitsha sigcwele ubumenyemenye boomatshini bokungcakaza kwakunye nesangqa esinezitulo ekuthengiswa kuso iziselo nokutya.  
Kwinqanaba lesibini lesi sakhiwo kukho iholo lokubamba iinkomfa kwakunye negumbi lokuhlala elithengisa iziselo. Ecaleni kwalapha ezantsi kuvulwe indawo yokutya ekuthiwa yiThe Carvery. 
 Ubungajonga ngapha ibingoosaziwayo, oosomashishini nezithwalandwe zaseMpuma Koloni. Sibala ooKumkani Ndamase Ndamase, inkulumbuso entsha uOscar Mabuyane, umongameli weNAFCOC uSabelo Macingwane, umsasazi uZizo Tshwete, ukubala nje abambalwa.  
UTshwete, obengumbhexeshi walo msitho, uthe iyamvuyisa into yokubona oosomashishini betyala imali apho basuka khona phambi kokuba abize izithethi ngezithethi ukuba ziphawule ngeli linge litsha likaNgebulana.  
Inkqubo ivulwe ngumanejala weMayfair Casino, uPeter Lobban, othe wabulela zonke iindwendwe ezizimase ukuvulwa kweli khaya lokungcakaza.  
Inkulumbuso, uOscar Mabuyane, naye uthethe eqongeni, esitsho ukuba njengenkulumbuso unoxanduva lokukhulisa ezoqoqosho eMpuma Koloni kwaye ubukho bakhe kulo msitho wokuvulwa kweMayfair Casino yinto ekumxholo wakhe. 
“Mandithathe eli thuba ke ngoko ndithi huntshu kubaphathi beMayfair Casino ngokutyala kwabo imali engange R77.1 million ekwakhiweni kwale Casino apha eMthatha. Le misebenzi ingama212 idalwe bubukho bale Casino yinto eyakuthi ithobe intswelangqesho kwesi sixeko.” 
 UMabuyane uqhube wabulela uNgebulana ngokutyala imali kwizakhiwo zeehotele, udederhu lweevenkile neendawo zokuzonwabisa eMpuma Koloni.  
“Sifuna ukuva izinto ezintle zodwa ngokukhula kwale casino. Naxa kunzima uze kuthi uthethe, ungasuke uthule uthengisele abelungu. Oko iyakuba kukubuyisela umva iinzame zethu zenguqu ngokobuhlanga kwezoqoqosho kweli,” uvale ngelitshoyo uMabuyane.  
UNgebulana naye uphakame wenza amazwi ombulelo, esitsho ukuba bekunzima ukwakha eli khaya lokungcakaza ngoba khange bafumane nkxasomali kumaziko amakhulu ezimali. 
 “Siyikhuphe kwiimpokotho zethu le 160 yezigidi zeerandi, xa sele iyonke, yokwakha oku nikubonayo apha ngokuhlwa,” kutsho uNgebulana, phambi kokuba adakance iinjongo zokwakha eli khaya lokungcakaza.  
“Iinjongo zokwakha iMayfair Casino, Convention and Entertainment Centre kukuzisa indawo enokukhulisa ezoqoqosho kwesi sixeko seO.R. Tambo, ikwadala namathuba engqesho. Ngabantu abali1200 abathe bafumana imisebenzi xeshikweni sisakha ze kwashiyeka abangamakhulu amabini benemisebenzi emva kokwakhiwa.”
title: Ikhaya elitsha lokungcakaza eMthatha

text:
Inzwakazi enguSomashishini ophume izandla ekwiphulo lokunikeza amathuba okuphuhlisa italente yolutsha olusakhasayo,  izakubamba umnyhadala wokunceda nokonwabisa kule mpelaveki. Lo msitho uzakubanjelwa eMthatha Country Club ngoMgqibelo wale veki. 
UPinky Xintolo oyingqonyela yenkampani ebizwa iThuba,  uxelele I’solezwe ukuba ujolise ekuncedeni iimvumi ezisakhayo, amaqela omxhentso, abadlali beqonga kunye noonobuhle. 
“Ukusungulwa kweli shishini elibizwa iThuba kuza emveni kokuba umdlali wakumabona-kude owaziwayo uZola Nombona ethe wazenzela igama wakhula ngoncedo  lwethu.” utshilo uXintolo.“Sifuna ukuphuhlisa nolunye ulutsha olunamaphupha okufana noZola Nombona,” woleke ngelo. 
Kule mpelaveki eMthatha, bazakube besingathe ingxikela yomsitho nalapho oomakhwekhwetha beemvumi bazakube begudlana imihlana neemvumi ezisakhasayo.Iimvumi ezifana nooLebo Sekgobela, Betusile Mcinga, Zaza, Sandile Khumalo, Yongama Mrwetyana nabanye. 
“Injongo yokudibanisa ezi mvumi kulo msitho kukuba kudekeke inkundla yonxibelelwano nenkuthazo phakathi koosaziwayo nabo basakhasayo,” utshilo uXintolo. 
Imvumi esakhasayo yaseMthatha, uSandile Khumalo, ivakalise uchulumanco ngeli nyathelo lithatyathwe nguPinky. 
Imvumi ezisakhasayo zilinde ngomonde eli thuba ekudala lilindiwe. UKhumalo uthe “Kunzima ukuba yimvumi, ingakumbi kwicala lemali. Lo msitho sinethemba lokuba uzakwenza umahluko notshintso kuthi zimvumi  ezisakhasayo.”
title: Iimvumi ezaziwayo zidibana neemvumi ezisakhasayo eMthatha

text:
Iintshatsheli ezikhuselayo, iTornado FC, inethuba elihle lokuvula umsantsa ophakathi kwayo namanye amaqela kwiABC Motsepe League ngale mpelaveki.  
ITornado ikwindawo yokuqala emva kokuqokelela amashumi amahlanu anesixhenxe amanqaku. Ishiya iPE Stars noMthatha Bucks ngenqaku elinye kuphela. 
 Emalanga ngoMgqibelo, iTornado kulindeleke ifumane amanqaku apheleleyo xa idibana neBush Bucks A FC ehleli emsileni.  
Umdlalo wempelaveki unika amakhwenkwe kaTshepo Motsoeneng ithuba lokubethelela indawo yawo phezulu kwiMotsepe League ngoba iBucks A FC ayiqhubi kakuhle kwaye ingonjwe yiPE Stars ngo’4-2 emdlalweni ogqithileyo. 
Kwaye kwelinye icala, iPE Stars noMthatha Bucks ezilandela emva kweTornado FC – ziza kuqubisana eBhayi. Umqeqeshi weStars, uDuran Francis, uthi ukuze iqela lakhe libenethuba lokuphumelela indebe yeMotsepe – kufuneka liphumelele yonke imidlalo.  
“Kufuneka siyiphumelele yonke imidlalo yethu eshiyekileyo, ngakumbi leyo siyidlalela ekhayeni,” kutsho uFrancis. Xa enokudlala ntanganye la maqela, lo nto inganika iTornado FC ithuba lokuvula umsantsa wamanqaku. Kweminye imidlalo, idabi lakulwela ukusuka emsileni liqhubela phambili phakathi kweButterworth FC neFuture Tigers, xa zidibana eWalter Sisulu University, eGcuwa, ngoMgqibelo. 
UBanzi “Bra Ace” Siyongwana unethemba lokuba iButterworth FC iza uqokelela amanqaku ngoMgqibelo ukuze isuke ezembeni. Amakhwenkwe kaSiyongwana ahleli kwindawo yeshumi elinesithathu kwiMotsepe League ngamanqaku angamashumi amabini anesithathu. Kanti yona iFuture Tigers ihleli ngezantsi ngamanqaku alishumi elinesithandathu.  
IThe Guys yona iza kudlala nePeace Makers, iYaka United yamkela iBizana Pondo Chiefs, iMatta Milan idibane neBirmingham City, iSibanye FC idlala neSUBS ze iHighbury FC yamkele Amavarara FC.
title: ITornado igxeleshe ukuvula umsantsa kwiMotsepe

text:
USinethemba Mangesi (28) kwakunye noMalixole Matiyase (27), kulindeleke ukuba baqalise isigwebo sabo sobomi entolongweni emva kokuba bethe bafunyanwa yiNkundla ePhakamileyo yaseMakhanda benetyala lokudlwengula intwazana (22). 
Le ntwazana yayineminyaka elishumi elinesibhozo ngethuba ixhwilwa sesi sibini saseMnyameni kufutshane nasePort Alfred ngo2018. Ingxelo ephuma kwiNPA ithi ixhoba lalihamba nomfana elalincuma naye kusebusuku beseBathurst ngethuba edibana naba barhanelwa bebathathu. Bamoxutha kulo mfana  bevule imela, bamsa ngasesiporweni sikaloliwe nalapho bafika batshintshisana ngaye bobathathu bemdlwengula. 
Owesithathu yena umrhanelwa, nelingadizwanga igama lakhe nanjengoko wayesengaphantsi ngokweminyaka ngethuba kusenzeka oku, eneshumi elinesixhenxe leminyaka, esakhe isigwebo esiwiswe yinkundla ibe yiminyaka elishumi. 
Ngokwengxelo yesithethi seNPA kula mmandla, uAnelisa Ngcakani, lo wesithathu umrhanelwa kukholelwa ukuba wanyanzelwa ngaba badala babini kuye kwesi senzo. 
INPA isamkele esi sigwebo, ikwaqhwabele izandla umsebenzi othe wenziwa ngabecuphi, abatshutshisi kwakunye noAdv Hanile Obermeyer.
title: Ubom kwabapakanyela intwazana beyidlwengula

text:
Uswelekile uMphathi weChannel Africa uLuzuko Koti. 
UKoti, 47, usweleke emini namhlanje emva kwengulo ethathe isithuba esingangenyanga. 
Othethela usapho lakwaKoti, uNontobeko Mabitsela, uxelele I’solezwe lesiXhosa ukuba uKoti ubhubhele kwisibhedlele saseNetcare ePretoria East. 
“Ngokwenene kunjalo, ugule isithuba esingangenyanga waze wasweleka namhlanje eNetcare ePretoria East,” kutsho uMabitsela. 
Ngaphandle kokwaziwa njengomsasazi woMhlobo Wenene FM, uKoti bekhe wanguMlawuli wezoNxibelelwano kwiNelson Mandela Foundation. 
“ULuzuko uphile ubomi bakhe ekhonza ilizwe neAfrika ngokubanzi ngemisebenzi yakhe beyenza. Ngokwenene eli lixesha elibuhlungu lokuphulukana nethandazwe,” kutsho uMabitsela. 
Ucele ilizwe ukuba libeke umama wakhe, abantwana bakhe nosapho lonke emthandazweni. 
Uthe amalungiselelo obuya aziswe.
title: Uswelekile uLuzuko Koti

text:
Umqeqeshi oyiNtloko waMavarara, uArchie Dyeli, unethemba lokuba impumelelo ezuzwe liqela lakhe ngempelaveki edlulileyo iza kukhuthaza abadlali xa bebuyela kwiABC Motsepe League.  
Amavarara enze imbali ebholeni ekhatywayo ngokuzibekela indawo kumjikelo wesibini weNedbank Cup emva kokubetha iSuper Eagles emdlalweni obumhle eSisa Dukashe Stadium. 
 Emidlalweni elishumi elinesihlanu kwiMotsepe League, eli qela laseKomani liphumelele imidlalo esixhenxe, labethwa kwemine laze ladlala ntanganye kwemine.  
Amavarara anamanqaku angamashumi amabini anesihlanu, kwindawo yokuqala kuthe ngcu iBush Bucks enamashumi amathathu anesine amanqaku kwiMotsepe League yaseMpuma Koloni.  
Akukonakali nto, kodwa kunyanzelekile iqela likaMzunani Mgwigwi lizame ukuqokelela amanqaku apheleleyo phantse kuyo yonke imidlalo yalo elandelayo. 
Omabini amaqela waseMpuma Koloni, Amavarara neChippa United, akwazile ukuzibekala iindawo kumjikelo olandelayo weNedbank Cup.  
Ukuphumelela kweqela laseKomani yinto enkulu kubaphathi balo nakubathandi bebhola baseChris Hani ngokubanzi.  
“Ndivuya kakhulu,” utshilo uArchie Dyeli, iNtloko yezoQeqesho yaMavarara.  
“Kwenzeke into ekudala eyinqwenela usihlalo iqela lakhe lisadlala kwinqanaba elisezantsi. Ndiqinisekile uchulumance kakhulu apho akhoyo,” utshilo uDyeli emva komdlalo. 
Nangona iqela lakhe uDyeli evumile okokuba likhe laphazanyiswa ziingxaki zangaphakathi ezibangele ukubethwa kwalo, kodwa uthe iyabonakala indima eyenziwe nguMgwigwi onikwe uxanduva lokuqeqesha ekuqaleni kwalo nyaka. 
Ngoku Amavarara aza kudibana neBlack Leopards, yona iChippa United ithelekiswe neBidvest Wits.  
“Ndiqinisekile, impumelelo esiyizuzileyo iza kusinceda emidlalweni yethu yeMotsepe League. Emva kokungena kwiNedbank Cup, iqela zange liqhube kakuhle kwade kwatshintshwa nomqeqeshi. Uyabonakala umahluko oko efikile umqeqeshi kwezi veki zine zigqithileyo kwaye abadlali bayabonakala ukuba bayibambile indlela afuna badlale ngayo,” utshilo uDyeli. Amavarara adibana neSpear of the Nation emdlalweni weMotsepe League oza kubanjelwa eKomani ngo15:00 ngoMgqibelo. 
Imidlalo yeMotsepe League: 
Lwesihlanu: Swartkops Valley United vs Sibanye United 
Mgqibelo: Yaka United vs PE Stars; Birmingham City vs Mthatha Bucks; Bisho Stars vs Matta Milan; Bizana Pondo Chiefs vs Highbury FC; Bush Bucks vs Bush Pirates
title: Amavarara anethemba lokuhle kwiMotsepe League

text:
Iqela laseKapha elitsha lityikitye umdlali we-Orlando Pirates, uTshepo Gumede, kutshanje. Ezi ndaba zidizwe leli qela kwikhasi lonxibelelwano, uTwitter.  
“SiyiCape Town City sinovuyo olukhulu ukwazisa uTshepo Gumede, njengomdlali wethu, siyakwamkela,” itshilo iCape Town City. Lo mdlali ngomnye wabadlali abakumgangatho ophezulu kwibhola nje ngokubanzi futhi odlalele neqela lesizwe, kodwa izinto khange zimhambele kakuhle kwiPirates kwisizini ephelileyo.  
Libathwana nje lemidlalo uGumede ayidlalileyo kwisizini ephelileyo, nayo khange ibentle ngoba wathi ithuba sele elifumene waphinda wahlala ngaphandle. Ngoku uzibandakanye neli qela litsha eKapa enethemba lokuvuselela ikhono lakhe lokudlala ibhola kwiPremier League.  
Phambi kokuthengwa kwakhe yiBucs, uGumede yayingumdlali eyayithembele ngaye ngamaxesha onke iPlatinum Stars. Ngoku ulandela * -Eric Tinkler obeqeqesha i-Orlando Pirates oqale ukuqeqesha iCape Town City kwinyanga ephelileyo.
title: UGumede wamkelwe yiCape Town City

text:
Njengokuba isizini yeDStv Premiership ka-2020/21 inethutyana ivaliwe, abaphathi bamaqela bakhangela abadlali abanokubafumana phambi kokuqala kwesizini entsha kwinyanga yeThupha. Baninzi abadlali abafunwayo emva kokuziqaqambisa kwisizini egqithileyo. Phakathi kwabadlali ekulindeleke bafunwe ngapha nangapha nguTabiso Kutumela odlalela iMaritzburg United. UKutumela udlale kakuhle kakhulu kwisizini egqithileyo kwaye ufake namagowuli ancede iTeam of Choice ebingayiqalanga kakuhle isizini. Akwenze ngethuba edlalela aBafana Bafana abazibethele i-Uganda ngo’3-2 emdlalweni wobuhlobo obukwiveki ephelileyo kumenze wanomntsalane kakhulu. Elona qela ekunokwenzeka lizame ukurhwebeshela kulo yiMamelodi Sundowns eziintshatsheli zeDStv Premiership. 
Umqeqeshi wayo, uManqoba Mngqithi, watsho esidlangalaleni ukuba uTabiso ngumdlali amthandayo. “Andiqinisekanga ngokuza kwakhe kwiSundowns – kodwa ngumdlali endimthandayo,” utshilo uMngqithi ethetha neentatheli kutshanje. Kulindeleke kwenziwe iinguqu yiMaritzburg emva kokusokola kwisizini ehlangulwe kuyo kukubuya kuka-Ernst Middendorp. Nangona uKutumela, 27, engengomdlali onokuhanjiswa lula emva kokufaka ishumi elinesine lamagowuli – kodwa kuthiwa iTeam of Choice ingamthengisa ngoba ingenza imali enokulinceda iqela. Abanye abadlali abafunwa ngamaqela amakhulu nguTeboho Mokoena nogxa wakhe uSipho Mbule abadlalela iSuperSport United. 
Zikhe zaqina iindaba ezithi Amakhosi ayabafuna bobabini. Ngoku aqeqeshwa nguStuart Baxter, ingenzeka lo nto ngoba ngabadlali asebenze nabo kwiSuperSport. Kodwa iChiefs ayiyodwanga, neSundowns inawo umdla kubo. Akukacaci kakuhle okuza kwenzeka – kodwa iChiefs kulindeleke yenze iinguqu ezibonakalayo emva kwesizini engantlanga. Yona iBaroka FC ingaphulakana no-Evidence Makgopa ofake amagowuli amabini emdlalweni weqela lesizwe kwiveki ephelileyo. Iingxelo zithi iChiefs, iSundowns ne-Orlando Pirates ziyamfuna uMakgopa – kodwa okungecaci ncam kukuba iBaroka iza kuvumana ukumthengisa. Kwakuba nzima ukumgcina kodwa ngoba iyayidinga imali enokuyizuza xa imthengisa.
title: Abadlali abaphambili abafunwa shushu ngamaqela amakhulu

text:
UMakazole Mapimpi ngomnye wabadlali ababonakalisileyo ukubanesakhono kwezi sizini zimbini zidlulileyo.  
Lo mdlali wenza ezibukwayo kwiSouthern Kings nakwiCheetahs ngokulandelelana. Kunyaka ophelileyo, uMapimpi unkqonkqoze kumaBhokobhoko emva kokudlala umbhoxo ophucukileyo.  
Ukudlala kwakhe kakuhle uMapimpi kumvulele ithuba kwiSharks emtyikityileyo. 
Nangona kucaca icala nje xa elinikiwe ithuba kwiSharks, uMapimpi udlale imidlalo emine.  
Ulele emgceni kwimidlalo emithathu kwelithoba edlalwe liqela lakhe kwiSuper Rugby. Lo mdlali uthi uxhomile umgangatho kwiSharks.  
“Uxhomile umgangatho kwiSharks. Sikhuphisana ngendawo enye sibaninzi,” utshilo. 
Le ndedeba ithi inoloyiko lokuba ukungadlali qho kunganciphisa amathuba wayo okudlalela iqela loMzantsi Afrika lombhoxo.  
“Kunyaka ophelileyo ndidlale kwiqela leSA A – kodwa ukungadlali rhoqo kuza kuwanciphisa amathuba okuba ndibizwe kwakhona,” itshilo le nzalelwane yaseTsholomnqa. 
UMapimpi, 27, ukholelwa kwelokuba le mingeni ajongene nayo iza kumenza abe ngumdlali ongcono.  
“Asikaqhelani kakuhle nomqeqeshi weSharks. Yenye into endiqonda ibangela ukuba ndingadlali qho. Imicelimngeni iyamkhulisa umntu, nam ke ndiyakholelwa ukuba iza kundikhulisa,” utshilo uMapimpi. 
Eli tyendyana aliyilibali inkxaso eliyifumana kubalandeli bombhoxo. “Ndiyayibulela inkxaso yabo abalandeli,” uvale ngatshoyo uMapimpi. 
Imidlalo equka amaqela aseMzantsi Afrika kwitumente yeSuper Rugby kule mpelaveki: ILions indendwela iHurricanes e-AAMI Park ngemizuzu engamashumi amabini anesihlanu phambi kweyeshumi kusasa.  
IStomers singquzulana neBulls eNewlands, ngemizuzu emihlanu emva kwentsimbi yesithathu emva kwemini.  
ISharks ziqubisana neeHighlanders, eThekwini, ngemizuzu emihlanu emva kwentsimbi yesixhenxe malanga. Yonke le midlalo iza kudlala ngoMgqibelo umhla wesihlanu kwekaCanzibe.
title: Makazole Mapimpi: Uxhomile umgangatho kwiSharks

text:
IMamelodi Sundowns yenze edume ngayo kwakhona. Ithenge uJeremy Brockie – oyena mdlali onamandla nonefuthe kwibhola yeli lizwe ngemali eqikelelwa ngaphaya kweshumi lezigidi zeerandi.  
Emva kokuxhathisa ixesha elide efunwa lo mdlali ngamaqela amakhulu, ingqonyela yeSuperSport United, uStanley Matthews, ide yabona kufanelekile ukumkhulula oyena mdlali woyikwayo, mhlawumbi – kuba besekucaca ukuba uBrockie ufuna ukuhamba.  
Ekuqaleni kwale veki uMatthews ungqinile ukuba le folosi yaseNew Zealand ithengiselwe iSundowns. 
Ukubambelela kwakhe uMatthews kulo mdlali ukwenze kuba ebefuna ukuqinisekisa ukuba ufumana imali eninzi xa emthengisa. 
Utshilo ke kambe ukuba uBrockie ngoyena mdlali othengiswe ngemali eninzi yiSuperSport United. 
 Le folosi yenze umsebenzi oncomekayo kuMatsatsantsa a Pitori emva kokufaka amagowuli akumashumi amahlanu nane (54) kuyo yonke imidlalo ayidlalileyo ukusukela ngo-2015. 
Uncede iSuperSport kwiindebe ezintathu eziphumeleleyo nakwiCaf Confederation Cup eyoyisakele ekugqibeleni kuyo ngo-2017.  
“Kunzima ukuphulukana nomdlali obukhali njengoJeremy. Kule minyaka abe nathi ngayo, uBrockie ngoyena mdlali ofake amagowuli amaninzi. Siye saqonda ukuba eli lelona thuba lakhe lokugqibela lokuzenzela imali. Yiyo lo nto isigqeba esilawulayo sigqibe kwelokuba akhululwe,” utshilo uMatthews. 
Into ecacileyo kwintetho kaBrockie yokuqala njengomdlali weDowns kukuba iimbono zikaPitso Mosimane uye wazithanda kwaye kuyabonakala ukuba ufike endaweni ebeyifuna kakade. 
“Iinjongo zikaPitso ezimkhokelela empumelelweni ziyandikhuthaza ziphinde zindonwabise kwangaxeshanye. Ndikungxamele kakhulu ukudlala phantsi kwakhe. Xa ethetha ngokuphumelela iChampions League, umdlali uyakhuthazeka yilo nto kwaye ndingavuya ukuba ndingayiphumelela nam,” utshilo uBrockie. 
Kunokwenzeka uBrockie adlaliswe nguPitso kumdlalo wePSL ophakathi kweSundowns nePlatinum Stars ngo’18:00 eLoftus Versfeld Stadium ngoMgqibelo.  
Amakhwenkwe kaPitso asazikhotha amanxeba emva kokubethwa ngo’3-1 yi-Orlando Pirates. Kule veki iDowns izakufuna ukulungisa izinto ukuze ihlale phezulu ngaphandle kwexhala.
title: UBrockie uthabathekile ziimbono zikaPitso

text:
Iqela lesizwe lamantombazana adlala ibhola eMzantsi Afrika, lenza iziqwenga kwitumente ekuthiwa yiCosafa esingathwe yidolophu yaseBhayi. Emva kwemidlalo emithathu ukuzothi ga ngoku, iBanyana Banyana iphumelele imidlalo emithathu.  
Ekuqaleni kwale veki, uMzantsi Afrika ubethele oogqirha nezicaka iMalawi ngamagowuli amathandathu eqandeni (6-0) kumdlalo weCosafa obubanjelwe eWolfson Stadium.  
Ngaphambili, iBanyana Banyana ibethe iMadagasca ngo’2-1 neBotswana ngo’1-0. Emva kwaleyo imidlalo umqeqeshi weBanyana, uDesiree Ellis, ebengonelisekanga kwaphela – kodwa emva kokuba iqela lakhe liphumelele ngemvula yamagowuli, ngokuqinisekileyo – uya kumdlalo olandelayo ukuzithemba kufunqukile. 
Ngoku iBanyana iza kudibana nelizwe laseUganda kumdlalo weCosafa ophambi kowokugqibela eWolfson Stadium.  
Umdlali ozibaluleyo kumdlalo ogqithileyo nguLinda Motlhalo ofake amagowuli amathathu eyedwa.  
Amanye amathathu afakwe nguKhanya Xeshi (amabini) noKgaelebane obuye nelinye. Komnye umdlalo iNamibia ivuthulule ilizwe lasebumelwaneni, Eswatini, ngamagowuli amane kwelinye (4-1) eWolfson Stadium. Kwangaxeshanye, uKapteni weBanyana Banyana, uJanine Van Wyk, ubhiyozele umdlalo wakhe wekhulu namashumi amahlanu emidlalo kwiqela lesizwe.  
Lo nto ithetha ukuthi ungoyena mdlali kweli lizwe odlale imidlalo emininzi ngaphezulu kwabo bonke abadlali kwiBanyana Banyana. 
Le tumente yeCosafa ikwasetyenziswa njengeqonga lokuphakamisa umsebenzi omhle woluntu owenziwe ngoomama abafana negqala lomzabalazo uAlbertina Sisulu.  
“Kuyasivuyisa ukusebenzisa iitumente ezifana nale njengendawo esinokubhiyozela kuyo ubomi bukaMama uSisulu owazinikelayo ukuze kukhululeke abantu. Siwabonile amabhinqa esenza ezibukwayo ebholeni kwihlabathi – kodwa ndicinga ukuba sihamba phambili thina kwicala lokubanika amathuba kwingingqi esemazantsi weAfrika nakwiAfrika ngokubanzi,” utshilo usosiba weCosafa, uSue Destombes.
title: Benza iziqwenga aBanyana Banyana kwiCosafa

text:
Xa kuqala le nyanga yoKwindla sikhumbula uJambase, uNjingalwazi Mangaliso Sobukhwe neentshukumo zakhe zokulwa, esilwela inkululeko yabantu abamnyama.  
Kwakungale nyanga ngo1960 apho eli gorha laseMaMfeneni lakhokela iqela lamadoda amnyama ukuya kuniwkezela ukuba babanjwe kwisikhululo samapolisa eOrlando.  
Oku kwakubonakalisa ukuchasa kwabo ubukhoboka bokuphatha amapasi, babezincamile besithi baxolele undenze mayibuye iAfrika.  
Okona kunika umdla ngezo ziganeko zakudala kukufumanisa ukuba uninzi lwezinto awayezithetha lo kaSobukhwe zazichaneke ngolona hlobo.  
Ngaphandle kokuzinikezela emapoliseni besilwa namapasi ngomhla wamashumi amabini ananye, la madoda awatshisa la mapasi kamva.  
Izimvo zakhe ezakhokelela kwesi siganeko sokuzinikezela emapoliseni zisafanelekile kunanamhla oku.  
Wayekuchase kakhulu ukuba yinxalenye yendibanisela yemibutho yezopolitiko eyahlukeneyo, esithi oku kuza kuxuba izimvo zedabi lamaAfrika, kungoko yena noogxa bakhe beza noluvo oluthi bangamaAfrika Poqo.  
Wayesithi makondliwe iingqondo zabantu baseAfrika ngemfundiso ukuze batyebe ngengqondo nolwazi ukuze bahlale bezihloniphile, behloniphe ubuAfrika.  
Wayekwathi nabani ofuna ukuba yinxalenye yedabi lamaAfrika kumele ukuba amkele yonke imfundiso, iinkolo neminqweno yeAfrika. Kungenxa yoku okwabangela ukuba abongoze abafundi ababengoogxa bakhe eFort Hare ukuba ze bahlale bekhumbula iAfrika.  
Asisenakuthetha ngezimvo zakhe kumcimbi womhlaba, izimvo zakhe ngomhla zazifanelekile ngoko kwaye zisafanelekile kunanamhla oku.  
Ukuba zazondliwe ngenene iingqondo zamaAfrika ngokuzingca ngeAfrika ngezingekho iziganeko zokuba indoda enye itye imali yona nosapho lwayo belambile abantu baseAfrika.  
Ngesele lakwazi kudala eli lizwekazi ukuzimela ngokwezimali ngaphandle kokuxhomekeka kwiimfundiso nezimvo zabanye abantu.  
Kukungazazi nokungazingci okubangela ubusela, ubuqhophololo nokunyoluka okubangela ubomi obunzima kwabanye abantu.  
Kumele ukuba sikhumbule kwiintetho zikaSobukhwe xa ebongoza amaAfrika ukuba ahlale ekhumbula iAfrika kwinto nganye abayenzayo.  
Zininzi iziganeko zokukhumbula le Ngonyama yaseAfrika eziqhutywa ngamaziko emfundo ephakamileyo ngokukodwa ngale nyanga, kodwa umbuzo uthi kazi ukuba simve kakuhle na xa esithi ze sincede sikhumbule iAfrika.  
Kwiveki ephelileyo eKapa kugxothwe abantu abadinga iindawo, imisebenzi negunya lobumi bethunyelwa apho bangaziyo. “Ze nincede nikhumbule iAfrika”
title: Njingalwazi Mangaliso Sobukhwe: ‘Ze nikhumbule iAfrika’

text:
Njengesiqhelo ulile iinyembezi uBhishophu uDesmond Tutu ngethuba kuqhutywa inkonzo yemibhiyozo yeminyaka engamashumi amane athe wayichitha ekhokele kumanqanaba ahlukeneyo enkonzo yamaTshetshi eMzantsi Afrika.  
Le nkonzo yokunika imbeko kweli gqala iqhutyelwe e-St Mary’s Catherdral eRawutini ibikhokelwe ngunjingalwazi umfundisi Barney Pityana ibikwazinyaswe ziibhishophu eziphezulu kwezakwalizwi.  
Ngomyalezo obhalwe yibhishophu yama Tshetshi eKapa uThabo Makgoba wenze amazwi okunika imbeko kwel gqala.  
“Inkonzo yethu ibingenakufika kule ndawo ikuyo ngaphandle kokuzinikezela nokuzincama kwakho emsebenzini weNkosi, ngale minyaka ingamashumi amane siyabulela ngokuzincama kwakho,” utshilo uMakgoba. 
Lowo wayesakuba ngumongameli weli uThabo Mbeki kunye nalowo wasakuba ngusekela mongameli weli uKgalema Motlanthe bebephakathi kweendwalutho ebezizimase lo mcimbi. 
Ethetha ngethuba esamnkela izipho uDesmond Tutu ukwazile ukuzilawula iinyembezi, wathetha esenza amazwi ombulelo. 
“Kuwe njingalwazi Barney Pityana ngombono ololu hlobo kwiBhishophu ezahlukileyo kwiqela iMilonji kaNtu, enkosi kakhulu kulowo wayesakuba ngumongameli weli uThabo Mbeki, bendingakulindelanga ukunikwa imbeko ngamadoda amakhulu afana nani,”utshilo uTutu. 
 Uncome inkonzo yakhe ngokukodwa eSt Mary’s esithi uninzi lezinto ezibalulekileyo ebomini bokukhonza kwakhe zenzeke kwizakhiwo zale nkonzo. 
“Ukwamnkela kwam igunya lokuba yibhishophu kwakulapha kule nkonzo, ndikhokele kule nkonzo ixesha elide kakhulu, ikho imfihlelo ekhoyo ngam nale nkonzo yase-St Mary’s, utshilo uTutu. 
Ekuqaleni kwale nyanga uTutu ubhiyozele iminyaka engamashumi amathandathu ananye watshatayo nenkosikazi yakhe Leah Tutu.  
UTutu utotobe wayakuma phambi kwesibingelelo ephelekwa yinkosikazi yakhe uLeah nalapho afike wabekwa izandla ziiBhishophu zenkonzo yaseTshetshi. Iqela lodumo iMilonji kaNtu belikhokhele kumculo obuculwa kulo msitho ngengoma kaNtsikane nezinye iingoma.  
UDesomond Tutu yenye yeenkokheli zakwalizwi ebisoloko ihamba phathakathi kwabahlali ngexesha lomzabalazo enika inkxaso ngeendlela ezahlukileyo. Lo kaTutu uyaziwa ngokuthetha phandle koorhulumente abahlukileyo xa kukho into angahambisaniyo nayo.  
UTutu ugxeke ngokucacileyo iimbono zikamongameli uThabo Mbeki malunga nesifo ugawulayo ngexesha ebephethe uMbeki, ukanti akakhange alibazise ukugxeka uJacob Zuma nolawulo lakhe ekhuthaza uluntu ukuba luthethe phandle ngeengxaki zelizwe loMzantsi Afrika.
title: Ukhale iinyembezi uTutu kwimibhiyozo ngegalelo lakhe

text:
Yinkosikazi enamashumi amahlanu (50) egama linguNomnandi Mabhude kwakunye nomfana onamashumi amabini anesihlanu uThando Tshezi (25) abathe bagwetywa ubom ejele yinkundla yamatyala ephakamileyo yaseMthatha emva kokufunyanwa benetyala lokubulala kwanelokuxhwila inkwenkwana. 
Ngokwengxelo ephuma kuKapteni Edith Mjoko, le nkosikazi kwakunye nalo mfana babanjwa kunyaka ophelileyo baze babekwa ityala lokuxhwila kwanelokubulala inkwenkwe eyayineminyaka elishumi elinesine ubudala. Le nkwenkwe emva kokubulawa kwayo yabhaqwa inyengezwe kwizindlu zangasese zesikolo. 
Uphando olwenziwa ngabecuphi lakhokelela ekubanjweni kwaba barhanelwa babini. 
Inkumanda yamapolisa uBrigadiya Mtutuzeli Mtukushe usamkele isigwebo esinikwe esi sibini. 
Kusenjalo, limisiwe ityala lentwazana enamashumi amabini anesibini ubudala (22) yaseSt Francis Bay ejongene nokuhlaba ibulale enye intwazana enamashumi amathathu ubudala (30) emva kwengxabano evele kwindawo yentselo. 
Ngokwengxelo yesithethi samapolisa ala mmandla, uSajini Majola Nkohli , ingxwaba-ngxwaba le phakathi kwala magqiyazana mabini ivele ezinzulwini zobusuku besengaphakathi kwindawo yentselo. 
“Oku kwenzeke ngeCawa emva kwentsimbi yesibini ekuzeni kusa kumatyotyombe iSea Vista eSt Francis Bay, ngaphakathi kwindawo yentselo. Indawo yentselo iye yavala, kulapho umlo wesi sibini sala magqiyazana uye waqala phantsi kwakhona ngaphandle kwindlela egodukayo.”
title: Igwetywe ubom inkosikazi yaseMthatha

text:
Umngcwabi owaziwayo eGcuwa, uNgenisile Gxoyi, ugwetywe iminyaka elishumi elinesibini ejele emva kokufunyanwa enetyala lokubulala indoda ekwa ngummi waseGcuwa. 
Inkundla yengingqi eGcuwa imfumene enetyala lo kaGxoyi emva kokudubula abulale uMfundo Ndlwana (30). 
Isithethi samapolisa aseGcuwa uKapteni Jackson Manatha uthi uGxoyi, ongumnini wenkampani yokungcwaba iGxoyi Funeral Services wayerhanela uNdlwana ngokuba isixhobo (gear box) semoto yakhe koka-2012. 
“Lo kaGxoyi waya kwindawo asebenzela kuyo uNdlwana eBika nalapho kwathi emva kwengxwaba-ngxwaba, wakhupha umpu wamdubula. Umfi wabhubha ngoko nangoko,” utshilo uManatha. 
Ukanti ngokwengxelo kaManatha, umpu lo wadubula ngawo losomashishini wawunempepha mvume. 
UGxoyi wakhe wangundaba-mlonyeni eGcuwa kwiminyaka embalwa edlulileyo emva kokuba kwakuthe ndii iindaba zokuba yena, nabanye abangcwabi eGcuwa, bathengisa ngamalungu omzimba ezidumbu zabo. 
Kusasazo lwenkqubo yeendaba kwiKhanya Community Radio eGcuwa koka-2009, uGxoyi wazikhanyela ezizityholo, esithi “zibubuvuvu!” 
abongile.ginya@inl.co.za
title: Ugwetyiwe umngcwabi waseGcuwa

text:
“UMzantsi Afrika unembali encomekayo yoosomashishini abantsundu ababeqhuba amashishini kakuhle kwiilokishi ngamaxesha ocalucalulo kweli,” kutsho usihlalo weAfrican Rainbow Minerals, uPatrice Motsepe, kwintetho ayenze kwindibano yebhunga loosomashishini abantsundu (BBC) eRhawutini kule veki iphelileyo.  
Uqhube wathi: “Ukuba asibakhumbuzi abantu bakuthi ukuba nabani na wayekwazi ukuzishishinela kakuhle, asikayifumani ncam inguqu nenkululeko kweli.”  
Ukanti uMongameli weli bhunga liyiBBC, uSandile Zungu, umemelele urhulumente ukuba kusekwe iarhente yabucala eza kujongana nezinikimaxabiso nezinye iikontraki ezinkulu ekudala zisohlula urhulumente, “siyalixhasa neligwijo likaThuma Mina, liyasomeleza kwaye sifuna ukuthi impumelelo yamashishini antsundu yinto ekufuneka yenzeke nakanjani kweli.”  
Umphathiswa wophuhliso lwamashishini asakhasayo, uLindiwe Zulu, uphendule ngelithi “ucalucalulo kweli lwakhuthuza umntu ontsundu; lamshiya ephaca, engakwazi nokuzibona ukuba angayintoni ebomini, athathe inxaxheba kwezoqoqosho. Kukuni nina soomashishini abantsundu ukuba niqhube iinkqubo zeenguqu ngokobuhlanga kwezoshishino kwaye nilwele ukusebenza kwiindawo ezingenabo ubuqhophololo!”  
“Kufuneka nidibane, nilwe nale nto yabelungu abahombisa ngabantu abantsundu kwizikhundla eziphezulu ibe iinkampani ezo zisemhlophe. Kufuneka oosomashishini abantsundu bazibonakalise; kucace ukuba abaphelelanga kwizinto ezithile kuphela,” uvale ngelo uZulu.  
Le ndibano ibigcwele oosaziwayo kwezoshishino, amagosa karhulumente kunye noosomashishini abasaqalayo.  
Iinjongo ibikukwabelana ngolwazi nokushukuxa imiba efana nembuyekezo yomhlaba ngaphandle kwentlawulo, imithetho nemigaqo ecothisa inguqu ngokobuhlanga kwezoshishino, ukushishina norhulumente, ukulwa ubuqhophololo, uvukelo lwesine kwezoshishino (4th Industrial Revolution / 4IR) nokulungiselela amashishini abantsundu kwi-4IR.  
Oosopolitiki abasuka kwiANC, UDM, EFF neDA nabo banikwe ithuba lokuhlomla ngezoqoqosho kwipolitiki. UShivambu uyikhabele kude into yolu vukelo lwesine kwezoshishino ngelithi, “andazi yimincili yantoni le ninayo ngale 4th Industrial Revolution! Kudala ikhona, naziya iimoto zisenziwa ngoosomashishini, hayi ngabantu pha kwaBMW! Andazi nokuba yinto entle ke leyo ngoba akusekho bantu ngoku kwezo zikhundla!”  
UStella Ndabeni-Abrahams, onguMphathiswa wezoNxibelelwano kweli, wosule la manzi ebegalelwa nguShivambu ngokuthetha ngamathuba alele kule nguqu yovukelo lwesine kwezoshishino (4IR), ekhuthaza oosomashishini abantsundu ukuba bayibambe ngezandla zozibini; bayile amakhasi omnatha wonxibelelwano ngeelwimi zesiNtu, nabo bazixakekise pha kumnatha, benze imali.  
Oku kungqinwe kwaze kwagxininiswa ngusihlalo weSekunjalo Investments Holdings, uGqr Iqbal Surve, owongeze nemizekelo yeenkampani – ezifana nooFacebook, Uber nooAmazon – ezenza izithonga zemali ngokushishina kumnatha wonxibelelwano qha.  
UMaite Nkoana-Mashabane, onguMphathiswa woPhuhliso lwamaPhandle, ibe sesona sithethi sishukumise umzi xeshikweni ebuza imibuzo enzima koosomashishini abantsundu: “Andikayiboni mna le nto sinokuyenza ngomhlaba! Naba oomasipala banawo umhlaba kodwa loo mhlaba abenzi ngeniso ngawo!”  
Phambi kokuba enze umzekelo ngomhlabana omncinci oseMidrand, eRhawutini, ekuthiwa yiWaterfall, “ngumhlaba nje omncinci osezandleni zomntu omnye, omeme abantu ukuba bazokwakha amapomakazi namashishini abo kuwo. Yhey! Uwulungisile la mhlaba, wogqitha nooSandton ngobuhle ngoku. Ingxaki ayingomhlaba, ingxaki yile unokuyenza ngawo! Masikhuthaze abantsundu ukuba bangawuthengisi nto zakuthi. Gcina umhlaba wakho, uwusebenzise ngendlela eyenza imali!” nalapho kuphakame iholo lonke limqhwabela izandla uNkoana-Mashabane. Nangona kuthethwe kakuhle, kuye kwakho oosomashishini abasakhasayo abathe bona badikiwe ngamagama amakhulu nezithembiso zikarhulumente koosomashishini. “Onke la magama ee “more support for SMMEs”, “accelerated growth”, “shorten payment period” awathethi nto ukuba awalandelelwa ngezenzo. Urhulumente usuke wayingcali yokucikoza nokusithuthuzela ngala magama amnandi,” kutsho usomashishinikazi ongafunanga kuchazwa kwiphepha. 
 Usuku lokugqibela lale ndibano yeBBC luvalwe nguMongameli Cyril Ramaphosa, kwisidlo sangokuhlwa ngoLwesihlanu, nalapho avakalise inkxaso yakhe nokuzimisela ukunceda oosomashishini abantsundu kweli.
title: Ibhunga loosomashishini abantsundu (Black Business Council) libambe indibano eyakhayo eGallagher Convention Centre, ngomhla wokugqibela kweyoMdumba nowokuqala kweyoKwindla

text:
Umphathiswa wezothutho, ezendlela nokhuseleko eMpuma Koloni uWeziwe Tikana ebambisene namapolisa eli phondo leMpuma Koloni bazakube besenzela obesakuba nguMkomishinala wamapolisa ephondweni uLieutenant General Celiwe Binta itheko nanjengoko eshiya esihlalweni emva kokuphela kwesivumelwano sakhe.  
Oku kuzakubanjelwa kumabala ezemidlalo aseBhisho ngaseQonce ukusuka ngentsimbi yeshumi kusasa ngoLwesihlanu.  
Kwakulo msitho uTikana uzakube enikeza ngeediploma zabaphumelele uqeqesho lobugosa bezendlela.
title: Kubulelwa igalelo lobesakuba nguMkomshinala

text:
Ifumene amanqaku amathathu i-Orlando Pirates emva kokubetha iSwallows FC ngegowuli elinye eqandeni (1-0) emdlalweni wokuqala weDStv Premiership obubanjelwe e-Orlando Stadium emalanga namhlanje. Lo ibingumdlalo wokuqala phantsi komqeqeshi weBucs omtsha, uJose Riveiro, othathe indawo kaMandla Ncikazi noFadlu Davids abebeqeqesha ngokubambisana kwisizini egqithileyo. Ezimnyama ziqale umdlalo ngabadlali abatsha abafana noTapelo Xoki, uNkosinathi Sibisi noBienvenu Eva Nga. Yona iSwallows idlale ngaphandle komqeqeshi, uDylan Kerr, osalinde amaphephamvume okusebenza eMzantsi Afrika. 
Umdlalo uqale ngezinga eliphezulu – kodwa yiPirates ekwazileyo ukubhalisa ebhodini phambi kwexesha lokuphumla. Igowuli ephumelele ngalo iPirates lifakwe yifolosi esuka kwiChippa United, uEva Nga. Nakubeni omabini amaqela ezamile ukudala amathuba okufaka amagowuli emdlalweni – kodwa iSwallows ayikwazanga ukuwasebenzisa kakuhle awayo. Isidlale kakuhle isiqingatha sokuqala iPirates kwaye bekufanele ukuba iye ekhefini ihamba phambili ngenqwaba yamagowuli. UKabelo Dlamini noSibisi boyiswe kukusebenzisa amathuba ebemahle kakhulu. Zijikile izinto kwisigaba sesibini kancinci. Abadlali beSwallows babuye bengxolisiwe. 
Badlale ibhola ebhetele kunePirates. Iinyoni zaseDube ngezigoduke nenqaku elinye – kodwa usompempe ukhethe ukungaziniki ipenela ecacileyo. USibisi uwise uPatjie emhlabeni kanozinti, ngelo xesha usompempe engekudanga kwindawo yesehlo. Komnye umdlalo, iRichards Bay yothuse abantu abaninzi xa ihlaza iGolden Arrows ngamagowuli amabini eqandeni emdlalweni weDStv Premiership wobukhaya ePrincess Magogo Stadium emalanga namhlanje. Emdlalweni wokuqala izolo ebusuku, iMamelodi Sundowns ibethe iCape Town City ngamagowuli amabini eqandeni eCape Town Stadium. 
Orlando Pirates: Ofori, Xoki, Sibisi, Maela, Hotto, Monare, Mosele, Nonyane, Dlamini, Lorch, Eva Nga. 
Amalalela: Mpontshane, Ndah, Mako, Shandu, Lepasa, Tlolane, Makaringe, Motshwari, Timm. 
Swallows: Mbanjwa, Damons, Sasman, Sait, Khupe, Mngonyama, Mtshali, Wambi, Patjie, Isaacs. 
Amalalela: Ngobeni, Sibiya, Allan, Lukhubeni, Musonda, Mbhele, Amoojee, Mthethwa, Mtshali.
title: iPirates ibethe iSwallows, yona iRichards Bay ihlaze iGolden Arrows!

text:
UMongameli Cyril Ramaphosa ubongoze uSihlalo weANC eMpuma Koloni, uOscar Mabuyane, ukuba aqinise isandla koomasipala baseMpuma Koloni, esithi banoxanduva lokutshintsha ubomi babantu. 
 
URamaphosa ebethetha kwiholo yaseGompo eDuncan Village ngeCawe, apho iinkokheli zeANC bezithetha noluntu, ukuhlakulela unyulo lonyaka ozayo. 
 
URamaphosa, otyelele ikhaya likamam’ uNomathemba Fazzie (91) olitshantliziyo lomzabalazo, uthi akonelisekanga yimeko ayibone eDuncan Village. 
 
KwaFazzie, uRamaphosa ubone ukuba uyenziwa umsebenzi wokuxandisa indlu yeRDP kamam’ uFazzie. 
 
“Imeko eniphila phantsi kwayo andiyithandi, ndifuna siyilungise. Ndifuna siyilungise ukuze nibenezindlu kwaneenkonzo ezifana namanzi nombane. Ndifuna nihlale kwizindlu ezingcono hayi ematyotyombeni unaphakade. 
 
“Kukho abantu abahlal’ ematyotyombeni iminyaka engaphaya kwengamashumi amabini. Ayilunganga le nto kwaye iza kufuna sikhawuleze siyilungise. Ndiza kubuya kwakhona ndizokujonga ukuba oomasipala benza ntoni apha,” utshilo uRamaphosa. 
 
URamaphosa uthi logama eza kuqinisekisa ukuba uMasipala waseBuffalo City wenza umsebenzi wawo wokutshintsha iimpilo zabahlali baseDuncan, ukwabongoze uMabuyane ukuba aqinise isandla.   
 
“Noqabane uOscar Mabuyane okurhulumente wephondo, naye uza kubaqhuba oomasipala bethu. Mna naye (Mabuyane) sesivene ukuba le nto siyibona apha eDuncan Village sifuna ilungiswe,” utshilo uRamaphosa. 
 
Emva kokuba ethethe oku uRamaphosa, uMabuyane, obehleli eqongeni, wenze umfuziselo wokukatsa ihashe, esebenzisa isandla sakhe sasekhohlo okungatha ukatsa ihashe – ekwenza oko encumile. 
 
Lo kaRamaphosa ukwatyelele naseMdantsane apho athethe khona nabahlali. 
 
Ukanti amalungu ekomiti embaxa yeANC ebethe bhazalala kulo lonke iphondo egaya inkxaso.  
 
—
title: Ramaphosa: Mabuyane faka isabhokhwe!

text:
Utywala buyalawula kubomi bethu, kukho abantu abangasakwaziyo ukuphila ngaphandle kwabo.  
Kumatheko nemisitho esibanawo ibangathi kusuze iqaqa xa bungekho, elo theko lakho libamuncu okunga kufika umphanga. Asikuko nokuba asibuqondi ubuzaza bokukhokelwa butywala kwizisusa zethu, koko sesirhintyeleke asakwazi nokunyakaza oku. 
 Umntu oyijonga yonke le nto emgama uyakusibuza okokuba, ibiyintoni na esikhwelisa emthini ngeli xa amasebe erhuqa phantsi? 
 Namhlanje abantwana bethu basixakile, abaseli bayakhuphela. Kwesi sithuba ancame umzali azidlele imu, kuba kakade kuthiwa ukuthetha kucutha amanqatha. Kuzovela phi kona ukutyeba sizizisulu zotywala okwenkunzi yentwala eyoyiswa luzipho? 
 Tyhini madoda ndemkisela nokuthetha ndingabulisanga; Mabandla kaXhosa ndibhotisile! 
Namhla ndiza ndithe qhiwu incwadi yedrama ethi, Ndiyekeni. Le ncwadi yatyekezwa liciko kwanechule elisoloko likrolonqa esiya isiXhosa, uD.M. Jongilanga.  
Yincwadi eyapapashwa ngabakwa-Educum Publishers phaya ngomnyaka ka1975. Apha umbhali uqhayisa ngobuciko nolwazi lwakhe olwendeleyo lolwimi, incwadi uyibalisa ngezikweko ezikwarhaswe ngoburharha.  
Ngumdlalo onemfundiso lo nothiwe thande yimpixano kubalinganiswa. UNdila yititshala ekhutshwa emsebenzini kuba ingakwazi kuziphatha, umfo lo wayesela angayeki sele esesikolweni. Imeko yakhe yakhelwa umkhanya xa ethuma abantwana besikolo ngexesha lesikolo ukuba baye kumthengela utywala. 
 Mhlawumbi uNdila wayebambe eliya lithi, iinkobe zivuthiswa kukukhwezela ukuze zingenyeli. Ukanti ukuba wayeyiqonda into yokuba yintyatyambo enomhlola ekhula endlwini ibuye ihle nasemoyeni ngewayephulaphule akuthethiswa.  
Wona amazwi athi, akukho mntu uxakwa kukuqhobosha iqhosha lakhe ayengamsebenzeli, wayexakwe ukuxakwa oku kukuzilawula. Ithini na madoda into yotywala, ukuba umntu asongele abanye ngenxa yezenzo zakhe? Inene kunzima! 
Idlaka aliphandwa, usakwenjenjalo sube unyendul’ izibi, waliphanda ke umfo kaNdila. Kwakusemva kokuba ebekele isabatha uLoni oyinqununu eyamkhuphayo emsebenzini ngenxa yokunxila. Wangena waphelela ke naye uLoni kuloo mgibe, wathi ebengaseli suka woyela ngokubambis’ amazinyo ebhekileni.  
Yaphela ngesiquphe imali yakhe ityiwa nguZanele, intokazi awayethiyiselwe ngayo. Wathi esakubangumpha ochutywe walahlwa uLoni, yalithuba azixeleleyo uNdila ukuba akanakuliyeka elo. Wayesenengqumbo nesingqala sokukhutshwa kwakhe emsebenzini. Uthi ke, umntu uyakuze azibone ibatha xa ephikana nokutyhola abantu ngeengxaki zakhe?  
Wazibona ewutya umsebenzi ngenxa yokungakwazi ukuzilumla. Ilamlwa njani into enje? Ingqeqesho yona imelwe ukufakwa luphi uhlobo?  
UNdila yindoda endonci yawo ukhule wagqiba ukuba akangekwazi ukwahlula impukane nenyosi. Ukuba uNdila wayesazi ukuba ukuzalisa komlambo usembindini wawo koyisa neendadi ngewayebuye nganeno. 
Mhlawumbi ke laa ntetha kaMadala, usihlalo wesikolo yayisele izinzile kwingqondo yakhe. Andithi kaloku uMadala ukholelwa ukuba ukungqivaza ngumkhwa wamayilo neenyhwagi ngelixa ukungqodoza isisidanga samaciko namachelezi. Tsii, ungabuy’ uthini ngamaphik’ anenkani! Mhlawumbi ukugweba ngophondo nako kulunge kungalunganga.  
Kona ubuncwane bobomi zizothuso eziza nantyibelo zimbi. Ke ukwehla kwingwenya ubuyikhwele kunobungozi obuntanganye namini ikutyekeza ngokwayo. Ndimkile! 
Owenu kusiba noncwadi lwesiXhosa.
title: Masivume utywala busoyisile

text:
NGUBANI esi siphalaphala siqala kulo mdlalo namhlanje? USibahle yintombi enama-23 eminyaka ubudala, intombi kaDhlomo, nawaphulukana nayo kudala, kwaye kubonakala ngathi ikwaligqiyazana elizakutsala umdla wezothando ku-Ayanda.  
USibahle udlalwa nguLondeka Mlaba, obu buso butsha kumabonakude. UMlaba unesidanga sase-UKZN kwizifundo zeDrama and Media. USibahle uyaqala namhlanje uMvulo (23 kuCanzibe), ngelizokukhangela uDhlomo kuba ufuna ukuqala ubomi obutsha naye.  
Kaloku uSibahle lo ubenexesha elinzima, ezama ukukhangela umsebenzi kodwa esokola ukuwufumana. Izinto bezingamhambeli kakuhle de wabhenela ekuthengiseni ngomzimba eHillbrow ukuze afumane imali.  
INDIMA YAKHE: Akaphangeli, kwaye kudala ezama ukukhangela indlela yokuphila; Unesakhono kwezosasazo kwakunye nopapasho; Ukholelwa kwelokuba amashwa okungafumani msebenzi abangelwa kukungenzelwa isiko lembeleko;  
Ukhe wasebenza njengomdanisi kwiindawo zentselo ukuze afumane imali, uphele esebenza njengomthengisi womzimba eHillbrow. Kubonakala ngathi unina ebengazi nto ngako konke oku. Ufumana uDhlomo ngokumkhangela kumakhasi onxibelelwano emva kokumbona ewongwa ngomsebenzi wakhe ezindabeni.  
Umama wakhe uNontsetselo zange uDhlomo avume ukumtshata, yaze loo nto yambangela ukuba azikhulisele uSibahle. Konke oku kushiye iimvakalelo ezohlukeneyo kuSibahle ngokuba uyamdinga uyise, kwaye kunjalo nje ukholelwa ukuba akukho nto imfaneleyo. 
 Ingaba uzakufumana iingalo zokulilela ku-Ayanda? Masibone ngokuhlwanje ku-Zalo ngo-20h30.
title: UZALO lwamkela uSibahle ngokuhlwanje!

text:
Sele kusisithuba esingaphaya kwentsuku ezintathu ivalekile indlela uR61 ukusuka eSajonisi ukuya eMthatha. Oku kulandela ingxabano yabaqhubi bezithuthu zika wonke-wonke basesaJonisi kwakunye nabaseLusikisiki nolubangelwe kukuphikisana ngabakhweli kutsha nje.  
Le ngxwabangxwaba yenzeke kummandla waseLusikisiki phakathi konotekisi bombutho iBoader kwakunye noNcedo ngomhla wangeCawe kule veki. Ngokwengxelo yomqhubi waseSajonisi  uVotekile Nombekana uthe abaqhubi baseSajoni babanga ngelithi banyanzeliswe ukuba bakhuphe intlawulo liqela labaqhubi eLusikisiki. Ngokwesivumelwano sale mibutho oonoteksi bakhupha intlawulo xa bekhwelise abahambi. UNombekana uthi, kweli tyeli isithuthi eso besithwele abaqhubi kwakunye neethawutha zeeteksi zaseSajonisi nto leyo ibengunobangela wokuba bangarhumi nekhokelele kule mbambano.  
“Sicela urhulumente angenelele kuba ixake namapolisa le nto yokubangwa kwale ndlela kwaye siyawarhanela namapolisa ukuba anesandla kulento,” utshilo uNombekana. Emva kwezidube dube akukhange kubelithuba elingakanani iqela labaqhubi baseSajonisi bazeka mzekweni ngokuvala indlela nalapho kukholeleka ukuba abaqhubi baseLusikisiki bafike bexhobile lwaqala udushe,  kulapho sitshele khona isithuthi sabo esiluhlobo lweBantam.  
“Amapolisa afike athatha oonotekisi baseLusikisiki bexhobile aphinda abakhulula ngaphandle kokuvula ityala, asisawathembi kwawona ngenxa yezenzo zawo” unabise ngelo uNombekana. 
Ukanti inkonzo yesipolisa eSajonisi ayifumanekanga ukuziphendulela ngezi zityholo. Isithethi samapolisa aseMthatha uColonel Mzukisi Fatyela ubhengeze ukuba abanjiwe amadoda amahlanu ngezityholo zokufunyanwa enemipu engekho semthethweni kugqogqo lwamapolisa olujoliswe kudushe loonoteksi.  
UFatyela uthe udushe phakathi kwedolophu yaseSajonisi, eNtlaza, eLibode kwakunye naseMthatha selusube imiphefumlo yabantu abahlanu kwezi nyangana zintlanu ziphelileyo. 
isibhalo@inl.co.za
title: Lusube imiphefumlo udushe loonoteksi

text:
UTITSHALA wesikolo samabanga aphezulu iNtsika, eRhini, angazibona esengxakini ngenxa yombhalo awubhale kuFacebook esithi ubhentselwe ngabafundi kwigumbi lokufundisela. 
Isebe lezemfundo laseMpuma Koloni liyavutha ngumsindo kwaye liyaqhuba nophando lwalo emva kokuba lo titshala, owaziwayo ngegama liphephandaba I’solezwe, ebhale kuFacebook wakhe esithi ubhentselwe ngabafundi ngethuba ebahlohla kwigumbi lokufundisa. 
KuFacebook wakhe kwiveki ephelileyo, lo titshala ubhale esithi: “Andisebhentselwe Yehova kule Classndithini ke mna? MOER!!!” 
Ngonyaka ka2014, le titshala inye yabhala kuFacebook wayo: “Ndina[ma]tsheri amayi-5 mna pha kwaGrade 11. Nindenza isilambi” 
Le mibhalo idale ukunxakama kumakhasi onxibelelwano, nto leyo ithe yanyanzela isebe lezemfundo ephondweni ukuba lithabathe amanyathelo. 
UBukeka Bee Ncwabekazi Mcoboki, ubhale kuFacebook esithi: “Owam utitshala wayesithi xa umntwana oyintombi ebhentsile…akubize ngefani athi hlala kakuhle…ngumzali ke lowo. Hayi lo uzobhala kuFacebook ngokubhentsa kwabantwana…” 
UMawande Kutyana uthe: “Abantwana babhentsa njani na? Ayingomzali na lo? Abantwana bethu basengxakini.” 
Logama uSanele Mazolwana yena ebhale ngolu hlobo kuFacebook wakhe: “Xa ebhentselwe athini ke. Abanye abantwana basile bayenza nangamabom lo nto.” 
Umfundi ofunda eNtsika uyichaze le titshala njengomntu ongakuchasanga ukuqhasa abafundi. “Ngamanye amaxesha ukhe afune iinombolo zabafundi abangamantombazana,” utshilo lo mfundi. 
Isebe lezemfundo eMpuma Koloni liyaqhuba nophando lwalo ngakule titshala, kwaye lithi lizakuthatha amanyathelo xa sele luziqokelele zonke iinkcukacha elizifunayo malunga noku. 
Intloko yesebe ephondweni uThemba Kojana, uthi le nto yenziwe ngulo titshala ilihlazo kootitshala. 
“Ndiyasigxeka esi senzo salo titshala, futhi ndiyalele ukuba kwenziwe uphando ngakuye kuba le nto irhuqela eludakeni isidima sootitshala. Ndikwacele icandelo lethu lezomthetho ukuba liphande esi sehlo lijonge ncakasana umsebenzi wakhe njengesicaka soluntu,” utshilo uKojana. 
UKojana uthi uphando lwabo luzakuqamela ngesolotya lomthetho elilawula ingqesho yootitshala elaziwa njengeEmployment of Educator’s Act of 1998. 
“Ndifuna ukulumkisa bonke ootitshala bethu ukuba bazakuphulukana nemisebenzi yabo ukuba basaqhubeka bebona abalingane bokwabelana ngesondo kubafundi bethu,” kulumkisa uKojana. 
sithandiwe.velaphi@inl.co.za
title: Angasengxakini utitshala othi ubhentselwe ngabafundi

text:
Umsasazi wesikhululo sasekuhlaleni iEkhephini Community Radio yaseBarkley East, ucela uMsamariya oLungileyo ukuba ancede usapho lwakhe lubenendawo yokufihla intloko – indlu ngamanye amagama. 
UFikile Dyantyi (30), owenza inkqubo yomculo kamaskandi kwesi sikhululo, uphumele elubala ngentlungu yosapho lwakhe. Uthi oku kungenxa yokuba ixesha elide umama wakhe wayehlalisana notata othile kwilokishi iLulama Hlanjwa eBarkley East, bona bakhulele phantsi kwalo tata. 
Ukusweleka kwalo tata ngo2013, usapho lwalo tata lufikile lusithi mabakhangele enye indlu. 
UDyantyi ulivolontiya kwesi sikhululo kwaye uthi imali ayanelanga ukuba anganika isidima yena nomama wakhe kwakunye nosisi wakhe omncinane. 
Umama kaDyantyi uphangela kwiifama kwaye akakafikeleli kwiminyaka yenkamnkam yabadala. 
“Ukusweleka kwalo tata, abantwana balo tata bazile kwakhona bathi indlu singayigcina. Kodwa ngoku siyakhutshwa kule ndlu sihlala kuyo,  ndicela uncedo kuye nabani onosinceda nam ndibe nendawo yokufihla intloko. Abasinyanzelisi ngokuphuma kodwa ndibona isazela sokuba sihleli kwindlu yabo ixesha elide. 
“Ndim nomama wam nosisi wam oza emveni kwam,  asinanto, ndicela uncedo nakuye wonke ubani onokusinceda sibenendawo yokufihla intloko,” utshilo uDyantyi. 
“Bendicela uncedo nokuba yimalana ebantwini sizakhele ikhaya nomama wam nodade wam. Ukutya kona sizokuthenga ngalo macebo simana ukuwafumana.” 
Onokunceda olu sapho angaqhakamshelana nephephandaba I’solezwe lesiXhosa kwi-imeyili ethi isibhalo@inl.co.za okanye atsalele uDyantyi ku 073 008 0004.
title: Umsasazi ucela ukwakhelwa indlu

text:
OMATHATHU amacwecwe kaNathi Mankayi aza kube esitsho njalo eGuild Theatre ngomso (uLwesihlanu). 
UMankayi, owaduma kakhulu ngengoma yakhe ethi Nomvula, uxelele I’solezwe ukuba uza konwabisa abahlali baseMonti neziphaluka ngomso ngeengoma zonke aziwa ngazo. 
“Ndiza kuma ixesha elide ndicula eqongeni. Zonke iingoma ezikumacwecwe am ndiza kuzicula,” kutsho uMankayi. 
Ngobu busuku, uMankayi uza kube ephelekwe ngusisi wakhe uAmanda, naye osele engene waphelela kweli khondo likabhuti wakhe. 
Icwecwe likaNathi elitsha, Iphupha Labantu, lineengoma ezilishumi ezibalisa ngothando, uThixo kwanobom. 
“Ndikhetha ukubalisa ngothando ngokuba wonke umntu uyalwazi, nokuba ubani uyasokola, uhlala endaweni enjani, uthando uyalwazi. Akufani nokucula ngemali kuba ayinguye nabani onayo,” kutsho uMankayi. 
UMankayi uthi kweli tyeli akafuni kuvakala njengohlobo awayelilo kuNomvula kuba ukhulile. 
“Xa umamele icwecwe lesibini nelesithathu uyakuva ukuba ndikhulile. Andifuni ukuba uve uNomvula.” 
Uthi umculo kuye ulubizo, akukho suku lugqitha engakhange acule. 
“Akukho suku lugqitha ndingakhange ndicule, kwaye nokuba bendingabhatalwa bendakucula,” kubalisa uMankayi. 
Phambi kokuba adume, uMankayi wayephila ngokwenza, aze athengise imizobo kwidolophu yakokwabo iMaclear. 
Umphandle wecwecwe lakhe lokuqala wawuzoba ngokwakhe. Nakweli litsha icwecwe uthi umsebenzi wakhe ukhona ngaphakathi kulo. 
Ngoku uMankayi ungumyeni notata, kwaye uthi oku kumnika isizathu sokuvuka ayokusebenza ngokuzimisela. 
Amatikiti afumaneka eComputicket ngeR300 (VIP) nange R200. 
KUSENJALO: Ingaba uNathi uyibethile ngokwenene iManejala yakhe? 
Le mvumi ityholwa ngokunkunkutha imanejala yayo uChina Mpololo de kwanyanzeleka angene esibhedlele. 
Abasihlebeleyo bathi uMankayi ungombe uMpololo de wamoxuthela nesithuthi sakhe. 
Ephendula I’solezwe ngezi zityholo, uMankayi uthi uMpololo “unezinto angazenzi kakuhle nekunyanzeleke baphele befaka ityala emapoliseni.” 
UMankayi ukwatyhole uMpololo “ngokunyoluka” nokutya imali yakhe. 
“Wacela ukusebenza nam ndingamazi nokumazi, kodwa ebantwini uyayijika uthi ndamcela. 
“Savuma ukuba angenza iibookings, ibe lapho ingxaki. 
“Imali ibingena kuye, angabonisi bungqina beempepha ( receipts ) kuthi. Abize isixa esithile semali kuloo ndawo ndibizwe kuyo, ayinciphise kuthi imali ayibizileyo, ayithabathe enye yaloo mali kanti useza kufuna isiqingatha sakhe semali nakuthi,” kubalisa uMankayi. 
Simbuza ukuba umbethile ngokwenene na uMpololo. 
“Kaloku ukuba bendimbethile ngendibhadla ejele ngoku,” utshilo. 
Ukanti uMpololo ukhanyele ukuba kukho ukungaboni ngasonye phakathi kwakhe noMankayi. “Hayi, ayikho into enjalo. Yima ndisesentlanganisweni ze unditsalele umnxeba emva kweyure,” uphendule watsho uMpololo ngethuba simtsalela umnxeba. 
Sibuyele amatyeli aliqela kuye kodwa nkqi ukuwuphendula umnxeba wakhe, kwaye akaphendula neembalelwano ebesimthumelela zona. 
Asazi, kodwa siziindlebe zenu!
title: UNathi utsholoza kwiqonga laseMonti ngomso

text:
Zibhalwe ngokutsha iincwadi zembali emva kokuba iFort Hare United ibethe iCape Penensula University of Technology (CPUT) ngo’28-27 emdlalweni weVarsity Shield obuseDikeni ngoLwesine kwiveki ephelileyo. Emva kokuphumelela yonke imidlalo yeVarsity Cup kwisini yalo unyaka, impumelelo yeFort Hare yenziwe ncasa ngakumbi kukuyizuza phambi kwabalandeli bayo eDikeni. Kokokuqala indebe yeVarsity Shield iphunyelelwa liqela lombhoxo eliphuma kwiphondo laseMpuma Koloni. Ukuphumelela kweFort Hare kuqinise igama leMpuma Koloni njengekhaya lombhoxo eMzantsi Afrika nanjengeyona ndawo evelisa abadlali abaphambili. Bekungelulanga ukuqubisana neFNB CPUT ebiziintshatsheli ezikhuselayo ngoba ibisilwela ukuyigcina indebe yayo. 
Kuyiwe kwixesha lokuphumla iFort Hare iphantsi koxinizelelo – kodwa okuye kwancomeka yindlela abadlali bayo abalwe ngayo kwisigaba sesibini somdlalo. Amadoda azijule ijacu anceda iFort Hare aquka uAyabulela Xhosana, uYamkela Mzozoyana noKeith Chiwara. UKapteni weFort Hare University, uKamvelihle Fatyela, uvakalise uvuyo lwakhe emva komdlalo watsho encoma indima eyenziwe ngabalandeli abalixhasileyo iqela lakhe kwisizini esongwe kwiveki ephelileyo. “Ndonwabe kakhulu. Ndizingomba isifuba ngomsebenzi owenziwe liqela lam. Besikhe sahamba emva emdlalweni – kodwa ndibacengile oogxa bam ngelithi mabanganikezeli kude kuphele umdlalo. Enkosi kubalandeli bethu. Le impumelelo yeyabo,” utshilo uFatyela obethiwe wambu yimincili. 
Noxa iziko lemvundo laseNtshona Koloni ligoduke lisophisa emva kokubethwa eDikeni – kodwa akukho mntu onokuyithandabuza indlela ebelizimisele ngayo emdlalweni. Ibidlalela ukuphumelela iCPUT – kodwa uKapteni wayo, uSiyasanga Ngubelanga, uthe abaphoxekanga kukubethwa yiFort Hare University. “Asindiphoxekanga mna. Kuthi esi sisiqalo sohambo olude. Ndiyababulela abalandeli bethu abasuka eKapa nabalandeli bombhoxo baseMpuma Koloni. Isebenzile kakhulu iFort Hare. Yiminyaka izama ukufumana impumelelo eyizuzileyo namhlanje. Ndiyaziqhenya ngomsebenzi wayo njengomntu walapha eMpuma Koloni. Bekumnandi nakum ukudlala phambi kwabantu basekhaya eQonce,” utshilo uNgubelanga. UChiwara weFort Hare ufumene iwonga lomdlali obalaseleyo kwiVarsity Shield yalo nyaka.
title: Yenze imbali iFort Hare University emidlalweni yeVarsity Shield!

text:
Kwiveki ezayo iyaqala ngokusesikweni isizini yePSL ka’2017/18, kungoko abaphathi bamaqela bethe sa iinzanwe bezama ukufumana konke okunothi kuncede amaqela wabo.  
Kuxakekiwe nakwi-Orlando Pirates – kodwa ezona ndaba ziphambili kuyo zithi uTebogo Moloi noMilutin Micho Sredovevic bangabuyela kwiPirates phambi kokuqala kwesizini.  
Umqeqeshi wePirates uKjell Jonevret ulahlile kwisikhundla sakhe, ngokwesibhengezo esivakale izolo.   
Oku kuza emva kokuba iBucs ivale isizini ingafumananga ndebe. Kuvakala ukuba indawo yakhe ingavalwa nguMicho okucingeleka okokuba angancediswa nguMoloi – oshiye iChippa United ngesaquphe kwiveki ephelileyo.  
UMicho uthele thsuphe abalandeli bakhe kuTwitter okokuba eya endaweni ethile – kodwa angayichazanga. Kuthiwa uboniwe eGoli, into eqinise ngakumbi amahum-hum okuya kwakhe kwiPirates.  
Kuvakala ukuba uMoloi unawo umnqweno wokubuyela kweZimnyama.  
“Nam ndiyiva ezindabeni into kaMicho – kodwa ukuba uyandifuna, izandla zam ndizivulile. Ekhaya kuyohlala kusekhaya, kwiPirates kulapho ndikhulele khona,” utshilo uMoloi. 
UMicho ulahle kutshanje njengomqeqeshi welizwe lase-Uganda. Ngaphambili le ndedeba yayikhe yangumqeqeshi weBucs.  
IPirates ayikho phakathi kwamaqela azakudlala iMTN 8 emva kokuvala isizini egqithileyo ikwindawo yeshumi elinanye. 
pedro.mapelo@inl.co.za
title: ‘Kulapho ndikhulele khona kwiPirates’

text:
Igowuli elifakwe ngumdlali-siswini, uMpho Makola, lincede uMzantsi Afrika ngethuba ubetha ilizwe lase-Egypt ngo’1-0 kumdlalo weNelson Mandela Challenge obubanjelwe e-Orlando Stadium ebusuku namhlanje.    Kulo mdlalo uShakes Mashaba wenze iinguqu ezimbini: uqale ngoClayton Daniels emva noMandla Masango esiswini okanye ephukweni lasekunene.    Lo nto imsebenzele umqeqeshi ngoba ababadlali bobabini babenawo umfuthi kakhulu kwindlela iBafana Bafana edlale ngayo namhlanje.    Abadlali beYiphutha ngabo abankqonkqoze kuqala kwimpondo zeBafana Bafana – kodwa ngethamsanqa bafike u-Itumeleng Khune ethe qwa.    Kwimizuzwana emva koko uMasango ugobe ibhola entle kufutshane nekona kwicala lasekunene – lobhola idibene nentloko kaMpho Makola oyivalele emnatheni ngomzuzu wesixhenxe kwisiqingatha sokuqala somdlalo.    UMzantsi Afrika uye kwixesha lokuphumla uhamba phambili.    Kwisigaba sesibini somdlalo AmaYiphutha awunyusile umxakatho futhi ikwangawo akwazileyo ukudala amathuba acaculeyo nangona engakwazanga ukuwasebenzisa.   UMashaba ukhuphe uThamsanqa Gabuza, waze endaweni yakhe wafaka uSibusiso Vilakazi – kanti yena uRamahlwe Mphahlele ungene endaweni ka-Abbubaker Mobara. Injongo yezonguqu ibikukuhlasela i-Egypt ngcono ngoba amandla kaGabuza ebesele ephantsi nokuqinisa amandla weBafana phaya emva. UMzantsi Afrika ukwazile ukuyithintela iYuphutha ebekubonakala ukuba ifuna ukugqobhoza ukuze ifumane igowuli lokulinganisa.         South Africa: 16 Khune, 2 Mobara, 3 Langerman, 6 Daniels, 14 Hlatshwayo, 15 Jali, 5 Furman, 12 Makola, 7 Masango, 20 Dolly, 9 Gabuza.   Egypt: Shenawy, Gaber, Gabr, Dweidar, Abdel Shafy, Elneny, Salah, El Said, Trezeguet, Salah, Koka.  
  
Igowuli elifakwe ngumdlali-siswini, uMpho Makola, lincede uMzantsi Afrika ngethuba ubetha ilizwe lase-Egypt ngo’1-0 kumdlalo weNelson Mandela Challenge obubanjelwe e-Orlando Stadium ebusuku namhlanje.  
  
Kulo mdlalo uShakes Mashaba wenze iinguqu ezimbini: uqale ngoClayton Daniels emva noMandla Masango esiswini okanye ephukweni lasekunene.  
  
Lo nto imsebenzele umqeqeshi ngoba ababadlali bobabini babenawo umfuthi kakhulu kwindlela iBafana Bafana edlale ngayo namhlanje.  
  
Abadlali beYiphutha ngabo abankqonkqoze kuqala kwimpondo zeBafana Bafana – kodwa ngethamsanqa bafike u-Itumeleng Khune ethe qwa.  
  
Kwimizuzwana emva koko uMasango ugobe ibhola entle kufutshane nekona kwicala lasekunene – lobhola idibene nentloko kaMpho Makola oyivalele emnatheni ngomzuzu wesixhenxe kwisiqingatha sokuqala somdlalo.  
  
UMzantsi Afrika uye kwixesha lokuphumla uhamba phambili.  
  
Kwisigaba sesibini somdlalo AmaYiphutha awunyusile umxakatho futhi ikwangawo akwazileyo ukudala amathuba acaculeyo nangona engakwazanga ukuwasebenzisa. 
  
UMashaba ukhuphe uThamsanqa Gabuza, waze endaweni yakhe wafaka uSibusiso Vilakazi – kanti yena uRamahlwe Mphahlele ungene endaweni ka-Abbubaker Mobara. Injongo yezonguqu ibikukuhlasela i-Egypt ngcono ngoba amandla kaGabuza ebesele ephantsi nokuqinisa amandla weBafana phaya emva. 
UMzantsi Afrika ukwazile ukuyithintela iYuphutha ebekubonakala ukuba ifuna ukugqobhoza ukuze ifumane igowuli lokulinganisa.  
 
  
  
  
South Africa: 16 Khune, 2 Mobara, 3 Langerman, 6 Daniels, 14 Hlatshwayo, 15 Jali, 5 Furman, 12 Makola, 7 Masango, 20 Dolly, 9 Gabuza. 
  
Egypt: Shenawy, Gaber, Gabr, Dweidar, Abdel Shafy, Elneny, Salah, El Said, Trezeguet, Salah, Koka.
title: UMzantsi Afrika ubethe iYiphutha kwiMandela Challenge!

text:
makhe sabelane ngenkcubeko yesizwe samaNtambo aseZimbabwe. Ngomnyaka wowe-1890 uMnu. Cecil John Rhodes wathabatha amaXhosa amaninzi omlibo wamaMfengu esiya nawo eZimbabwe, ekwakusithiwa yiRhodesia ngezo mini.  
La madoda wayesiya kuwasebenzisa emigodini, ekuguquleni nasekuphuculeni abemi baseZimbabwe bangene kumba wengqobhoko nempucuko yaseNtshona.  
Wathabatha amadoda neentsapho zawo ewathembise ukuwanika umhlaba kwindawo yaseMbembesi.  
UMelusi M. Mpengesi ongumNtambo osisizukulwana samaXhosa awasiwa eZimbabwe ibali lamaNtambo aseZimbabwe ulichube wathi: “Le mbali yonke ndiza kuthetha ngayo ishicilelwe ziingwevu zaseMaNtanjeni zonke zidibene, ootata uThembile, uMnikeni ekukwathiwa nguBlom, uGalelekile, uDolama, uBongile, uNzeleni, uBonginkosi, uThobile ekukwathiwa nguSbonda kunye neengwevu zaseKoloni uMbeko, uNicholas kunye noLufefe. Le mbali ibhalwe ndim uMelusi.  
UMelusi ke yena uzalwa nguGalelekile, uGalelekile uzalwa nguMaxin, uMaxin uzalwa nguMishini, uMishini uzalwa nguMgweza, uMgweza yena uzalwa nguGwanya, uGwanya yena uzalwa nguMpengesi, uMpengesi yena uzalwa nguMdlazi, uMdlazi uzalwa nguSozozo. OomNtambo ke babongwa bathiwe: Mntambo, Ntethe, Maphanga, Sukela, Jiyani, Mbhandeni, Gabada, Novetshe, Nomawoqo, Abantu baseMbo, Ngubo ayinyathelwa, Inyathelwa ngabayithandayo! USozozo ke yena wazala uMdlazi, uMdlazi ke yena wazala oonyana abathandathu. 
 Naba ke oonyana bakhe, unyana wokuqala nguNdema; uNdema walekelwa nguVokwana, uVokwana alekelwe nguMpengesi, uMpengesi alekelwe nguQoboka, uQoboka alekelwe nguMaqungu, uMaqungu alekelwe nguDingiswayo.  
Unyana wesithathu kuMdlazi uMpengesi wazeka abafazi ababini; umfazi wokuqala yintombi yaseNtsitho uMamThembu; umfazi wesibini kaMpengesi yintombi yaseQwiliqwili egama linguMaTyani. Umfazi wokuqala kaMpengesi uMamThembu wamzalela oonyana abane. Naba oonyana bakaMpengesi kuMamThembu. Owokuqala nguFutshane, emva koFutshane kuze uMadangatye, uMadangatye alekelwe nguLwangaye, owokugqibela oza emva koLwangaye nguTshemisi. Lo nyana kaMpengesi unguFutshane wabhubha engekabi nankosikazi esengumfana, wafela emfazweni. Unyana wesibini kaMpengesi uMadangatya yena wazeka abafazi abahlanu. Nguye ke lo onesizalo esandileyo eMpuma-Koloni. Ndibala koMthatha, Ngcobo, Ngqamakhwe, Tsomo, Port St Johns, Libode, Gcuwa, Dutywa nezinye iindawo.  
Inintsi labantu bakwaMpengesi baphuma kwesi sizalo sikaMadangatya. Bekwakho ke nabo benzalo kaLwangaye nabo bakaTshemisi.  
UMaTyani umfazi wesibini kaMpengesi wamzalela oonyana abathathu. Naba ke oonyana bakaMpengesi; izibulo nguGwanya; eziwe nguBhidli; owamagqibelo ibe nguZwinye. Aboonyana bakaMpengesi bobathathu, bafuduka bobathathu neentsapho zabo bayawuwela eMatshona eRhodeshiya ngonyaka ka1900.  
Basuka bobathathu uGwanya, Bhidli noZwinye, kodwa bayofika sebebabini uGwanya noZwinye. UBhidli ke akafikanga wasweleka endleleni. Kwayokufika unyana wakhe uNtakumba. Bafuduka besuka emaNtanjeni kwilali ekuthiwa kuBhongithole eNgqamakhwe. Kulapho kukhona iinkaba zookhokho, kulapho kusuka khona inintsi lamaNtambo. Kulapho akhona amadlaka ookhokho bethu ooMpengesi. Kwakuyo loo minyaka yowe-1900, amanye amaNtambo afuduka awela umlambo omkhulu ekuthiwa yiTsomo, baya kwakha kwilali ekuthiwa yiMbulukhweza, abanye eMbulu eTsomo.  
Kulapho kukho amanye amaNtambo akwaMpengesi eTsomo. UGwanya unyana omdala kaMpengesi wazeka abafazi abathathu.  
Owokuqala nguMaLitshaba, owesibini nguMamNtlwane, owesithathu nguMamTolo. UMaLitshaba umfazi omdala kaGwanya wazala uMgweza. UMgweza ke yena wazala uRhalayi, noNqawe noNjanjula ebazala kuMaGaba. uMgweba wabe wazala uMhlola ekwaziwa ngokuba nguMission emzala kuMaXimba.  
URhalayi yena wazala uNomagcobo, noNomthiwakhe, noNdinga, noNkazana, noMzameni, noDaniel, noNonhinhi noMsuthu. Bonke ebazala kuMaMpinga.  
URhalayi yena wabe wazala uNtombizodwa, noDubekile, noTozanana, noNomqophiso, aba ebazala kuMaDlamini. UNjanjula wazala uManduma noNtombembi ebazala kuMaNguta.  
UMhlola unyana kaMgweza wazala uMaxin, noVokonqwane noSindeka. Aba ke ebazala kuMamaSango. UGwanya wabe wazala uKhethani, noNikiwe noNophuthwana, noNondala noNtloko. Aba ebazala kuMamNtlwane.  
UKhethani ke yena wazala uMayikweni, noMadakana, noChafteni, noMbalekwa. Aba ke ebazala kuMaKhuboni. UKhethani wabe wazala uNtonisa, noBhadile, noToma, noVuyiswa, noPhilemon, ebazala kuMaMaduna. UNtloko yena wazala uNozililo, noLambhathi, noMadonki, noSniki, noSipho, noNise, noYivani, noLulama noNtlanga, ebazala kumaMasoka.  
UGwanya wabe wazala uMbulunga kuMamTolo. UMbulunga yena wazala uMagoqwana, noNomkhothani, noPhathiwe, noBrown, noKhaliyoni, noNdindi noNhuzu, noNgcondo ebazala kuMaMiya.  
UMbulunga wabe wazala uKlem, uNtsali, uNomalanga, uMgudu noNqithi ebazala kuMaNdlangisa. UBhidli yena wasweleka eKoloni, kweza oonyana bakhe abathathu. Naba ke oonyana bakaBhidli: nguNtakumba, noMnyamana noJadezweni. Unyana omkhulu kaBhidli nguNtakumba.  
UNtakumba uzal’ uMgwetyelwa emzala kuMamMsitho. Wabe wazala uBongani, noMakhaphela, noSgonqo, noMafethu, noVotiwe, noNozitshotsho noNqokothwana. UBhidli wabe wazala uMnyamana okwabizwa ngokuba nguBhavu ngoMaTenza.  
UMnyamana wazala uNomaqhinga, noFatman okwaziwa ngokuba nguMisheiki, noNonhinhise, noWanana, noVuyisile, ebazala kuNonkinqa uMaNyawuza intombi kaKelly. UJadezweni unyana kaBhidli yena wazala uMoliyathi, noMafutha, noAbson, noMarhenyana, noHariyethi, noChristina, noGqirhana, noLeneki, noVayina, noVumba noStete.  
UZwinye yena wazala uZothani kuMaRhadebe. UZothani wazala uMkhangeli kuMaDlamini, uZothani wabe wazala uMabholoda, noMankazana, noThethi, noNgubenyathi noLoyi ebazala kuMagaba. UZothani wabe wazala uShumi, noNombuyiselo, noNomalanga, noNobelungu, noCokiswa noMbandeni.  
UZothani wabe wazala uJamani noKholeka kumaRhadebe. uJamani yena wazala uMasotsha, noNdabazakhe, noNkululeko, noMoses, noZwelinzima, noFezile, noBuyelwa, noNomhiki, noNomini, noNomgqibelo. UZwinye wabe wazala uXhala noNkomo.  
UXhala yena wazala uBhotani okwaziwa ngokuba nguRobert, noMangile, noHletyiwe, noNomasiso, noKali, noMjedu. uZwinye ke yena wafika gxada nje apha eMatshona, wabe wabuyela eKoloni. Kulapho ingcwaba lakhe likhoyo kuBhongithole eNgqamakhwe.  
UNkomo yena wazala uNomgqumshelo, noNomtshotsho, noNomtshato, noNontlupheko, noMthunywa. Ayipheli apho ke le mbali kuba nathi siyazala sisiya phambili.
title: Isiduko samaNtambo kwilizwe laseZimbabwe

text:
Amalungu amane eANC axhalabileyo, afake isithintelo kwinkundla ephakamileyo yaseRhini, efuna le nkundla ukuba isibekele bucala isigqibo sokuchongwa kwabaphathiswa abatsha yiNkulumbuso uPhumulo Masualle. 
  
Ngokwembalelwano yamagqwetha akwaWikus van Rensburg, ebonwe liphephandaba I’solezwe, la malungu afuna inkundla ihlehlise isigqibo sikaMasualle sokutshintsha ikhabhinethi ngokomyalelo wekomiti embaxa yephondo yeANC (PEC). 
  
Kwimbalelwano yakhe ngoLwesine, ngethuba ebhengeza abaphathiswa abatsha abane, uMasualle ukucacise gca oko ukuba ngumyalelo weANC eCalata House. 
  
Kwimbalelwano ejoliswe kuMasualle nakunobhala weANC kazwelonke uAce Magashule, abakwaWikus van Rensburg bathe: “Ukuba nje iNkulumbuso ithabatha izigqibo ngokomyalelo wePEC, kuquka ukutshintsha ikhabhinethi, sifuna inkundla izikhabe ezo zigqibo. Sifuna iNkulumbuso ingathabathi sigqibo esingomyalelo osuka kwiPEC.” 
  
Zonke ezi zithintelo zingenxa yokuba la malungu eANC afake iimpepha, abanga ngelithi awukaxoxwa umcimbi wobume benkomfa yeANC ephondweni yanyakenye, eyathi yonyula uOscar Mabuyane njengosihlalo weANC ephondweni, ebetha uMasualle kwinkomfa eyayonganyelwe lungquzulwano olwakhokelela ukuba kuphalale igazi emva kokulwa ngezitulo kwabathunywa benkomfa. 
  
Uxanduva lokuphanda ubume bale nkomfa lalunikwe uSbu Ndebele ekunye namanye amalungu ombutho amathathu. Izindululo zikaNdebele, azikabekwa elubala, ngokokutsho kwamalungu axhalabileyo eANC. 
  
Abaphathiswa ababexhasa uMasualle ngethuba lale nkomfa, nabagxothiweyo, nguNancy Sihlwayi (obekuphuhliso loluntu), Mlibo Qoboshiyane (obekuphuhliso lwamaphandle), Thandiswa Marawu (obekwimisebenzi yoluntu) noSakhumzi Somyo (obekuphuhliso lwezoqoqosho nezimali). Endaweni kaSihlwayi kungene uGqirha Pumza Dyantyi, endaweni kaQoboshiyane kwangena unobhala wamaKomanisi ephondweni uXolile Nqatha, kwekaMarawu kungene uPemmy Majodina logama kwekaSomyo kungene uOscar Mabuyane. 
  
Ngokwekhabhinethi entsha, uMabuyane nguMphathiswa omtsha wophuhliso lwezoqoqosho, imicimbi yezendalo, ukhenketho nezimali. UHelen Sauls- August ususwe kwisebe lokuhlaliswa koluntu wasiwa kwelezempilo. UMlungisi Mvoko, usekela sihlalo weANC ephondweni, ngumphathiswa wesebe lokuhlaliswa koluntu. 
  
UPemmy Majodina ususwe kwisebe lezemidlalo, ulonwabo, ubugcisa nenkcubeko (DSRAC), wasiwa kwelemisebenzi yoluntu. UBulelwa Tunyiswa uza kuphatha uDSRAC. UGqirha Pumza Dyantyi ususwe kwisebe lezempilo, wasiwa kwelophuhliso loluntu. 
  
Akukho tshintsho lwenziweyo kwisebe lezemfundo (Mandla Makupula), elezothutho (Weziwe Tikana) nakoomasipala (COGTA) abakhokelwe nguFikile Xasa. 
  
Isicelo senkundla esifakwe ngala malungu axhalabileyo eANC sakumanyelwa ngoLwesibini (umhla weshumi elinesihlanu) kwinkundla yaseRhini.
title: Amagqwetha: UMasualle akanakuyalelwa yiPEC

text:
USiphiwo Nzawumbi, ityendyana elineminyaka engamashumi mabini anesixhenxe (27), neliyinzalelwane yaseMpuma Koloni, eMtata.  
Owayesakuba ngomnye wabafundi beziko lezemfundo ephakamileyo iWalter Sisulu, esenza izifundo kwicandelo lezosasazo nobuntatheli.
