Abafana Bes’thende badlala kakuhle futhi bakwindawo yokuqala kwiPSL.  
Ukuba ayilungisi izinto iyakubuya intywizisa iChippa. 
Ukuba izinto aziguquki, kunokwenzeka iChippa ikhangele umqeqeshi onamava onokuthi ayikhuphe engxakini kusakhanya.  
Kodwa ke kungumsebenzi onzima kumqeqeshi onjengoTeboho Moloi – okufuneka aze neziphumo ngabadlali angekabaqheli kakuhle. 
Abadlali kufuneka bafunde ukuwasebenzisa amathuba. Sifumene amathuba amaninzi kakhulu kumdlalo ogqithileyo – kodwa ke yinto esizama ukuyiphucula leyo. Andikalifumani ithuba kakuhle ukusukela ndathatha iintambo, ngoku ndifumana iveki yonke phambi kokuya kwaMashu. Kunzima ukuqikelela ukuba izinto zingatshintsha nini – kodwa ndibone umahluko ngokuya besidlala neCeltic. Zindiphixile iziphumo zomdlalo zona,” utshilo uMoloi kutshanje. 
pedro.mapelo@inl.co.za
title: UMoloi uphantsi koxinizelelo kwiChippa United

text:
EKAPA: BASOTHUKILE ootitshala abathathu besikolo samabanga aphantsi eNomzamo eStrand nanjengoko besinde ngeemfefe zikaMdali emva kokuba kumbonzeleke amadoda axhobe ngemipu oxutha iimoto zabo esikolweni iAJC Phakade Primary ngoLwesibini. 
Esi siganeko siza kwisithuba esingaphantsi kweenyanga emva kokuba isebe lezemfundo likhuphe imali engange R10 000 kulowo unokuza nomkhondo malunga nokukhuthuzwa ezikolweni. Esi siganeko sesesihlanu kwizikolo zeli phondo kulo nyaka. 
Inqununu yesikolo uThobile Majingo uthe kuye kwanyanzeleka ukuba bakhululwe kwangethuba abafundi. “Bekumalunga ngo7:40 kusasa  phambi kokuba kuqale ukufundiswa. Isibini kula madoda mahlanu soxuthe iToyota Fortuner katitshala. Abanye baqonde kootitshala abaqhuba iimoto ezincinci. Omnye wootitshala abathathu ulwile esala ukunikezela ngemoto baze babaleka nesitshixo kuphela,” utshilo. 
“Imeko isanxunguphele esikolweni. Le meko ngeyinqandekile ukuba bekukho isango leremote, sinonogada apha. Isebe lezeMfundo lilinda kude kwenzeke into. Kulula ukungena apha nakubani na,” utshilo uMajingo. 
Uthe kuye kwanyanzeleka ukuba kuthunyelwe oonontlalontle bazokuthuthuzela abafundi ababone eso siganeko. 
“Basothukile ootitshala ingakumbi lo ungavumanga ukwehlika emotweni. Ndicinga ukuba uyiqonde mva into yokuba ubeke ubomi bakhe esichengeni. Andiqinisekanga ukuba baza kuza ngomso,” utshilo uMajingo. 
Umphathiswa wezeMfundo ephondweni uDebbie Schafer uthe: “Kuyothusa ukuba izikrelemnqa zihlasela ootitshala abamsulwa. Ngethamsanqa akekho owenzakeleyo kwesi siganeko. Kodwa ootitshala ababandanyekayo nabo baziboneleyo bothukile. Baza kuthuthuzelwa ngokwasemphefumlweni. Uninzi lwezikolo zethu zinokhuseleko olunqanda ukungena kwezikrelemnqa. Kuyacaca ukuba basebenzisa ixesha lokungena nelokuphuma nanjengoko onke amasango evuliwe ngaloo maxesha. Ndiyacela nabani onomkhondo ngezi ziganeko zokuhlaselwa ezikolweni eze nawo ngaphambili.” 
EZINGENAYO: Zifunyenwe eStrand zityhuthulwe zalahlwa ngoLwesithathu iimoto ezimbini kwezintathu ebezoxuthwe kwaba titshala.
title: Bothukile ootitshala aboxuthelwe iimoto esikolweni

text:
UHlalukana uphakathi kwabafundi abangamashumi amahlanu baseMpuma Koloni abathe baphumelela emagqabini kwiimviwo zebanga leshumi kunyaka ka2016. 
  
Lo mfundi ukwawongwe nanguMphathiswa wemfundo esisiseko kuzwelonke uAngie Motshekga eRhawutini ngoLwesithathu nanjengoko ezuze indawo yesibini kwizikolo ezikwibakala lesithathu (Quintile 3) ezithe zaqhuba kakuhle kwiimviwo. 
  
UHlalukana ugqwese kuzo zonke izifundo zakhe ebezibhala ngethuba leemviwo. “Ndonwabe kakhulu, ayikholeleki into yokugqwesa kubafundi abangaka. Enye into endivuyisa kakhulu yile yokuba ndingumfundi osuka ezilalini,” utshilo uHlalukana, inzalelwane yaseNcise eMthatha.   
  
Umyalezo kaHlalukana kubafundi bakaGrade 12 kunyaka ka2017 uthi: “Ukuba uyazihlonipha iincwadi zakho, yonke into izakuhambela kakuhle. Yazi ixesha lakho lokufunda, futhi ufunde ngelo xesha,” kutsho uHlalukana.
title: Umfundi waseMthatha utshatshele kwilizwe liphela kwiimviwo zikaGrade 12

text:
Maqobokazana angalala endleleni yazini kunyembelekile, Ukuthwaxa nokuthwixa iAl Ahly, Kunenza amaqhawe namaqhaji kweli, Udlalile umabonakude abantu bebukele, Kubhaxabulwa umntu amehlo exhage umbombo, Besingayanga kuvuna mbotyi, Kukhala impama kukhal’isibhaxu, Xa iSundowns isenza imbali.  
Hambani Madawana kabutyheli, Ningatyhafi inkxaso yethu inilingene, Yenzekile imbali, imbali engasoze yacima, Ingen’iSundowns ezincwadini zeAfrika, Yabe ingaqali kwaye ingagqibelisi, Okufunekayo yinkxaso yoMzantsi ngoku, Animelanga Mamelodi kuphela, Nimele uMzantsi Afrika uphela, Qaqambani ke njengekhwezi ekuseni kusa, Nigqame njengoms’obomvu ngonyezi, Singayibetha ngoyaba kodwa nenza kakhulu bafana bakaPitso.  
Hambani makwedini ningabisajonga ngemva, Senimkisele sekukufutshane ngaphambili ngoku, Andithi makwedini kuba ndinidelela okanye ndineya, Ndithi makwedini kuba ningoompondo-zihlanjiwe, Ndijongile nje nizulelwa yinkwenkwezi yesibini, Nakuthi ndanditshilo mhla sibhiyoza, Ukuthwaxa iqela elikhulu laseYiphutha ayonyheke, Yona ithi isakoma uyikhothe, Ukuthwaxa ngesihlanu eqandeni ngumqondiso, Umqondiso wokulambela impumelelo, iAl Ahly ayilofokofoko laqela, Liqela elaziwayo nelithenjiweyo, Kodwa iSundowns yenze amadoda abangamakhwenkwana.  
Dadelan’enzulwini kufayayo, Ninganqandwa nazezo nkwenkwezi, Ningabi sajonga ngemva hleze nibe sisimo setyuwa, Ithemba lokuba niyegqitha likhona, Kwaye niza kusenza sizingce ngakumbi ngani , Iinyembezi zovuyo sizinkonyile, Sizibekele umhla wovuyo nogcobo, Ninganqandwa nayinto engapha kwesibhakabhaka, Kuba enye yezo nkwenkwezi siyifuna njengophawu lobugorha, Dadelani enzulwini njeengophopho, Sifuna udumo nendumasi.  
Zenithi nakufika eYiphutha nizijule ujacu, Sinikhupha ngokunithemba nokunithanda Hambani niyozenza idini loMzantsi Afrika, Lo nto ifuna nje ukuzimisela nokuzihlonipha, Niqinis’umqolo kuba ningamaqolo kwanina, Impumelelo ke ayizi ngesithebe segolide, Iza ngentsebenziswano nokubambisana, Impumelelo ikuni ezingqondweni, Ntingani ke zintakazana udumo lukuni.
title: Siyazingca ngeMamelodi Sundowns!

text:
IBrazil iphumelele umdlalo wayo wokuqaka emva kokubetha iSerbia ngamagowuli amabini eqandeni (2-0) emdlalweni wetumente yehlabathi obumhle ngendlela emangalisayo eLusail Stadium ebusuku namhlanje. Amagowuli omabini afakwe liqhawe leBrazil lanamhlanje, uRicharlison, kwisigaba sesibini somdlalo. Kuyiwe kwixesha lokuphumla kungekho gowuli ebhodini. Igolozile iSerbia kwisigaba sokuqala ixheshwa injalo. UNeymar, uVinicius noRicharlison bazamile ukudibanisa iibhola besiya phambili – kodwa abadlali beSerbia bebezixelele ukuba ngeke kufakwe gowuli ezipalini zabo. 
Nangona iBrazil idlale kakuhle ngendlela abantu abayazi ngayo – kodwa khange kube lula ukudlala neSerbia ngoba ibizimisele. Ibidlala kakuhle emva, esiswini – kanti naphambi ibishukumisa. Izinto ziguquke kwisigaba sesibini. Kuye kwacaca ukuba uTite uwangxolisile amakhwekhwe wakhe ngoba abuye engamameli. Kube nzima ukuxhathisa okanye ukudlala ngendlela edlale ngayo iSerbia ngoba ihlaselwe macala onke yiBrazil. Ukungena kwamadoda afana noDarko Lazovic, uDusan Vlahovic noNemanja Maksimovic akuyincedanga kwisigaba sesibini ngoba kube nzima nokufumana igowuli eli lokubika ekhaya. 
Emdlalweni wokuqala, iBrazil ibonisile ukuba kutheni abantu abaninzi becinga ukuba iza kuphumelela indebe yehlabathi ngokudlala kakuhle. UNeymar uphantsi koxinezelelo ngoba nguye yedwa ebadlalini bebhola ekhatywayo eBrazil oye wagqama – kodwa ongekaphakamisi indebe yehlabathi. Kwelinye icala, iPortugal idlule ngo’3-2 kwiGhana emdlalweni obutaka iintlantsi kuGoup H. Phambi koko, iUruguay ibambene ngeqanda neKorea Republic emdlalweni kaGroup H. Emini, iSwitzerland ibethe iCameroon ngegowuli elinye emdlalweni obumhle kaGroup G. Ngomso amehlo akwiSenegal eza kudibana neQatar emdlalweni kaGroup A.
title: URicharlison liqhawe leBrazil ebethe iSerbia emdlalweni kaGroup G

text:
Ndihleli nabakhwetha ethontweni kwilali yaseKhubusi, kumhlaba wamaMbalu kwelo laseCumakala. Lo mhlaba ngulowo ufumaneka kwelamaNgqika, nowawufudula ulawulwa nguNkosi uMbalu.  
Bambi izizwe zamaXhosa ezihlala kuloo mmandla uquka iNdakana; kwaZidenge; iKhubusi; idolophu iCumakala; eWolizini; uMlungisi; eMasimini; iCenyu; iXholorha; iNtili; iDohne; iKotishi; iHekele; uMgwali; uXaxazele; iKatikati kaDaliwe; ukuya kuma ngeSihoboti samaToyise, babezibiza ngokuba zezamaNgqika, maxa wambi kuthiwe ngamaMbalu, kungenjalo zibizwe ngenkabi yenkomo kaNkosi uMbalu, uZibula, kuthiwe ngamaZibula.  
Undiva ndizichaza ndizikhankanya kuhle nje nangeqhayiya zonke ezi ndawo, ndenziwa kukuba nelunda lokukhulela kuzo, kuquka nokuzingca okukhulu okubangwa kukuba kuzo zonke ezi ndawo zakowethu, akuzange nangonyaka omnye kuphume ingxelo engokufa komkhwetha. 
 Enye yeendawo ezifana twatse nalo mmandla weCumakala, yiHeshele (equka iilali endikhe ndakhenketha kuzo ezifana neQhimirha; iNdofela; uBikizana; iPolmiti, eMbihli, eVoyizane naseMlamli), kuba nalapho le mbubho nendyikityha yokufa kwabantwana babantu esuthwini ngumnqa, into engaziwayo, nengazange ibonwe kwasendulo!  
Ndithe xa bendijikeleza ndiphanda ngoku kusweleka kungaka kwabakhwetha esuthwini, ndachwayitiswa kakhulu nakukufumanisa ukuba nakwiidolophu ezifana noomaBhayi neMonti, ukufa kwabakhwetha kunqabe oku kwezinyo lenkukhu. 
Oku ke zidwesha zakuthi, kulilinge lokuthi kwezo ndawo kuxhaphake isibi sokubhubha koonyana bethu esuthwini, zibe nokufunda nzulu kwindlela ekuqhutywa ngayo kwelo lamaMbalu aseCumakala, kwezi dolophu ndizikhankanyayo nakwelo lamaHlubi aseHeshele.  
Ikomishoni kazwelonke yamalungelo aphathelele kumasiko, iinkolo kwaneelwimi ezahlukileyo, sele izenzile izikhokelo ezinokulandelwa ukuze kungaze kuphinde kubekho mntwana wamntu ubuya esuthwini ejongise umetyiso phezulu, koko bonke kufunwa babuye bevuma negqiza lamadoda aze kubalanda esuthwini kubuyelwa emakhaya kugwijwa ngochwayito olukhulu kusithiwa, “Somagwaza ndiza kugwaza ngalo mkhonto! Ngqawule! Ngqawule! Somagwaza ndakugwaza ngalo mkhonto!” Ithi xa ingena esangweni lo mzi loo ntsholo umve umhlabeli etshintsha esithi, “Qula kwedini, qula kwedini kabawo! Khawuze nazo kwedini, nazo kwedini kabawo! Ibhokhw`inetyala kwedini, hayi yho kwedini kabawo!”  
Ngalo lonke ke elo xesha iintombi noomama bakhuphisana ngomyiyizelo kubethwa iingqongqo zamacangci ezilokishini nasezidolophini, ukanti kubethwa iimfele zempahla emfutshane kumakhaya asezilalini, nazo ke iintombi namanina zisitsho ngoncuthu lwengoma yovuyo, kuba abafana bebuyile ehlathini nasentabeni besithi, “Alukh`usana olungenanina, yasuke yakhal`inkedam`ingenabani!” 
Kwezi ndawo zingayanyaniswa nambubho yabakhwetha, eyona nto iphambili ligalelo noxanduva lwamadoda kwisiko lolwaluko. 
 Kwezi ndawo zingangakhankanywa ngokusweleka kwabakhwetha, onke amadoda okuhlala kuthi kwakungena oonyana babantu esuthwini, kubekelwe yonke into bucala, uwabone amadoda equqa ebuyelela ngenkuthalo kweloo thafa, ihlathi okanye intaba angenele kuyo amakhwenkwe.  
Ngumthetho kwezo ndawo ukuba abazali abanabantwana abasesuthwini bangapheli emathontweni, ukuze kuqinisekiswe ukuba isiko lihamba kakuhle kwaye isigezo; intlondi; ukungahloniphi nokonzakaliswa kwabantwana babantu, zizinto ezingekhoyo ezo esuthwini.  
Ezona zinto kutshilwa ngazo kwezi ndawo kungafi mkhwetha kuzo, kukufundisa abantwana babantu ngako konke okulindelekileyo emfaneni nasendodeni esizweni, kuba kakade ukwenziwa kwendoda kukwakhiwa kwesizwe. 
 Xa amakhwenkwe nabakhwetha bengananzwanga, bengaqeqeshwanga kwaye bengafundiswanga ngobudoda nentlonipho ehambelana nobudoda, sicinga ukuba abo bakhwetha baza kuhlonipha njani xa besentlalweni. 
Ezona zinto kugxininiswa kuzo kwezi ndawo zingababazwa ngakufa ebakhwetheni, kukwaziwa kwemvelaphi kwanomzi wengcibi kunye nekhankatha. Kulihlazo kule mihla ukubona abantwana babantu besetyenzwa kwaye besezandleni zeengcibi kwanamakhankatha angoovuk`esicithini! 
Mawethu, nkqu neKomishoni yamalungelo amaSiko, iiNkolo neeLwimi ezahlukileyo (CRL Commission), iyibeka icace into yokuba xa abantwana babantu besezandleni zamakhankatha kwaneengcibi ezingawulandeliyo umcimbi, oko kungangunozala wembubho.  
Kaloku ikhankatha elifunekayo lelo linamava, nelikwaziyo ukubona kwantlandlolo xa umntwana enengxaki ezifana nokukhotheka, ukufeda kwezintso nokuphathwa gadalala, kuba ezo zizinto ezinokudala ingozi nokufa emntwaneni, ingakumbi xa enokuphelelwa ngamandla.  
Ngokufanayo nezi ndawo zibalasele ngokungabhujelwa ngabakhwetha, le komishoni ikwagunyazisa ukuba intsebenziswano phakathi kwabahlali, izindlu zowiso-mthetho, indlu yeenkokheli zemveli kwaneSebe loPhuhliso loLuntu, kumele izinze, kwaye kuqinisekwe ngoku kulandelayo: iminyaka efanelekileyo yokuya esuthwini; impilo entle emntwaneni phambi kokuya esuthwini; ukuqinisekisa ngokufaneleka kweengcibi namakhankatha; kunye nendima yootata babantwana kwanamadoda ngokubanzi kukhuseleko esuthwini.  
Ukuba konke oku kungaqinisekiswa ukuba kumi ngendlela, kufundwe kwimizekelo yeendawo ezifana neCumakala neHeshele (nezinye endingazikhankanyanga), ndiqinisekile ukuba oku kuhlazeka kufuna ukugubungela isiko lethu, kungaphela kuthi nya!
title: Akuzange kwasweleka mkhwetha kwelamaMbalu!

text:
Amandla eeLions asezakuvavanywa kakhulu, kwaye kakhulu kweli ityeli. IHinghlanders inobungozi kakhulu kuneCrusaders, kodwa ngaphandle kwamathandabuzo izakuhlangabezana nobunzima kakhulu xa iqubisana neeLions e-Ellis Park kule mpelaveki. 
Ukuba iLions ikwazile ukubetha iCrusaders kwiveki ephelileyo, ndiwabona enciphile amathuba okuphumelela kweHighlanders ngomso. Kumdlalo wokugqibela phakathi kwala maqela mabini ngomhla weshumi elinesibini kweyoKwindla, iHighlanders yayodlula iLions ngamanqaku yaphumelela ngo’35-15. 
“Yayingumdlalo ombi kakhulu kwicala lethu, ingakumbi emva kokuba sasibethe iChiefs phambi kwalo mdlalo,” litshilo isekela mqeqeshi leLions uSwys de Bruyn.  
Into ezakumonwabisa uJohan Ackermann kwakhona kule mpelaveki uzakubafumana bonke abadlali bakhe abathembileyo. Ukubuya kwekapteni uWarren Whiteley kwiveki ephelileyo kulisebenzele kakhulu iqela.  
Ukuba iphumelele iLions ngoMgqibelo, neChiefs ibethe iHurricanes eNew Zealand, loo nto izakuthetha ukuba iLions izakudlalela umdlalo wamagqibela kankqoyi ekhayeni. UWhiteley udlale kakuhle kakhulu kwiveki ephelileyo, xa uqwalasela into yokuba ebenzakele. “Igxalaba khange lindiphoxe ndikwazile ukunyamezela,” utshilo uWhiteley emva kokuba bebethe iCrusaders.
title: IHighlanders izakuba ngumqobo weLions

text:
Ngaphandle kwamathandabuzo, uStuart Baxter ngurhasatsha womqeqeshi! Imbali yakhe kwibhola yaseMzantsi Afrika iyabengezela.  
Wongeza enye indebe phantsi kwegama lakhe ngethuba iSuperSport United iphakamisa indebe yeNedbank amatyeli amabini elandelelana, emva kokuhlaza i-Orlando Pirates ngo’4-1 eMoses Mabhida Stadium kwiveki ephelileyo. Ibingumdlalo kaBaxter wokugqibela kwiSuperSport United njengokuba engumqeqeshi weBafana Bafana ngokupheleleyo nje ngoku. 
Eli Ngesi lihambe ngesitayile ePitoli emva kokuphakamisa iNedbank okwesibini kwiSuperSport United.  
Phantsi kwegama lakhe, uBaxter uneendebe zeNedbank ezintathu ngoku, eyeMTN 8 nezimbini zePremiership.  
Ngumsebenzi ekungekho lula ukuwenza – kodwa uBaxter ubonisile ukuba yena uyakwazi ukwenza izinto zenzeke. Ukubetha iPirates yinto enkulu – kodwa ukuyoyisa kumdlalo wokhuphiswano yinto ethe chatha.Phambi kokuphumelela le Nedbank Cup, abadlali beSuperSport United batsho elubala ukuba bafuna ukubulela uBaxter ngomdlalo weNedbank Cup njengokuba esiya kwiqela lesizwe. Kwenzekile oko nangona yena umqeqeshi ebesokolo eyiyayaza lo nto phambi komdlalo. Kodwa emva komdlalo umqeqeshi uye waphumela elubala ngokubaluleka kwendebe kuye njengomqeqeshi. 
“Impumelelo ayikho ngam ngaphezulu kweqela nabalandeli. Yimbali nje kum. Ukuphumelela ndiyakuthanda,” utshilo uBaxter. 
Ndinebhongo ngokuba ngumqeqeshi weBafana Bafana, ndizimisele ukwenza umsebenzi omhle kwaye ndinalo ithemba emva kokuba sibethe iNigeria,” utshilo uBaxter. 
UDean Furman ubaqhwabele izandla oogxa bakhe emva kokuphumelela eThekwini. “Ibingomnye wemidlalo esiyidlale kakuhle kwisizini yethu. Umdlalo wethu uhambe ngale ndlela besifuna uhambe ngayo. Le ndebe ibaluleke kakhulu kuthi,” utshilo uFurman.
title: UBaxter uhambe ngestayile ePitoli

text:
NGENYANGA yoMdumba ngo2017, uSodolophu waseOR Tambo uNomakhosazana Meth, wafaka umfanekiso kuFacebook nonyana wakhe oligqibelo uBradley Meth (18), apho abantu bancoma betyibela lo mfanekiso, ze ukuphefumla uMeth wathi “enkosi”. 
Ngoku uMeth uhleli egumbini ezilele ukubhubha kukaBradley kwingozi yemoto eyenzeke kuN2 xa usondele eMthatha, usuka ngaseDutywa, kwiiyure ezingephi emva kokuba lo nyana kaSodolophu efumene iziphumo zokuba umphumelele uGrade 12 apho ebefunda khona – eKhanyisa. 
Nangoku uSodolophu usakhokela (profile picture) ngalo mfanekiso kuFacebook wakhe. 
UBradley ubhubhe kwakunye nomzala wakhe uNdipheleke Diko (21). UNdipheleke ngunyana kabhuti kaNomakhosazana Meth. USodolophu wamthathela ngakuye uNdipheleke, wamkhulisa njengomntwana wakhe. 
Le ngozi ishiye usapho lakwaMeth nakwaDiko lunxunguphele. Imiyalezo yovelwano isathe gqolo ukuphuma nkalwana zonke, ithuthuzela ezi ntsapho. 
Unyana omdala kaSodolophu * -Ivan Meth umchaze umninawa wakhe uBradley njengeqhaji ebelifuna ukuzuza lukhulu ebomini. 
“Ebefuna ukuba ngumcwangcisi, umzobi kwanomphononongi wezakhiwo (Architect) kwaye kulo nyaka bekufanele ukuba uyokufunda kwiYunivesithi yaKwaZulu Natal (UKZN) okanye eNelson Mandela University apho ebefake khona izicelo,” utshilo * -Ivan. 
Kuyacaca ukuba uBradley noNdipheleke bebenamaphupha aphantse afane, nanjengoko uNdipheleke ebejonge ukuya eBuffalo City College ukuya kufundela ubunjineli bezakhiwo nemigangatho. 
“Apha ekukhuleni kwakhe, uye wanothando lwezolwakhiwo (Civil Engineering) kwaye ebefuna ukuya kufunda eBuffalo City College. Ebekholelwa ukuba uyakuthi xa egqibe izifundo zakhe, aqale inkampani yakhe. UDiko ebefunda eMthatha College,” utshilo * -Ivan. 
Kule ngozi, yenzeke ekuzeni kusa ngoMgqibelo (umhla wesihlanu), bekukwakho nobhuti kaNdipheleke uMihlali, nenguye othe waxelela usapho ngale ntlekele, emva kokuba esindile. 
Umngcwabo wesi sibini uyakuqhutywa ngomhla weshumi elinesibhozo, usenziwa ndaweninye nangona nje bengazukungcwatyelwa endaweni enye. Umngcwabo kaBradley uza kuqhubela eMaweleni eQweqwe eMthatha logama okaNdipheleke uza kuqhutyelwa eMowa kuNtabankulu.
title: Bebenamaphupha okwakha ilizwe oonyana bakaMeth

text:
Ilizwe laseBurkina Faso ligoduke nembasa yeBronze emva kokuba libambe indawo yesithathu kweyona tumente inkulu kwizwekazi le Afrika. Ibhola entle efakwe ngu-Alian Traore ayikhabe engaphaya komhlaba kanozinti kwicala lasekunene inike iBurkina Faso impumelelo ka’1-0 ngomzuzu wokugqibela emdlalweni obubambene ngeyona ndlela eStade de Port-Gentil ebusuku izolo. Eli lizwe lizibethele iGhana eyagqibela ukuthatha indebe ye-Afrika ngo’1982. 
Izixhiliphothi zeBurkina Faso eziquka u-Aristide Bance, okhe wadlalela iChippa United kweli lizwe loMzantsi Afrika, ziye kule midlalo zingekho phakathi kwamazwe abalwayo njenganobungozi okanye anokwenza into ebonakalayo – kodwa kule tumente ka’2017 – wonke ubani uyavuma ukuba eli lizwe lelinye lamazwe anobungozi ebholeni ekhatywayo. 
 
Isiqingatha sokuqala siphele kungekho nto ebhodini macala omabini. Umdlalo wona ububambene kakhulu ngoba bekungekho cala lifuna ukuvula nanjengoko omabini la mazwe ebegxeshe impumelelo kulo mdlalo. Amathuba wokufaka amagowuli ebebane esithi ntalu ntalu okwamaqam omqombothi oqal’ubila – kodwa akubangakho lizwe elide lawasebenzisa.  
Kodwa kuyo yonke into ebisenzeka, wona umdlalo ubukwizinga eliphezulu. Umqeqeshi weGhana, u-Avram Grant, ufake u-Andrew Ayew no-Asamoah Gyan – abona badlali banefuthe kwela lizwe kwisigaba sesibini somdlalo – kodwa ubukho babo khange buyincede iGhana ebifakwe ekoneni yiBurkina Faso.  
 
 
 
Ngokuqinisekileyo injongo yakhe (uGrant) ibikukufumana igowuli bediniwe abadlali beBurkina Faso – ngelishwa akubanga njalo. Umnqweno kaGrant wokuphumelela umdlalo wakhe wokugqibela njengomqeqeshi weGhana awufezekiswanga. IGhana ibambe indawo yesine kwi-2017 Afcon.
title: IBurkina Faso igoduke neBronze kwi-2017 AFCON

text:
Izuze impumelelo ebalulekileyo iTunisia – kodwa ngelishwa layo, kuye kwanyanzeleka izichithe iintente eQata ibuyele ekhaya. UWahbi Khazri ufake igowuli ebe kuphela kwalo emdlalweni iTunisia ezibethele kuwo iFrance ebidikidiki namhlanje emalanga. Ngoba iFrance ibisele iyifumene indawo kwiTop 16 yeFifa World Cup yalo nyaka, uDidier Deschamps ufake abadlali abatsha abalithoba emdlalweni wanamhlanje, mhlawumbi ebefuna abadlali abathile abanokumnceda emidlalweni ezayo ekwaphumza nabanye. Yona iTunisia iye emlweni iziphethe zonke izikrweqe zayo ngoba ibigxeleshe ukuya kumjikelo olandelayo – kodwa lo nto ibixhomekeke kwiziphumo zomdlalo obuphakathi kweDenmark ne-Australia. 
Sonke isiqinga sokuqala silawulwe yiTunisia ebisilwela ukuphumelela amanqaku amathathu ukuze ifumane indawo yesibini kuGroup D. Igowuli elifakwe nguKhazri kwisigaba sokuqala ibisisiqinisekiso sokungena kweTunisia kwiTop 16 okwesibini kwimbali yayo – kodwa yapotyakala lo nto ngenxa yeziphumo zomnye umdlalo. Alivunywanga yiVAR igowuli elifakwe yiFrance emizuzwini yokugqibela yomdlalo. Kwelinye icala, iAustralia ibethe iDenmark ngegowuli elinye eqandeni emdlalweni kaGroup D. 
Ngalo ndlela iAustralia idlulelele kwisigaba sesibini seFifa World Cup ityeli lesibini emva kokubetha iDenmark komnye umdlalo kaGroup D. Yayivula kakubi iWorld Cup ngokubethwa yiFrance ebethwe yiTunisia. Abantu abaninzi baphoxekile yindlela iDenmark edlale ngayo eQatar ngoba bebeyibona njengelona lizwe elingakhuphisana namazwe afana neFrance eziintshatsheli zika-2018, iBrazil, iArgentina neGermany esokolayo. IDenmark ivala itumente yalo nyaka ikwindawo yesine kwiGroup D ingaphumelelanga mdlalo. Kwindawo yokuqala kuhleli iFrance, emva kwayo yayiAustralia neTunisia ebinethemba lokubhukuqa iAustralia kwindawo yesibini. Amanye amaqela asele ekhulule ijezi aquka iSerbia, iQatar, iEcuador, iWales ne-Iran.
title: iTunisia ibethe iFrance kwaphuma yona, iAustralia yakhiqa iDenmark

text:
INGQONYELA yeYunivesithi iFort Hare uNjingalwazi Sakhela Buhlungu uthi kulo nyaka eli zikomfundo liza kusindleka umthandazo wokuhlambulula le yunivesithi kwilifu elimnyama. 
Kuthe gqolo ukuvela kwezicelo zomthandazo kule yunivesithi ingakumbi emva kokubhubha kukaNosicelo Mtebeni obulewe ze wanqunqwa amalungu omzimba liqabane lakhe uAlutha Pasile eQuigney eMonti. 
Kusajongwe leyo, omnye wale yunivesithi uAnovuyo Siyahluma Sinuka uthe wabhubha emva kokuwa kwisakhiwo esihlala abafundi eMonti. USinuka ungcwatyelwe kowabo eMount Coke eQonce ngoLwesihlanu (27 kweyeThupha). 
Ethetha kwinkonzo yesikhumbuzo kaMtebeni, uBuhlungu uthe: “Makhe ndithethe ngale ndawo [ekudala ithethwa] ethi ‘le nto [yaseFort Hare] ifuna umthandazo, le nto ifuna intlambululo’.” 
“Mandiyithethe ngokupheleleyo kuba kudala kuthethwa ngayo, njengoko abafundi bebhubha. Kulo nyaka masiwenzeni [lo mthandazo]. Nokuba kuphantsi kweyiphi inkolo [ubuKrestu, iNkolo kaNtu njalo njalo], kodwa masenzeni into,” utshilo uBuhlungu. 
UMongameli weBhunga eliMele abaFundi (SRC) eFort Hare, uMkhanyiseli Nomana, uthe: “Egameni leBhunga eliMele abaFundi (SRC) ndihlaba ikhwelo kuye nawuphi na umntu, ukuba kuthandazelwe thina bafundi abafunda kule yunivesithi.” 
UNomana uthi ‘kukho ilifu elimnyama elijinga phezu kwethu njengeyunivesithi”. 
“Eli lifu sizamile ukuligxotha ngokukhanyisa amakhandlela nemithandazo. Asingethandi ukuba siqhubeke sibhubha ngokungaqondakaliyo ngenxa yeshwangusha esijongene nalo singabafundi bakwaNokholeji,” utshilo uNomana. 
UNomana uthi kungelishwa ukubona amaphupha kaMtebeni engazukwazi ukufezeka ngenxa kaPasile. “Ukufika kukaAlutha kubomi bukaNosicelo akuzange kuze njengentsikelelo, endaweni yoko ibe sisiqalekiso.” 
UNomana uthi ilizwe loMzantsi Afrika lijongene nengxaki enkulu yodushe olujoliswe kwisini. 
“Kweli lizwe sijongene nobhubhane, hayi nje loweCovid-19, koko owodushe olujoliswe kwisini. UNosicelo ubulewe ngokungenalusini egameni lothando. Madoda le nto iqalwe sithi, kwaye iza kupheliswa kwasithi. 
“Ngala mazwi ndihlaba ikhwelo, ndithi masiwulwe lo mkhuba ukuze utshabalale ngonaphakade,” utshilo uNomana. 
UBuhlungu uthi uMtebeni, ebulelwe ngokungenalusini njalo, “uyinkwenkwezi esijongileyo ethi ‘yenzani into’. Ngoko ke masinike uNosicelo umngcwabo ondilisekileyo”.
title: Umthandazo wentlambululo eFort Hare

text:
INGOZI emasikizi eyehle ngentseni yangoMgqibelo isube imiphefumlo yamagqiyazana amabini aselula, omnye kuwo ingumdlali kamabonakude waseThekwini uOwethu Enhle Gambushe, ngokutsho kwephephandaba iSunday Tribune. 
UGambushe, 22, bedlala indawo kaNonhlanhla kumdlalo oluhlobo lwedrama kwiE.tv  Imbewu: The Seed.  
Othethela iiNkonzo zoHlangulo, uGarrith Jamieson, uthi abeenkonzo zohlangulo bafike kwindawo yengozi kufutshane nendlela iSydenham neBotanic Gardens Road kancinane emva kwentsimbi yokuqala ekuseni, baze bafumana isithuthi esinkaleke eludongeni. UJamieson uthi ngabantu abahlanu abebekweso sithuthi.  “Isithuthi besinabantu abahlanu ngandlela ithile siye saphulukana nolawulo satshayisa uphawu lwendlela, ze saya kubetheka eludongeni. Abasetyhini ababini, nekukholeleka ukuba bakwisithuba seminyaka eyi20, baye bafumana ukonzakala okunobuzaza baze bachazwa njengabangasekhoyo kwindawo leyo yexhwayelo,” utshilo uJamieson. 
Isithethi samaPolisa ePhondweni, uColonel Thembeka Mbele, uthi indoda eneminyaka engama47 nebiqhuba esi sithuthi inqakulwe yavalelwa. 
Uthi le ndoda, ebiqhuba esi sithuthi sibulele la mabhinqa, iza kubekwa ityala lokubulala ngengozi kwakunye nokuqhuba phantsi kweempembelelo zotywala. 
UMbele uthi le ndoda iza kuvela phambi kweNkundla kaMantyi waseThekwini ngoMvulo, ukwathe abakwantsasana baphanda ngokukhokelele kule ngozi. 
ULeleti Khumalo, umvelisi ophezulu womdlalo kamabonakude Imbewu: The Seed, uthe abadlali balo mdlalo badakumbile kukusweleka kukaGambushe. 
“Ayikholeleki, sibuhlungu. Sithethile nosapho  kwaye lucele ithuba lokujamelana nesi sithwakumbe, ” kutsho uKhumalo. 
Omnye wabadlali kulo mdlalo, uRaphael Griffiths, odlala indawo kaZithulele Bhengu, okhe wadlala njengesinqandamathe sikaGambushe kwiMbewu, uvakalise ukukhathazeka kwakhe sesi sehlo. Umbhalo obonwe liphephandaba I’solezwe lesiXhosa kwikhasi lakhe likaFacebook wenjenje:
title: Akasekho umdlalo weImbewu: The Seed

text:
NGAMAZIKO osasazo asekuhlaleni ayi-28 ajikajike ngemibuzo ngaxesha nye umphathiswa wemfundo ephakamileyo noqeqesho uBlade Nzimande. UNzimande ebecacisa isigqibo sesebe lakhe sokunika iiyunivesithi igunya lokunyusa imali yokufunda kunyaka ozayo.  
Olusasazo-ngqo luqale ngentsimbi yesithandathu ngorhatya ukuya kwintsimbi yesixhenxe. Abantu basekuhlaleni bafumene ithuba lokuphosa imibuzo kumphathiswa ngokuthi batsalele umnxeba kwinombolo yasimahla engu 0800 314 446. 
Zithathu izikhululo zosasazo zeli leMpuma Koloni ezithe zathatha inxaxheba kolusasazo. IbiyiFort Hare FM eDikeni, iNkqubela eseBhayi kwakunye neVukani yaseCala. Esi sigqibo sibangele ukunxakama kwabafundi kuninzi lweeyunivesithi zeli, ngelithi bafuna ukuba iphele intlawulo kumaziko emfundo ephakamileyo eMzantsi Afrika.  
Iiyunivesithi ezimbini zeli phondo iFort Hare neWalter Sisulu ziqinisekise ukuba awazukunyuka amaxabiso okufunda kwezi yunivesithi.  
Abafundi abaphuma kumakhaya angathathi ntweni bazakuxhamla kwesi sibonelelo, logama abo bamnkela imali engaphezu kwamakhulu amathandathu amawaka erandi ngonyaka bezakuhlawuliswa.
title: Uthethe kumajelo angaphezu kwamashumi amabini uNzimande

text:
U-Amanda Du Pont yinzwakazi yaseSwazini, unobuhle, umsasazi kamabonakude nomdlali weqonga. 
Waziwa ngendima yakhe kaThabisile Dlamini kumdlalo ka-SABC 2 uMuvhango phakathi ko-2009 ukuya ka-2011. 
Le nzwakazi yaziwa njengomsasazi wenkqubo yomgosi uReal Goboza. Indima yakhe kaLelo ku-Skeem Saam imenze waduma njenge-gqwirhakazi elikhohlakeleyo. 
UVuyo Dabula yena? Waziwa ngendima yakhe ka-Tsetse kwisizini yesithathu kaYizo Yizo ngo-2004.Uyakumkhumbula njengegqwetha likaCherel, uTitus Lesenya kwi-SABC 3 kwi-Isidingo. Kweminye imidlalo avele kuyo iquka uWild at Heart, Bophelo, kuZone 14 neminye. 
Ngoku simbona njengomnye ocatshukelwayo nothandwayo ku-Generations The Legacy njengo Kumakani “Gadaffi” Pakade. 
Ababukeli baziva njani ngo-Dintle ku-Scandal! UDintle uyinzwakazi encinane neqinisekisa ukuba yonke into ayifunayo uyayifumana. 
Le ndima idlalwa ngu-Mapaseka Koetle, nowathatyathwa luthando lokuba kwiqonga lobugcisa eseneminyaka elishumi elinesithathu kuphela ubudala. Emva kokuqoshelisa izifundo zakhe uqalise wabonakala kwiimveliso ezincinane. 
UNyaniso Dzedze ngumdlali kamabonakude, nomdanisi. Emva kokuthweswa isidanga se-BADA eWits School of Arts (2006-2009), ubonakalise uthando lwakhe kwimidlalo yeqonga. UDzedze udlala indima ka-Tsietsi Namane ku-Ashes to Ashes, nongunyana omkhulu wakwa-Namane. UTsietsi ngunyana okhohlakeleyo, ojonge inzuzo nobutyebi. 
Uthandwa phantse ngumntu wonke, kodwa nangona kunjalo ukhohlakele kwaye uqinisekisa ukuba akukho namnye oluthintayo usapho lwakhe lakwa-Xulu. UMpumelelo Bhulose, udlala indima ka-Muzi Xulu uGxabhashe, ongumgulukudu ku-Uzalo. Eminye imidlalo avele kuyo kuquka uGenerations, uTshisa no-Khululeka.
title: Bakhohlakele, bayathandwa, bayazondwa!

text:
Umdlali oyinjini kwi-Orlando Pirates, uBen Motshwari, uthi abalandeli mabalindele isizini entle emva kokufika kwabadlali abatsha. OkaMotshwari ukuthethe oku emva komdlalo weCarling Black Label Cup obuse-Orlando Stadium, eSoweto – apho iPirates ibethwe khona yiKaizer Chiefs ngo’4-3 kumapenela emva kokubambana ngeqanda emdlalweni. Nangona iPirates idlale kakuhle isebenzisa abadlali bayo abaqhelekileyo – kodwa nabo abadlali abatsha bakwazile ukubonisa ukulungela kwabo isizini entsha. Kwisizini egqithileyo, iBucs ivale isizini ikwindawo yesithathu kwiDStv Premiership futhi inendebe yeMTN 8 eza kuyikhusela kwiveki ezayo. Njengokuba kulungiselelwa ukuqalwa kwesizini entsha, uMotshwari unethemba lokuba iPirates iya kuthatha apho iyeke khona kwisizini ka-2020/21. 
“Abadlali abaninzi bagciniwe yiPirates. Lo nto ithi sineqela elizinzileyo. Abadlali abatsha abafana noKwanda Mngonyama bazama ukuziqhelanisa nendlela yethu yokudlala. Uza kusinceda ngoba besingenaye umdlali oyintsika emva kwisizini egqithileyo ngenxa yokonzakala kwabadlali,” utshilo uMotshwari emva komdlalo. “Abadlali abatsha bebefuneka ukuze balinike amandla iqela. Jonga iSundowns, inabadlali abaninzi futhi iyakwazi ukumelana nemidlalo yalapha neyeCAF. Ndicinga ukuba izinto ziza kusihambela kakuhle kwisizini entsha. Sidlale imidlalo emininzi yeCAF kwisizini egqithileyo. Kubekhona ukudinwa ngenxa yokuhamba kakhulu. Sinabadlali abanamava ngoku, okufanele sikwenze kukusebenza ngokuzimisela siziphathe njengabadlali abakwinqanaba eliphezulu,” utshilo uMotshwari. 
Umqeqeshi weBucs, uJosef Zinnbauer, ukhala ngabadlali abonzakeleyo nangona kwaye akumkhathazi ukubethwa yiChiefs kwiveki ephelileyo. UGabadinho Mhango noThembinkosi Lorch bebekhona emdlalweni – kodwa kusekho abadlali abafana noZakhele Lepa noTshegofatso Mabasa abangekaphili. “Kunzima ukutyikitya abadlali ube usazi unabadlali ekungathiwa baphilile. Sinaye uMhango ekufuneka siqinisekise ukuba usebenza kakuhle. UMabasa angabuyela eqeleni naye – kodwa ngeke sithi ukulungele ukudlala. Sinabo abadlali abatsha abaza kudibana nabanamava. Sifuna iifolosi zethu ebaleni,” utshilo uZinnbauer.
title: UBen Motshwari unethemba lesizini eneziphumo ezibethele kwiPirates!

text:
Umdlali weqakamba ophambili, uBen Dunk, uncede iNelson Mandela Bay Giants ngethuba ibetha iTshwane Spartans ngoothinti abathandathu emdlalweni weMzansi Super League obutshisa eSt George’s Park, eBhayi, ngoLwesibini wale veki.  
ITshwane iphumelele itosi yakhetha ukuqhokra kuqala. Ikhutshwe yonke emva kokuba yenze imitsi elikhulu elinamashumi asibhozo anethoba.  
Umdlali weProteas, uAB de Villiers noWiaan Mulder ngabona badlali abaqokelele imitsi yeTshwane emininzi.  
UMulder wenze imitsi engamashumi amahlanu anesibini kwiibhola ezingamashumi amane anesibini. 
 Kanti yena uDe Villiers ugoduke nemitsi engamashumi amathandathu anesithathu kwiibhola ezingamashumi amathathu anesibhozo. 
Abadlali beGiants abafumene oothinti ababalulekileyo nguJunior Dala no-Imran Tahir. Kwiveki ephelileyo, iMandela Bay Giants ibethwe okokuqala kule sizini yiDurban Heat ngoothinti abathandathu.  
Bekunyanzelekile kengoko iyibethe iTshwane Spartan ukuze ibuyele phezulu kwakhona.  
Emva kwempumelelo eyizuze eBhayi, ngoku iMandela Bay Giants ibambene nePaarl Rocks ngamanqaku angamashumi amabini anesithathu emidlalweni esibhozo.  
UDunk wenze imitsi engamashumi alithoba anethoba engaphumanga izolwelinye emdlalweni ogqithileyo.  
URyan Ten Doeschate noMarco Marais ngabanye babadlali abafumene imitsi engaphaya kwamashumi amathathu emnye.  
NgoLwesihlanu, iGiants iza kudibana neCape Town Blitz ngo17:30 emdlalweni oza kube useNewlands Stadium.
title: UBen Dunk uyihlangule iMandela Bay Giants

text:
Inqununu yaseBambanani JSS ebityholwa ngesincwaso nempatho gadalala yabasebenzi ixesha elide, ide yaboniswa isango ngabazali abaphantsi kweSouth African Civic Organisation. 
Oku kwenzeke ngoMvulo we18, kwindawo esakhelwe kuyo esi sikolo iSlovo Park kwintshona yoMthatha. Ngesaquphe, phambi kwentsimbi yesixhenxe ngentseni, kufike iqaqobana labantu abaqikelelwa kwisixhenxe beyokuvala isango lesikolo ngelithi uMnu. uBango akasamkelekanga ngaphakathi kwamasango. 
 Ingxelo esuka kwisekela lenqununu uMnu.Mafa Maphasa ithi, wonke omnye umsebenzi kuthwe makadlule ngomzimba okhululekileyo, ngaphandle nje kukaBango, nabamkhombe ekhayeni ekufikeni kwakhe, engekawubeki nomcondo ngaphakathi kwamasango. 
OkaMaphasa uthi, le ngqokelela yabazali, ayingobantu abafundisa abantwana kwesa sikolo, kodwa ziimbuso ezingaqhelekanga ekunokuba zibizwe nje ukuze zizokuqoshelisa lo mcimbi. 
“Nangona kunjalo, okwethu kukuthatha amanyathelo ngesi sehlo, manyathelo lawo azakwandulelwa kukwazisa iSebe lezeMfundo, nendiqinisekileyo ukuba inqununu isebenza kuwo sithetha nje. Esi sehlo yinto noko ebesingakhange siyilindele njengoko ingakhange ithiwe thsuphe nguSANCO. Kodwa ke sinolwazi lokuba uSANCO akangomqeshi, kwaye akalo sebe lezemfundo, lona liselungelweni lokugxotha liqeshe. 
Iinkqubo zokufunda nokufundisa beziqhuba ngesiqhelo nangona ulawulo belukwisekela lincediswa sisigqeba solawulo iSGB. 
OkaBango uthe akanako ukuphendula kuba naye ubone nje abantu bemvalela iingcango ngaphandle kolwazi lwakhe. Kuvakala ukuba le ntshukumo iququzelelwe ngabazali ngeCawa ye-17 kwintlanganiso ethe yabizwa,  kubongozwa abahlali ukuba bamanyane kweli khwelo lokuphelelwa lithemba ngakwinqununu. Eyona ntsuma-ntsumane esahlafunwa nguye wonke umsebenzi yeyokuba, ‘ngubani obone kusisidingo ukuba kubizwe uSANCO ngethuba le nyewe isesezandleni zeSouth African Council of Educators (SACE)’. 
Imbono zisabonakala zibetha-bethana, abanye besithi, ukuba angabe kanti uphume umlibe singatsho isikolo sibuyele kwindlela elungileyo, engavelisa iziqhamo ezilindelwe lisebe kunye nabazali abathumela abantwana. Abanye, kuquka isekela lakhe bame kwelithi, yinto engenakwenzeka leyo njengoko iqoqo lolawulo limxhasa okaBango kwaye nesebe liyazi ukuba zizityholo nje ezingamayelenqe ezi.
title: Abazali bagxothe inqununu etyholwa ngesincwaso

text:
Njengokuba kusongwa ikhefu, amaqela adlala kwiPremier Soccer League asasebenzisa ixesha elishiyekileyo njengethuba lokuqinisa iindawo ezithile. IMaritzburg United ibhengeze amagama wabadlali abathathu ebatyikityileyo izolo. Abo badlali nguDaylon Claasen, uDan Morgan noMicah Lea’alafa. Ukufika kwabadlali abatsha kwiMaritzburg bekulindelekile ngenxa yezinto ezimbini: ukuphulukana kwayo nabadlali abaphambili abathathwe yi-Orlando Pirates nokuzama ukuqokelela iqela labadlali abanokuthi bayibeke endaweni engcono kunonyaka ophelileyo. “Sinovuyo olukhulu ngokwazisa uDaylon Classen, uDan Morgan noMicah Lea’alafa,” itshilo ingxelo ekutshwe yiTeam of Choice kwiTwitter. 
UClaasen wayekade engumdlali othembisayo esadlala eJamani (Gremany) – kodwa intlantsi yakhe iye yacima emva kokungadlali kakuhle kwiBidvest Wits kwiisizini ezigqithileyo. Kwisithuba seminyaka emibini edlulileyo, uClassen noSteven Pienaar babuyela eMzantsi Afrika emva kweminyaka eliqela bedlalela amaqela aphambili eYurophu. UMorgan noLea’alafa ngabadlali abasuka kwi-Auckland City yaseNew Zealand. Akukho nto ingako enokubaliswa ngabo ngoba ngabadlali abatsha kwibhola yaseMzantsi Afrika. Kodwa iingxelo zithi uLea’alafa ufake amagowuli angaphaya kwamashumi amathathu (30) emidlalweni engamashumi amathandathu anesithandathu (66). Bonke ababadlali abatsha baza kusebenza phantsi kwesandla sika-Eric Tinkler – osindise iMaritzburg United ezembeni kwimidlalo yokuxabangela.
title: Ityikitye abadlali abathathu iMaritzburg United

text:
YIMALI engange R843 yezigidi eyabiwe ngumphathiswa wezobugcisa, inkcubeko kwakunye nemidlalo uPemmy Majodina kunyakamali ka2016-17.  
Le mali izakuqinisa iziseko ezine zeli sebe. UMajodina udize ukuba i20.6 yezigidi izakuncedisa kwimfundiso ngomgaqo siseko nokukhuthaza ubuthandazwe.  
Oku kuquka i7.9 yezigidi ezakuncedisa kwimibhiyozo yeYunivesithi yaseFort Hare. Eli ziko lemfundo  lizakuqhuba imibhiyozo yeminyaka elikhulu.  
Ukwathe kuzakombiwa amathambo angamashumi amahlanu anesibini wamajoni ayelwela inkululeko nawaxhonywa ePitoli.  
Isiseko sesibini seli sebe kukunika amathuba alinganayo nokukhuthaza ubudlelwane phakathi kweentlanga.  
Eli phulo lizakuzuza imali engange 251.7 yezigidi.  
Oku kuquka iminyhadala eliqela ezakuqhutywa kweli phondo kulo nyaka. Imali eyiR11.9 yezigidi iya kwisiseko sesithathu ukukhuthaza uluntu elinenxaxheba nobunkokeli.  
Ukanti i29.8 yezigidi kuphuculo lwemo yentlalo yoluntu ngenjongo yokudibanisa iintlanga njengonozala wempumelelo kuluntu ngokubanzi.
title: UMajodina waba izitya zesebe

text:
Imbethimanqindi yaseLibode, uLuthando Mbumbulwana, ithi izimisele ukuya eGoli ibuyele ekhaya nentshinga emva komlo wangomso. UMbumbulwana ukuthethe oku phambi kokundulukela kwiphondo laseGauteng – apho aza kuvana amandla no-Innocent Mantengu emlweni wentshinga yeJunior Featherweight onemijikelo elishumi elinambini. Le mbethimanqindi yaseBuntingville, eLibode, izimisele ukubuyisela isidima samanqindi e-O.R.Tambo ngokususa uMantengu  phambi kwayo ibuye nebhanti ngoba oko kwakuyibeka endaweni entle kumanqwanqwa amanqindi kukhuthaze nezinye eMampondweni. 
“Ubaluleke kakhulu umlo endiya kuwo ngoba uza kundinceda mna njengembethimanqindi. Okwesibini, ubalulekile umlo kule ndawo endiphuma kuyo yase-O.R.Tambo Municipality. Ayikho intshatsheli kule ndawo yethu. Onke amadoda aneetayitile ahamba kudala. Ngoku kuyanyanzeleka ndiphumelele ukuze kubekho into ekhoyo apha e-O.R.Tambo”, utshilo uMbumbulwana, ngokuzithemba emva kokudibana nosodolophi waseNyandeni Municipality. 
Nangona efuna impumelelo eSandton Convention Centre – kodwa uMbumbulwana uyakwazi ukubaluleka kokuzilungiselela. “Amalungiselelo ahamba kakuhle. Ndakhe ndambona uMantengu esilwa intshinga noSonjica. Akukho nto endingayibalula eyingozi. Ndiyokuthatha ibhanti ndize nalo e-O.R.Tambo, ukuze kuphuhle umdlalo wamanqindi kule ndawo. Ukuphumelela kwam kuza kuhlahla indlela yabeza emva kwam abasafuna ukukhula emdlalweni wamanqindi. Umsebenzi wam kukuya phaya ndibuye nebhanti,” utshilo uMbumbulwana. 
Ekuqaleni kweveki, usodolophi waseNyandeni, uMnu. Mesuli Ngqondwana, uthe: “Singumasipala sivuya kakhulu ngoba le nto ithi kulutsha: ukuba sezilalini, akuthethi kuthi abantwana bethu abanakuwafumana amathuba okuziphuhlisa kwezemidlalo. Kufuneka babone ukuba xa uzimisele, kubakho iziphumo ezifana nezi zikaLuthando. Nokuba akaphumelelanga – kodwa sicinga ukuba wonke umntu unomnqweno wokufikelela kwinqanaba akulo.” Phantsi kwegama lakhe, uLuthando uphumelele ishumi elinanye lemilo, wabethwa kwemithandathu.
title: Ndifuna ukubuya nentshinga eGoli, utsho uMbumbulwana

text:
Umqeqeshi weCape Town City ucinga ukuba iqela lakhe lidibana neMamelodi Sundowns ngelona xesha lifanelekileyo. 
 La maqela adibana kumdlalo weNedbank Cup oza kutsala umdla wabalandeli kakhulu ngeCawe ngo’15:00, eCape Town Stadium.  
Iqela likaPitso Mosimane lixakeke kakhulu ngoba lincwase ukuphumelela indebe yePSL neNedbank Cup – kanti likwagxeleshe iCAF Champions League.  
Kungenxa yeso sizathu kanye esibangela uBenni McCarthy acinge okokuba ukubandakanyeka kweSundowns kwizinto ezininzi kungayiphazamisa.  
Amakhwenkwe kaMcCarthy aya kumdlalo wale mpelaveki ekhuthazekile emva kokubetha i-Orlando Pirates kumdlalo weNedbank Cup ekuqaleni kwenyanga yoKwindla.  
Nangona uBenni enalo ngcingane engqondweni yakhe – kodwa ukudlala neSundowns soze kube lula nanini  na ngoba inabadlali abasezingeni eliphezulu kwaye izimisele ukuncumisa abalandeli bayo ekupheleni kwesizini.  
Abadlali beDowns banamava kwaye bakuqhelile ukudlala namaqela asokolisayo. Ukuba iCity iyakwazi ukudlula kwiDowns, ingafumana ithuba lesibini lokulwela indebe emva kokuba yoxhuthwa intlaka emlonyeni yiSuperSport United kwiMNT 8 kunyaka ophelileyo.  
“Eli lithuba lokubuyisa isidima sethu emva kokukhutshwa kwimidlalo yeCAF – kodwa ndingatsho ukuba sidibana neqela elinzima. Nangona kunjalo – ndicinga ukuba lixesha elifanelekileyo lokudlala neSundowns ngoba iingqondo zabadlali bayo zikwiChampions League nakwi-Orlando Pirates ebathe nca kwiPSL,” utshilo uMcCarthy.  
Ukuphumelela kwayo iSundowns kungayinika ithuba elihle lokuphumelela iindebe ezintathu zonke. Lo nto inokwenzeka ukuba uPitso usebenzisa iinduku zakhe ngobuchule ngoba kunzima ukujongana nezinto ezininzi ngaxeshanye. Iqela eliphumeleleyo kwiNedbank lakuzuza indebe ekhatshwa zizigidi ezisixhenxe zeerandi (R7-million) njengokuba ifinca iminyaka elishumi isebenzisana nePremier Soccer League. 
Imidlalo yeNedbank Cup: 
NgoMgqibelo: Ubuntu Cape Town v Free State Stars (Athlone Stadium, 3:30pm); Maritzburg United v Bloemfontein Celtic; Kaizer Chiefs v Baroka FC (Nelson Mandela Bay Stadium, 20:15) 
NgeCawe: Cape Town City v Mamelodi Sundowns (Cape Town Stadium, 3:00)
title: UBenni McCarthy akayoyiki kwaphela iSundowns

text:
Ndike ndangumqhubi weeteksi zemigama emide, ndilayisha amagoduka akuthi ayephangela eKapa.  
Ndandisebenzisa iziselo zamandla ezazikho ngelo xesha, njengabo bonke abaqhubi bemigama emide esasingabo, sigxotsha ubuthongo nokudinwa endleleni.  
Ezi ziselo zasolo zikrokreleka, ubani uzibuza ukuba yintoni le ifakwa kuzo yenza umntu angadinwa, angozeli. Ayezikrokrela ngakumbi ke amagoduka akuthi.  
Umafungwashe kabawo wahlupheka mhla wandibona ndisela esinye sezo ziselo, ndibuya naye eKapa, emangaliswe kukuthi kanti sendingene etywaleni kule nto yezi teksi neyaziwa ngokusoloko ineenkqubo ezigoso.  
Utywala ke andizange ndabusela, babunqabile kuNgcengane ngemihla yokukhula kwethu, bungeyiyo nento yabantwana ke.  
Naxa basebuthe bakho andizange ndabunanza, ndabuchasa ngenxa yokunxilisa. Wayemele kukothuka ke umntakatata, ukukuthi kanti kuhleliwe nje ndiyanxila, ndiqwele ngentswelakuzimaseka ukusela ndiqhuba! Nam ikhe yandibhida into yezi ziselo.  
Ndibona unyana womkhuluwa esela isiselo esisenkonkxeni ende emnyama esithandwa kakhulu lulutsha. Ndamangala, ndisithi lo mfana kanti kuhleliwe nje uyanxila, ngoku uswele imbeko ukuba asele phambi kwam. 
 Ndaxhalaba ukuba kazi uza kuthi akunxila enze ntoni na emehlweni am? Andizange ndimbuze, ndamyeka enjalo, ukuba anxile athwale isidanga ukuba unako.  
Ndisazi kutshanje eso siselo ukuba kanti sisiselo samandla. Sisiselo anedingekasicaceli nangoku ke mna, kukuba sithandwa ngabantwana abafikisayo nalulutsha oluthanda imijuxuzo.  
Into ethandwa lulutsha lwemijuxuzo lwanamhlanje ndasoloko ndiyikrokrela, kuba ivamise ngezothe nangokungazimaseki. Ndisonqena ngezo zizathu ke esi siselo samandla sisenkonkxeni emnyama. Kuleyo nto yokukrokreleka kwezi ziselo zamandla, kutshanje ndibone esenziwe ngentsangu.  
Ewe intsangu, umya, icuba labathwa elihlonitshwa ngokuba ngumthunzi weenkukhu, idarha ngokwamalawu. Ndothukile, ndimangele, ndatsho ndacinga amaphulo acetywayo okusetyenziswa kwentsangu ngokusemthethweni eMzantsi Afrika, ngaphandle kokuqhunywa oku ke.  
Isiselo sentsangu sisenkonkxeni eluhlaza ezotywe igqabi lentsangu ze sabhalwa “Isiselo sekhanabhiz.” Kubeko nelinye igama elibhalwe ngezantsi kwelo endingakwazanga kulifunda kakuhle.  
Xa ndilijonga libe ngathi lakhiwe ngamagama ajongiswe ezantsi; kodwa xa ndiyiguqula inkonkxa, ndiyimisa ukuba amagama lawo ajonge phezulu azofundeka, suka aphinda angathi kukhona ndiwajongise ezantsi!  
Ndiyijikajike ndayijikajika loo nkonkxa suka yangathi ndim lo ujongise umetyiso ezantsi! Ndikhawuleze ndasiphindisela kwitafile yaso ndingaphindanga ndilinge nto yimbi, ndamana ndisikrwaqula ngokuye ndisishiya, ndikhangela nokuba abantu aba bandijonge njani na, kodwa ndafika kungekho ukhangeleka ebona okutyhulu kwisimilo sam.  
Andifuni kuzicingela ke into enokuba yenziwa seso siselo emntwini, ndiyiyeka apha emandleni ekuthiwa senza wona, njengezinye ke izidalimandla ezisetyenziswa ngabantu kwizinto ezahlukileyo.  
Kodwa endizixelele kona kukuba nokuba yintoni na esiyenzayo ayisayi kubonwa kum, abangazoyikiyo izinto sesiya kuyibona kubo.  
Nditsho ndakhumbula iikuku zentsangu ezazithengiswa kwisikhululo sikaloliwe saseKhayelitsh eKapa. Zazithengiswa ngumfo olirasta owayehlala kwilokishi iHarare kwalapho eKhayelitsha.  
Wayekhwaza ke urasta ethengisa iikuku zentsangu zakhe; “ganja mafin, ganja mafin ngapha! Ganja mafin kweli cala!”  
Andizange ndide ndibone bantu bambi bazithengayo ingengabo abantwana abakule ntanga ifikisaya, kukho namantombazana kubo, bambi benxibe impahla yesikolo. Niyabazi ke ngemikhuba abantwana abakwelo khabathiso.  
Urasta unabalingane ke ngoku kwikuku yentsangu ayithengisayo, ishishini lakhe liza kukhula! AbaseKapa basenyhwebeni, umntu ya kuzifumanela ikuku yentsangu esikhululweni sikaloliwe eKhayelitsha ze athobe ngesiselo sentsangu.  
Atsho abe mnandi ke abe njeyaa!
title: Iziselo zamandla!

text:
Amapolisa aseMount Fletcher aphanda malunga netyala lokubhaqwa kwamadoda amahlanu angaziwayo sele ebhubhile kwilali yakuKetekete emva kokubethwa ngabahlali bala mmandla kuba bekrokreleka ukuba esi sihlanu liqela lemigulukudu elisuka kummandla waseMafusini. 
 
Ngokwengxelo ephuma kwisithethi samapolisa kula ngingqi uKapteni Raphael Motloung, esi sihlanu samadoda sibhaqwe sele sihamba ngaze sibotshelelwe izandla ngentambo. 
 
UMotloung uthi kukrokreleka ukuba emva kokuba abahlali bebulele la madoda mahlanu, bathathe le mizimba yawo bayokuyinyengeza ecaleni kwedami. 
 
Amapolisa ayaqhubeka nophando nanjengoko bekungekabanjwa mntu. 
 
Kusenjalo, amapolisa aseMaluti afunisa ngendoda edukileyo egama linguSolomon Tobia (51). Indoda le igqityelwe ukubonwa ngomhla wesibini kule nyanga izimase umcimbi kwilali yaseZwelitsha eMaluti. 
 
Ingxelo ithi akazange aphinde abonwe kwaye abuyele nakowabo kude kubengoku.  
UMotloung uthi amapolisa kudala egqogqa ngezinja ekhangela uSolomon kodwa nkqi ukubonakala.
title: Amadoda amahlanu afunyenwe eze, ebhubhile  Abongile Ginya

text:
Ngabantu abagula ngengqondo abakumashumi amahlanu anesibhozo abathathwe ngetshova kwindawo ebibagcina engekho mthethweni kuNdabakazi eGcuwa ngaphandle kokwazisa iintsapho zabo.  
Ingxelo ithi iziko iKhululani Abantu Bam, ligcina ngokungekho mthethweni abantu abagula ngengqondo emva kokubaqokelela esitalatweni naphantsi kwebhulorho eGcuwa. 
 Ongumlawuli wale ndawo uSese Sitali uthi yindibanisela yamasebe karhulumente aquka isebe lezempilo, isebe lentlalontle namapolisa oMzantsi Afrika athathe aba baguli.  
“Ngomhla wamashumi amabini anesibini kule nyanga kufike ibhasi ezimbini kukho unkosikazi apha ezikweni, ezi bhasi zize kuthatha aba baguli, bathunyelwe kwindawo eseKirkwood ngaseBhayi, izihlobo azikhange zaziswe ngeli nyathelo, bendingenalwazi lako konke oku,” uthethe watsho uSitali.  
Lo kaSitali waqala eli ziko ekuqaleni konyaka ophelileyo emva kokuqaphela ukuba kukho imfuneko yoko.  
“Ndaqaphela ukuba akukho magosa karhulumente, nkonzo okanye bantu bazimisele ukunika ingqalelo imeko yaba bantu, bebesitya emgqomeni belala esitalatweni, ndacela ukusebenzisa le ndawo kwaTransnet ukuze ndibagcine,” ucacise watsho uSitali. 
Xa befika aba baguli apha bathunyelwa esibhedlele ukuba baye kwenza uvavanyo lwezifo ezahlukeneyo ukuze kuvulwe umqulu wokugula kwabo, itsho ingxelo.  
“Sinoomama abane abaphekayo noonogada ababini abagada imini nobusuku, bonke aba basebenza ngaphandle kwentlawulo, sibatyisa ukutya esikuphiwa kwindawo ezahlukeneyo ngenxa yokuba akukho ncedo silufumana kurhulumente nakumashishini abucala, sihanjelwa nangugqirha, iintsapho zabo azinangxaki,” utsho uSese. 
Oku kwenzeka logama kugcadwa ngemibuzo amagosa esebe lezempilo kwiphondo laseRhawutini malunga nentlekele yokubhubha kwabantu abagula ngengqondo abakwikhulu namashumi amane anesithathu eSidimeni.  
Iintsapho zala maxhoba zivakalise inkxaso yazo kwindlela abagcinwe ngayo abantu babo eKhululani abantu bam, logama bekwavakalisa umsindo wabo ngakwisebe lezeMpilo eMpuma Koloni.  
UCynthia Nyembezi ngumama kaSisa Nyembezi othunyelwe kweli ziko laseKirkwood, uvakalise ukunganeliseki.  
“Udade wethu ebeye kubona uSisa, waxelelwa ukuba akakho uthathiwe usiwe kwenye indawo, ayaziwa indawo abasiwe kuyo ukuba iphi, ayilunganga le nto yenziwe ngurhulumente, besingena ngxaki nale ndawo,”uthethe watsho uNyembezi.  
UWele Mtshabe nguyise kaAndile Mtshabe, yena uthethe wenjenje ngale meko. “Sidelelwe, sajongelwa phantsi ngurhulumente, ukuba le ndawo ayikho semthethweni iphi enye esemthethweni, wenzani urhulumente ngaba bantu, asinaxesha lemithetho yabo, masihlonitshwe,”uthethe watsho uMtshabe. 
Oligosa leHuman Rights Centre eQonce uMatshaya Maki, uthi uzimisele ukunika ingcebiso yasemthethweni kweli ziko nabazali bamaxhoba. 
 “Silapha ukuza kucebisa umnikazi wendawo nabazali ngelona nyathelo ekumele ukuba lithatyathwe, ukuba le ndawo ayikho mthethweni kutheni isibhedlele saseGcuwa sithumela abantu apha,” uthethe watsho uMaki.  
Ukanti osisithethi sesebe lezeMpilo eMpuma Koloni uSizwe Kupelo uthethe wathi:  “Aba bantu bebegcinwe kwindawo engekho mthethweni, kukho nezityholo zokuba bayabethwa, abekho kwindawo karhulumente kula ndawo,”utsho uKupelo. 
Abangamashumi amabini anethoba kwaba baguli bathathwe lisebe lezempilo logama abangamashumi amabini anethoba bethathwe lisebe lentlalontle, abangamashumi amathathu anesithathu basagcinwe leli ziko. 
Ukanti othethe egameni lamapolisa aseGcuwa uKapteni Jackson Manatha, walile ukungqina ukuba amapolisa ebekho ngethuba kuthathwa aba bantu. 
siyabulela.mqikela@inl.co.za
title: Baqweqwedisiwe abagula ngengqondo

text:
Namhlanje andibhali ndiyathetha kwaye unendlebe nje unetyala. Ndithi kuwe igalelekile eyoMqungu inyanga ifike neengxaki zayo, uthanda ungathandi, ifike kanye apha emveni nje kwezi ziyolo neziyunguma zenyanga kaDisemba. 
Ibhonasi ibiphumile kwabayifumanayo kwaye amasoka kumele afezekise izithembiso zawo kwizinqanda mathe zawo ngokuthi babhinqise njengoko bebethembisile. Abakulo ntombi bavuyile ngoba umkhwenyana uyalobola kwaye intombi yabo ikhulile izakubanomzi kunye nosapho lwayo ngoku. 
Ngelixhesh’abantwana bafuna ukufuman’ezintsha impahla njengoko ixesha leKrisimesi lidlulile sikuxakeka ngoku sijonge kwimpahla yesikholo kwakunye nezixhobo ezisetyenziswa esikolweni ezifana neencwadi, iilidi zokubhala iipeni, iikhrayoni kwakunye nezinye ezifunwa esikolweni. Imali siyayazi ukuba iye isebenziseke kakhulu ngoDisemba. Lilona xesha linzima eli uJanuwari. UDisemba ziziyunguma, iimpahla ezintsha, ukutya okumnandi, iiswiti kanti nakwelandelayo inyanga uJanuwari ikwaseso iyasebenziseka imali yokubhatala ezikolweni, ukubhatalela abantwana ezikolweni, ukwehla usenyuka ufunela umntwana isikolo kwakunye nendawo yokuhlala ukumthengela yonke into ube umqala phantsi.  
Ukuba umamele kwaye uyetyisa ngobanje ndithetha uyakuqaphela ukuba ndithi kuwe le nyanga kunye neli xhesha lonyaka kuchithwa imali ngoba zonke ezi zinto ndithethe ngazo zenziwa ngemali.  
Mali leyo uninzi lwethu thina sizwe esimnyama esingenayo njengoko singarholi mirholo ingako. Ubokuyisebenzisaa le mali sele uyilungisile eyesikolo ngoba sibaluleke ukodlula yonke into.  
Kaloku sizwe esimnyama ukuze siphume kule ngxingo sikuyo yendlala, yentswelo ngokolwazi nangokwezoqoqosho, ukurhuqwa kwesidima sethu edakeni kunye nokungahlonithswa imfundo sisixhobo sokuqala ekumele sixhobe ngaso.Sakusifumana esis ixhobo ngokuthi siyole sele siyibeke bucala eyemfundo imali.  
Kumele sirhafe isithuthi sokuthutha abantwana abaya esikolweni.  
Ukuze singantanyantanyazi sibengamaxhoba omatshonisa ngale nyanga sibokuzifundisa ukubeka imali yemfundo kuqala, emveni koko singazenza zonke ezinye izinto ke ngoku.  
Ithi endim indoda, UMadiba, masibeke ikamva labantwana bethu nesizwe sethu kuqala phambi kwento yonke ekulo mhlaba.
title: Kubalulekile ukonga imali

text:
INKULUBAPHATHISWA yaseMpuma Koloni, uOscar Mabuyane, wenze umbulelo kubantu bephondo ngokuphuma bayovota, nangona nje bengakhange baphume ngobuninzi babo. 
Umbutho iANC unkqenkqeza phambili ngeevoti kwiphondo laseMpuma Koloni nangona ubonakalise ukungakhuli ngenkxaso kwimimandla ekwintshona yephondo. 
Ethetha nabeendaba, uMabuyane uthe: “Ndibulela kubantu baseMpuma Koloni ngokuphuma bayovota ukuqinisekisa ukuba inkqubo yedemokhrasi ihlala ihleli.” 
UMabuyane, ongusihlalo weANC ephondweni, uthi njengeANC bayavuya ngendlela abaqhube ngayo kunyulo. Oku ukutsho nangona nje iANC iphulukene nolawulo lwesininzi kumasipala iKoukamma naseDr Beyers Naude. Kwaba masipala babini, iANC ibifudula ilawula ngokwesininzi. 
Ngo2016 iANC yaphumelela iKoukamma ngomyinge we-50.9%. Kolu lonyulo iANC iyakwazanga ukuphumelela ngesininzi kulo masipala ozinze eKareedouw. 
Emva kobalo, iANC ifumene u-46.3%, iDA 27.5% ze iPatriotic Alliance yafumana u-10.9%. 
Ukanti eDr Beyers Naude, umasipala ozinze eRhafu, iANC ifumene u-46.8%, iDA 39.6% ze iPatriotic Alliance yafumana u-4.2%. 
Ngo2016, iANC yaphumelela iDr Beyers Naude ngomyinge we-51.1%. 
Ukanti eNelson Mandela Bay, akukho mbutho othe wafumana isininzi, into ethetha ukuba kuza kuphinda kubekho urhulumente wenkazathi. . 
UMabuyane uthi enye yezinto ezibangele ukuba abantu bangaphumi bayovota ngumbandela weCovid-19. “Abantu bazibonile iintsapho zabo zibhubha, ngoko ke [abafuni kwenza mpazamo].” 
UMabuyane uthi ukugaya inkxaso ngeenyanga ezimbini bekungekho lula, kodwa watsho esithi ukusabela kwabantu kumaphulo wabo kuluphawu lokuba abantu basayixhasa iANC. 
“Abantu bayayibona inkqubela notshintsho olwenziwe yiANC ukusukela ngo1994. Ewe sisenoxanduva olungumnqantsa wentswelongqesho, siyayazi futhi ukuba abanye abakabi nazo iinkonzo, kodwa siyiANC sisebenza nzima ukuqinisekisa ukuba wonke ubani uphila ubomi obundilisekileyo.”
title: Mabuyane: ‘Siyabulela kuni bephondo’

text:
Amapolisa aphanda ngamatyala odlwengulo eTinarha, amemelela kuluntu ukuba luwancede ekufumaneni umkhondo wendoda egama lingu-Allan Dhela Alias Melumzi Mafuzfa.  
Amapolisa akholelwa ukuba le ndoda inganceda ekusombululeni ityala lodlwengulo elenzeka eKirkwood kwinyanga ephelileyo.  
Onolwazi malunga nale ndoda uyacelwa ukuba atsalele umnxeba uWarrant Officer Eddie Saaiman ku: 072 732 4614 okanye amapolisa aseTinatha ku: 041 996 3003.
title: Amapolisa afunisa ngomkhondo kaMelumzi

text:
Endaweni yokuya phambili, iKaizer Chiefs ibuya umva. Oku kucace gca emva okwekati emhlophe ehlungwini emva kokuba Amakhosi ekhatywe ngesithende ngaBafana Bes’sthende zacima izibane. Badlobe okwamathole abadlali beGolden Arrows emva kokuba bebethe iChiefs ngamagowuli amabini kwelinye (2-1) emdlalweni weDStv Premiership obutaka iintlantsi ePrincess Magogo Stadium ngenjikalanga yanamhlanje. Oku kuthetha ukuthi iArrows ifumene amanqaku amathandathu onke kwiChiefs kule sizini eqhubekayo – into engafane iyifumane kwiqela laseSoweto. Abafana Bes’thende baqokelele amanqaku amane ngoku emidlalweni emibini phantsi kukaMabhuti Khenyeza noVusumzi Vilakazi abanikwe umsebenzi wokuqeqesha iqela emva kokugxothwa kukaLehlohonolo Seema kutshanje. 
Amakhosi abuyela kwaNyamayipheli engciphuza kwakhona emva kokubethwa ngo’1-0 yiStellenbosch FC emdlalweni weDStv Premiership kwiveki ephelileyo. Isiqingatha sokuqala somdlalo besinika umdla kakhulu ngoba omabini amaqela ebehlasela. Amakhosi abhalise kuqala ebhodini ngegowuli elifakwe nguKhama Billiat – odlalelwe ibhola entle nguLeonardo Castro oqale umdlalo okwesibini phantsi kuka-Arthur Zwane noDillon Sheppard. Abadlali abafana noNduduzo Sibiya noSaziso Magawana bazamile ukudala amathuba – kodwa akwabikho nto ivelayo kwade kwaphela isiqingatha sokuqala iChiefs ihamba phambili ngegowuli. 
Abafana Bes’thende bafumene igowuli lokulinganisa emva kokuba uNjabulo Ngcobo enze impazamo endaweni embi. USifiso Mlungwana ubhakuzelise umnatha yatsho yafumana amandla athe chatha iGolden Arrows ebibhoke isicuku kwisigaba sesibini. UMichael Gumebe ubethelele isikhonkwane esingcwabe iChiefs ngegowuli lesibini leGolden Arrows emizuzwini yokugqibela. Ukubethwa kweChiefs emdlalweni wanamhlanje kuthetha ukuthi ibethwe emidlalweni emithathu ilandelelana kwaye ambalwa nyhani ngoku amathuba okuba ifumane indawo yesibini kwiDStv Premiership xa kuphela isizini. 
Golden Arrows: Mlungwana, Nxadi, Cele, Mantshiyane, Sibiya, Ndwandwe, Magawana, Dube, Mutizwa, Zuke, Mhlongo. 
Amalalela: Mbaeva, Magubane, Mathiane, Ndlovu, Conco, Gumede, Dlamini, Fikizolo, Khumalo. 
Kaizer Chiefs: Petersen, Ngezana, Mphahlele, Njabulo Ngcobo, Blom, Frosler, Alexander, Nlosingiphile Ngcobo, Dolly, Billiat, Castro. 
Amalalela: Bvuma, Cardoso, Nurkovic, Baccus, Parker, Zuma, Radebe, Mabiliso, Sekgota.
title: Abafana Bes’thende bayikhabe ngesithende iKaizer Chiefs zacima izibane!

text:
Amabhinqa ale mihla asoloko ekhalazela ukunganikwa ngqalelo iwafaneleyo kwidemokhrasi yeli.  
Nangani ihlala isemilonyeni nje into yokuxatyiswa kwawo nokunqanda ukuxhatshazwa kwawo, kodwa okona kucacileyo kukuba oko kwenziwayo akonelanga, kusafuneka kwenziwe nangakumbi. UMgaqosiseko uthi wonke umntu unamalungelo alinganayo nafanayo. 
Andiqinisekanga ke ngeyona nto ithethwayo xa kusitshiwo, njengoko indoda ingafani nebhinqa. Alingana ze afane njani amalungelo abantu abangafaniyo. 
 Umzekelo, emsebenzini ibhinqa lixhamla ikhefu lokukhulelwa eliziinyanga ezintathu ubuncinane ngeli xa yona indoda ingalifumani ikhefu lokukhulelisa. Kumele ke kambe kube njalo, elowo axhamle ngokwemfanelo yakhe. 
 Omnye umzekelo, kwiindawo zoncedoluntu ezifana neebhanki namazikompilo, abantu abanobulima nabalupheleyo abafoli njengokuba thina sisima emigceni kugobe izinqe silinde uncedo.  
Bafika nitsale ubuso kukukruquka kukuhlala emigceni nilinde uncedo, bafike bona bangqale etafileni yoncedo, basuke apho bathunyelwe ngqo kwindawo yoncedo, baphume banishiye nizezo zimo zetyuwa apho.  
Njengokuba ehewulwa kangaka nje umntu ongenelelayo emgceni, abanobulima bangenelela ngegunya kungabikho unabuganga bakuthetha, bengangeneleli nasesiqwini koko bengqala entloko. Sele siyamkele ke loo nto kuba asifani, namalungelo ethu akafani ke ngoko. 
Mininzi ke imizekelo endinokuyibalula ukubonisa lo mcimbi kamakulinganwe nokamakufanwe, qha ke andihambelanga apho.  
AmaXhosa kudala ayazi ke wona into yokuba abantu abafani kwaye abalingani. Kananjalo ayazi amaXhosa ukuba abantu bengalingani nje, bengafani, babaluleke ngokulinganayo, kanye oku kweminwe yesandla ukushiyana ngobude nobukhulu nangani ibaluleke ngokulinganayo.  
Imontlalo yaBantu yijonge kuleyo minwe yakho lawundini, yiyoleyo esandleni sakho ayikho kude ukuba ungayazi. 
Ukubuyela kulo mba wamabhinqa ke, amaXhosa ayalazi ixabiso lebhinqa nokubaluleka kwalo entlalweni nangona lingenamandla alingana nawendoda nje. Lingekho ibhinqa akukho luntu, ngokunjalo nendoda.  
Kwaye kwaba akukho ukwaziyo ukuthatha indawo yomnye ngokugqibeleleyo, nenkwalambisa eyenziwayo neyande ngobukho bedemokhrasi ibuya izihlaze kwayona.  
Ngako oko kwaba akukho ubaluleke ukodlula omnye nangani bengalingani bengafani ngezinto ezininzi. 
Ukuqinisa ixabiso lebhinqa esiXhoseni, igama lalo lemveli elithi “ibhinqa” liyayeshelwa xa kuthethwa kusingiswe embekweni nasekuxabiseni aba, kuba lichaza nje ubume babo bendalo hayi ixabiso labo. Ngamabhinqa kuba babhinqile; kambe ke nendoda ibhinqile kodwa ibhinqa lona libhinqe ngaphezu kwendoda.  
Yho; wakhumsha Gengeshe! AmaXhosa asebenzisa igama elithi “nkosikazi” kowendileyo nelithi “nkosazana” kongendanga xa esingise kumabhinqa. Andike ndive nkosikazi ithi “nkosi” ke endodeni yayo, ngaphandle kwabo bakwenza oko ngokwenkolo yoBukristu.  
Amadoda akanagama libonisa xabiso lawo. Yinkosi nenkosana yasebukhosini ababizwa “nkosi” okanye “nkosana”.  
Umnqimbinqa wendoda efana nam lo angancuma noba sele elele mhla kwathiwa “nkosi” kuwo ngamakhosikazi awo.  
Endaweni yokuba amakhosikazi ethu asibize “nkosi’’ njengoko nathi sisithi “nkosikazi” kuwo ase akhethe ukusibiza ngabantwana bethu, kuthiwe “yise kaNgxengamasi,” esithobela ezingeni labantwana endaweni yokusibiza ngeenkosi zawo. Ndaza ndakuva zwindini! 
Kuloo nto yethu ke yokubabiza “nkosikazi” abafazi bethu, nakwiintombi zethu sithi “nkosazana” ukubonisa ukuxabiseka kwabo nangani bengenamandla alingana nathi, bayayityekeza loo mbeko. Izinto abazenzayo nabangxamele kuzo zibonisa ukuba bafanelwe kwalela gama lemveli kunelo lexabiso. 
 Izinto ezithathwa ngokuba azibafanelanga njengabantu abaxabisekileyo, zezona bafuna zona ngedemokhrasi.  
Njengokuba besifudula sisithi mayibe sithi maxaxavithi abantu abaya kuxheshwa ngamaBhulu emigodini, bona sibashiya ngasemva njengezitya zembeko zethu, namhlanje bafuna ukunxiba igambutsi behle emigodini banyuke iipali barhuqe imigqomo nathi!  
Liphi ke ixabiso lenkosazana nelenkosikazi kuloo nto? Goba msenge iibhokhwe zikutye! 
Owenu kwisiXhosa, Nxuba.
title: Inkosikazi nokuba yinkosazana

text:
Iqela labafana abangaphantsi kweminyaka elishumi elinesithathu leBush Bucks liphumelele itumente yebhola ekhatywayo ebanjwa rhoqo ngonyaka exhaswa nguBuilt it emva kokubetha iqela iDown Town ngo’3-1 kumapenela eRotary Stadium, eMthatha. 
Le tumente yasungulwa ngo-2006 ngeenjongo zokuphuhlisa abadlali abaselula badlulele kumaqela amakhulu aquka Amazulu kwaye abaqeqeshi abanje ngoClive Barker babefudula beyinxalenye yayo. Kwimidlalo eyandulela owokugqibela iBush Bucks ibethe iQokolweni ngo2-1 logama iDown Town itywatyushe iThembu Royals ngo2-0. Le midlalo itsale umdla wabantu baseNgangelizwe kakhulu. Kunyaka ophelileyo yaphunyelelwa yi-Thembu Royals ibetha iBush Bucks. Umqeqeshi weMbabala, uBonga Mgwigwi uthi le impumelelo yabo ikhuthaza uphuhliso nangakumbi kwiqela lakhe ukwathi akhange bavale, indlela abaqeqesha ngayo nokuzibophelela zezinye zezinto ezibancedileyo.  
Umdlali weDown Town oselula okwayiKapteni uLwanele ncapayi(13) utyunjwe njengomdlali wetumente waphumelela amabhaso ohlukeneyo.  
Uthi ukuphumelela amawonga amabini amkhuthazile nanjengoko erhalela ukudlalela iKaizer chiefs. Umququzeleli wale tumete, uSiyabonga Mdlungwane, uthi baqaphele ukwehla kwezinga lebhola ekhatywayo eMthatha, bathatha isigqibo sokubamba itumente rhoqo.  
Sikhuthaza uphuhliso lwebhola ekhatywayo kulo mmandla, sisebenzisa amaqela adlala kumbutho webhola ekhatywayo iKsd local football Association, isekhona imiceli mngeni ekhoyo equka ukungafumani bala kunyanzeleke sihlawule iR400 ukusingatha le midlalo eRotary.  
Iinkampani ezifana ne-Nedbank kunye ne-Real People zifake isandla ukuze le tumente ibeyimpumelelo. Amaqela athathe inxaxheba anikwe iindebe kunye nebhola.  
UKhayalethu Benya ojongene nophuhliso eMthatha uthi bayayivuyela le tumente kuba iyakhula umhla nezolo kwaye omnye wabadlali abaphume kule tumente uCasker Zweni uzakuziqeqesha neMamelodi Sundowns.
title: Uphuhliso lwebhola luthathe olunye unyawo eMthatha

text:
Umbhali weentsomi kwakunye namabali amafutshane, uNompucuko Zakaza, wenze esi sibhalo siqulathe indlela ekunokuthi kwenziwe ngayo ukubuyisela ixabiso kunye nothando lwesiXhosa, kubafundi kunye nababhali ngokubanzi.  
Uluvo lwakhe lelokuba iintsomi zinendima enkulu ezingathi ziyidlale ukubuyisa isidima sesiXhosa ebantwini. 
UKUVUSELELA UMDLA KUPHANDO NGENDIMA ENOKUDLALWA ZIINTSOMI ZESIXHOSA 
Singenza njani ke ukuvuselela umdla kuphando lweentsomi? Uphando olungenazenzo alunasiseko nakamva lililo. Xa uScheub (1969) wayeqokelela iintsomi zesiXhosa kumama uNongenile Zenani, wayebonakalisa ukuba nabani onomdla wokwenza uphando anganako. Iinjongo zolwakhe uphando yayizezelo xesha kwaye zazilungele iimfuno zakhe neenjongo zesifundo sakhe. Ingaba xa ufuna ukwenza uphando ngeentsomi uyakube uqhutywa yintoni? Ngumdla nje wokuphanda, ngumdla wokuzisebenzisa ubalisa, ngumdla wokuba ngumbhali, okanye umshicileli macwecwe eentsomi njalo-njalo. 
Ukuvuseleleka kuxhomekeke kwinjongo yakho njengomphandi. Ndingatsho ukuba uphando luqhutywa luthando lwesihloko kunye neenjongo ezijoliswe ekusetyenzisweni kolwazi olo luphangaleleyo ubani aluqokeleleyo. Ndinengqiniseko yokuba nabo babandakanyekayo kuphando olo, babanegalelo ekuboniseni umphandi lowo ukuba sibaluleke kangakanani na isifundo eso seentsomi kubo okanye kumsebenzi abawenzayo. Injongo ephambili kaZakaza (2015) ibikukusebenzisa iintsomi ezithile ekunikeni umdla kwizifundo ezisetyenziswa ngabongikazi abafundisa abafazi abakhulelweyo kwiiklinikhi zamaphandle eMpumakoloni kunye nakumakhaya okulindela ukubeleka (Maternal Waiting Homes). Usebenze ngesihloko asithandayo nakholelwayo kuso, kwaye uphando lwakhe lubonakalise ukuba abongikazi noonomakhaya babone ukuba iintsomi zinegalelo elincomekayo nje ngenye indlela ephucukileyo nefikelelekayo yokwabelana ngezifundo zezempilo. (Zakaza 2015:151) 
INDIMA ENOKUDLALWA NGABAFUNDI 
Kulusizi ukubona amanani abafundi abanomdla wokufunda ngezinto zesiXhosa ecutheka umhla nezolo kumaziko ethu emfundo ephakamileyo. Ngaxesha nye kungumngeni kubafundi abakwiCandelo leeLwimi zesiNtu kwiiDyunivesithi, ukuba babhinqe omfutshane ukwenza indima ebonakalayo ekuvuseleleni uthando nomdla kwisiXhosa. Bangenza ntoni abafundi ukuyibonakalisa eyabo indima? 
Kubalulekile ukuzalanisa izimvo namava asekuhlaleni nezifundo ezijoliswe kwizihloko zemveli. Ingxam yoncwadi lwemveli bubuntu nabantu. Xa ubani ekwazi ukusebenzisa iindlela zophando ezenza akwazi ukufikelela eluntwini, kungalula ukuba abantu bazibandakanye ngokukhululekileyo kuso nasiphi na isihloko esiqulethe amava emveli. 
Akungencedi ukuba yingcungcu ephethe umnyazi nosiba, ithi ngcu kwisithuthi sayo iqokelela iinkcukacha zokuphuhlisa isifundo sayo. Ukuba abafundi banganesakhono sokuvala umsantsa phakathi kwabo noluntu, kungalula ukunxibelelana nokwabelana ngezimvo ezikhokelela kulwazi olunokusetyenziselwa ubungcali nophando olunokwakha isizwe sethu. 
Ikwaluncedo nokuba abafundi baqalise ukubonakalisa ngezenzo ukuba bayinxalenye yamaqumrhu alwela ukuphuhliswa kwezinto-yinto zolwimi lwesiXhosa. Ingasinceda njani eyokufunda siyityekeze indima edlalwe nguSatyo, uMqhayi, uSoga, uMtuze, njalo-njalo kodwa sibe silufake phantsi komandlalo usiba okanye isakhono sokubalisa nokubonga? 
Ingaba ulutsha noluntu luphela luya kubufumana kubani ubuncwane nokuvuseleleka ngeentsomi xa sisanela nje kukufunda ngazo nzulu ukuze sifumane amanqaku sibe singakwazi nokubalisa intsomi yembotyi nelahle? 
Ubomi bethu busekelezelwe emabalini. Kuziziganeko ngeziganeko kwiimpilo zethu yonke imihla. Asingekhangeli iintsomi ezisondelelene nezi zinto zidla umzi, kwanezo zinobuzaza ukuthetha ngazo poqo, ukuze sibuyele embo ngesakhono sokuhlala kwiindawo zoluntu, singqongwe ngabafazi, abantwana ulutsha nooyise sisabelana ngembadu?
title: Indima enokudlalwa ziintsomi zesiXhosa kuphuhliso loluntu

text:
Ekugqibeleni iChippa United iza- kudlala eMonti imidlalo yayo ethile ye-Absa Premier Soccer League. Oku kuza emva kwesibhengezo esenziwe ngusodolophu weBuffalo City, * -Alfred Mtsi noLukhanyo Mzinzi weChippa United.  
Abaphathi beli qela bagqibe kwelokuba bayinabise imidlalo ukuze nabanye abantu abangakwaziyo ukufikelela eBhayi ngenxa yezizathu ezithile balifumane ithuba lokufumana imidlalo ekumgangatho ophezulu. Umdlalo wokuqala uzakube uphakathi kweChippa United ne-Ajax Cape Town emalanga ngeCawa.  
Usodolophi weBuffalo City uwacelile ke amajelo eendaba ukuba adlulise umyalezo wakhe ebantwini othi abantu mabaye kule midlalo ngobuninzi babo. Kungakubi kakhulu ukuba iChippa ingezela ilize eMonti ingakumbi ngoku kubonakalayo ukuba noko iqhuba kakuhle nakwimidlalo yePSL kule sizini.  
Njengokuba usihlalo weChippa United, uSiviwe Mpengesi, wathi wanomnqweno wokuba neqela elidlala kumgangatho ophezulu, lo nto wayengayenzeli yena kuphela.  
Ubukho beli qela apha eMpuma Koloni beseza kudlala indima enkulu. Xa sineqela lethu apha, abantwana balapha bazakuthi bafumane ithuba lokuzalisekisa amaphupha abo [kulo] wokudlala kwibhola yehlabathi.  
Kodwa lo nto eyingekhe yenzeke ukuba ayiqiniswa ngabantu baseMpuma Koloni ngokuthi baye ebaleni ngeliyo kunika inkxaso kwiChippa.  
Nathi sizeka emzekweni ngelithi ebantwini masilisabele ikhwelo, siye ebaleni ngeCawe. Imidlao imnandi ngokuba iyabadibanisa abantu kwaye lowo uyinyamekeleyo iyamphakamisa kakhulu. kwelinye icala siyiqale kakubi le veki emva kokufumana iindaba zokubhubha kukaMondli Cele obedlalela iMaritzburg United.  
Lo mdlali ebekhona ngethuba iqela lakhe belidlala ne-Orlando Pirates ngoMgqibelo odlulileyo ebusuku, kwaye ufake igowuli kumdlalo ophele ebambene ngo’3-3. Lala ngoxolo Cele!
title: iChippa United ize kuni, ningayibaleki!

text:
Abasoze bamlibale abadlali be-Orlando Pirates unozinti waMaZulu emva kokuvimba iqela labo amanqaku amathathu. UVeli Mothwa ube ngumqobo othembekileyo emdleleni yePirates ebambene ngegowuli elinye macala naMaZulu emdlalweni weDStv Premiership obushushu ngendlela emangalisayo e-Orlando Stadium namhlanje ebusuku. Umdlalo utshise zisuka, amaqela omabini ebelambele impumelelo ngoba ebenethuba elide engasaphumeleli imidlalo. AmaZulu ankqonkqoze kuqala ezipalini zePirates – kodwa uRichard Ofori uye wayivala ibhola eyingozi ebizanywa nguLehlohonolo Majoro. Abadlali bePirates badibanise iibhola besiya phambili ngelizama igowuli kwangoko emdlalweni, ngelishwa bafike uVeli Mothwa ethe qwa ezipalini zakhe. 
Umdlalo ukhe wanqunyanyiswa imizuzu embalwa ngenxa yokonzala kukaMajoro noRichard Ofori abangqubeneyo besilwela ibhola ebiphezulu. Usompempe unike AmaZulu ipenela efakwe emnatheni nguSphesihle Maduna. Khange batyhafiswe ligowuli elingeneyo abadlali bePirates. Emva kwemizuzu embalwa, iPirates ifumene igowuli lokulinganisa ngebhola efakwe nguKermit Erasmus okhululwe yiMamelodi Sundowns kwinyanga ephelileyo. Kuyiwe kwixesha lokuphumla emva kwesiqingatha sokuqala ebesilawulwa yiPirates edale amathuba amaninzi. AmaZulu abuye ngamandla kwisigaba sesibini. Ebesilwela ukufumana igowuli lesibini abenokuphumelela ngalo umdlalo. 
Kodwa ke aye enza impazamo emva ebangele usompempe anike iPirates ipenela. Ngelishwa lomhluzi wamanqina, iPirates ayizuzanga nto kuyo ngoba uMothwa uyibambile ibhola ebisuswe echaphazeni nguNkosinathi Sibisi. Umqeqeshi weBucs ophantsi koxinizelelo, uJose Riveiro, ufake uKwame Peprah endaweni kaKermit Erasmus. Naye uzamile – kodwa uMothwa akavumanga ukuvula. UMothwa uye wanikwa iwonga lomdlali oqaqambileyo emdlalweni wanamhlanje. Oku kwenzeke emva kokuba evale iibhola ezimbi ezilithoba nepenela emdlalweni wanamhlanje. URomain Floz uzamkele ngovuyo iziphumo zomdlalo wakhe wokuqala njengomqeqeshi waMaZulu. Ukungaphumeleli kwePirates namhlanje kuza kubeka uxinizelelo kuRiveiro oneqela elingakwaziyo ukusebenzisa kakuhle amathuba emidlalweni. Komnye umdlalo, iGolden Arrows ibambene neStellenbosch ngo’1-1.
title: UVeli Mothwa uyivimbe impumelelo iPirates emdlalweni weDStv Premiership

text:
Uvumile umqeqeshi we-Orlando Pirates, * -Eric Tinkler, ukuba akaqinisekanga nokuba iqela lakhe lakukwazi na ukungena kumaqela asibhozo aphambili kwiPremier League xa kuvalwa isizini ngenxa yeziphumo zempelaveki.  
Amabhaka-bhaka oyisiwe kukubetha iqela elisokoloyo kwiPSL iMaritzburg United, ngempelaveki kumdlalo ophele ngo’0-0.   
Kungokunje iPirates ihleli kwindawo yesithandathu, inamashumi amane amanqaku, kodwa umsantsa ophakathi kwayo namaqela asemva kwayo awumkhulu.  
Injongo kaTinkler kuqala ibikukufumana indawo yesithathu ukuze iqela lakhe lifumane ilungelo lokudlala kwiCaf Confederation Cup – kodwa emva kokuba lingakwazanga ukuphumelela imidlalo emithathu edlulileyo, ngoku akaqinisekanga [uTinkler] nangale yesibhozo ilwelwa luninzi lwamaqela adlala kwiPSL. “Asikho isiqinisekiso sokufumana indawo kulawo asibhozo xa kuphela isizini, kudala ndiyithetha lo nto kubadlali,” utshilo uTinkler izolo. 
Nangona iPirates igqwidizile ekuqaleni kwale sizini ngenxa yezizathu ezahlukeneyo – kodwa kuthe yakuphumelela imidlalo eliqela lakhona ithemba lokuvala isizini ikwindawo endilisekileyo.  
“Ukubangaphakathi kwamaqela aphambili kwiPSL yinto esemqoka, ukuba besiwuphumelele umdlalo esiwudlale neMaritzburg, ngesithetha enye into ngoku. Imeko esikuyo ngoku imbi kakhulu. Ndiyathetha ngale nto nabadlali ngamaxesha onke, kwaye abadlali bayakwazi ukubaluleka kwale nto ndithetha ngayo,” utshilo uTinkler. 
Njengokuba iBucs intingela eBhayi – apho iza kudlala neChippa, umqeqeshi wayo ukhala ngokuzithemba okwehlileyo kubadlali bakhe.  
“Emva kokuba sibethe iSundowns kubonakala ngathi iingqondo zabadlali ziye zaphazamiseka. Kufuneka sikugxininise ukubaluleka kokufunda kwiimpazamo,” utshilo uTinkler. 
Nayo iChippa United ilwela indawo kumaqela aphambili kwiPSL xa kuvalwa le sizini, ngoku ihleli kwindawo yesixhenxe.
title: Ukhala ngokungazithembi kwabadlali uTinkler

text:
Into eqhubeka kweli lizwe iyoyikisa. Zaphela iintloni ngoku. Xa kwakukhutswa uMnuThabo Mbeki babesazi kakuhle Abantu ukuba lo Rhulumente uya eliweni ngethuba befaka umnumzana Zuma.  
Ngoku kunzima ukumkhupha ngoku sele ehlazise lonke lizwe. Kuyabonakala ukuba bonke abantu banahlanje abazisokolisi ingqondo ngokwahlula okungalunganga nokulungileyo. Bathini ke bona abantwana bethu xa kunje.  
Xa iNkundla yomgaqo siseko isikhuphile isigwebo sokuba utata uZuma akenzanga kakuhle, yintoni ebangela ukuba wonke umntu okwiANC ePalamente acinge ngokufanayo, BANGAVUMI xa kuthiwa makehle? Sekwaphela iintloni ebantwini ngoku, kwamka nenyaniso.  
Kodwa into ebalulekileyo kukuba, nokuba abavumi KODWA INYANISO bayayazi. Nathi thina bavoti siyabubona ubuxoki obu. Kodwa ngenye imini basazakulwa bodwa. Waphuma nje ngomnyango utata uZuma, kuzakutwela abantu.  
UThixo zange adale abantu abafanayo ngokucinga nanini, oku kufana kokucinga kweqela elilawulayo ePalamente kuyoyikisa, kwaye liyemka ilizwe sijongile, kusukela ngowe 1652 mhla kwanyathela uJan van Rebeeck eKapa, owathi waqala ngesitiya samazambane wagqibela ethatha ilizwe lonke ngeemfazwe.  
AbaseIndiya bona babeze kubonisa nokuthengisa izipayisi mhla bafika eNatala kanti kumhla yasezandleni zabo i-ikhonomi yethu. Sekutheni ngoku sonke sangamagwala ngenxa yegama elithi African National Congress, sizibone sesicingelwa ngabanye abantu, sidalwe sanengqondo yokubona okubi nokulungileyo?  
Utata uZuma noko uyacelwa ehle kakuhle, uyidlalile eyakhe indima ngexesha lakhe. Wayengene kaloku kuba iinkundla zamatyala ziwachithile amatyala akhe ngoku, kwakhona ikwayinkundla embona engenzanga kakuhle, kufanele azamkele ezi ziphumo, njengoko zamkelwayo ezichitha amatyala akhe.  
Iintloni ziyamakha umntu. Sonke mawethu masixube neentloni xa simthethelela.  
ZEMK’ INKOMO MAGWALANDINI.
title: Iintloni ziyamakha umntu

text:
Waziwa njengomntu ongathandi kuthetha, kodwa uthi akudibana neqonga aqhabalake elanda ezantsi ubugcisa besakhono sakhe somculo weHip Hop.  
Lowo nguSarifa Malaika Sokutu (18) ozalelwe eKokstad, kodwa ngoku ehlala eBhisho. Eqongeni waziwa njengoSA_Rifa kwaye usandul’ ukukhupha ingoma ethi “Two Eyes”.  
Le ngoma ingumfuziselo wendlela ethatyathwa nguSA_Rifa, nenjongo zayo ikukuba abantu bagxile bangavumeli iimbono zabantu zibaphazamise ebomini.  
Le mvumi ithi umculo wayo ufuthelwe ziimvumi ezifana noNadia Nakai, Gigi Lamayne, Nasty C, A Reece kwanabanye. Kule ngoma uSA_Rifa uyicula noDean Denarro ze yaveliswa yiAndy Beats.  
Ngaphandle nje komsitho aza kube ecula eLusikisiki kuwo ngoSuku loLutsha, uSA_Rifa uthi ufuna ukwazisa uluntu ingoma yakhe ngeenjongo zokuba ibelicwecwe elipheleleyo.  
“Injongo yam kukuba ndazise ebantwini ingoma yam, ze ndibone ukuba kwenzeka ntoni. Ndicinga ukuba ndize nento entsha emarikeni, ekwaziyo ukudibanisa omdala nomncinci,” utshilo uSA_Rifa.  
Le mvumi ingalandelwa kuFacebook (SA_RIFA), Twitter: @SA_RIFA kwano-Instagram: @sa__rifa.
title: Intwazana yaseKokstad izenzela igama kwiHip Hop

text:
mholweni, kunento endityayo apha ndiqale @ 20 yrs ukufaka i-cv emapoliseni andide ndiqashwe tuuu, ngoku iyaphelelwa iminyaka yam, kunyaka ozayo  ndizobana30. Ndicela isebe lisibonelele ke ngo18-35, endaweni  ka18-30. Thina singabanye siyanqwenela ukuba ngamapolisa, ndide ndafunda icourse yawo iPolicing kangangokuba ndinomdla, andisoze ndincame. Kodwa ngoku le age limit iyavala mba! 
 – Ofuna ukuba lipolisa, eBhisho

title: Kunzima ukuba lipolisa

text:
UTeboho Motsamai nobesweleke kwiiveki ezimbini ezigqithileyo ungcwatywe kwiveki yesithathu engcwatyelwa kokwabo eSebokeng emva kokulandwa komzimba ngumninawa wakhe.  
ULehlohonolo Motsamai noneminyaka engamashumi amane anesibini ubudala uthi bekuza kuba buhlungu kakhulu ukuba ubhuti wakhe ebengcwatyelwe eKapa.  
“Ndizamile ukumlanda ngo2014 kodwa wahlala nje iinyanga ezintandathu ekhaya waphinda wabuyela apha eKapa, sibulela kakhulu koonozitendi balapha ngokubhatalela indawo ebelele kuyo,” utshilo uMotsamai.  
UTeboho wathi wabulawa ziintambo zombane kumatyotyombe aseQandu Qandu nekulapho umninawa wakhe aqale khona ukuyokuthatha umoya wakhe ngehlahla nanjengoko kusenziwa xa umntu ethe wasweleka kwenye indawo. 
 “Ndiyathemba ukuba uza kuphumla ngoxolo nangona sibuhlungu ngendlela athe wasishiya ngayo, ” utshilo uMotsamai.  
UBonelwa Gqalane nongomnye woonozitendi uxelele I’solezwe ukuba baqale ukumazi umfi ngo2011.  
“Ngethuba efika apha kuthi waye wacela umsebenzi samnika ke owokuba acoce izitendi ezi zethu, nto leyo ayenze kakuhle kakhulu, yilo nto ebangele ukuba xa sibona ukuba akukho mntu wakokwabo uvelayo masimthathele kuthi,” utshilo uGqalane.  
Uqhube wathi bebesele bethathe isigqibo sokuba bamngcwabe bona kuba besele lilide ixesha ehleli kubangcwabi.  
“Besele zimbini iiveki ehleli kumzi wabangcwabi kwaye bese siqalile ukuya emapoliseni siyokucela ukumngcwaba kuba sisoyikisela ukuba uza kude onakale, ngethamsanqa ke uye wakhona umntu omaziyo othe waxelela umninawa lo wakhe amlandileyo namhlanje,” utshilo uGqalane.  
Watsho esithi isifundo abasifundileyo kukuba abantu mabayazi imvelaphi yabantu abahleli nabo ingapheleli nje ekwazini ukuba uhlala kumatyotyombe athile.  
“Nabanye abantu abanabantu abasebenza kubo kubalulekile ukuba bayazi imvelaphi yabo kuba umntu xa sele engcwatyiwe ibangumsebenzi onzima ukuba aphinde agrunjwe,” utshilo.  
Uqhube wathi ngemali abathenge ngayo ibhokisi, naleyo yokuhlawula indawo yabangcwabi ebegcinwe kuyo bancedisene nonooteksi baseVuyani Rank kwaseTown Two.  
UBhutise Moyikwa nongomnye wabanini beetekisi, othe waphosa isandla, uthe khange bakwazi ukuhlala nje basonge izandla xa besiva ngengxaki kaTeboho kuba nabo ebebanceda kakhulu.  
“Iimoto zethu bezihlanjwa nguye kwaye ebengumntu onothando kakhulu, yilo nto sibonileyo ukuba masifake isandla ukuze abe uyangcwatywa,” utshilo uMoyikwa.  
Umzimba kaTeboho uqaliswe kwindawo athe waswelekela kuyo ngaphambi kokuba asiwe kwityotyombe ebehlala kulo, nalapho kubanjwe khona inkonzo emfutshane.  
“Siyamkhulula uTeboho ukuba ahambe ayokulala nabantu bakokwabo, siyabulela kakhulu nangomsebenzi ebesenzela wona.” utshilo uGqalane
title: Uphantse wangcwatywa ngoonozitendi obetshiphile

text:
ISEBE lokuHlaliswa koLuntu eMpuma Koloni lisithabathile isigqibo sokunceda amaxhoba eempuphuma KwaGreen eSajonisi, ngokugxumeka izindlu zethutyana, kodwa aliyazi ukuba liza kuzigxumeka phi ngenxa yokoyikisela omnye umngcipheko ongathi wehle kwakhona kule ndawo. 
Oku kuvakaliswe nguMphathiswa weNtsebenziswano kuRhulumento neMicimbi yeMveli, uFikile Xasa, ethetha namaxhoba eempuphuma eholweni ledolophu yaseSajonisi kule veki.
