“Simemelela kumashishini ngokubanzi, amashishini amancinane, izikolo, amaziko emfundo ephakamileyo [iiyunivesithi neekholeji] kwanabathengi bethu ukuba basixelele ngamacebo amatsha (okucoca indalo),” utshilo uSwartz.
title: Nceda uSPAR kwiphulo lokucoca indalo

text:
Abalali buhlayo abagqatswa booceba basetyhini be-EFF oko kwathi konekwa imifanekiso neenombolo zabo kumaqonga eminatha yonxibelelwano. 
Kule veki, iEFF ipapashe imifanekiso neenombolo zeminxeba yabagqatswa booceba bayo kuba ifuna baziwe luluntu. 
Oku kuza emva kokuba inkokeli ye-EFF uJulius Malema ivakalise ukuba xa ufuna ukuba ngumgqatswa we-EFF kufuneka ubengumntu ofumanekayo emnxebeni ubusuku nemini. 
Yonke into ihlala inezibhoxi zayo ke kuba ndaweni yokufumana iminxeba ebuza ngezinto ezichaphazela intlalo yoluntu okanye ipolitiki, abantu abangamadoda bathabathe eli thuba betsalela abagqatswa basetyhini be-EFF, abakule mifanekiso, bebonakalisa isincwaso bambi bengena emxholweni begqula. 
Eminye yale minxeba ibuza la malungu e-EFF ukuba ayafumaneka na kwezothando lo gama eminye incoma inkangeleko nokucikidizwa kwabo. 
Abanye bakwaveze ukuba baxolele ukuthwala iimpahla zabo bayokuhlala kwindawo ekuhlala ezi ziphalaphala ze-EFF. 
Indoda esebenzisa uTwitter, emva kokubona umfanekiso kaLulama Memela wakwaWadi 28 eDiepkloof eSoweto, ithe ifuna ukuya kuhlala eDiepkloof. 
UThuli Xaba ongumgqatswa kwaWadi 53 eSoweto ufumana iminxeba yamadoda anxanelwe uthando nasezinzulwini zobusuku. La madoda athi axolele ukuya kuhlala kwaWadi 53 ngenxa yobuhle bale ntombi yakwaXaba. 
“Ndifumene umnxeba osuka eLimpopo ofuna ukwazi banzi ngendawo endihlala kuyo. Kuza- kufuneka ndibe nenye inombolo yemiba yam yabucala,” kutsho uXaba okwathe uyawuqonda umgaqonkqubo wombutho wokubeka esidlangalaleni iinombolo zabagqatswa bawo. 
isibhalo@inl.co.za
title: Athe shu sisincwaso amanenekazi e-EFF

text:
Imbaleki yasDutywa, uYanga Malusi, ixelele iimbaleki zaseMnquma naseMbhashe okokuba uya kuyeka ukuthatha inxaxheba kwiSpargs SuperSpar 5KM Fun Run mhla washiywa yenye yazo. UMalusi, ongenantanga eMnquma naseMbhashe, uphumelele umdyarho weembaleki oxhaswa nguSpar ityeli lesihlanu iiminyaka ilandelelana eGcuwa. Le mbaleki ebalekela iqela ekuthiwa yiZwelonke Athletics Club ithe khange ifumane bunzima ngethuba ibaleka umgama oyi-5KM. “Khange ndifumane bunzima bungako koogxa bam ebendikhuphisana nabo. Ibingumoya eyona nto endisokolisileyo, ngakumbi ngexesha ndisiya entanjeni,” utshilo uMalusi. Iikhilomitha ezintlanu ezibalekiweyo ziqale koSpargs SuperSpar zayo kuqhina eButterworth College ezinze ngaphandle kwidolophu yaseGcuwa. 
UMalusi uwukhokele uqala umdyarho kwaye wayokuwuvala esabaleka phambili yedwa. Kwimidyarho emine eyahlukeneyo ebanjwa rhoqo ngonyaka eGcuwa, uMalusi uyiphumelele yonke eyiphinda-phinda engaphikiswa nayenye imbaleki kwiminyaka emihlanu edlulileyo. Nangona kunjalo, akazimiselanga ukuyeka ukuthatha inxaxheba kwi5KM ngaphandle kokuba kubekho imbaleki emqhumisela ngothuli. “Mhla kwabakho imbaleki endishiyileyo kulo mdyarho, ndawuze ndiyeke ubaleke kuwo,” uvale ngaloo mazwi uMalusi weZwelonke Athletics Club. 
UMalusi ufumene imali engamakhulu amathandathu eerandi (R600) ngokuphuma kwakhe kwindawo yokuqala; kwindawo yesibini yanguMbali Hashe obalekela iNedbank Athletics Club ogoduke neR400 ze uZukile Vellem weHlazo Athletics wafumana iR300. Kwiziphumo zabasetyhini: iimbaleki zeRoyal Striders Athletics Club, Asathi Mvalo uphume kwindawo yokuqala ugoduke neR600, logama uEndinako Mndayi ephume kwindawo yesibini wafumana iR400 ze uXoliswa Bici wazifumanela iR300.
title: Imbaleki yaseDutywa idinwe kukushiya abantu ngoku idinga umntu enokukhuphisana nayo

text:
AbakwaToyota bathengisa inkululeko ngale-Fortuner yabo intsha. Bebesibizile kwezi veki zigqithileyo zingephi ukuba siyamkele siyivavanye nje kancinci kumsitho obebewubambele kwiindlela ze-4×4 e-Klipbokkop emaphandleni aseVostile eNtshona Koloni. 
“Le intsha iFortuner ithe ukutsaleka ukusuka phambili ukuya ngemva iphinde inone xa ithelekisa naleyo indala. Iyakwazi ukudlala indima yokuphucuka edolophini, kodwa iphinde ilungele ukufathula iindonga namahlathi emaphandleni”, kutsho uSekela Mongameli wezokuthengisa kwaToyota South Africa Motors, uCalvyn Hamman. 
KwaToyota bazidla ngeembambo ezintathu zolwakhiwo lweemoto zalo mzi, abazibiza i-QDR (Quality,  ier entsha ixhaseke kakuhle, iqhubeke ibengungqa phambili kumanani eemoto ezithengiswayo kweli nqanaba idlala kulo nezinye ii-SUV ezifana nee-Ford Everest nee-Chevrolet Trailblazer. 
Amaxabiso e-Fortuner ayancumisa mpela xa ujonga ezo ikhuphisana nazo. IFord Everest singathi izobasengxakini nala maxabiso ayo aphezulu. Kodwa xa iFortuner ixabisa ngaphantsi, ingabe ulwakhiwo lwayo luyathandabuzeka? 
Kuphuculwe okuninzi kwi-Fortuner. Iinjini zintsha zinomfutho ongcono njengezo zikwi-Hilux ebifike ekuqaleni kukaFebruwari.  
Kwezepetroli sithetha ngenjini ye-2.7 VVTi ekhupha 122kW/245Nm ngethemba lokuba ungonga i-10% ekurhabuleni ithontsi. Umanqam we-4.0 litre V6 usekhona namandla ayo angange-175kW/376Nm. 
 Kwezedizili ngoku kukho umancane wenjini ye-2.4 GD one-110kW/400Nm, nomkhuluwa i-2.8 GD one-130kW/420Nm. 
Ii-gearbox nazo zintsha. Ezakudala ze-5-speed manual ne-4-speed automatic zimkile. Ngoku kufumaneka eze-6-speed kwimanual nakwi-automatic. 
KwaToyota bathembisa ukuba olu manyano lutsha lwezi-gearbox neenjini luzokunika umthengi i-Fortuner etsala lula kwisantya senjini esiphantsi, oko kuphinde kunike ukurhabula kwethontsi okungcono kangange-13% kwi-2.4 GD ne-15% kwi-2.8 GD. 
Ezokuphucula ubucwebe nobulula bokusebenzisa, kufakwe okuninzi okutsha kwi-Fortuner. I-suspension intsha, ngakumbi apha ngaphambili, bayekile ukusebenzisa leyo ifana nakwi-Hilux. Oku kwenza ukuba iFortuner ibeyi-SUV manyhani, ingabiyivantyi eneqokobhe kuphela. Ayisafani nofana ne-Hilux apha ngaphandle. Kufana idashboard ngaphakathi kuphela. 
 Endleleni ivakala intofo-ntofo, ayisagqampi njengakudala, ikunika ithemba lokuba ingabambelela xa uthatha igophe ngobundlobongela. Ithule futhi, ingxolo yomoya nendlela ayisangeni tu. 
Ngaphantsi kukho i-Hill-start Assist Control, Active Traction Control, Downhill Assist Control, Trailer Sway Control (ezithile zifumaneka kwi-4×4 kuphela). Besikhe sazivavanya ezi zinto kwiintaba namadlelo nesanti phaya e-Klipbokkop. I-Fortuner yenze edume ngazo ngokungathandabuzi. 
Ngaphakathi okutsha yi-glovebox enomkhenkce, uyacofa iqhosha ukuyidumisa hayi isitsixo. Xa usenyuka kuluhlu usiya kwi-2.8 GD-6 ufumane izitulo ezogqunywe ngofele, izibane ze-LED, ingxowa yokhuseleko yamadolo kwicala lomqhubi. Kwingakara i-4.0 V6 ufumane ucango lwangemva olulawulwa ngombane nenavigation system. 
Besikhe sajonga amanani othengiso kwezi veki zimbini zidlulileyo ifumaneka i-Fortuner. Seyingungqa-phambili njengesiqhelo. 
Sithanda: Icwalile, ithule, ayiligongqozi ifutha iyaliphunga nje qha, iyelele ekufaneni nemoto ngaphakathi hayi ibakkie. 
Asithandi: Akukho cango lombane phaya ngemva, eza zitulo zangemva zibuxhaka-xhaka bekufanele ukuba likhona elinye icebo lazo ngoku. 
Amaxabiso: 
Toyota Fortuner 2.4 GD-6 Raised Body Manual – R436 400 
Toyota Fortuner 2.4 GD-6 Raised Body Automatic – R453 400 
Toyota Fortuner 2.7 VVT-i Raised Body Automatic – R429 400 
Toyota Fortuner 2.8 GD-6 Raised Body Manual – R513 400 
Toyota Fortuner 2.8 GD-6 4×4 Manual – R571 400 
Toyota Fortuner 2.8 GD-6 Raised Body Automatic – R531 400 
Toyota Fortuner 2.8 GD-6 4×4 Automatic – R589 400 
Toyota Fortuner 4.0 V6 Automatic – R633 400 
Service Plan – Iminyaka eyi-5 / 100 000 km 
Warranty – Iminyaka eyi-3 / 90 000 km

title: Ifikile i2016 Toyota Fortuner

text:
Umlingo owenziwe yikapteni yeqela lee-All Blacks uRichie McCaw kumzuzu wokugqibela uncede ii-All Blacks ukuba ziphumelele umdlalo wovavanyo wangoMgqibelo. 
 INew Zealand iphumelele ngamanqaku angamashumi amabini enesixhenxe kwangamashumi amabini. 
ISpringbok besiwulawula lo mdlalo ixesha elininzi, into ebebeyenzile nakumdlalo kunye ne-Australia. Kodwa khange bakwazi ukunyamezela de uphele umdlalo, kuba ize ngasemva iNew Zealand yawuphumelela umdlalo. 
Iqela lee-All Blacks liye lazibonakalisa ukuba kutheni libekwa kwindawo yokuqala embhoxweni kwihlabathi, kuba bebeziphindezela rhoqo xa uMzantsi Afrika ubhalisa ebhodini. Kwaye baye bawongwa ngeFreedom Cup emva komdlalo. 
Emva kwemizuzu emibini yokuqala komdlalo, iflyhalf yee-All Blacks, uLimo Sapoaga, uye waqabelisa ipenalithi ngomzuzu wesibini uqalile umdlalo. Kwaye le nto iye yanceda eli qela lasemzini ukuba lizethembe. 
ISpringbok bezibonakalisa iimpawu zobugagu ekuqaleni komdlalo njengokuba bebedlala ngebhola ibala lonke, phakathi kwabadlali bangasemva nabo bahlaselayo. UBismarck du Plessis nguye oqale wakwazi ukunyonyoba wayokungqengqa okokuqala emgceni, engqengqela eli qela lalapha ekhaya. 
Kuphinde kwabuya uJesse Kriel emva kokufumana abadlali bangemva beKiwies belele wankqenkqeza wafumana ifullback uWillie le Roux ukuba ayokungqengqa ekalikeni. 
Kuyiwe ekhefini la maqela mabini ebambene ngamanqaku alishumi macala. Indlela ebebedlala ngokuzimisela ngayo abafana beSpringbok kwisiqingatha sesibini, ibingathi baza kuyingcwaba iNew Zealand. 
Sele kushiyeke imizuzu elishumi uphele umdlalo ziphinde zavuka ii-All Blacks zawacinezela mpela amabhokobhoko. Emva kokuba bejijisene uRichie McCaw uye walihlangula iqela lakhe- uye waya kuRuan Pienaar wafika eme yedwa, amanqaku adlala ku (24-20) kukhokela iNew Zealand. 
Baye bagqityezelelwa nguSopoaga ophinde waqabelisa enye ipenalithi; iSpringbok siye sabethwa ngolo hlobo. Ngumdlalo wovavanyo wesibini lo babethwe kuwo.
title: UMcCaw uhlaze iSpringbok

text:
Sukela kuqale iphulo likagqogqa elibizwa ngokuba ngu-Operation Lockdown kwinyanga yoKwindla kwimimandla edume ngokuba namaqela oonqevu iBethelsdorp kwakunye neGelvandale eBhayi ukuzokuthi ga ngomhla wokuqala kule nyanga sikuyo, ube yimpumelelo umsebenzi wamapolisa njengoko bekubanjwa umntu abemnye ukuya kwababini ngosuku, kwabo phula umthetho, nto leyo yenze inani elipheleleyo lokubanjwa kwezaphuli mthetho kuquka neqela loonqevu lime ku161 kula mmandla.   
Ezinye zezinto ezithe zafumaneka ngethuba lika gqogqa yimipu engekho semthethweni, abashishina ngentsangu, ukufumaneka beneentlobo ngeentlobo zeziyobisi, ukubiwa kwempahla zendlu kwanamatyala okubulala.  
UColonel  Priscilla Naidu wamapolisa, uncome nentsebenziswano ebiphakathi kwabahlali kwakunye namapolisa ngethuba likagqogqa kula mmandla. Imipu eye yabanjwa ibeyi 38, amacwecwe eCD ayi 294 kwakunye nesixa semali.   
Ukanti kukwabanjwe nabantu abasela bezintyintyile kwanabo baxhaphazayo. Bonke aba bathe babanjwa sele bevelile ezinkundleni, abanye kusalindeleke ukuba bavele kungekudala.
title: Kubanjwe abantu abayi-161 kugqogqa eBhayi

text:
ABAFUNDI besikolo iSt Matthews kuQoboqobo bayalelwe ukuba basishiye isikolo kule veki emva kokungeniswa kwenkungula yabafundi esikolweni bekreqwa sisisu kwinto ekholeleka ukuba ibangelwe ngamanzi anentsholongwane. 
Iingxelo zithi izolo (ngoLwesibini) abafundi abalikhulu elineshumi(110) bangeniswe kwisibhedlele iSS Gida kuQoboqobo emva kokukhala ngesisu kulandela ukusela isiselo (jusi) esenziwe ngamanzi asuka kumasipala wesithili iAmathole. 
Utitshala wesi sikolo uthi la manzi afakwe kumatanki esi sikolo, ehostele nasesikolweni, kulandela ukushokoxeka kwamanzi okusela nokupheka ematankini. 
Umfundi oyintombazana oneshumi lesihlanu leminyaka, owenza uGrade 9, uthi uqalwe ngamahlaba esiswini emva koko wasiva simkreqa. “Emva koko ndiye ndahlanza ndabe ndihambisa. Ndikhwaze umetroni sabe sele sifunelwa uncedo,” utshilo lo mfundi. 
Ngokwengxelo kaRay Tywakadi, uSekela Mlawuli kwiSebe lezeMfundo eMpuma Koloni, abafundi abangamashumi amathandathu anesine, kwabo balikhulu elineshumi, bakhawuleze bakhutshwa esibhedlele logama abanye besashiyeke ngaphakathi benyangwa. 
Ubukhulu becala, ngokutsho kukaTywakadi, aba bafundi baphelelwe ngamanzi emzimbeni emva kokuhlanza nokuhambisa. 
“Yiyo le nto sithi godukani nibuyele esikolweni ngoMvulo ukuze sivavanye la manzi kwanokutya ukuze sibone oyena nobangela wale ngxaki,” utshilo uTywakadi. 
Amagosa esebe lezempilo abesesikolweni ngethuba I’solezwe lifika kwesi sikolo. Ambi kula magosa ebenyanga abafundi kumagumbi esikolo logama abanye bebezimase indibano yokugqala umkhombandlela kule ngxaki.
title: Ikhulu labafundi esibhedlele emva kotyatyazo nokuhlanza

text:
AmaBhaka-bhaka anike usihlalo (wawo) uGqirha Irvin Khoza isipho esihle ngokuphumelela umdlalo obumhle namhlanje eRoyal Bafokeng Stadium emva kokuntywilisela iPlatinun Stars esezingxakini kwezi ntsuku. Amagowuli amabini afakwe yifolosi uJustin Shonga kwisigaba sokuqala somdlalo noThembinkosi Lorch ongcangcazelise umnatha kwesesibini, anike i-Orlando Pirates amanqaku amathathu ayithathe (iPirates) ayoyilahla emva kweMamelodi Sundowns ephezulu kwiPSL. Kunyanzeleke okokuba asebenze zisuka unozinti weBucs, uJackson Mabokgwane, emva kokuba ifolosi yeDikwena, uBonginkosi Ntuli, ezame ukufaka igowuli kumzuzu wesithathu umdlalo uqalile. Izamile ukuphendula nayo iPirates ngebhola kaLorch emva kwemizuzwana – kodwa ngelishwa lakhe ufike ethe qwa unozinti wePlatinum Stars – uDino Visser. 
Nangona iqale ngokuxhathisa emdlalweni iPlatinum Stars – kodwa kuye kwacaca ukuba idibene namakhangala wePirates aze emdlalweni ezilungiselele ngokupheleleyo. Ukuba ibikwazile ukuwasebenzisa amathuba wayo kakuhle iPirates, bekufaneluba iye kwixesha lokuphumla ihamba phambili ngamagowuli amabini okungenani ngoba ebekhona amathuba. Emva kwethuba ezama uJustin Shonga kwimidlalo edlulileyo, namhlanje ude wafuma igowuli kumzuzu wamashumi amabini anesixhenxe. Eyona nto ibibonakala iphambili kubadlali bePirates kwisigaba sesibini ibikukuqinisekisa ukuba ifumana igowuli lesibini lokuqinisekisa impumelelo. 
Umqeqeshi wePirates, uMilutin Sredojevic, uye wanyanzeleka ukuba akuphe uGladwin Shitolo ngenxa yokonzakala, indawo yakhe ithathwe nguMarshall Munetsi. Umdlali osuka kwiChippa United, uDiamond Thopola, ufumene ithuba lokudlalela iPirates okokuqala emva kokungena endaweni kaKapteni wanamhlanje uMpho Makola kwisigaba sesibini somdlalo. IDikwena ihleli kwindawo yokugqibela kwiPSL kwaye akubonakali ngathi iyakuphuncuka lula kwindawo ehleli kuyo ngoku. 
 
Platinum Stars: Visser, De Jongh, Sithole, Mthethwa, Mpeta, Mere, Mekoa, Rambuwane, Ng’ambi, Msomi, Ntuli. 
Orlando Pirates: Mabokgwane, Shitolo, Nyauza, Dube, Maela, Nyatama, Makola, Norodien, Memela, Lorch, Shonga.
title: IDikwena intywiliselwe yiPirates enkundleni yayo

text:
KULO nyaka, iiMbasa zoMculo wesiNtu (SATMAs) ziza kuhlonipha amaqhawe namagqala kumculo, amaqhula, unomathotholo, iimbongi nabanye. 
AbeeSATMA bathi abatyunjwa baza kuhlonitshwa, abayi kukhuphisana, ndaweni yoko abagwebi beeSATMA baza kukhetha abo bafanelwe kukuwongwa. 
IiSATMA zalo nyaka ziqhutywa ngobambiswano nephondo laseMpumalanga ngomhla wesihlanu kweyoMnga / Disemba 2020. 
La mawonga angena kunyaka weshumi elinesihlanu eqhuba, kwaye njengeminye iminyhadala eqhutywe ku2020, nawo kulindeleke azeke mzekweni ngokuqhutywa ngobuxhakaxhaka be-intanethi. 
“Abatyunjwa abayi kuvotelwa ngokuthunyelwa kweeSMS. 
Sicela nityumbe iqhawe lomculo wesintu, imvumi, iqela, umsasazi kanomathotholo, iqhula nentatheli oyibona ifanelekile kuwe okanye kwisikhululo sakho sikanomathotholo,” kutsho abaqulunqi beSATMA. 
“ Ifomu iza kufumaneka online ukuze igcwaliselwe loo mingxili uyityumbayo, isikhululo sakho sikanomathotholo okanye inkampani yoshicilelo. 
“ Ubani kufuneka ethumele iinkcukacha ngalo mntu amkhethayo, umfanekiso / icwecwe okanye iDVD yakhe,” kutsho abavelisi beSATMA. 
Abavelisi balo msitho bayacela ukuba izicelo zokutyumba zifakwe ngonxibelelwano lwe-online okanye ngeposi, kule dilesi, 337 Roslyn Ave, WaterKloof Glen Pretoria, besithi oku bakwenza ngokuthobela imiqathango yeCOVID- 19. 
Inyoba yokutyumba abo bafanelwe kukuwongwa ivule ngoLwesibini wale veki, umhla we11 kweyeThupha de ibe yintsimbi yesithathu ngomhla we30 kweyoMsintsi 2020. 
Umxholo walo nyaka weeSATMA uthi Celebrating Afrika.
title: SATMA: Kheth’ omthanda njengofish ngoku!

text:
Zinkosi! Uba nokuphambana ke kodwa umthetho esinawo; kunjalo nje unamaxa okuqatsela, ungawazi nokuba uyinto yokuthiwani na.  
Kambe ke ndibuya ndizinqwanqwe kuleyo ngcamango, ndithi umthetho ulungile wona, koko ngabantu bomthetho aba banamaxa okuphambana.  
Apha enyangeni oonondaba basithe vee ngesanxwe sokubethana kweemvumi ezidumileyo, ezingenamthetho; zityholana ngokuphuphunyelwa lujiki de luziphume ngeempumlo. 
Bantakwethu, bangaphi abantu abathi bakunxila baxhimfane bathukane kweli lizwe linolutsha oluhlala emiphandeni yojiki? Apho kuleyo ndawo uhlala kuyo mfundi wam, ingakumbi kwabasezilokishini, zingaphi izikhalo zamanxila ozivayo mihla le?  
Kuke kwathetha bani ke kwabasemthethweni ukunqanda nokulwisana nezo zenzo kuleyo yakho indawo? Kweyam abezi sele bebizwa!  
Kodwa kwezi mvumi sithe singekeva nokuba kwenzeke ntoni na, sisabone nje ivido kuphela, ingekaphandwa ukufumanisa ukuba ayivi ihleliwe kusini na, zatsiba izinxibamxhaka zomthetho zathi makabanjwe umnikazi wempama. 
Akhange kubekho nokungathiza ngokusingise kwizinto ezifana nokuba kungenzeka uyenze ngokwakhe ‘uBhabha’ le vido, kube isisabatha sokubhabhisa ‘uMpintshi’.  
Izinxibamxhaka zomthetho zithethe koonomathotholo zisithi zimfuna phantsi naphezulu uMpintshi kwaye azizu lala buhlayo zingambambanga. 
 Kanti lo mthetho ukhetha izinene ukufuma kusini na? Kungani ukuba kungenziwa oku kwabanye abantu abathi bagaxeleke kwangxakini inye? 
Oosopolitiki bagxalathelene kwizikhululo zamapolisa besiya kumangala, engekamangali ke phofu oqhwatywe ngempama, kwabe sekungabo phambili. Kambe ke izenzo zabopolitiko zasoloko zinorhudo, kuthi kwakusondela uvoto zibe notyatyazo.  
Akukho nto bake bayenze ingekuko ukucela injezu yezopolitiko. Le mibutho ibifuna nje ukuzenza ngathi iyakhathala kanti isibetha ngemf’ iphindiwe, akukho kwakukhathala ngandawo.  
Yena lo ube yokumangalela abantu abalwa ngokubhanxwa lujiki, njengoko betyhola ke, bangaphi akhe wabamela bebethwa benganxilanga ke bona phaya kula ndawo ahlala kuyo? 
 Mhlawumbi ke uhlala kwihlomeladolophu apho ungasoze uzibone izinto ezinjalo, ngako oko ebeqala ukubona into enjalo apha ebomini bakhe.  
Kodwa ukuba uhlala elokishini nakwezi ndawo zibambe bulokishi apho zikho ngobuninzi izehlo ezinje, abamaziyo ze bamxelele ukuba ungumhanahanisi ozithandela nje injezu. Umntu othi xa esiya kumangala ahlebele oonondaba ukuze bamfezel’ injezu! 
Bayandixaka ke nabo oonondaba. Bayakuthanda ukuphembelela izinto eziphuthileyo.  
Lo wabathiya ukuba ngoonondaba wababona kakuhle ukuba ngabantu nje abathanda iindaba nokuba zinjani na, nqwa nabolwimi kuthi thina basezilalini. 
 Bangaphi abantu abathi bakuntlithana bexakwe butywala babaveze xa besiya kumangalelana?  
Abanyalanga ukuya kulanda uyise walo mntwana uhlalisanayo ukuba aphendule ngokuqhwatywa kwentombi yakhe. Bathi makaphendule athini umntu omdala engakuthandi nje okwenzekayo. Abanalwazi ukuba ukuhlalisana komntwana yintlungu emzalini? 
 Ibe ngakumbi umzali akuba ngumntu wakwaLizwi. Mhlawumbi ke kobakhe ubufundisi akukho nto igwenxa ngokunxaxha kwabantwana bekholwa, kuba ke zikho iicawe apho ukrexezo lungazelwe nto. 
Baphume ngendlu ke abomthetho bekhangelana noMpintshi, bamfumana apho bamfumene khona, ukuba aye kuphendula.  
Mangaphi amatyala ezimekemeke zasekuhlaleni ezenziwa ngabantu athi afakwe apho abomthetho bathi bawalandelele babambe umntu zingaphelanga iintsuku ezimbini?  
Mangaphi amatyala amasela aba imfuyo yethu athi sele ebanjiwe akhululwe singakhange sive nokuba kuxoxwe kwaphelwa phi na?  
Akukho mthetho ngandawo koku; okukhoyo ngamahaya ezopolitiko kuphela.  
Kungade kumenyelelwe izohlwayo eziqatha ngabantu abazichaza ngokwabo ukuba benzana ingqongqo, omnye yomnye! Goba msenge iibhokhwe zikutye! 
Owenu kwisiXhosa, Nxuba
title: Umthetho ngowezihluthi kusini na?

text:
Igwetywe iminyaka emihlanu kuphela indoda yelali yakuGomolo eSajonisi eyadlwengula intwazana yetshomi yayo, igwetywa yinkundla yamatyala engingqi yaseSajonisi.  
 
Eli tyala belichotshelwe ngoLwesine enkundleni. 
 
Le ndoda nguPhakamile Guleni nonamashumi amathathu anesixhenxe (37) ubudala. Lona ixhoba lineshumi elinanye (11) ubudala. 
 
Ingxelo ephuma kwisithethi samapolisa kula mmandla uKapteni Nozuko Handile, ithi ixhoba lalilele lodwa kwigumbi likaninakhulu walo, engekho yena uninakhulu ngethuba utata wakhe efika noGuleni ebusuku besuka kwindawo yentselo kweyoMnga ka2017. 
UHandile uthi uGuleni wacela indawo yokulala kugxa wakhe ongutata wexhoba kuba besuka kwindawo yentselo. UGuleni wathi akubona ukuba ugxa wakhe ukobude ubuthongo kwaye nexhoba lilodwa wachwechwela ixhoba wafika wazenzela elidlwengula. 
 
UGuleni uzakuchitha iminyaka yakhe emihlanu ngaphakathi ejele.
title: Igwetywe iminyaka emihlanu indoda eyadlwengula intwazana ena-11

text:
Mzi kaNtu ndisuke ndaphathwa kukoyika, uvalo luthande ukuthi gqolo ukubetha ngamandla, amehlo ahlala eenyembezana, ukanti nengqondo iyabhadula, ithatha ibeka umhla nezolo!  
Oku kungazinzi kwam kuvuselelwa ngakumbi ngumbono omasikizi oqhubeka ezityalikeni, uqhutywa ngabo bekumele ukukhokela abantu abangamarhamente, bebakhokelelela kubomi bobungcwalisa, ubomi bendlela esingisa eParadesi engunaphakade!  
Ingaba indlela engcwele nengcwaliseke ngolo hlobo, indlela yonqulo olugxile kwiziBhalo nobuKrestu, iyahambelana nentlonti egqubayo kwezinye zeetyalike zoMzantsi Afrika? 
Kutsha nje, kuwo onke amajelo osasazo, kuquka unomathotholo, umabonakude, amaphephandaba noolindithuba, kugqame isikhalo esinye, esi sabefundisi abantlokothisa amarhamente abo ngokwenza izinto ezibambisa umzimba nezingaqhelekanga kwindlu yokuthandaza!  
Sivile ngabefundisi abakhafulisa amakholwa kwiityalike zabo ingca eluhlaza yaka, ufike abantu beyitya ngathi kutyiwa isonka esomileyo okanye izihlunu zenyama yenkomo. Sivile ngabo bazibiza ukuba ngabefundisi bakwaLizwi benika amarhamente abo izinambuzane ezifana nezidungulu, oonomeva, iimbovane kwanezirhubuluzi ezifana neenyoka ukuze bazintlantlathe, bazitye bade baziginye.  
Mva nje kwiimagazini zamazwe aseAfrika bekukhalwa ngabefundisi bezinye zeetyalike zaseKenya abagunyazisa amarhamente angoomama namantombi ukuba xa befuna ukubekwa izandla bathandazelwe, kumele baguqe phambi kwabo, ukuze ngeli lixa bebekwa ezo zandla bethandazelwa, baphulule aba befundisi kubuni babo bebabambe kumatyhelufa eebhulukhwe. 
Ezakutsha nje zezo zomfundisi othatha isibulala-zinambuzane esibizwa ngokuba yiDoom, asithsuthsuze kanobom kwabo bafuna ukuthandazelwa, ukuthandaziswa nokubekwa izandla ngumfundisi lowo, ukuze babe nokuthamsanqeleka ezimpilweni zabo.  
Ndithi ndakuqwalasela ezi zenzo zaba befundisi mawethu, ndifune ukukholelwa ukuba ikho ingxaki, kunjalo nje inkulu kwaba befundisi. Ndide ndamdala ndanenkqayi ndingazange ndakuva ukuhambelana kwelizwi likaThixo nentlonti. Ndithi ndakuyiqwalasela ndiyihlalutye yonke le nto yenziwa ngaba befundisi bezi nkonzo zinamagama angaqhelekanga nangaziwayo kwimbali yesizwe sethu, ndibe novakalelo lokuba kungenzeka njengokuba bexhaphaza abantu ngegama likaThixo nje, bephosisa ke phofu, kuthi kanti benza okuvisa bona kamnandi, benza okungenanto yakwenza nokutyhilelwa kwabo nguThixo, nanjengoko besitsho, koko benza konke oku kuba bengamaxhoba empatho egadalala bona kuqala.  
Uphando luyibeka itsole kunjalo nje icace gca into yokuba, umntwana okanye umntu obe lixhoba lokuphathwa gadalala, aye abe maninzi amathuba okuba naye aphathe abanye abantu gadalala ngokwenza intlonti engamkelekanga kubo. 
Kwincwadi yophando-nzulu ngokusebenza kwengqondo yomntu, kwanentlalo akuyo, ncwadi leyo ibhalwe nguNjingalwazi uMW De Witt nenesihloko esithi The Young Child in Context: A Pyscho-Social Perspective, ichazwa kakuhle kwiphepha lama-342 kule ncwadi ukuba “umntwana onembali yokuphathwa gadalala, onomnqweno wokufezekisa iimfuno zovakalelo ezingazange zifezekiswe ebuntwaneni, nalowo ebenokuxhatshazwa eselula, naye akuba mdala uye azanelise ngokwenza ngolu hlobo kwakusenziwa ngalo kuye ebuntwaneni, nokuba oko kuthetha ukuba makavise abanye ubuhlungu.”  
Oku mawethu kuyathetha apha kum ngaphakathi, kuthi ukuba banokuthathwa bonke aba befundisi bezityalike zinamagama angaziwayo nesinokuzibona njengoovuk`ezicithini, kusenokwenzeka kufumaniseke ukuba bakhule bephathwa gadalala entlalweni, okanye bexhatshazwa ngoontangandini ezikolweni, kungenjalo ke kuthi kanti bangenwe yintlonti egqithisileyo. 
Iinkonzo esikhula zisaziwa nezinembali enokuchazwa yalathwe, kuzo akuzange kuvakale ntlonti igqithise njengale yezi zinamagama angenakulandwa ngokwemvelaphi yazo. Ndithetha kaloku ngeetyalike zemveli ezifana neeWesile eyathiwa ngomsunguli wayo uJohn Wesley; iiRute ezathiywa ngonyawontle wangaphambili uMartin Luther; iiRoma ezathiywa ngendawo yemveli eyiRome kwelaseItaly; iTshetshi ethiwa ngemveli yayo eyiChurch of England okanye Anglican Church; iRhabe ethiywe ngomzila owawubonwa kuKumkan’ uRharhabe, nezinye eziliqela mawethu.  
Kaloku kulaa ncwadi kaWG Bennie ka-1971 ithi Imibengo, iphepha lelama-138, iyacaciswa into yokuba “icawe yaseRhabe yathiywa phantsi kwesivivane awayenqula ethandaza kuso uKumkani uRharhabe, kwathiwa le ndawo athandaza kuyo uKumkani, yityalike kaRharhabe, kwabe ngolo hlobo kuvela igama laseRhabe.”  
Ezi ke ziinkonzo ezingaziwa ngantlonti yokutshizwa kwabantu ngeDoom, ukutyiswa kwabantu izinambuzane nokukhafuliswa kwabo uhlaza olufana nengca. 
Mawethu, naluphi na unqulo nenkolo, aluzange luhambelane nentlonti!  
Abenzi bentlonti ngegama likaThixo, ngegama lobuKrestu, ingathi balibele ukuba “umyalelo kaYehova ugqibelele, ubuyisa umphefumlo, izimiselo zikaYehova zithe tye, zivuyisa intliziyo kwaye zibubulungisa kwaphela!” 
 Kuphi ukugcoba kwentliziyo kule ntlonti? Buphi ubulungisa kule mikhwa mibi yokulahlekiswa kwabantu ngaba befundisi? 
Lumkani mawethu! Yintlonti yodwa le!
title: Unqulo nentlonti azizange zihambelane!

text:
Onke amalungu esigqeba esilawula iSafa (South African Football Association) avumelene ngazwinye ngokuchongwa kukaMolefi Ntseki njengomqeqeshi weBafana Bafana omtsha. UNtseki uye wangumqeqeshi obambeleyo weqela lesizwe lebhola ekhatywayo emva kokubeka phantsi kukaStuart Baxter emva kokuphela kwe-2019 Africa Cup of Nations ebibanjelwe eYiphutha kwinyanga ephelileyo. Lo kaNtseki ebelisekela likaBaxter kwi-Afcon, uMzantsi Afrika okhutshwe kuyo yiNigeria kumjikelo wesithathu. Kwiveki ephelileyo, uNtseki ukubeke kwacaca okokuba unawo umnqweno wokuqeshwa njengomqeqeshi oyintloko ngokupheleleyo. 
“Entlanganisweni yanamhlanje, isigqeba esilawulayo kwiSafa sinikwe igama lomqeqeshi yikomiti ebinikwe uxanduva lokukhangela umqeqeshi omtsha. Onke amalungu esigqeba avumelene ngegama likaMolefi Ntseki kwaye uza kuthatha iintambo ngoko nangoko ukuze akwazi ukuthatha iqela lesizwe alise kwiNdebe yeHlabathi (2022 Fifa World Cup), itshilo ingqonyela ebambeleyo yeSafa, uRussel Paul. UNtseki uyanyuselwa emva kokuqeqesha iqela lesizwe elincinane, i-Under 17, ixesha elide. Umdlalo wokuqala kaNtseki ngulowo uphakathi kweBafana Bafana neZambia kwiveki ezayo.
title: UMolefi Ntseki ngumqeqeshi weBafana Bafana oyintloko ngokupheleleyo

text:
Intlalo nezithethe zesiNtu zaginywa sisiLungu. Xa kuthethwa ngokumetsha phakathi kwempi engayanga esikolweni ibangathi kubaliswa iintsomi.  
EmaXhoseni isishumane sendoda asamkelwa ngababhinqileyo nangamadoda. UTamsanqa, W.K. kwincwadi yakhe ethi, “Buzani Kubawo” uyasibonisa ukuba esintwini umfana ongathandwayo ziintombi wayegxekwa kuthiwe akamfuzanga uyise, ubhala ngoMamJwarha, ogxeka uMzamo ngobushumane, “Ee-e, suka wena Mzamo uligeza nje eloyikisa ngenyoka efileyo, andizanga ndisibone isishumane esinjengawe lo, andazi ukuba ufuze bani na kuba uyihlo uMfungelwa wayengesosishumane.”  
Ngenxa yokonqena ukugxekwa abafana abaninzi bamaXhosa babesebenzisa amayeza entando okuphosela iintombi.  
Umlomomandi: Eli iyeza lisetyenziswa ngumfana xa ephimisa okanye eqhasa intombi. Lifakwa phantsi kolwimi, lwenza ukuba umfana atsho ngamazwi amyoli ayenza ukuba intombi izobozeke imvume ngoko nangoko, ingabi imbekela amalanga.  
Uvelabahleke: Lenza ukuba intombi oyifunayo ithi isathi gqi ngomfana incumancumeze ize kuye sele ihleka ngokungathi ithi, ‘Bhuti yide uthethe ndikunike * -ewe wakho’.  
Ubhekamna-ndedwa: Lo umthi sisibophelelo esenza ukuba intombi ingacingi ngomnye umntu ngaphandle kwakho. Kuthi nokuba kukho omnye umfana okhe walinga eyigolozela efuna imvume okanye ecela idinga nayo phaya ngasemlanjeni isuke izokumxela kuwe.  
Isibuyiso-sothando: Lo mthi ukuba uwusebenzisile ithi intombi nokuba ibisele ikwalile isuke izibuyele ize kuwe izokucela uxolo wena ungakhange uthethe kwanto. Ifika kuwe intombi sele ilila isithi: ‘Andazi nokuba bendingenwe yini na Nono, phinda undamkele, Ndingowakho nokuba sekumnyama entla, Ndikuthanda nyani, Sukudlala ngexesha lam. Enye intombi ide iye kulo mfana weli yeza sele izibhijabhija ibetha isingqi ngonyawo ivuma ingoma isithi: “Ndikhumbul’ilanga, Ndizinikela kuwe, Sasihamba sisobabini, Ndizinikela kuwe!”  
Isibambelelo-sothando: Umfana uhlamba ngawo izandla zakhe, uthi xa efika entombazaneni ayixhawule ngesandla, ayiphathe egxalabeni, intombi iba ngathi ibethwe ngumbane ivakale isithi kulo mfana: “Ndakusuke ndikuvume ke mna nje. Phel’ubugwala uze emntwini. Thetha ndoda ndikunike isinyaniso sakho!” 
 Isibethelo-sothando: Lo umthi wenza intombi isoloko icinga ngomfana nokuba iyatya isoloko iziluma ibona yena, nokuba ihlamba izitya, nokuba ihlamba umzimba; nokuba iya emlanjeni ibona yena emanzini. Kule mihla ye ‘cellphone,’ ide ithi xa iphethe icellphone uyive izivumela ingoma yayo yothando isithi: ‘Ndinayo icellphone endlini, Ngas’uman’ufona, Andikuthandi ndonakele, Ngas’uman’ufona!’  
Usofa-silahlane: Eli yeza lenza ukuba intombi nomntu othandana nayo bangakwazi ukwahlukana nokuba sele kumnyama entla. Ithi intombi nokuba ibonwe lisoka umfana eseRhawutini izimele emzini ilibaleke elo soka ifuna loo mfana. Iinkomo zithi nokuba bezingene zalishumi kowayo, ivuke kusasa ithathe intonga ekhona amadoda akowayo nabafazi bebukele izikhuphe ezo nkomo ebuhlanti kuba ifuna ukuba ilotyolwe nguloo mfana unalo mthi ibe ngumfazi wakhe.  
Ummemezi-wezintaba: Abanye bathi xa bewubiza lo mthi ngummemezi-kwelikude. Lo mthi ubuyisa intombi owawuthandana nayo nokuba ikulonina nokuba ihlala kwamalume, ibuye ize kule ndawo ukuyo. Ibuye izokuhlala nawe, ikuthande ikunxibise ikugayele iintsimbi, ube ngulewu. Intombi yala naloo mfana ithandana naye nokuba ibimgayele yamnxibisa neentsimbi.  
Ipotanitshefu: Le yitshefu ethengwa evenkileni yokosula ubuso. Emva kokuba eyithengile umfana uyihlamba ngeli yeza. Xa efika entombini ufike azosule ngayo ubuso aphekuze ngayo ubuso bentombi ayiphe umoya ophephezelayo. Intombi isuka imthande umfana abe ngulewu. Zonke iintombi adibana nazo ziyamvuma akuziphekuza ngale tshefu. Ezinye zide zilwe ngaye emlanjeni xa ziyokukha amanzi, nasehlathini xa ziyotheza inkuni. Iintombi zinobukhwele, yileyo intombi ifuna ukumthanda yodwa. Akukho ntombi ifuna ukubanjelwa.  
Umlilo-wothando: Eli liyeza lokuqhasa intombi ngeleta. Ngumgutyana ogalelwa kule mvulophu iza kufaka le leta emva koko ukhwaze igama lentombi leyo. Intombi ithi xa iyivula ileta, nokuba iyivulelwe ngumntana wesikolo ukuba ayikwazi kufunda, umzimba wentombi isuka iwuve utshisa, umfana abe ngathi usecaleni kwayo. Intombi ithi iqala nje ukufunda amazwi othando aseleteni isuke ibobotheke. Amazwi ke okuwisa le ntombi umfana naye uwabeka kakuhle enjenje: “Blue bells of London, City of Gold, Date is love. Nde qhaphu ndee gqi emantla ephepha ndisinge emazantsi. Hamba phepha lam uyondikhonzela, apho ndingenakufika. Asingomdlalo ngumtyabulo lo. Amehlo am anongcume, ndinyange ndiphandliwe nguwe ntombazana. Iyeza lam nguwe. Akwaba bendilelo phepha liza kubona wena. Sorry for bad spelling ndibhala ndisozela. Usale kamnandi, nditsho ngomkhulu umbuliso.” Intombi iye ixhumaxhume iqhwaba izandla ingazi nokuba mayithini, kusuke kuvuthe umlilo wothando ngaphakathi kuyo, ingazi nokuba iya kumbona nini na lo mntu ebebhala le leta inamazwi avakala kamnandi kangaka.  
Udelunina: Intombi ishiya unina ibesemva komfana isoloko ifunana nendawo enalo mfana imvumileyo.  
Isikhafulo-sothando: Umfana ngalo mthi uyikhwaza intombi ikowayo, ayibize ngegama layo evule ibhotile eneli yeza. ‘Yiza yiza ndiyakuthanda’. Intombi imva ikowayo inqwenele ukumbona, ifunane nendawo enaye.  
Isiphondo-sothando: Eli liyeza le ntombi lifakwa ebhotileni enempukane ebomvu, xa umntu kukho intombi ethile ayifunayo uyikhwaza kule bhotile. Le bhotile uyivula kancinci ngobunono agade le mpukane ingabhabhi iphuncuke iphume, ngeli thuba akhwaza igama lale ntombi. Ukuba ikhe yaphuma uya kuphambana abe ligeza asoloko eleqa zonke iimpukane. Eli ke iyeza liyenza indoda ifunwe zizizo zonke iintombi ezikhwazileyo.  
Uza-kum-ndize-kuwe: Ngumthi wentombi oyithandayo, ngalo mthi ukuba ukhe wahlamba ngawo, ithi intombi ukuba ukhe wacinga ngayo uyibone isithi gqi, ithi ukuba wena ukhe wayicinga usuke ungazi ukuba kutheni, usuke uzibone ungabambeki ufuna ukuya apho ikhoyo.
title: Amayeza okuphosela iintombi

text:
Isizwe sama-Arab, iMorocco, siphoxekile emva kokubethwa yiFrance ngamagowuli amabini eqandeni (2-0) emdlalweni weFifa World Cup obubanjelwe eAl Bayt Stadium kubusuku banamhlanje. Noxa indlela yeMorocco iphelile kwitumente yehlabathi namhlanje – kodwa abadlali bayo kufanele bazingombe izifuba ngoba benze umsebenzi omhle kakhulu. Imbali eyenziwe yiMorocco kwilizwe laseQatar yinto eyakuhlala isisibonelo eminyakeni emininzi ezayo kumazwe eAfrika asokolayo kutumente yehlabathi. Umdlalo utake iintlantsi zisuka kwisigaba sokuqala ngoba kwimidlalo enjengalo wanamhlanje, iqela elifake igowuli kuqala – liye lisebenzele ukukhusela into elinayo. 
Izinto zonakele kwangomzuzu wesine kwisigaba sokuqala ngethuba uTheo Hernandez ebhakuzelisa umnatha ngebhola eqale yadlalwa nguKylian Mbappe noGriezmann. Kuye kwanyanzeleka ukuba abadlali beMorocco bazame indlela yokuziphindisela. Okuthe kwaphazamisa isicwangciso somqeqeshi weMorocco ibe kukonzakala kwexhadi lakhe, uRomain Saiss, ophume kwisigaba sokuqala kwangena uSelim Amallah. Bekufanele ukuba iFrance iye kwixesha lokuphumla ihamba phambili ngamagowuli amabini. Ayikwazanga ngoba u-Olivier Giroud woyiswe kukufaka ibhola emnatheni abantu phambi kwakhe bethe waca phantsi emva kokuxikixwa nguMbappe othe gqi esisiphekepheke kwicala lasenxele. 
Ebekhona amathuba okufumana igowuli okanye amagowuli – kodwa iMorocco ayikwazanga ukuwasebenzisa. Ngaphandle kokuyidlela indlala iMorocco, umdlalo ibingowayo. Ibhola ibiyibeka phantsi kakuhle ihlasela ngamadoda afana noHakim Ziyach. Eyona nto ebembi ngomdlalo wayo kukuphosa amathuba acacileyo. Ibihexa iFrance emva – kodwa ngoba inamava, iyazile into efunekayo ukuze iphumelele umdlalo. Phambi kokuphela komdlalo, uMbappe wenze adume ngazo. Ushiye amadoda ezizigede ebhokisini wanika ibhola uRandal Kolo Muani wayifaka emnatheni. Yaphumelela iFrance ngo’2-0. Ngoku iza kudibana neArgentina ngeCawe emva kokuba ibethe iCroatia ngo’3-0 izolo.
title: Iphelile indlela yama-Arab emva kokubethwa yiFrance ngo’2-0

text:
Iphinde yafumana inqaku elinye iChippa United kwakhona emva kokuba umdlalo obuphakathi kwayo neBloemfontein Celtic uphele kungekho eliphumeleleyo. La maqela mabibi axikixene kwanzima kumdlalo we-Absa Premier Soccer League namhlanje ebusuku eDr Molemela Stadium. Into aye eyifuna la maqela omabini emdlalweni yimpumelelo ukuze aqinise iindawo zawo kwiTop. Emva kokudlala ntanganye, iChippa United ihleli kwindawo yesixhenkxe emva kokuqokelela amashumi amathathu anesihlanu amanqaku kwimidlalo engamashumi amabini anesixhenkxe – kunjalo nakwiCeltic ehleli kwindawo yesibhozo. 
Nangoba iiChilli Boys bezikhe zabetha iKaizer Chiefs ngo’3-0 kutshanje – kodwa lo ngumdlalo wesibini zingaphumeleli emva koko. Kwiveki ephelileyo iChippa yoyiswe kukubetha i-Ajax Cape Town kumdlalo obuseNelson Mandela Bay Stadium. Nangoba kunjalo, eli qela laseMpuma Koloni liza kuzamkela iziphumo zomdlalo wanamhlanje linethemba lokuqhuba kakuhle xa lidibana neSuperSport United kumdlalo wePSL ozakube useSisa Dukashe Stadium ngentsimbi yesithathu ngoMgqibelo. 
   
Bloemfontein Celtic: Tignyemb, Letsoalo, Rikhotso, Ndengane, Gordinho, Dlamini, Motshegwa, Baloyi, Hotto, Phalane, Nyundu. 
Amalalela: Dambe, Shikweni, Mabasa, Masuku, Mashikinya, Lubisi, Maema. 
Chippa United: Akpeyi, Macheke, Nsabiyumva, Okwuosa, Mako, Rakhale, Mabaso, Sali, Mayambela, Lentjies, Mashego. 
Amalalela: Mothwa, Mbenyane, Bergman, Manqele, Mntambo, Mdlinzo, Modisane.
title: IBloem Celtic neChippa United ziqengqe iqanda eDr Molemela Stadium

text:
“Ukuba ayisiso isitulo esihamba ngamavili ndibawela nokuba ndingabonelelwa ngoozenzele bezihlangu okokuba ndiphakame. Ukuhamba ngamadolo ayonto imnandi!” La ke ngamazwi kaNomgqibelo Thezaphi, 64, wakuQolo eLady Frere osele ehamba ngamadolo ngenxa yokonzakala imilenze yakhe yomibini nozicelela uncedo kurhulumente. 
 I’solezwe lesiXhosa lifike uThezaphi ezinabele ngasemnyango esitya umqa wentyabontyi . 
Uyibalise yabuhlungu esithi wayengazazi ukuba ubomi bakhe bungaze bujike ngophanyazo kwaye buxhomekeke emntwini.  
Emzini wakhe uhlala nomzukulwana wakhe oyinkwenkwe oneshumi elinesixhenxe leminyaka naxhomekeke kuye ngayo yonke into. Uthi ukuze apheke okanye acoce indlu, nkqu nokuchama oku, ulinda umzukulwana de abuye esikolweni.  
“Umzukulwana uya esikolweni othule yonke into endizokuyidinga, ayibeke apha phantsi nditsho ndikwazi ukupheka. Wona umchamo neyesibini ndiyaziminca de abuye esikolweni azondiphakamisa andibeke etshembeni, nakhona andikwazi kuzinceda. Ndiphila loo mpilo yokunyamezela de ayokubuya esikolweni ngexesha lakhe, kaloku uyatshivela akafani nomntwana oyintombi. Sele kungcono ngoku kungafundwayo uhlala ekhona,” utshilo uThezaphi.  
Uthi ukhule ezihambela kwaye ezezenzela yonke into. Ngoko ebesahlala eKhayelitsha kwidolophu yaseKapa apho wonzakala khona.  
Le ntsokolo iqale ngo2015 eseKhayelitsha engena endlwini, waye watyibilika nto leyo yayomlalisa iinyanga ezintathu esibhedlele enyangwa unyawo, athi wayecinga kukukruneka nje kanti sisiqalo sobunzima.  
Emva koko wabuyela emzini wakhe kuQolo ecinga uza kubangcono kanti kuza konzakala owesibini umlenze. Lo wesibini wakruneka esuka kumzi owawunomcimbi.  
UThezaphi xa efuna ukuphuma ugaqa ngengubo kuba esithi amadolo akhe ayakhuthuka.  
“Iinyawo zam sele ziyile ngubo niyibonayo kuba amadolo abuhlungu kwaye akhuhlekile kukuhamba ngawo. Ndicela isitulo sokuhamba oku kokuba ndikwazi ukwenza ezimbalwa izinto ndingahlali ndaweninye,” uvale ngelo uThezaphi.  
Uthi babekhe bafika ooNontlalo bathatha iinkcukacha zakhe komnye unyaka angasawaziyo besithi baza kumnceda, uthi usajonge enkalweni zange babuye, kungazange kufike noncedo.  
UThezaphi uthi wayincama ikliniki ugula ayeke kuba engakwazi kuhamba kwaye kungekho nantonga zimncedisayo. Nasedolophini wayeka ukuya kuba esithi uyazazi wayeba luxanduva ebantwini ngemini yokurhola, unikela abantu ikhadi bamkhuphele bamenzele neepasele zokutya.  
USodolophu waseMalahleni, uNtombizanele Koni, ephendula I’solezwe lesiXhosa uthe: “Kokokuqala sisiva ngale meko kamama siza kuyilandelela. Sakuzinika ithuba lokuyombona, emva koko sinxibelelane namasebe karhulumente ekungawo ajongene noku. Ukanti sakuthi sijonge namashishini azimeleyo ukuba akanako na ukunceda ngesisa.Yonke lo nto iya kuxhomekeka kwimeko esimbone ekuyo eyakwenza ukuba kubelula ukuhambahamba,” utshilo uKowe. 
 Isithethi sesebe loPhuhliso lweNtlalo yoLuntu ePhondweni , uGcobani Maswana, impendulo yakhe kweli phephandaba ithe baza kukhe bakhangele.  
Nabani na onokunceda angathumela iemail ku: isibhalo@inl.co.za okanye abhalele kuFacebook: ilisolezwe.
title: Ohamba ngamadolo ucela uncedo!

text:
IInkcukachaMANANI zolwaphulomthetho zika2018/2019 zoMzantsi Afrika ziveza ukuba bafikelela ku3000 abasetyini ababulawayo. Oko kuthethe ukuba apha eMzantsi Afrika kubulawa umntu wasetyhini rhoqo ngeeyure ezintathu. 
Malunga nezi nkcukacha iUyinene Mrwetyana Foundation kwimbalelwano eyikhuphileyo iyabuza ukuba ingaba ikhona into etshintshileyo emva konyaka kubulewe uUyinene? UMongameli uCyril Ramaphosa wangqina ukuba izenzo zokuxhatshazwa nokubulawa kwamanina kweli zikwizinga eliphezulu xa sijonga kwihlabathi. Emva kwesi sehlo, uRamaphosa waseka ikomiti ekhawulezileyo eza kuthi ijongane nezi ziganeko zokulwa ukuxhatshazwa kwamanina kweli. Ezi zicwangciso zaphunyezwa ePalamente ngomhla weshumi elinesibhozo kweyoMsintsi kunyaka ophelileyo. 
NgoMvulo kule veki, nekuyinyanga yamakhosikazi, bekukhunjulwa usuku lokugetyengwa ngokungenalusini kwale ntwazana yaseMonti eyayisenza unyaka wayo wokuqala eUCT, Uyinene Mrhwetyana (19). 
Le ntwazana yabulawa kwiPosi iClareinch, eClaremont eKapa nguLuyanda Botha (42) owayephangela kule Posi ngethuba uMrwetyana eyokulanda ipasile yakhe. Emva koko umzimba wakhe woyokunyengezwa kwithafa laseLingelethu, eKhayelitsha. Ukubulawa kukaMrwetyana kwenza isankxwe kweli, ingakumbi amanina, esithi ingalo yomthetho mayibeqatha kumatyala okuphathwa gadalala kwamanina. 
UNomangwane nongumama kaUyinene Mrwetyana, ethetha okokuqala nejelo leendaba iNewsroom Afrika ngempelaveki ngokumiliselwa kweUyinene Mrwetyana Foundation, uthe akugqithi nasuku engakhange acinge ngentombi yakhe uNene. 
“Endlwini sisoloko sithetha ngaye, simane sisithi ngesifundisa nangale Covid-19, izinto emasizisebenzise xa sizikhusela. Uncumo lwakhe, uthando lwakhe, iingcebiso zakhe, ndikhumbula kwanto ngaye,” utshilo uNomangwane. 
Uthi enye yezinto ezimomelezileyo ngumthandazo kuba xa kunzima ebeye athethe noThixo. Uthi kwanenkxaso engummangaliso yoluntu lweli loMzantsi Afrika athe wayifumana, ibomelezile belusapho. 
Ezinye zezicwangciso zeUyinene Mrwetyana Foundation kukuba ngakule Posi ekwabulawelwa kuyo uNene, ibe yindawo esisikhumbuzo kwaye eza kuthi ibe luncedo nakumanye amaxhoba eGBV. UNomangwane ukwadlulise amazwi ovelwano kusapho lukaAsithandile Zozo (19) waseDutywa obengcwatywa kwiveki ephelileyo emva kokuhlatywa abulawe ngumfana owayethandana naye ngaphambili. “Ndiyalazi eli nxeba lijongene nosapho lakwaZozo. Livele lavuselela kwanto ngoNene kum.” 
UBotha wagwetywa izihlandlo ezithathu zobom ngaphakathi ejele yiNkundla ePhakamileyo yaseKapa emva kokuvuma ityala alenzileyo. 
abongile.ginya@inl.co.za
title: Unyaka kwabulawa U-UYINENE: Lukhona utshintsho?

text:
HAMBA NONTSOKOLO, MaGumede, Khawuleza,  Suka Lapha, Phatha Phatha – zezinye zeengoma esakumcinga ngazo ongasekhoyo uMam’ uDorothy Masuka. 
Ikhono lokucula likaMasuka lagqama phaya ngeminyaka yoo1950.  Umculo wakhe ngaloo minyaka, wachukumisa kakhulu abantsundu ababejamelene noMzantsi Afrika owawuthe tshitshilili yimithetho yengcinezelo. 
Iindaba zokubhubha kweli gqalakazi lomngqungqo zivakele izolo, nalapho kuvakala uxinzelelo lwegazi njengomnye wonobangela ongqonge ukubhubha kwakhe. 
UMasuka wazalelwa kwidolophu yakwaBulawayo eZimbabwe, engumntwana wesine kwabasixhenxe. Unina wayeyinzalelwane kweli loMzantsi Afrika ngelixa uyise waye ngowaseZimbabwe. 
Ingoma yakhe ethi “Dr Malan” ebalisa ngemithetho eyayinzima, yaye yavalwa umlomo. Phaya ngo1961 wacula ingoma ngoPatrice Lumumba neyamkhokelela ukuba aye elubhacweni. Wahlala apho elubhacweni kwilizwe laseZambia iminyaka engama31. Wabuyela eZimbabwe ngo1980 emva kokuba ela lizwe lifumene uzimele-geqe. 
UMphathiswa wobuGcisa neNkcubeko kweli uNathi Mthethwa, ukuchaze ukubhubha kukaMasuka njengelahleko enkulu kuMzantsi Afrika. 
“Umculo wakhe ubuyingoma emnandi ngamaxesha amyoli kwaye ube kukukhanya ngamaxesha obumnyama.” 
UMasuka ubhubha eminyaka engama83 ubudala.  Yanga umphefumlo wakhe ungalala ngoxolo!
title: Hamba Nontsokolo! Hamba Mam’ uDorothy!

text:
KAPA: 
Kukhangela beza kufundela phandle abafundi kwisikolo samabanga aphantsi iNkanini eKhayelitsha nanjengoko kunqongophele amagumbi okufundela. 
 Aba ngabafundi abangamakhulu amathandathu anamashumi asixhenxe anesithathu (673). Sukela oko kwavulwa izikolo ngomhla wesixhenxe kule iphezulu abazali bayimikrozo befunela abantwana babo kwisikolo samabanga aphantsi iNkanini.  
Ummandla waseNkanini wonganyelwe luninzi lwamatyotyombe yaye kukuphela kwesikolo samabanga aphantsi esikufuphi eluntwini. 
Uchubele I’solezwe lesiXhosa ngemeko yesi sikolo usihlalo kwibhodi ejongene nolawulo lwesikolo uAndile Lili. 
“Kwisithuba seveki ezimbini ezidlulileyo ibhodi elawula isikolo ivumelene ukuba ngoLwesine umhla weshumi elinesixhenxe kule nyanga kuziswe abantwana ukulungiselela ukuba bonke abalinde kuluhlu lokungena esikolweni sibafake kumagumbi okufundela. Ukusukela ngomhla we16 kule nyanga abazali babe yimikrozo ukuzisa abantwana esikolweni. Ngokwenza njalo silungiselela ukuba abantwana bangene kumagumbi.” 
“Sijamelene nabantwana abangama673 abangekho kumagumbi okufundela ngenxa yokuba la akhoyo agcwele ayaphuphuma. Kungokunje abantwana baza kufundiselwa phandle. Kwintlanganiso ebesiyibambe negosa lezemfundo kwinqila sivumelene ukuba ubuncinane makongezwe ishumi elinesihlanu lamagumbi okufundela ethutyana, ukulungiselela ukuba sikwazi ukwamkelwa bonke abantwana abafuna isikolo. Kungokunje sinamagumbi ethutyana okufunda angama22 yaye ezinye zeeklasi zinabafundi abukuma57-69,” utshilo.  
Esi sikolo sinye kuphela kwindawo enamatyotyombe aqabeleyo ngaphaya kwamashumi amabini amawaka. Inani eligqithisileyo labantwana kumagumbi okufunda lakubangela ukwehla kwezinga lokuphumelela kwizifundo zabo nanjengoko kunyaka ophelileyo esi sikolo siqhube kakuhle kakhulu. 
“Kuza kunyanzela befundele phandle kuba asifuni bantwana bazakuyabula ezitalatweni libe likhona iziko lemfundo elikufuphi ekuhlaleni. Zona iidesika nezitulo zokuhlala abafundi sinazo ngokwaneleyo, ezinye side sabolekisa ngazo kwisikolo esiseDelft yaye sele kukho nootitshala abatsha ukwandisa inani labafundisintsapho nanjengoko aba bakhoyo sele bekhulile ngokweminyaka kuba bambi bagugile ngoku, sifumene ookracaza abaphuma eyunivesithi,” kutsho uLili. 
Uthi abanyanzelisi ukuba kwakhiwe isikolo koko bacela amagumbi okufundela ethutyana kwiSebe leMfundo eNtshona Koloni. Esitsho kananjalo ukuba akhona amagumbi okufundela ethutyana kwisikolo samabanga aphantsi iLudwe Ngamlana eKuyasa.  
OkaLili udiza ukuba la magumbi ethutyana akasentyenziswa nanjengoko ayelungiselelwe isikolo samabanga aphantsi iNkanini. 
“Oko ndahamba ukusukela ngomhla wokuvulwa kwezikolo ndifunela umzukulwana wam, uza kuqala uGrade 1 kulo nyaka yaye ndingavuya ukuba afumane kwesi sikolo kuba sikufuphi kum,” utshilo uNomonde Siziba. 
Isebe leMfundo eNtshona Koloni lithi liyayazi imeko yesikolo samabanga aphantsi iNkanini.  
“Sisikolo esitsha iNkanini yaye owona mcelimngeni sijamelene nawo silisebe ngowokuba abazali abahlala kufuphi nesi sikolo basuke bakhupha abantwana babo kwizikolo ebebefudula befunda kuzo phambi kokuba baqinisekise kuqala ukuba bayayifumana kusini na indawo kwesi sikolo. Kungokunje banyanzelisa ukuba abantwana babo bafunde eNkanini ngetshova,” utshilo uBronagh Hammond uSomlomo weSebe leMfundo eNtshona Koloni.  
Uthi eli nani labantwana belanele kwakunyaka ophelileyo. UHammond uthi bayazi ngokukhula kwenani labafundi kula ngingqi nto leyo ibangele ukuba bongeze amagumbi ethutyana asixhenxe kunyaka ophelileyo ukulungiselela lo nyaka.  
“Isikolo sacela amagumbi amane ethutyana, hayi ishumi elinesihlanu nanjengoko uAndile Lili ebanga ngelithi bafuna ishumi elinesihlanu lamagumbi,” utshilo uHammond. 
Esi sikolo saqala ukusebenza ngonyaka ka2013 nalapho abantwana babefundiselwa kwiCawa yasekuhlaleni. 
 Emva kwemilo eliqela kuzanywa ukumiswa esi sikolo, kweyeKhala ngo2013 abantwana bafuduselwa kumagumbi ethutyana eLudwe Ngamlana.  
UAndile Lili uthi kungokunje esi sikolo kulindeleke ukuba sakhiwe nanjengoko sele eqalile amalungiselelo olwakhiwo.
title: Kuza kunyanzeleka befundele phandle

text:

title: .Intlanganiso yasemaNcobeni

text:
EKAPA: KUNQUNYANYISIWE ukwakhiwa kwezindlu zeRDP ePhilippi emva kokubulawa koonogada ababini ngelixa bekukhuthuzwa. 
 
Aba nogada nabangenakuchazwa kude kwaziswe izizalwane zabo badutyulwe basweleka ngelixa bekukhuthuzwa izixhobo zokwakha ngoLwesithathu. 
 
Kungokunje, bayavutha ngumsindo abo bebeza kuxhamla ekwakhiweni kwezo zindlu. Bathi esi siganeko siza kwandisa udederhu lomgca ohleli ukhona kwabo bafolelele izindlu zikarhulumente. 
 
“Kudala sabhalisela ukufumana izindlu. Mna ndineminyaka engaphaya kwamashumi amabini. Igama lam lide laphuma kwezi ziza kwakhiwa. Ngoku, umsebenzi umiswe usaqala ngenxa yezihelegu. Le nto ithetha ukuba usaza kubamde umgca wokufolela izindlu,” utshilo uBandile Tapi wasePhilippi. 
 
UMzontsi Mbaliswano wePhilippi People’s Development Forum uthe esi siganeko siza kudodabalisa uphuhliso. “Siyaludinga uphuhliso. Abantu basebenzisa ukuziswa kophuhliso njengethuba lokwenza ubundlobongela. Sikhuthaza abahlali ukuba beze nomkhondo ngaphambili emapoliseni ukuze zibanjwe ezintswelaboya,” utshilo. 
 
ISithethi samaPolisa uFC Van Wyk uthe ngokwengxelo, kufike amadoda ahlasela oonogada abane efuna imipu yabo. “Kudutyulwe kwabulawa oonogada ababini.”
title: Kunqunyanyisiwe ukwakhiwa kwezindlu ePhilippi emva kokubulawa koonogada

text:
NGONYAKA ka2050 abantu baseMzantsi Afrika abahlala edolophini baza kube bebalelwa kumashumi asibhozo ekhulwini (80%), kwaye uninzi lwabo iza kuba ngabantu abatsha. 
 
Oku kuvele ngoLwesine, usuku lokuqala lomsitho weentsuku ezintathu obanjelwe eICC eMonti. 
 
Indibanisela yeBRICS ngamazwe amahlanu enziwa yiBrazil, Russia, India,China noMzantsi Afrika. 
 
Noxa nje ukukhula kwenani labantu abafuna ukuhlala ezidolophini kunika urhulumente ithuba lokuphucula izixeko needolophu ezincinane, lo mbandela unemingeni oza nayo kuba imali yokuqubisana nale ngxaki inqongophele ngokokutsho kukaAndries Nel, uSekela Mphathiswa kwisebe leNtsebenziswano kuRhulumento kwakunye neMicimbi yeeNkokeli zeMveli (COGTA). 
 
ULato Mabaso, ojongene nophuhliso lolutsha kwaCOGTA, uthi abona bantu baninzi kwimfuduko yokusuka ezilalini kusiyiwa edolophini ngabantu abatsha, kuba befuna amathuba engqesho. 
 
Isisombululo kule ngxaki, ngokokutsho kukaOscar Mabuyane, uMphathiswa waseMpuma Koloni kwisebe leziMali, uPhuhliso loQoqosho, ezoKhenketho neMicimbi yezeNdalo – kukuveliswa kwamathuba ezoqeqesho nengqesho kubantu abasezilalini. 
 
Lo msitho weBRICS uzinyaswe ziindwalutho zala mazwe amahlanu eziphuma kwicandelo loomasipala, uphuhliso lwezixeko, ezoqoqosho nezophando.
title: #BRICS2018: Kuza kukhala ibhungane ezilalini ngo2050

text:
AMAKHOSIKAZI kweloMzantsi Afrika jikelele namhlanje akhumbula umngcelele woqhankqalazo owawubanjwe ngamakhosikazi ngo 1956. Amakhosikazi abamba uqhankqalazo elisingise kwizakhiwo zomdibanso, ngelichasene nomthetho weli wexesha lika rhulumente wengcinezelo, owawunyanzelisa ukuphathwa kwesazisi seloxesha ngabantsundu esasibizwa ngokuba dompasi.  
Lomngcelele wawukhokelwe ngamakhosikazi uLillian Ngoyi, uHelen Joseph, uRahima Moosa kwakunye noSophia Williams de Bruyn. Adlulisa uxwebhu lezikhalazo kwinkulumbuso yeli ngethuba lengcinezelo uJG Strydom.  
Kwanamhlanje, umongameli weli uJacob Zuma uzakothula umyalezo wosuku, aphinde atyhile umfanekiso oqingqiweyo ka Lillian Ngoyi. Umphathiswa wamakhosikazi okwi ofisi kamongameli uSusan Shabangu uthe isikhumbuzo salonyaka sikwa yimbali yendima edlalwe ngamakhosikazi kumzabalazo wenkululeko weli. “Sikwazimisele nokubonisa impumelelo yamakhosikazi eli,” utshilo uShabangu.
title: Kukhunjulwa amashumi amathandathu eminyaka oqhankqalazo lamakhosikazi

text:
Emva kokufika kwakhe kwiMamelodi Sundowns, uSipho Mbule uzityande igila ngesona sizathu esibangele akhethe yona. UMbule, 24, utyikitye isivumelwano sengqesho seminyaka emithathu kwiSundowns emva kokubhengezwa njengomdlali wayo opheleleyo kwiveki egqithileyo. Ukufika kwakhe kwiintshatsheli zeDStv Premiership kutshabalalise onke amaqashiso ebekade esenziwa ngekamva lakhe. Isizini ka-2021/22 ivalwe sele engasadlaliswa yiSuperSport United eyamsikayo emva kokuqhankqalazela ukuhamba ekuqaleni konyaka. Ngelo xesha wayefunwa kakhulu yiKaizer Chiefs – kodwa uKaizer Motaung Jr wathi mancama kwakucaca ukuba uStan Matthews akanamdla ncama wokumkhululela uMbule. 
“Eminyakeni egqithileyo, iSundowns lelona qela eligqugqisileyo ebholeni yaseMzantsi Afrika,” utshilo uMbule, ethetha kumabonakude ekuthiwa yiSundowns TV. Ulandela emva kwabadlali abafana noTeboho Mokoena, uGrant Kekana no-Aubrey Modiba abasuka kwiSuperSport United kutshanje. “Inabadlali abasemgangathweni ophezulu iSundowns kwaye ukhuphiswano kuphezulu ngeyona ndlela. Ndiyidlalile imidlalo yeCAF ndisengumdlali weSuperSport – kodwa ndizive ingathi ikhona into endingayenza ngcono xa ndikwiSundowns. Seso sizathu esibangele ndikhethe iSundowns. Ndifuna ukudlala kwinqanaba eliphezulu ndiphumelele neendebe. Ukuphumelela iindebe yinto entle. Wonke umdlali webhola ekhatywayo unephupha lokuphumelela iindebe. 
“Yinto leyo wonke umdlali afuna ukukhumbula ngayo iintsuku zakhe zobutsha njengomdlali. Zimbini iindebe ezifumene kwiSuperSport: ziindebe zeMTN8 zombini. Ngokuza kwam kwiSundowns ndinethemba lokuzongeza,” utshilo uMbule. Kulindeleke abe yinxalenye yabadlali abaziwayo abafana noGaston Sirino, Andile Jali, uPeter Shalulile noThemba Zwane. “Into endizayo kwiSundowns yitalente yam futhi ndivuyela ukudlala nabadlali abangoompondozihlanjiwe bodwa. USipho ngulo bamaziyo abantu. Uze kwiDowns kubaliqela elidlala ibhola ebukeleyo,” uvale ngaloo mazwi uMbule. Nangona iDowns ityholwa ngothenga abadlali kuba ingafuni bathathwe ngamaqela ekhuphisana nawo – kodwa kulindeleke yongeze abanye abadlali phambi kokuqala kwesizini entsha kwiinyanga ezizayo.
title: UMbule ukhethe ukudlalela iDowns ekwaziyo ukuqokelela iindebe!

text:
Namhlanje uyakuqaphela ukuba sinesibhalo somfundi waseMasixole High, uSibusiso Moni, owayethathe inxaxheba kukhiphiswano lwezikolo ngentetho yobume bezwe yenkulumbuso yeli phondo. Jonga nje ekunene kwesi sibhalo, uzifundele izimvo zomfundi. 
Ukanti izolo sipapashe izimvo zenkulumbuso ubuqu phantsi kwesihloko esingu “Ulutsha maluthathe inxaxheba luvote.” Ukuba ubuzifundile ezi zimvo uyakukhumbula ukuba inkulumbuso ivakalise ukukhathazeka ngekamva nokunqongophala kolutsha kwimiba yezepolitiki nokuvota.  
Ukwathe i-ofisi yakhe iceba ukusungula icandelo lolutsha; apho luzakuthi lusebenzisane norhulumente kuqulunkqo lwamathuba nophuhliso lolutsha ephondweni. 
Sinomdla kakhulu wokuyibona isenzeka le. Kudala sabhala sathi eli phondo likhokelwa ngabantu abadala; zinqabile iinkokeli eziselulutsha.  
Kudala sikwabuza nokuba iphi iANCYL? Phofu iphi imibutho yolutsha yayo yonke le mibutho yezepolitiki? Luphi ulutsha lweUDM? Luphi olwe-EFF? OlwePAC? Njalo-njalo? Impendulo elula ingakukusikhombisa kwiiyunivesithi ezine zeli phondo. Impendulo ithi bakhona pha eziyunivesithi.  
Kanti akumelanga ukuba ihamba njalo. Ukuze ufumane isikhundla kwimibutho yolutsha kufuneka ube useyunivesithi? Lona ulutsha olungekho kwezi yunivesithi lakungena njani kule mibutho? 
Ingaba ulutsha lasezilalini nasezilokishini lukhe ludibane luthi luqhuba umxholo othile? Kungenziwa njani ukuba ulutsha luzive lunendima ebalulekileyo kwikamva lezwe lethu? 
Inkcubeko yokuthi “ungumntana into oyiyo!” kufuneka siyikhabele pha kude xa singena kwimiba yezepolitiki. Eli lizwe lelolutsha, ikamva lelabantwana. 
Yiyo lo nto simema ulutsha ukuba nalo luthathe inxaxheba kweli phepha lethu. Sinomdla wokupapasha izimvo zolutsha rhoqo, kwaye esi sibhalo sikaSibusiso sanamhlanje sisiqalo esihle. Kuso sifumana izimvo ngesimo sezemfundo kumntu osesikolweni ngoku. Siyathemba ukuba oku kwakukhuthaza nolunye ulutsha ukuba luzivakalise. Thumela ku: isibhalo@inl.co.za okanye ku PO Box 13504, Vincent, 5217.
title: Izimvo zolutsha kuqala

text:
Nangona isizini yePSL ingekasongwa – kodwa abaphathi bamaqela sele beqalile ukuthetha nabadlali ngelilungiselela isizini ezayo. Imidlalo ye-Absa Premiership yamiswa kwisithuba seenyanga ezintathu ezigqithileyo ngenxa yekhorona esele ihlasele abantu abangaphaya kwezigidi ezisibhozo kwihlabathi lonke. Noxa kusekho ukungaqiniseki ngomhla eza kubuya ngawo ibhola ekhatywayo – kodwa amaqela afana ne-Orlando Pirates sele efumene abadlali abatsha eza kuba sebenzisa kwisini ezayo. Iindaba ezivakele namhlanje zithi Ezimnyama zityikitye uThulani Hlatshwayo noDeon Hotto. Akuphelelanga apho ngoba kuthiwa ngoku (iPirates) izama ukutsalela kuyo uThabang Monare noSifiso Hlanti. Abadlali beBidvest Wits abaninzi kutsala-tsalwana ngabo ngamaqela amakhulu eMzantsi Afrika emva kokuba ithengiselelwe usomashishini waseLimpopo, okwa ngumnikazi weTshakhuma Tsha FC edlala kwiGladAfrika, othe abadlali abamkela kakhulu nabangafuniyo ukusebenzela abaphathi abatsha baza kuthengiswa. UHlatshwayo noHotto bebefunwa kakhulu yiMamelodi Sundowns – kodwa kuthiwa iPirates ibazuzile ngoba ibeke etafileni imali ebhetele. 
“UPitso Mosimane ubemfuna nyhani uHotti. Emva kokuba iWits yayivumela iSundowns ithethe naye, uPitso wahlangana noHotto izihlandlo eziliqela. Umanejala kaHotto ukhe wadibana noPatrice Motsepe – kodwa khange kwanele oko emdlalini. Kanti yena uGqirha Irvin Khoza uye wadibana nomdlali nomanejala wakhe entlanganisweni amthembise ngebhonasi nomvuzo obhetele kakhulu,” utshilo ohlebele i-IOL Sport. Ziziqwayi bobabini abadlali abafunyenwe yiPirates kwaye ngoku isezithendeni zabanye ababini. Phantse bonke abadlali abancede iWits ngethuba iphumelela iindebe kwiminyaka embalwa edlulileyo bafunwa ngapha nangapha. Yona iSundowns imxelele nje ngebhonasi aza kuyifumana uHotto ukuba ikwazile ukuya kwiFifa Club World Cup – kodwa umvuzo ayawunyusa. Imali abebemthembisa ngayo ibisondele kuleyo ebeyifumana kwiWits. NakuHlatshwayo yenze into efanayo iSundowns. Ayikufuni ukubhatala iSundowns; yilo nto ebangele iphoswe ngabadlali. Kanti yena umanejala kaHotto, uLwazi Mazibuko, uthe akhona amaqela anomdla emdlalweni wakhe kwaye iingxoxo zisaqhuba,” utshilo umthombo wolwazi ohlebele i-IOL Sport.
title: IPirates ifumene iziqwayi ezibini zeWits, ngoku ifuna ezinye ezibini!

text:
IYAPHOKOKA imiyalezo yokuthuthuzela usapho lakwaMogotsi emva kokusweleka kukaSegale Aldrin Mogotsi, igqala lomsasazi waseMzantsi Afrika.  
  
UMogotsi, obekwaligqirha, ubhubhe ezinzulwini zobusuku bangeCawe emva kokukhathazwa yimpilo.  
  
UMogotsi usebenze koonomathotholo abaliqela ekuquka kubo iRadio Bophuthatswana, Kaya FM kwaneMetro FM. Ebhubha nje ebesebenza kwisikhululo iNorth West FM.  
  
Intatheli uMmanaledi Mataboge-Mashetla ubhale kwikhasi lakhe likaFacebook. “Ebethe chu ukulandela ikhono lam, endinika iingcebiso ingakukumbi ngethuba ndisengumsasazi. Yilahleko enkulu (ukubhubha kwakhe). Inga umphefumlo wakhe ungalala ngoxolo,” kubhale uMataboge-Mashetla.  
  
Umsasazi kwanomhleli weDestiny Man uThabiso TT Tema ucatshulwe kulo lindixesha esithi uMogotsi ebengumntu olithanda kunene ikhono lezosasazo.  
  
Eyona nto eyenza intliziyo ebuhlungu kubahlobo nabalandeli bakaMogotsi, ngumyalezo abewubhale kuFacebook nakuTwitter ngomhla wesibhozo kule nyanga apho eli gqala lomsasazi belibonakalisa unxunguphalo kukushiywa ngabahlobo balo ababini. “Ingaba ndim ozakulandela?” kubuze uMogotsi.
title: Amazwi ovelwano emva kokubhubha kwegqala lomsasazi uSegale Mogotsi

text:
Waqala ukubonisa umdla emculweni eselula kakhulu ngokweminyaka, ecula ecaweni, ekwabetha nepiyano kwimicimbi yekhaya. 
Akufika esikolweni, waye wazibonakalisa kumatheko omculo  apho wayecula khona, elinganisa iimvumi  ezifana noR. Kelly, uMario noUsher. 
Ngenxa yefuthe ezi mvumi ezaba nalo kuye, ngoku waziwa ngelo lizwi lintyiloza kamnandi, kwaneengoma zakhe ezincamis’ umxhelo. 
Emva kokuzibandakanya neqela lomculo leHip-Hop elibizwa iTeenagers, akazange aphinde ajonge mva.  Uye wajikeleza eMonti, enyuka esehla neli qela.  Akuphumelela iMatriki laqala laziwa igama likaJunia Zenzile kuba imbiza abekade eyipheka kule minyaka yonke yaye yavuthwa. 
Kunyaka wokuqala eyunivesithi waye wakhupha ingoma yakhe yokuqala ngqa ebizwa ‘’Only Me’’. 
“Eyona ngoma engabhadlanga endakhe ndayibhala,” uZenzile ebalisela I’solezwe lesiXhosa efile yintsini. 
Le nzalelwane yelali yaseLovers Twist, eNgqushwa, yakhe yazama ithamsanqa nakwiimvavanyo zenkqubo yokhuphiswano lomculo kamabonakude iIdols Season 10 ezazibanjelwe ePlayhouse eThekwini. 
“Ndicinga ndakufumana endandikufuna apho, ukuvela kumabonakude, emva koko ndabuyela ekhaya ndaqala nokushicilela umculo, futhi ndakhula nkalwana zonke, ”  uZenzile ebalisa ehleka. 
Ngo2018 wakhupha ingoma ethi “Ebomini Bam.” 
KuLwesihlanu odlulileyo, umhla weshumi kule yoMsintsi, uZenzile ukhuphe ingoma entsha kraca ethi ‘Iphupho Lam’. 
Le ngoma, esele ifumaneka kwiivenkile zonxibelelwano lomnatha, iyincwadi uZenzile ayibhalele umama wakhe ongasekhoyo. 
Le ngoma yenye yeengoma ezikwicwecwana lakhe lohlobo lwe-EP alungiselela ukulikhupha ekuqaleni konyaka ozayo.   Uthi ‘Iphupho Lam’ yingoma engumthandazo nesishwankathelo sebali lobomi bakhe. 
“Siziimvumi sibhala nangantoni esicinga ukubhala ngayo. Kuxhomekeka kokuvayo ngoloo suku okanye okusengqondweni yakho. Ndandidakumbile ngolwa suku ndibhala le ngoma,” kutsho le mvumi, ephulukene nomama wayo ngo2017. 
“[Kule ngoma] Ndithandaza kuMdali ukuba yanga angandisikelela ukuze nomama onwabe apho akhoyo. Akakhange afumane thuba lokundibona ndiphumelela,” kutsho uZenzile, okwathi ukholelwa ukuba umama wakhe umjongile, enethemba lokuba uza kuba ngumntu ongcono ebomini unyana wakhe. 
UZenzile ukhwele kumaqonga omculo afana neBCM Carnival, iBuyel’ Ekhaya neMotsepe Foundation Concert. 
Uthi abantu baza kukhuthazeka kule ngoma, kwaye babe nokuyazi ngcono imvumi ngapha kwengoma. 
“Bazi nokuba ungubani waphi, ungayiyo loo nto unqwenela ukuba yiyo nokuba iimeko zithini,” utshilo. 
Le ngoma sele idlala kwizikhululo ezifana neTruFM noMhlobo Wenene. 
Onqwenela incoko noJunia angakroba kumakhasi onxibelelwano ku @juniamyworld
title: Ingoma kaJunia ilibali elingobomi bakhe

text:
Kukho uluvo kubantu abathile, lokuba xa ulahla into endala naphi na apho uthanda khona, ubangela ukuba kudaleke imisebenzi kwabo bachola inkunkuma.  
 
Kodwa oku kuyaphikiswa nguNosifundo Skweyiya, wecandelo elijongene nokucholwa kwenkunkuma kumasipala ombaxa iBuffalo City. 
 
“Masiyiyeke le nto ithi xa ulahla inkunkuma nokuba kundawoni uncedisa ekudaleni imisebenzi. Ukulahla inkunkuma nokuba kundawoni kubangela ukufunquka kwamaqondo obushushu ehlabathi nto leyo enefuthe kwindalo, ngokomzekelo imbalela. Yonke le nto ibuya iqhwalelise uqoqosho,” utshilo uSkweyiya. 
 
USkweyiya ebethetha neqela labasebenzi bomzi weziselo ezingenagwele iCoca Cola Beverages South Africa, abebephume ngobuninzi babo becoca kulwandle iEastern Beach eMonti ngoLwesihlanu.  
 
AbakwaCoca Cola benze eli nyathelo ngelokuqaphela usuku lwehlabathi lokucoca amanxweme olwandle (International Coastal Cleanup Day) olubanjwa rhoqo ngomhla weshumi elinesihlanu kweyoMsintsi. 
 
USkweyiya uqhwabele izandla inyathelo elenziwe ngabakwaCoca Cola, esithi oku kuza kubangela nabanye abantu babone ukuba ucoceko lwendalo luxanduva lomntu wonke. 
 
Umanejala wesithili kwaCoca Cola Beverages South Africa eBuffalo City, uAllan Long, uthi bagqibe kwelokucoca iEastern Beach kuba yenye yeendawo ezingacocekanga eMonti, kodwa ethandwa kunene ngabakhenkethi nabo bezoyolo. 
 
ULong uthi inkampani yabo yenza iimveliso ezibangela ungcoliseko lwendalo xa abantu bengasebenzisi imigqomo yokulahla inkunkuma, watsho esithi le nkampani ifuna ukwenza iimveliso ezingazukuba nefuthe kungcoliseko lwendalo ngonyaka ka2020.
title: ‘Inkunkuma ayidali misebenzi, ibulala uqoqosho’

text:
I’solezwe lesiXhosa lifumene inyhweba yokuncokola nomnye wabalandeli beChippa United abayithanda kakhulu. Usixelele ngendlela awaqala ngayo ukulandela iqela laseBhayi emva kokulandela Ezimnyama Ngenkani. 
Pedro Mapelo: Bhota Mhlekazi, unjani? 
Umlandeli: Molo Bhuti. Ndiphilile, kunjani kuwe? 
PM: Kuhle nakum, enkosi. Gqaba-gqaba, ungubani? 
Umlandeli: Igama lam ndinguNceba Nyanda. Ngokokuhlala ndiseMissionvale kufutshane ne-Algoa Park, eBhayi. Ndingumlandeli omkhulu weChippa United. 
PM: Khawutsho Mhlekazi, kwathini ukuze ukhethe iChippa? 
Nceba Nyanda: Bhuti, ndaqala ekufikeni kwayo apha eBhayi ngo-2014. Mna ndandingumlandeli omkhulu we-Orlando Pirates. Ndandikade ndifunda njee ngayo iChippa – kodwa ngenye imini ndaya kwintlanganiso yabalandeli eyayiseNew Bright. Emva kwalo ntlanganiso, kwatshintsha yonke into. Iimpahla zam zePirates ndaphisa ngazo zonke. Ndiyithanda ngentliziyo yam yonke iChippa United kwaye yakhula kum emva kwala ntlanganiso. 
PM: Uyibona injani iChippa United phantsi kukaTeboho Moloi kule sizini? 
NN: Bhutisoze ndixoke. Kuninzi okuphucukileyo kwiChippa. Jonga nangoku, sibethwe nje yi-Ajax Cape Town emva kokungabethwa ixesha elide. Ndiyalithanda eli qela nabo bonke abantu ababandakanyekayo. Ngenxa yayo, amaphondo weli lizwe ndiwahambe phantse onke kwaye ndifundile nakwabanye abalandeli. 
PM: Yintoni ongasoze uyilibale ngeChippa United? 
NN: Ndingatsho okokuba ukuvala isizini sikwiTop 8 yeyona nto endingasoze ndiyilibale. IChippa iseliqela elitsha kakhulu – kodwa phantsi kukaMoloi ithe chu nokudlala imidlalo ephucukileyo. 
PM: Ngubani umdlali omthandayo kwiChippa? 
NN: Yoh, baninzi kakhulu. Ndithi nguJames, uMabaso, uMarko noZuke. Aba ngabadlali abasebenza ngokuzimisela kwiChippa United ngamaxesha onke xa idlala.
title: UNyanda uyithanda akazenzisi iChippa United

text:
Umqeqeshi weGolden Arrows, uSteve Komphela, uthi into emnandi iyaphindwa.  
Lowo ngumnqweno wakhe njengokuba Abafana Bes’thende beza kwamkela iMamelodi Sundowns emdlalweni weTelkom Knockout ekulindeleke ube nomtsalane eSugar Ray Xulu Stadium ngentsimbi yesithathu ngoMgqibelo.  
Iqela likaKomphela liye emdlalweni weTelkom Knockout ukuzithemba kuphezulu ebadlalini emva kokubetha iMamelodi Sundowns ngo’3-2 emdlalweni weAbsa Premiership kwiveki engaphaya kwephelileyo. 
 Kwisizini ephelileyo, uKomphela, waphucwa ithuba lokulwela indebe yeNedbank emva kokuba iGolden Arrows yabethwa yiTS Galaxy eziintshatsheli.  
Ukuba iqela lakhe uKomphela lingabetha iSundowns emdlalweni wangempelaveki, uza kufumana elinye ithuba lokuphumelela indebe yakhe yokuqala njengomqeqeshi kwiPSL. 
Akululanga ukubetha iGolden Arrows phantsi kukaKomphela kwaye indlela edlala ngayo kule sizini iphucukile.  
Ukufikelela kwindawo ekuyo kwiTelkom Knockout akothusi ngokuba abadlali bayo badlala ngokukhulu ukukhuthala. 
 Indlela abalwe ngayo emdlalweni ababethe kuwo iSundowns iyabonisa ukuba bazimisele ukwenza ngcono kule sizini.  
UKomphela uthi ukuzithemba kokona kwenza umahluko kwindlela eliqhuba ngayo iqela lakhe.  
Ethetha ngokudlala neSundowns emdlalweni weTelkom, umqeqeshi wathi: “Kukhangeleka ngathi singafumana amawele futhi. Sidlale kabini nePolokwane City, saphinda sadlala kabini neSuperSport United. Masithembe ukuba uThixo uya kusipha impumelelo,” utshilo uKomphela. 
Amasandawana aya kuBafana Bes’thende equle aligangatha. Abadlali abafana noThemba Zwane okhe wakhathazwa kukonzakala, uphilile ngoku.  
UPitso Mosimane ucatshulwe ngamajelo eendaba esithi iqela lakhe liza kuya ngamandla alo onke emdlalweni.  
“Ndinganiqinisekisa, siza kulwa emdlalweni. Sikwamkele ukubethwa yiArrows. Sisoloko sihamba nzima xa siye kuyo kodwa lo nto ayithethi ukuthi siliqela elingadlali kakuhle. Siza kuzama kwakhona,” utshilo uMosimane.  
ISundowns iya kufumana ithuba lokuphakamisa indebe yeTelkom okwesibini phantsi kukaJingles emva kokuyiphakamisa ngo2015 eThekwini – apho yabetha khona iKaizer Chiefs. 
pedro.mapelo@inl.co.za
title: UKomphela uthi int’emnandi iyaphindwa!

text:
AVUMELENE ngazwinye amabandla enkolo yobuKrestu eNgcobo ukuba kuthethwe ngazwinye, kucelwe ophezulu angenelele kwingxubekaxaka yeli lizwe, ngakumbi iingxaki ezombethe amanina. 
Amanina aphuma kumabandla ohlukeneyo eNgcobo abambe inkomfa eAll Saints kule dolophu ngempelaveki esiphuma kuyo. Kule nkomfa bekuthethwa ngeengxaki zasemakhaya ezijingene noomama, emva koko bathandazela ezingxaki. Agxile kakhulu kwizifo ezitshabalalisa ulutsha, ingakumbi isifo sikagawulayo nesandulela sakhe, isifo sephepha, ukuxhatshazwa kwabasetyhini nabantwana, kwakunye nokusetyenziswa kweziyobisi.  
Esinye sezithethi kule nkomfa sithe, ukuba ngumama ngumsebenzi onzima kakhulu, “Oomama bajongene neemeko ezimaxongo zekhaya ukusuka kumyeni ukuya ebantwaneni kwaye oko kukhokelela ukuba oomama badinwe,” sitshilo esi sithethi. Abebeyinxalenye yale nkomfa bathe iinkomfa ezifana nale ziba luncedo, zibanika ithuba lokuphefumlelana, ithemba nokomelezana ngomthathazo. 
Amagosa esebe lezempilo kwakunye nombutho wabucala iMen as Partners ebezokunika inkxaso kumanina ebezimase le nkomfa. Isebe kwakunye nalo mbutho bazibophelele kwintsebenziswano namabandla ekulweni nezifo ezigqiba amakhaya ingakumbi ulutsha.  
Obethethela eli isebe lezempilo uNofezile Sigcu ukhuthaze abantu ukuba bandwendwele amaziko ezempilo afana neekliniki rhoqo ukuze bahlolwe impilo. 
Esinye sezithethi zalamabandla uthe, kunomkhuba wabantu abahlekisa ngeengxaki zabanye. “Ayamkeleki nangakumbi xa into yokuhlekisa ngengxaki yomnye umntu, ngakumbi xa isenziwa ngumntu ongumama ozibiza ngekholwa,” sitshilo esi sithethi.  
UNozanele Phoswa webandla lamaTshetshi uthe, isifo sikagawulayo yingozi engehlela naluphi na usapho. Ukhuthaze ngelithi icebo linye kukubhenela kophezulu bathandaze ngokuzimisela olwahlobo babesenza ngalo oomama bakudala ababethandaza kume imigodi. 
Uceba wale ndawo uNosimo Lilane uncome indima yoomama emakhaya, esithi iimbokodo yimiqolo yokuxhasa ootata bakwazi ukwamkela iimeko zobume bempilo yabo. Ukwathe oomama mihla le bangalibali ukuthandazela ootata abathi baphambuke endleleni baze babuye nezifo emakhaya.
title: Abika imiceli mngeni kophezulu amanina wamabandla aseNgcobo

text:
Amakhosi ayivule kakubi isizini entsha emva kokubethwa yiBidvest Wits ngo 2-1 kumdlalo weAbsa Premier Soccer league wokuqala obudlalelwa eBidvest Stadium.  
Amagowuli weWits afakwe nguElias Pelembe noThulani Hlatshwayo, elokubika leChiefs lifakwe nguLorenzo Gordinho ngentloko.  
Ukubethwa kwayo iKaizer Chiefs kubiyese iinkumbulo ezimbi zesizini edlulileyo kubalandeli bayo.  
Isiqalo esihle seChiefs besizakunika ithemba kumawaka-waka wabalandeli beli qela kwaye sibonise nokuba umqeqeshi uSteve Kompela nabadlali bazenzile izilungiso. Khange kube njalo kulo mdlalo kwaye noKomphela uyavuma ukuba abadlali bakhe abadlalanga kakuhle konke.  
“Besisazi ukuba iWits inamandla kwiibhola eziphezulu – sizamile ukuyilungiselela into enjalo. Asikwazanga ukuyithintela lo nto emdlalweni.  
Impazamo esiyenzileyo kukuvumela iWits ifumane ithuba lokudlala iibhola eziphezulu. Okwesibini ngabo ababonakalise ukuyinxanelwa impumelelo kunathi. Amagowuli bawafumene ngenxa yeempazamo zethu,” utshilo uKomphela obebonakala ephoxekile. 
Amakhosi aya kumdlalo weMTN 8 azakuwudlala neCape Town City FC ukuzithemba kwehlile kubadlali.  
Kuza kufuneka iChiefs ikhawuleze ilibale ngeziphumo ezidlulileyo, kuba iMTN 8 ibaluleke kakhulu. Kweminye imidlalo yePSL edlalwe kwiindawo ezahlukeneyo ihambe ngoluhlobo.   
IBaroka FC ifumene inqaku elinye emva kokubambana ne-Ajax Cape town ngo’1-1 e-Old Peter Mokaba Stadium. Kanti yona iCape Town City FC ivule isizini yayo kakuhle ngokuthi ibethe iPolokwane City ngo’2-0 kumdlalo obuseCape Town Stadium.
title: UKomphela uyayivuma iBidvest Wits

text:
IKUMKANI yamaXhosa uMpendulo Zwelonke Sigcawu uxelele uMphathiswa wamaPolisa uBheki Cele ukuba amakomkhulu aseMpuma Koloni afuna zifakwe ubhanyabhanya oluhlaza (blue lights) iimoto zabo abazinikwe ngumbuso. 
Ubhanyabhanya oluhlaza usetyenziswa ngamapolisa namagosa ezendlela kuquka noMongameli, iNkulumbuso, abaphathiswa bakazwelonke namaphondo. 
Ebethetha eNqadu kuGatyana ngethuba inkonzo yesipolisa ibityelele eli komkhulu ukuya kuphehlelela iphulo lokupolisa iilali kusetyenziswana nabantwana begazi. 
Inkonzo yesipolisa ibikhokelwe nguCele, uMkomishinala wamaPolisa kuZwelonke uNjengele Khehla Sitole, uMkomishinala wePhondo uLieutenant General Liziwe Ntshinga kwanoMphathiswa wezoKhuseleko uWeziwe Tikana. 
USigcawu uthi iimoto zeekumkani zaseMpuma Koloni kufuneka zifakelwe ubhanyabhanya oluhlaza. “Le moto ndiyithengelwe lisebe leMicimbi yeeNkosi ndicela ifakelwe ubhanyabhanya oluhlaza (blue light) ekhatshwa kukugadwa okukwiqoqo eliphezulu (VIP Protection). Kudala sayicela lo nto, into enayo ayide yenzeke. Siziikumkani asikhuselekanga bantwana begazi.” 
Kule moto inobhanyabhanya oluhlaza, ucelwa nguZwelonke, le kumkani ithe bakwafuna ukuziqhubela ngokwabo kuba bakwangabantu bamaxhwele. “Kubakho iimini apho kuye kufuneke ukuba lo mntu ungumqhubi wakho ukhe umshiye uye exhweleni, uyokuziqinisa,” utshilo uSigcawu. 
Le kumkani ikwacele ukhuseleko eNqadu, into athi kudala eyithetha qha umbuso awude uyenze. 
“Akukho nogada apha komkhulu (eNqadu), lowo ufuna ukungena wenza njalo abe lo nto ayifunayo kuba akugadwanga. Apha komkhulu kwabiwa iikhompyutha esasizinikwe nguNeotel ezokufundisa abantwana balapha. 
“Ndithi mandiyivakalise le nto khon’ ukuze kwaziwe ukuba siphantsi kobo bugxwayiba ukuze kwaziwe ukuba izinto esiziphiwa ngabantu zisemngciphekweni wokubiwa kuba akukho khuseleko. 
“Siyacela ke Mphathiswa [uCele] ukuba unayo indlela usiphe abantu bokugada ukuze kusinde ezi zinto siziphiwa ngurhulumente,” utshilo uSigcawu. 
Ethetha ngale nkqubo yokupolisa kweelali kusetyenziswana nabantwana begazi, uNtshinga uthi ngoku abantu abakufutshane namakomkhulu akubakho mfuneko yokuba bafowunele edolophini xa befuna iveni yamapolisa. 
“Phantsi kwale nkqubo siza kukwazi ukukhawuleza ukusabela kwiminxeba nezikhalo zoluntu, kuba abantu baza kufowunela amakomkhulu endaweni yokufowunela izikhululo zamapolisa ezisedolophini,” utshilo uNtshinga. 
Omathandathu amakomkhulu obukumkani ephondweni aza kuba neeveni zamapolisa kwanamapolisa buqu kuquka noluntu oluchongelwe ukupolisa iilali. 
UNtshinga uthi amatyala afana nokulahleka kwabantu, uxhatshazo ngezesondo, izithintelo zodushe lwasemakhaya, ukugunyaziswa kwamaxwebhu (certify) ngamanye wamatyala aza kuvulwa kumakomkhulu. 
UNtshinga uthi le nkqubo iza emva kwesivumelwano esityikitywe phakathi kwesipolisa, isebe leNtsebenziswano kuRhulumento neMicimbi yeeNkosi (COGTA) kwaneNdlu yeeNkosi kaZwelonke. 
UTikana uyiqhwabele izandla le nkqubo esithi ingumfuziselo wokuba bungaliwa ubundlobongela xa urhulumente esebenzisana noluntu.  
Yena uCele uthe ngoku oonqevu abakuba nendawo yokuzimela xa uluntu lusebenzisana namapolisa, watsho ebongoza abahlali ukuba bazibike emapoliseni izinto abangaziqondiyo kwiilali zabo.
title: Zwelonke: Ndifuna iBlue Lights

text:
AmaBhoko-bhoko azakube ekhokelwa nguPat Lambie xa edlala neBarbarians eWembley Stadium ngoMgqibelo.  
Lo kaLambie ungena endaweni ka-Adriaan Strauss ophunyuziweyo. UStrauss kulindeleke abuyele kwiiBoks xa zidlala neNgilane ngomhla weshumi elinesibini kule nyanga eTwickenham.  
Ukapteni (Lambie) khange awonwabele umdlalo weRugby Championship njengomdlali wasemva obuphakathi kwaMabhoko-bhoko neWallabies obuseLoftus Stadium. Eyona ndawo abalasela kuyo uLambie yindawo yeshumi – kwaye * -Allister Coetzee uyakukuthakazelela ukubuyela kwalo mdlali kula ndawo.  
Ngokokutsho komqeqeshi, uLambie, ibengoyena mdlali ufanelwe kukukhokela kolu tyelelo lwaseNgilane.  
“UPatrick uyinxalenye yeqela labadlali abakhokelayo naMabhoko-bhoko ngokubanzi. Lo mdlali uqhuba kakuhle kakhulu kwiqela lakhe futhi uyabahlonipha oogxa bakhe.  
Uyazazi izithethe zomdlalo wombhoxo, unolwazi oluphangaleleyo lomdlalo nendlela esidlala ngayo. Andithandabuzi nakancinci, uLambie uzakuqhuba kakuhle njengoKapteni,” utshilo uCoetzee. 
Ethetha emva kokutyunjwa kwakhe uLambie uthe”Ukudlalela iqela lesizwe yinto enkulu kum – kodwa ukulikhokela ngumsebenzi omkhulu kakhulu.  
UMzantsi Afrika unembali entle embhoxweni kwaye iqela lilonke liyazingca ngokumela ilizwe.”
title: ULambie uzakukhokela amaBhoko-bhoko

text:
Kutsho kwathi qabu kwinkampu yeqela lesizwe loMzantsi Afrika emva kokuba liphumelele umdlalo okokuqala kwiCosafa Cup.  
IBafana Bafana ivuthulule iNamibia ngamagowuli amane kwelinye (4-1) kumdlalo obumhle kakhulu ePeter Mokaba Stadium ngoLwesibini emalanga.  
Impumelelo yeqela likaStuart Baxter iswabulule iimbuso zabantu belizwe emva kokubethwa yiMadagascar ngo’4-3 kumapenela kumdlalo wokuqala.  
Emva kwemidlalo emibini, kuye kwanyanzeleka ukuba acacise indlela iqela lakhe elidlala ngayo. UBaxter usebenzisa imidlalo yeCosafa Cup njengeqonga elinokuthi lilole izakhono zabadlali anokuthi abasebenzise xa iqela lakhe lizama indlela eya kwitumente yezwekazi leAfrika ezayo. 
NguLebohang Maboe odlakaze iNamibia ngamagowuli amabini athe kamva enza wangumdlali oqaqambileyo emdlalweni. Amanye amagowuli amabini afakwe nguSiyanda Xulu noAubrey Modiba ngepenela. 
“Kula mdlalo wethu neMadagascar sadlala kakubi ngoba sasingenaye umdlali wasemva ekunene. Kwanyanzeleka ukuba sigobe uSiyanda Xulu ukuze adlale la ndawo. Kumdlalo wayizolo, iqhinga lethu lisebenzile ngoba umdlalo wethu ukwazile ukuvumela uModiba ukuba aye phambili. Sayinika umhlaba wokudlala iMadagascar – kodwa siye sayilungisa lo nto ngethuba sidlala neNamibia. Bekungekho sicwangciso sakudlalela ukungabethwa emdlalweni,” utshilo uBaxter emva komdlalo. 
UMzantsi Afrika uza kudibana neBotswana kumdlalo oza kube usePeter Mokaba Stadium emalanga ngoLwesihlanu. Lo mdlalo ubonwa njengempinda yalowo owaphunyelelwa yiBafana Bafana ngo2016 kwiCosafa Cup.
title: Kuthe qabu kwinkampu yeBafana Bafana

text:
UMzantsi Afrika uzimisele ukuyikhusela indebe yeCosafa Women’s Championship owayiphumelela kunyaka ophelileyo. Kodwa nangona kunjalo, indlela yawo kufuneka igqithe kwiZimbabwe eyingozi emdlalweni ophambi kwamagqibelakankqoyi ozakube ungentsimbi yesithathu emalanga namhlanje, eWolfson Stadium. Abadlali beqela lesizwe lamantombazana (aBanyana Banyana) kulindeleke lidlule kwiZimbabwe emva kokufumana inkutho enkulu emidlalweni yalo kwiCosafa. Ukuza kuthi ga kwesi isigaba, aBanyana Banyana baqala bavuthulula iComoros ngemvula yamagowuli alishumi elinesixhenxe eqandeni (17-0). Emva koko balandelise ngeMalawi abayibetha ngamagowuli amathathu kwelinye (3-1) – phambi kokubethwa iMadagasca ngamagowuli amathathu eqandeni (3-0) ngoMvulo wale iveki. 
 
Umdlalo wona ngeke ube lula ngoba nayo iZimbabwe iqhube kakuhle kakhulu emidlalweni yayo kwaye iyakwazi ukufaka amagowuli. Into abanokuqiniseka ngayo abalandeli bebhola kukuba umdlalo wanamhlanje uza kuba namagowuli ngoba omabini amazwe (SA vs Zimbabwe) akonwabele ukufaka amagowuli kwitumente yalo nyaka ebanjelwe kwisixeko saseBhayi kwakhona. Omnye wabadlali abathe bafinca ikhulu lemidlalo (100) abayidlalele iqela lesizwe nguMamello Makhabane. “Sisoloko silangazelela ukudlala umdlalo ongcono. Ukuphumelela kwethu imidlalo emithathu kule tumente yinto esikhuthazayo kakhulu emva kokungaqhubi kakuhle kwiNdebe yeHlabathi. Siza kuvavanywa yiZimbabwe ngoba akululanga ukudlala nayo. Kunyanzelekile sidlale ngokuzimisela okukhula xa sidlala nayo,” utshilo uMakhabane emva komdlalo ngoMvulo. 
Omnye umdlalo oza kukhupha elinye iqela eliza kuya emdlalweni wokugqibela uphakathi kweZambia neBotswana. Amazwe aza kulwela indawo yesithathu kwiCosafa aza kudibana ngoMgqibelo ngentsimbi yesithathu emalanga. Emalanga ngeCawe, kuza kuvalwa itumente ngomdlalo wokugqibela.
title: ABanyana Banyana bazimisele ukuyinyathela iZimbabwe eyingozi

text:
Ukufundela ekhaya, ukufunda kungekho mbane kwanoxinzelelo obeludlala engqondweni ngenxa yeCovid-19. 
Ezi zezinye zezinto ezithethwe ngabafundi abathe baphumelela emagqabini kuGrade 12 ka2020. AmaXhosa athi ningaxhentsa nonke, kodwa ubugcisa bokuxhentsa bukubantu abathile. Iinkwenkwezi ziyakhanya zonke, kodwa ukukhanya kwazo esibhakabhakeni akufani. 
Kubafundi abangamawaka ngamawaka eMpuma Koloni abathe babhala iimviwo zikaGrade 12 nyakenye, abanye babo baye bakwazi ukuphumelela emagqabini. Kodwa basixhenxe kuphela abathe babizelwa eMandla Makupula Education Leadership Institute eStirling eMonti ngoLwesibini, ukuya kunikwa amawonga. 
USimamkele Bhongo waseXolilizwe SSS kuGatyana, ebengomnye wabo. UBhongo ungoyena mfundi othe wagqwesa elizweni nasephondweni phantsi kwebakala lezikolo eziphuma kwiindawo ezihlelelekileyo.
